euen vntoo last day certeynly straunge confuzion diuisions ceasse bee seene christendome wherof cause harken vntoo god yeeld full authoritie woord fault shalbee layd charge iudgment god vnlesse turne new leafe lord father mercie graunt grace doo according supplication made holy assembly called vppon according onely name iesus christ thing wee desire heere cace concerneth bringing newe deuyce fancie men nother stryue wee make victorie fall vppon men side whatsoeuer bee surmyze god woord may haue vpper hand ageinst abuse superstition lye satan may toogither giue glory god confessing father haue ouershamefully forgotten insomuch haue folowed holy lawe haue bowed asyde ryght hand left truly whensoeuer reade woord tung wee vnderstand heare preached clared purely allureth v make lyke acknow gedment hath doone much late yeeres stri ng mercie ageinst malice world dyuerse aue returned intoo ryghtway others yea euen de rees doo followe styll anew yit ynough vnlesse th residew haue hithertoo bin deaf asleepe doo bethinke themselues awake good earnest haue eares heare sayeth iesus christ therefore wee intreate exhort god name may discharge themselues promis whereuntoo baptim dooth secretly bynd hath bin sayd therein besydes lyuely voyces trew inisters bookes conteyning faythfull exposition scripture wee offer heere sermon iohn caluin vppon epistle apostle saint paule ephesian wee hope shall haue matter fare better playner vnderstanding thing shall eyther heare preached reade alone themselues afterward mak long rehersall thing myght bee alledged commendation doctrine herein conteyned manner teaching vsed author simple familiar yit neuerthelesse full authoritie force needfull wee bee sure seeke god honour owne saluation shall reading perceyue author none meaning shall euen malicious sorte themselues bee driuen confesse spyte harte wherefore conclude ryght deare brother shall meete book wee pray new agein giue eare god sonne mayster seruant excellent minister church declareth thing holy apostle long ago preached lyuely voyce afterward compyled breefly wryting v shall com v worldes end degree soeuer bee haue bin shrinke backe forasmuch god speaketh hath loued v arely hath spared owne sonne hath giuen death redeeme v death vayne tradition father come therefore let v serue god one accord walking wayes teacheth v forsaking owne say disagreeth rule woord making giftes serue glory dooyng wee shall bee christian name deede wee shall discharge selues promise made baptim wee shall see good agreement christianitie wee shall serue good example iewes turkes yit enemyes christendome bee bee amen brother lord causers sermon bee brought lyght pthe argument saint paules epistle ephesian well ynough knowen ephesus citie lesser asia renowmed many cause luke reporteth actes lord got himselfe people seruice paule church furtherance ee touch nothing heere onely hich belongeth properly argument epistle saint paule taught ephesian pure doctrine gospell prisoner rome perceyuing eede bee confirmed wrate epistle hem three first chapter standeth heefly vppon prayzyng magnyfying god grace beginning first chap r greeting speaketh god free election end knowe called kingdome heauen bycause bin predestinated vntoo lyfe borne heerin shineth foorth god wonderfull mercy sauing soules commeth god free adoption trew nd naturall welspring thereof forasmuch men wittes weake conceyue hygh secret prayeth god inlighten ephes an full knowledge christ second chapter better set foorth grea nesse god grace putteth rememberance wretched till called iesus christ comparing present state former state toogither wee neuer perceyue sufficiently greatly wee bee beholden lord iesus consider becommeth v greate benefyts towa d v except bee layd afore v contrarie part wretched state without also amplifyeth matter new agein saying bi gentile straungers promise eternall lyfe god made alonly iewes th rd chapter sheweth apostleship bin apoynted peculiarly gentyles intent bin straungers long tyme myght bee graffed intoo people god bycause vnaccustomed thing one trubbled many men mynds newnesse therof calleth secret hidden tymes saying neuerthelesse vttering secret committed vntoo towards end prayeth god agein giue ephesian perfect lyuely knowledge iesus christ may couet knowe thing woords goeth make ephesian acknowledge greate number benefyts gracious gift god bestowed uppon shewe themselues thankfull yeelding themselues wholy vnto also intendeth rather put owne calling lykelyhood aint paule afrayd least false apostle ould step trubble fayth making th eleeue bin halfe instructed hera bin gentyles newly eyued trew christen doctrine ear ceremony circumcision spoken intended bring lawe vre among christian sayd consecrated god circumsion ere vnholie common song one ought bee reckened among people god circumcysed al ceremony commaunnded moyses ought ee kept cause spake euill paule making iesus christ common gentyles well iewes affirmed apostleship vnhallowing eauenly doctrine bycause sort offer set forth couenant grace vncleane people without difference therfore end ephesian bein assayled launders chaunge mynds ended giue remedie wheras n one syde telleth aduyzedly heir called gospell ad bin chozen making world warneth syde thinke gospell came haphazard apoyntment men lyghted lappes aladuenture telleth wheras christ preached preaching nothing else vttering publishing god euerlasting determination setteth vnhapie plight former life eye therwithal putteth mynd getting deepe gulf singular woonderfull mercie god wheras speaketh apostleship committed towards gentyles dooth strengthen fayth receyued bycause call ng intoo communion christes church wrought god neuerthelesse looke many sentence heere many warning chere vp ephesian acknowledge god bene yts fourth chapter descrybeth meane wherby lord gouerneth maynteyneth church namely gospell preached men wheruppon foloweth verie full poynt perfection churche cannot otherwyse bee kept vp vnappayred therfore apostle meaning commend vntoo ephesian ministerie wherby god reigneth among v afterward commeth speake fruts preaching wit innocencie holinesse dewties christen man onely teacheth lyues christian ought bee generall also interlaceth particular instruction concerne euery man peculiar calling vocation sermon iohn caluin vpon saint paules epistle ephesian gathered ordinarie writer benefite edifying lordes church first sermon vpon first chapter paule apostle iesus christ vvill god holie faithfull one iesus christ vvhich ephesus grace bee peace god father lord iesus christ blissed bee god father lord iesus christ vvhich hath blessed v vvith spirituall blessing heauenly thing christ reade epistle paule wrate abrode diuerse place must alwayes consider god met serue one time alone certaine people euer generally whole church truly man cosider wel doctrine conteined easie discerne god intent herd thing spoken euen rldes ende also hath care v hath ot ouerslipped forgotten thing might welfare nd saluation slainne epistle haue taken expound paule confirmeth bin trayned gospell ende might knowe ing wheruppon must rest vppon trewe lawfull perfect wi ome adde anything theruntoo lleth v bene te brought v lord hrist whereof wee bee excellent wee must needes bee tootoo vnthankefull wee iske fro folke neuer rest contented theruppon sheweth v also wee haue christ end wee sticke vntoo presume seeke helpe else assure selues hath bought v againe side sheweth v christ hath wel prouided church wee haue wit vse giftes grace offereth v wee shall haue full perfect happinesse therewithall warneth haue bin instructed truth gospell leade holy lyfe shewe haue profited ought doo god schoole thinges serue onely citie ephesus one countrie ne one age time wee neede bee furthered seyng diuell practizeth without ende ceassing thrust v way cannot leade v quite away doctrine iesus christ laboreth bring taste v way intangle v new curiosity onely bring passe wee may bee constant faith wee haue receiued stand alwayes mamering whensoeuer fancy ticklish certaine gap opened wype rememberance wee learned afore take many folie yea erroneous doctrine serue corrupt peruert purenesse faith see doctrine conteyned epistle directed dedicated vntoo v day god hath woonderfull prouidence dispozed thinges aforehand wee onely haue foundation gospell whereuppon ground selues also whereby faith may day day growe increase wee go still forward till wee come perfection first formest paule claymeth authoritie vntoo bin giuen god intent men stop person though bin mortall mannes saying deede lord iesus christ onely mayster whole hand wee must learnemath witnessed heauen onely none wee must giue eare vntoo hath alwayes bin god haue guyding owne church himselfe woord bee receyued without geynsaying hath giuen priuiledge creature1 tim whereas iesus christ ordeyned roome god father bycause god manifested fleshe infallible truth itselfe sdome time furthermore men speake must doo owne name alledge aught ne fancie brayne must faithfully set foorth thing god hath inioyned giuen charge thus yee see hy paule dooth euerywhere vse preface apostle lord iesus christ holdeth sure bsolute grounde man thrust foorth himselfe speake owne name nothing rashnesse taketh thing vppon belongeth alonely vntoo god ageine forasmuch lord iesus christ purposely sent last teacher wee might haue wisdome perfect vtterly without fault therefore dooth paule call himselfe apostle sent presuppozeth twoo thinges one paule charge committed vntoo acquited himselfe dewly imploying himselfe faithfully office called man best able xcellent world yet thrust foorth himselfe owne head trubbleth common order wee knowe god haue order disorder among v paule sayeth fowrteenth chapter first epistle corinthian speaketh leastwise teache must haue calling say must bee admitted haue charge giuen euery man may put foorth himselfe vnaduized zeale sayd afore speake paules callingact c needefull present wee knowe god gaue record auowed apostle deede disputeth much heere bycause knowen well ynough church ephesits forasmuch galathias bin trubbled deceyuers much paules authoritie yea name god himselfe bin disgraced wee sawe howe mainteyned owne state telling reuerence dew apostle iesus christ coulde bee taken himgal c c without ouerthrowing order god therfore ynough heere haue sayd one woord apostle iesus christ let v come seconde poynt touched namely ynough man bee called except discharge dewtie pure conscience vpright dealing office thing paule tooke vppon thing qutesion giuen sufficient proofe deceyuers may well boast themselues full mouth bee called wee see doo fight ageinst god woord sowe trubble darnell church would fayne make buckler calling also zeale needes bee called christian yea paule sufficiently proued came himselfe ne sought thing else spend himselfe building vp church forasmuch well knowen ephesusact wee may gather storie luke yea borne many hard brunt therefore thinketh ynough say one woorde apostle lorde iesus christ heere wee bee warned first holde selues pure doctrine wee knowe haue proceeded god wee cannot doo amisse wee followe rule bycause lord iesus christ wee haue performance requisite needefull instruction wee neede doubt whither wee may hold v gospell adde somewhat let v bee co tented take sonne god mayster specially vout afeth stoope lowe take charge vppon also protesteth wee haue profited well doctrine wee shall come trew marke wheruntoo wee go yee see first le n wee haue gather vpon text faith must wauer one way haue sure vnmoueable foundation rest vppon wit god truth euen conteyned gospell seyng paule sufficiently auowed vntoo v let v doubt god spirit speaketh v day mouth nother let v heere doctrine though subiec iudgement let v imprizon owne vnders ding wittes receyue without scanning except wee wilfully make warre ageinst god aduaunce selues aboue one thinges wee haue marke vppon text furthermore ende doctrine may onely bee reuerenced among v also bee amiable v let v marke paule speaketh name christ sent vntoo v god father bring v glad tydinges peace also let v beare mynd sayeth another text cor ordeyned bring message attonement beseecheth men god name bee reconcyled god told done make doctrine gospell sweete wee myght bee desirous giue selues whensoeuer told v god speaketh v ynough authorize shall speake yet might voyce therwithall bee weerie according see great mu ber confesse well ynough god deserueth obeyed haue men subiect meane start away shun farre bycause maketh afrayd iesus christ speaketh v mediator betweene god men wee may go boldly sayd epistle hebrewes wee bee mount sinayheb xod b lyghtenings flashed aire lawe published much beast come must haue dyed voyce therefore god vttered time terrible dayes seyng incorageth v gospell receyue grace offereth v mynded away rememberance sinnes let v suffer selues iustifyed free goodnesse let v bee peasable vntoo ought well moue v resort vntoo poore hungrie soules bee fed heauenly foode giue v thus yee see effect wee haue remember paule calleth himselfe apostle iesus christ whereas addeth vvill god serueth scanning ende men blame pre ptuosnesse though thought reputation men protesseth woorthinesse bycause pleased god chcoze office surely feyned humilitie sayeth set god mere grace choozing1 cor c wee see protesteth place woorthy honour rather serued vtter damnation1 tim therefore bee taken god infinite goodnesse exalted high bin murtherer christian shed blud martirs rayled ageynst god woord reporteth wee see feynednesse confession sayeth set state gree onely god serueth v great purpose intent wee esteeme god woord qualitie bring v one ordinarie police diuell vseth diminish reuerence god woord withall outface v person bring certaine wee bee frayle vessel valew yea euen good broken pot god hath ordeyned bee minister word2 cor treasure alwayes inestimable notwithstanding dyspizednesse vessells let v marke men come warrant v forgiuenesse sinnes saluation wee ought hope fayth must mount vp hygher stand scanning whether man bee woorthie bee herd inquyring maner person let v holde selues contented god meanes intendeth drawe v himselfe way wee must walke wee st p asyde wee e astray high way destruction let v marke well wee must submit selues god ordinance receiue without let doctrine preached v mouthes mortall men wee must bee wyze maner great number demaund whether god could send angells heauen teache v reuelations also maner buzibodies beare theselues hand haue holy ghost sleeues meanes wherof hold skorne receiue giftes bee delt abrode god end wee bee bewitched satan maner let v marke sayd heere god gospell preached mouthes men bee witness vntoo v whosoeuer exempteth himselfe order like cace thrust backe god hand offereth sure infallible recorde saluation thus yee see still wee haue marke vppon text ageine called beare abrode god woord ought take warning saint paules example walke lowelynesse wee wee compare selues sheweth v chozen sufficientnesse abilitie bycause god haue therefore let v assure selues wee holde thinges mere grace wee cannot chalendge aught selues vn esse wee mynd rob ryght wee knowe vnthankfulnesse bee borne withall hereuppon sayeth holy one ephe faythfull iesus christ trew name citie expressed heere yet haue touched alredie common v god hath ordeyned vse day wee must receiue paule still alyue mong v yea wee must onely haue eye vntoo partie sent although dyed finished race yit notwithstanding god spirit dyeth soeuer cace stand wee must learning beare mynd paule meaneth heere speaketh holy one iesus christ albeit wee bee tyme countrie people asia yit notwithstanding seying pleased god match v paule wrate time let v assure selues standeth v hand bee strengthened fayth wee haue receyued gorpell bycause intent purpose holy ghost incorage holde haue bin entered gospel yet weake haue neede larger confirmation let well mynd woordes sayd holy one iesus christ paule sheweth men nothing else feynednesse till god haue applyed owne seruice dedicated consecrated therunto faith wee vncleane nature neuer come v vnclenenesse trew men set glasse countenance vpon thing shalbe taken righ u may bee vertues shalbe commended euerywhere ac ing wee see man shall purchace fame great perfec haue gay thing wee must remember sayd fifteenth actes god clenzeth mennes faith great neede doo pro et ieremie sayeth manmes hart dungeon horrible confuzionierem selues perceiue god hath cleerer eye wee owsoeuer cace stand let v assure selues ho nesse men surmize themselues haue corruption vt ly abhominable god till time made one belief gospell therfore marke schoole poynt none holynesse lyked allowed god bande holynesse beleeuers except wee first become christi wee bee blynde neuer yeelde god dewtie although none leadwnesse ynough marre vertues wee could haue besides againe seyng spirit perfection spirit feare god spirit righteousnesse spirit purenesse abydeth resteth iesus christ certeine separated haue nothing else vyce maner vnclenenesse much euer world fawne vppon side let v marke also boast themselues beleefe gospell sanctifyed god doo bewray owne hipocrisie lying dote themselues owne lyfe whatsoeuer mouth sing say according wee see many dayes defyle vnhalowe name faith ought bee holie euerie man say faithfull haue least faith boldest say faith themselues would god one halfe v wee see euen among beare name christian whole life disordered looce much mocke god full despyze religion yet notwithstanding doo meane whyle thinke haue sayd already haue great wrong bee taken good chrirtions catholikes yet wee see paule knitteth thing toogither vnseparable bond namely wee haue faith gospell wee must therwithall giue ouer selues wholly vntoo god separate selues corruption world according wee haue seene epistle galathiansgal sayeth comming lord iesus christ end wee bee sanctifyed blud yeeld obedience hensfoorth purenesse vntoo god father sayeth another place1 thess wee bee called vnclenenesse vntoo right ousnesse intent god name bee honored glorified v thus yee see wee haue remember preface end wee may bee better prepared receiue conteyned epistle may haue authoritie among v deserueth moreouer bee made amyable v wee may vnderstad singular benefite learne paules hand forsomuch witnesseth grace lord iesus christ vntoo v leadeth v god bee reconcyled vntoo wheras wee bee naturally child wrath furthermore wee may stand fauour wee may bee hold call vppon father bee sure also taketh v child theruppon thanksgiuing lift vp mennes harte acknowledge much bee bound beholden vntoo god specially conside hath shewed himselfe bountifull towardes foorth himselfe maner sortes essed sayeth bee god father lord iesus vvhich hath blissed v vvith spirituall blissings hea ly thing heauenly place christ forasmuch chiefe god requireth mennes hand ac wledge benefites thankfull paule sidereth first maye prouoke doo wee bee rechlesse pitie see wee well confesse chiefe studie indeuer ought bee well ordered lyfe wit praise god man aske v wherefore wee bee world wherefore god hath care v wherfore goodnesse feedeth cherisheth v finally dooth put eye great number bestoweth vppon v end wee acknowledgement vntoo sayd psalme wee side cannot profit nother requyreth else v exchaunge thanksgiuing according hundred sixteenth psalme shall render benefites haue receyued onely cuppe welfare hand call vppon name see euer wee bring vntoo god ac owledge selues bound thing yet dischargeth dewtie hundredth part b halfe rather v greatest least doo defraud much wee ceasse leawdnesse bury praise ought ring mouthes cause lord rebuketh v negligence wheras holy scripture exhorteth v praise god vseth many woordes pur ose let v thinke bee super ous let v acknow edge bee many vpbraydings churlishnesse vn dnesse fayling thing requisite yee would principall poynt life trew holy ghost ooth oftentimes set foorth reason wee shoud magnifye god name order nature fruites earth yeeldeth ayde help god giueth v thing sufficient matter wherfore prayse god paule leadeth v hygher heere haue v glorifye god aboue thing bycause thinkes ynough haue set v worlde cherish v haue prouided thing needfull passing transitorie lyfe also hath chozen v bee heires kingdome heauenly lyfe wee dubble bound vntoo god much streytly ignorant vnbeleeuing wretch although bee sufficiently bonnd alredye yit notwithstanding good hath doone v iesus christ without comparison excellent noble bycause hath adopted v bee child truely inasmuch wee bee men wee bee nomber creature hath fashioned owne image image defaced v sin corruption wherwith bee atteinted adam disobediece heritage haue wee wrath endlesse death bee shorte wee bee woorthy bee reckened number brute beast wee abide state wee haue nature seyng god maketh v member onely sonne setteth v aray angel prepareth v become parttakers owne nature glory sayeth peter first epistle pet ought wee perceiue hygh noble grace rauish v wholly loue thus yee see thinges paule ment say text first wee bee heere exhorted apply whole indeuer praising god verily bycause wee bee cold slothfull behalfe wee bee driuen inforced thereuntoo besydes paule one respect feede v wise grace haue gospell wee may couet thing thing ordinary manor see fickle wee bee nature god good vntoo v set woord v wee needes haue thinges beside nothing content v cause wee bee dull neuer conceiued vnderstoode god sheweth v word shal see heereafter know loue god sheweth v lord iesus christ haue wish vpward downward farre wyde also paule dooth call vpon v blisse god end holde v doctrine wherin consisteth fulnesse felicitie leastwise skill vse profit thermore let v marke also without cause sayeth spirituall blissings although wee cannot eate bit drinke drop water without theft godward except cknowledge confesse therein sheweth himselfe towards v yit notwithstading thing concerne transitory life nothing respect thinges serue euerlasting welfare soules deede paules exhorting v heere praise god heauenly blis wise therwithall giueth v incling bee pacient bee pinched respect flesh haue ge god cutteth v short pittance hand v tenderly would bee two thing therfore con ed heere one learne knowe wherin perfect happinesse consisteth wit lyfe wee hope hid v yit intent bee tyed world marke one poynt se ly world shake v dispize v men make stocke v wee must settle selues pacience despizers god vaunt themselues pompe brauerie eemeth wee bee vnhappie respect much v suffer hunger thirst othersome trubbled vexed ongfully wee must looke euen bycause wee content selues heauenly blissings god bestowed vpon v must great hygh inesti le prerogatiue make v ouerpasse incomberances conceiue whensoeuer god exercizeth tryeth v worlde many affliction haue v indure scarcitie pe rie many thing effect thing wee haue arke streyne wee go foreward rest let v marke oord blissing taken diuers sences paule applyeth ther god selues said wee blisse god blisseth v maner dooth blisse v wee blisse blisseth v wee come farre short haue edged alreadie sixteenth psalme seruices doo good agein must needes conclude haue also alledged hundred xvi psalme wee bring vntoo god acknowledgement wee bee beholden good thing wee haue yee see blissing yeeld sacrifice praize vntoo god let serue one poynt god blisseth v onely woordes filling v bestowing thing vppon v wee want farre foorth needefull woord blissing attributed vntoo bycause needeth trauell take much paine helpe seruantes giue thing knoweth bee expedient doo say woord say doo vtter thing doone forasmuch god hauing created world onely woord hath power also doo v good alonely behyghting therefore sayd wee become riche onely blissing say shewing louing fauorable v let v see wee bee bee excuzed defraud god dew disdeyning open lippes confesse howe much wee bee bound beholden vntoo wee haue receyued many benefites hand let blissinges men world giue vntoo god bee layd intoo balance ageinst onely blissing wherwith inricheth v shall outwey alledge must bee fayne confesse nother doo say thing aught woorth wheras side god sheweth v hath requisite welfare therefore without cause paule sayeth heere faithfull must giue apply wittes indeuers blisse god seyng giueth great cause else bee vnthankfull starke churles therefore speaketh twoo thinges father lord iesus christ vvhich hath blissed v christ whereas sayeth god father lord iesus christ must bee layd foorth maner namely god wee feele fauorable vntoo v father lord iesus christ circumstance deserueth bee well marked thereby paule dooth v vnderstand god benefites specially belong heauenly lyfe euerlasting saluation soules cannot come v except iesus christ bee cundit pype wee may bee made parttakers therefore let v marke well wee bee shet thing concerne saluation iesus christ become mene trew doo eate drinke glut themselues vttermost shyneth vpon yet howsoeuer fare speake inioy thinges god giueth vsurp without lawfull tytle made god child yea respect lord iesus christ short paule shewing god hath giuen himselfe sayeth bycause father lord iesus told euen heere matter standeth eating drinking vppon farre greater preciouser namely god hath adopted v child ye effect wee haue beare mynd wbeit better profiting selues streyne let must brydle selues least wee wander intoo wee knowe god father lord papist haue word god often mouthes lykewyse woorde iesus christ meane whyle haue disfigured iesus christ doctrine gospell wherin bee seene god howbeit confuzed imaginatio meane knowe truly wo e god worship turkes doo wee know lord iesus fourth iohn sayth haue rule themselues well wote worship continually forge idolls themselues therfore one way haue good infallible accesse vntoo god beholding lyuely image maiestie farre deepe v iesus christ hath himselfe v applyed himselfe weaknesse v whatsoeuer requysite knowe wee myght god father yee see wee must haue lord christ way intent wee stray seing father head made one v yee wee may haue accesse come familiarly vntoo without mediatour wee shet maiestie god must need make heares head stand vp feare consider calleth himselfe father head wee knowe also must need auow v child bycause hath bought v furthermore although paule doo set downe heere one woord spirituall blissinges yit notwithstanding sheweth god hath shewed himselfe bountifull towardes v mo wayes one therof make large declaration hereafter laying foorth benefites particularly wee obteyne gospell chapter full howsoeuer eace standeth yit dooth giue v vnderstand streyne god giuing gracious gyfts vnto v patch parcells making v taste wet finger away say hath giuen v diuersly fully wee haue cause magnifie respectes therfore let v vnderstand seyng iesus christ giuen vntoo v wee obteyne auaylable saluation make v happie according also paule speaketh eyght romanes onely sonne bee giuen vntoo v benefites hath bee communicated v meanes howsoeuer wee fare let v learne fauour god spirituall giftes wise wittes may bee gathered home make much bringing therof passe let v beware wee haue myndes much wedded world verie cause draweth v away perceyue hundredth part good god hath doone v apply benefites profit owne vanitie bycause euery v begulleth himselfe owne fond wandering lustes therfore let v learne shake thing stop v comming lord iesus christ although naughtie nature prouoke v seeke transitorie thing world yit let v doo indeuer withdrawe wee may yeeld selues free hart vntoo god bee earnestly mynded obey giue self wholly vntoo haue v ioyned vnto thing wee haue marke vppon paule hauing spoken spirituall blissings addeth immediatly heauenly place thinges whereby ment shewe wee bee receiue gracious giftes communicated v iesus christ god would haue v possesse till howe thing world ought wherefore wee knowe wee bee made dwell alwayes world wee must wayfarer euerlasting heritage heauen let v thereuppon make thitherwarde selues although wee bee feeble faynt plucke vp good hart pray god giue moreouer yee see cause paule setteth downe blissings doo v wit wheras diuell traynes thrust way god prouide hath store blissings destroy euer may bee ageinst let v fall downe maiestie good god faultes praying touche v wee may bee brought trew repentance may condemne selues seeke lord iesus christ wee want one day brayd stedfastly lyues end whatsoeuer befall v alwayes assure selues haue cause praise wee poore miserable world ynough quiet v sweeten affliction giue v contentation wee may neuerthelesse mouthes open blisse god shewing himselfe kynd liberall towards v euen adopt v child shewe v heritage hath bin purchaced v sonne redie v wee misse go trew inuincible constancie fayth please graunt grace v also c pthe second sermon vppon first chapter blissed bee god father lord iesus christ hath blissed v spirituall blissing heauenly thing christ according choozing v foundation world end wee bee holy vnblamable charitie wee haue seene heeretofore paule exhorted v praise blisse god bycause hath blissed v earthly maner spirituall maner end wee learne holde selues contented god shewing fatherly goodnesse loue towards v opening gate kingdome heauen vnto v hope much although wee bee subiect much miserie world yit good reason wee content selues god choozing v fashion calling v according witnessed v gospellmath b luk father namely much hath knit v lord iesus christ member head paule bringeth v originall welspring rather principall cause tha caused god take v fauour ynough god hath vttered reasures goodnesse mercy vppon v drawe v hope heauenly lyfe gospell yit much paule added wee see presently myght haue bin god grace common al men offereth without exception consequen ly euery man receyue owne freewill meanes whereof e bee deseruing v men receyue god grace myght bee sayd god hath shewed mankynd parttakers lord iesus christ atteyne fayth yee see might bee deemed paule exclude deseruing behalfe shew commeth god onely free goodnesse sayth hath blissed v according v aforehand say exalt god becommeth v wee must looke vppon difference betweene man man gospell preached wote vtterly shet make rayne one coast suffer another coast dry bee demaunded god pitieth one part forsaketh giueth ouer none answere pleaseth uppon preaching gospell shalbee touched lyuely faith harte go away ageine came without faring whit else harden themselues ageinst god bewray hidden whereof commeth euen god amendeth one sort holy leaueth sort naturall corruption yee see thing wherein god goodnesse shyneth foorth vntoo preaching gospell v wee haue pitieth v loueth v calleth v allureth v doctrine preached v receyued v effectually yit speciall token wee perceyue god intendeth bee father hath v bee child without cause doth paule say streyne wee bee blissed god euen according v aforehand wee selues come wee selues seeke notesai saying prophet esay must bee fulfilled namely god sheweth himselfe sought farre doo see neere sayeth heere heere although despyzed mee yit doo voutsafe come bycause haue care welfare thus wee see paule amed bee short wee haue marke heere wee shall neuer know saluation commeth till haue lifted vp myndes god euerlasting purpose wherby hath chozen thought left residew owne confuzion fall maruell though men thinke doctrine straunge hard agreeth whit man naturall wit man aske philosopher wil alwayes tell god loueth worthy forasmuch vertue pleaseth dooth also marke giuen theretoo hold people yee see owne imagination wee deeme god putteth none difference man man louing hating eche man owne worthinesse deseruing waye let v remember also owne vnderstanding nothing vanitie wee must measure god meetyard excessyue ouerweening bynd god stake thing wee could conceyue myght seeme ryghtfull eye matter therfore concerneth heere reuerencing god secret incomprehensible v without wee doo wee shall neuer taste principle fayth wee knowe wisdome ought alwayes begin humilitie humilitie much say must fall weying god iudgments owne balance take vpo v iudges determiner wee must bee sober bycause weaknesse wit forasmuch wee bee grosse dull wee must magnifie godpsal b say wee bee taught holy scripture lord thy determination great deepe man able recken vp vntoo thee yee see cause men fynd doctrine hard irksome bee much wedded owne opinion cannot submit themselues god wisdome receiue saying soberly modestly truly ought take warning paule sayeth1 cor namely man owne mother wit vnderstadeth god secretes taketh bee starke foolishnesse wee bee c unsell must haue thing reueled v holy spirit else neuer know must haue measure giueth vnto v paule speaketh thing wee know experiece wit god childre gouerneth v holy spirit comforteth v aduersities strengtheneth v pacience conceyue thing vnlesse inlyghtened holy ghost shall wee vnderstand thing much hygher namly god choze v making world sith cace standeth let v learne put away wee conceyue owne lay vnder foot let v receyue whatsoeuer god v discharging selues vtterly selfweening selues wee cannot bring thing owne syde beastlynesse thus yee see wee haue beare mynd good sooth wee see paule exhorteth v come poyntrom art thou man sayeth standest thy god set downe many replyes make sayeth art thou man word man make v perceyue owne frayltypsal c wormes earth rottenesse malipertnesse open mouthes dispute god pe uerting whole nature power plucke sunne latch moone betwixte teeth say much lesse lawful v contend god alledge reason iudgments wee cannot comprehend graunt doctrine predestination bee wherof paule treateth heere yit would myght neuer bee spoken yea shew themselues bee fooles controllyng holie ghoste spake prophet apostle yea euen mouth god iohn g lord iesus intendeth assure v sendeth v euerlasting election lykewise magnifie gift faythiohn c one tenth ihon sixth therefore kynd folke come put god silence wype thing holye shewed whole scripture tim paule spake lawe prophet therfore mee also may conclude superfluitie gospell thing serueth good purpose whereby wee may bee edifyed faith feare god doctrine conteyned holy ghost speaketh lowd shirle therefore must needes bee manichies intend nip gospell looke lyketh set aside forged gospell diuerse peeces allowing nothing themselues thought good maner haue shewed diuelish stubbornnesse ageinst god separating thing ought go toogither vnseparable bond malicious froward also would dayes haue doctrine election kept silence woulde ouerrule god possible stop mouth oft vttereth thing lyketh agein man may euidently see beastlynesse paule better proofe whereby magnifie god goodnesse none reason yit better whole world go confuzion doctrine bee suppressed silence reason god set infinite treasure mercy eye yit spoken bee thrust vnder foote yit twoo reason mo shewe doctrine needefull bee preached wee reape great profit bin much better wee neuer bin borne bee ignorant thing paule sheweth heere twoo thinges wherat wee must chiefly ame whereuntoo behoueth v apply wittes indeuers bee summe thinges god teacheth v holy scripture one magnifying god deserueth assurednesse saluation om c wee may call vppon father full libertie wee haue twoo thinges wo woorth v nother fayth religion v well may wee talke god shalbee leazing touching first poynt haue tolde alreadie god grace sufficiently knowen se ting god election eye put cace god drawe men alyke intend obteyne saluation must come owne free selfmouing certeine wee deserue bee receyued god hand handle euery man according worthinesse wherin shall god goodnesse bee magnifyed euen preuenteth v owne mere free good wil loueth v neuerthelesse without fynding thing eyther v woorkes loue v bee trew must needes bee election god must take one sort bycause thinketh good doo leaue thus ye see assured point god glory doth appeere shyne foorth requisite except knowen sheddeth foorth goodnesse loue pleaseth sayd euen preaching word singuler benefyte v cause sayd often lawe god hath delt nation linage abrahadeut voutsaf chooze adopt lawe sure record child exhorted prayse god bycause vo safed gyue law meane whyle let poore entyles folk perteyned yit farre specialler priuiledge maketh v fare better woord certeyne eares myght bee beaten thing bee told v wee bee neuer vntill god speake v holy spirit within v matter god sheweth dubble grace2 cor one vp men preache gospell v man meete doo himselfe needes therefore must bee god doo call v offer v hope saluation yit let v marke well wee cannot beleeue except v holy spirit speake harte holy ghost well hath spoken eares manesai cause prophet esay sayeth beleeued doctrine arme lord sheweth fayth world till god haue mennes myndes harte power holy cause also dooth lord iesus sayiohn c commeth except bee drawen father hath learned father sayeth submitteth mee short wee see manifestly god sheweth v voutsafeth inlyghten v holy end wee bee drawen fayth gospell doone commonly indifferently men yit wee haue cause magnify god wee see hardened othersome vnconstant go without taking profit thing haue heard othersome bee altoogither blockishe certaine god grace apparant vsact g according luke paules preaching many beleeued saluation uerily number people great paules sermon doubt side grace ought haue moued euen stone yit great sort continued vnbeleefe stubbornnesse othersome beleeued luke sayeth playnly cause therof one sort forewarde folke towardnesse vertue one god foreordeyned saluation therefore one woord wee see mannes deseruing must ceasse layd vnder foote else god shall haue deserued praise yea wee must vnderstand fayth commeth selues woorthinesse woorkes trew fayth wee confesse nothing wretchednesse v wee bee damned accursed wee bring aught v onely acknowledgement sinnes yit fayth serue desert owne breeding wee must therefore conclude impossible men beleeue vnlesse bee giuen aboue surely paule declareth heere thing well woorthie bee marked sayeth blissed bee god cause euen inriching v wise iesus christ lyfe happie blissed afterward addeth according choozing v fayth comprehended among spirituall rich whereof paule maketh mention yi chiefe fayth wee receyue holy ghost fayth wee become patient aduersitiesh b fayth become obedient god fayth wee bee sanctifyed seruice bee short fayth continueth alwayes chiefe spirituall benefites god bestoweth vppon v let v remember well paules order sayth god hath giuen v fayth well rest according choozing v wee see fayth dependeth vppon god election else wee must make paule lyer touching first poynt yee see cannot abyde haue predestination plainly openly spoken deadly enemy god grace would deface vttermost power sayd afore hyding therof ouerthrowing religion second poynt assurednesse saluation papist say wee must dout wee cannot come vntoo god otherwyze opinion wyll receyue v assure selues ought wee doo great presumtuousnesse wee pray vntoo god wee must call leastwize scholers lord iesus christ taught v doo doo wee call father sure selues father nothing hipocrisie prayer first wee vtter shalbee stark lye papistes therfore neuer pray vntoo god seing say ought themselues saluationeph c wee shall see chapter specially scripture sheweth wee pray ryghtly wee must haue beleef iesus christ giueth v vppon trust wee conceyue boldnesse world go wee must bee mamering yet dout throughly resolued perswaded selues god v child may bee imbracing fayth offereth v gospell selues also wee bee grounded euerlasting fayth depend vppon selues surely would v myght bee shaken aboue although wee bee kept preserued fayth peter1 pet yit god keepeth preserueth v grounded vppon god eternall election satan myght plucke v euery minute houre wee day constantest worldluke c yit myght wee morrowe lord iesus sheweth v remedie v ageinst temptation sayeth come selues heauenly father bringeth mee haue taken intoo keepingluke bee acknowledge inheritance god father hath giuen charge put hand wee see besides setting foorth glory saluatio also warranted god eternall ought bee sufficient cause moue v consider paule treateth place trew haue touched alredie many men starkle heere god hath chozen thought good rest wee see number come vnto small hath refuzed rest uerily would say god ought stand rule towardes behoueth v markepsal first god bound vntoo person wee foredeele hand neuer little beholden vntoo v might well go lawe hun forasmuch side nothing bounde vntoo v wee altoogither vntoo let v see wee shall win contending wee needes constreyne god deale alyke men haue lesse libertie mortall creature man bee riche may doo listeth owne good bee liberall one reason bee sewed lawe euery man demaund lyke summe behold man good aduanceth one loueth poore folke come require doo much bound dewtie fond thing uerily man may adopt farthest straunger world chyld heiremath g free doo behold god liberall men maketh sunne shyne vppon good bad onely reserueth certeine part men bestowe priuiledge adopting child shall wee gayne murmuring ageinst man say seeme bee accepter personscoloss choozeth riche letteth poore go choozeth noble men gentlemen1 cor rather men estimation bace degree therefore cannot bee sayd accepting person god choozing vnwoorthy hath respect owne mere goodnesse nother passeth whether one bee woorth another taketh listeth would wee good reason hold selues contented god brydle selues let chooze listeth bycause souereine rule equitie rightrom yee see mouthes world stopped although wicked athenish sort doo grudge repyne god yea blaspheme dooing yit myghtie ynough maynteyne owne rightuousnesse infinite wisdome haue chattered fill yit must bee confounded end part wee see paule sayeth heere darke doctrine sayeth god hath blissed v uerily inasmuch hath inlyghtened v fayth gospell holy spirit made v parteners grace lord iesus christ euen therby sayeth hath shewed choozen v making world therefore let v vnderstand god grace aryght wee must sayd afore come originall cause wit vntoo election wee passe tent better respect woorthynesse men myght pretend wee bee inclyned chalendge alwayes somwhat cannot abyde bee brought nothing sayeth world forasmuchas wee think selues haue wee haue paule heere beate downe fantasticall cause sayeth wee could put selues wee yet borne nay verily god choze v taking world could wee bring vntoo papist haue suttle shift behalfe say god chaze vntoo saluation yet deserued yit foresawe shoulde deserue thus confesse eseruing went election eyther order god thinges open knewe bee worthie maner doo papist speake deny god election soothly shewe nowadayes cannot abyde haue spoken diuells incarnate maynteyne outrageous wickednesse papist wee must note god haue chozen predestinated thought making world stand vntoo thing diuells deny would haue god maiestie vtterly ouerthyowing ordinaunce maner leastwyze haue walked vprightest speake monk freers called schoole diuines yit election god free choze man respect pleased himselfe mingle turmoyle al say whe choze listed make deserue doo ground merites insomuch men may win kingdome heauen owne graunt deede touching election free gift lwayes returne fantasticall surmyze god doo good foresee could bee wee knowe adam ofspring corrupted wee haue skill thinke one good thought doyng well much lesse therefore able doo well deede although god tarie v hundred thousand yeers wee could continew long world yit certeine wee neuer come vntoo doo thing else increase mischiefe continually owne condemnation bee short longer men yue world deeper doo plundge themselues damnation therefore god could foresee thing v himselfe put intoo v come wee vntoo god obey wee haue quiet mynd yeeldeth selfe according fayth thing come followeth fayne doo himselfe wherfore let v consider saying god choze v creation world paule presuppozeth thing trew namely god could see thing v saue euill one droppe goodnesse fynd seying hath chozen v yee see manifest record free goodnesse causerom nynth romanes speaketh twoo twinnes iacob esawe time yit moothers womb done eyther good euill intent shoulde come onely caller worker sayd elder serue yonger wee see paule declareth large thing toucheth heere briefly wit whereas god choze v creation world therein sheweth sufficiently one man woorthie excellent another respect deseruing therefore seyng putting difference betweene iacob esawe doone eyther good euill came woorkes caller must praise bee yeelded vntoo god nothing bee reserued man yee see yit ageine wee haue marke heere paule sayeth wee chozen makyng world confirmeth thing yit better sayeth vvas doone iesus christ wee bin chozen selues myght sayd god found v secret vertue vnknowen men seyng hath chozen v saye selues shall wee reply doo man bycause loue cause loue bee sought bee wee bee lyke condition else wee must imagine lykelinesse god v expressly heere paule sayeth wee christ god eye vntoo v voutsafed haue vtterly abhorred v respect misery pitie compassion vppon v bycause loued v already christ must god needes haue patterne glasse wherin behold v say haue looked vppon lord iesus christ could v call v bee short paule hath wee could bring thing vntoo god owne free goodnesse choozing v creation addeth yit certeiner proofe namely ord iesus christ trew booke god voutsafyng chooze v wit voutsafyng euerlastingnesse registring v record holy scripture calleth god election lyfe sayd afore iesus christ serueth register wee bee ingraued god acknowledgeth child seyng god eye vntoo v iesus christ followeth fyndeth thing wee myght lay cause elect v thing wee haue remember afterward end pure god namely loue woord loue referred vntoo god sayd wee shall fynde reason god voutsafed take v child owne free loue else verye lyke paule trew soundnesse perfection faythfull walk rightuousnesse god wee cannot laye whole shall suffyze tell breefly whertoo eye sheweth heere although god free doo beate downe put away woorthinesse vertewes men yet notwithstanding serueth leaue doo euill lead disordered lyfe runne rouers rather withdraw v euil wherin wee plundged naturally wee doo nothing e se prouoke god wrath wickednesse alwayes reigne v wee bee hild downe vnder bond tyranny satan god therfore must bee fayne woorke change v goodnesse cometh election sayeth paule yee see thing wheruntoo ment bring faythfull make knowe lyke god choze owne free goodnesse gyueth leaue yeeld themselues naughtinesse intendeth keepe preserue vndest ed himselfe god chozing v calling v therwithall vnto holynesse thing matched in perably togither thess accordingly also paule sayeth another text wee called vncle enesse f thinesse dedicated god godlynesse holynesse forasmuch cannot lay foorth whole tyme let v looke make profit lesson seing wee bee prepare selues receyuing lord iesus christ supper pawne vntoo v well election hope saluation spiri uall benefyts come foorth welspring fountaine god free goodnesse let v consider vttereth rich vntoo v end wee abuse rather purpose glorified hand mouthes also whole lyues forasmuchas wee hold thing let v also learne bee giue ouer selues obeying may inioy v quietly let v alwayes shoote mark namely get sure warrant taketh auoweth v child bearing mark shewing bery deede wee bee rightly gouerned holy spirit calling vppon father thus yee see effect wee haue marke text till residew may followe let v fall maiestie good god acknowledgme fault praying make v feele wise wee may continually profit feare strengthened meane whyle beare weaknesse wee may alwayes inioy grace euen till haue set v possession thing time shall haue doone away sinnes blotted quite lord iesus christ ake salet v say almightie god heauenly father c pthe third sermon vppon first chapter hath choozen v christ foundation end vvee bee holy vnblamable loue hath predestinated v adopt v christ according good pleasure vvill praise glory grace vvherethrough accepted v vvelbeloued began shewe morning lawfull v take libertie loocenesse vnder colour god hath chozen v making world though meete v giue ouer selues naughtinesse bycause wee cannot perishe seyng god hath taken v childrenmath wee must put thinges sunder hath toogither seyng hath chozen v bee holy purenesse lyfe election must bee roote good fruites long god lettes v alone owne wee doo nothing manner naughtinesse bycause great corruption frowardnesse e nature thinke doo contrarie god rightuousnesse none shift bee chaunged god ommeth chaunge onely grace wee spake elect chooze v child borne intoo world herewithall wee haue marke god letteth choozen one go tyme bee strayd away vtterly lost yit bringeth home flocke pleaseth serueth make goodnesse mercy much knowen whole world god make walke perfectnesse conuersation euen bee well discerned grace holy spirit wretched folke lyued loo ely giuen naughtinesse time quite chaunged cannot come passe without god woorking putting hand thus yee see cause god delayeth calling chozen say touche quicke holy spirit may make walke obedience wee see refourmed vpon suddayne beyond common expectation opinion men therin perceyue god hath vttered power sayde afore agein part euery v conuicted experience wee bee beholden god good v wee bee naturally inclyned vyce afterward corrected wee perceyue well god hath looked mercifully vppon v yee perceyue wee haue much cause humble v seyng wee way perdition till drawen v standeth v hand mark well fantasticall heades imagin god dooth guyde chozen one holy spirit bee sanctifyed aforehand eue tyme bee borne intoo worlde soone come moothers womb contrarie appeereth good sooth wee see paule another text speaking faythfullrom sayeth plundged couetousnesse giuen crueltie scorner whoremonger looee lyuers othersome glutton drunkardes bee short yee full vnclenesse god hauyng chaunged made cleane filthinesse infection hath dedicated himselfe agein sayeth romanes ught bee ashamed lyfe led drewe himselfe whereas sayd text god choze seruantes make walke holinesse life ment bound gouerne holy spirit eue chyldhood forth haue sayd alredy experience sheweth letteth runne astray till conuenient tyme bee come call yit must wee alwayes beare mynd god choozing v end call v holinesse lyfe let v alone still wretched castawayes surely wee could doo nothing manner naughtinesse according corruption v good proceedeth free bestowed mercy hath vsed alredy towardes v wee borne yea world made thus yee see effect wee haue streyne blasphemy would praise repressed make iarre god free election indeuer dooyng well hath god chozen v let euery v doo wee cannot petishe shoulde wee passe good euill seying saluation grounded vppon grace vppon vertew answere easie namely god election looke thoughtes appetite v many bee ageinst ryg uousnesse wee tende euill wee bee inclyned wee bee hot wee runne frentik cause diuell possesseth reformed spirit must needes conclude giuing doo good god guydeth leadeth v holy spirit bycause election erewhyle wee must separate thing god toogither wee bee chozen take leaue doo list shewe deed god hath adopted v child taken v intoo keeping intent holie spirit knit v himselfe ryghtuousnesse let v mark also although god haue reformed v good waye made v feele hath v alredie subdew v word make v serue thing yit doth therfore follow first day yit whole lyfetyme sayes god bringeth chozen faythfull one poynt perfection sayes draweth wee way thitherward euen vntill therfore long wee liue world let v learne go foreward assuring ourselues somewhat amisse v imagin anie good bewitched hippocrisie pryde feeling feare god mocke face examineth himselfe shall alwayes fynd vyces shalbee ashamed consider well say wee come anie perfection whyle wee dwell mortall bodie doo well shew eyther bee vtterly blynded diuelishe pryde else bee folk voyd religion godlinesse part v mark touched afore god hath chozen v wee bee blamelesse howbeeit wee bee able bee sorom till wee bee quyte r infirmity departed prison sin wherin wee bee hild fast therfore wee feele anie vyces v let v fyght manfully ageinst bee hart though wee god child bycause wee bee yit faultlesse sinnes alwayes eye make v giltie although wee fynd neuer manie misery ourselues thrust v way yit let v go still assuring selues long wee liue heere beneath vppon earth waye neuer ende wee alwayes go still forewarde wee neuer come resting place lo faythfull ought harten strengthen themselues although bee perfect let also cause gro e sigh vnder burthen wee bee driuen feele perfection faythfull god child acknowledge owne weaknesse pray god onely amend misdooings also beare infinite goodnesse call account extremitie rigor yee see thing whereuntoo wee must resort succour god mercy whereby couereth buryeth sinnes bycause wee haue yit atteyned marke whereunto calleth v wit holy faultlesse lyfe howsoeuer world go v let v go foreward still take good heede step right way woord loue bee referred men paule ment betoken trew right ousnesse christian wit deale faithfully vprightly wee knowe hypocrite would content god ceremony gewgawes men terme meane whyle shalbee giuen catching snatching shalbe full enuie malice crueltie treason drunkard othersome shalbe whoremonger looce themselues brydle naughtinesse yit al safe may make fewe moppes mowes countenaunce holinesse vsing fewe paule cut stuffe sayeth wee must walke bond perfection fulfilling lawe haue lyfe allowed god yee see wee marke vppon strey ne let v marke place paule exhorteth acknowledge selues beholden god vertew v example wee haue good zeale ageinst owne vyces wee walke obedience whence commeth euen welspring purposed wit choze v aforehand let v consider prayse thereof dew vnto let v defraud although wee lyued perfectly angells yit fond thinke commeth owne free selfmouing wee misse chiefe poynt wheretoo good workes glorify god withall take spring selues wee see bee marred dooyng turned intoo vyces nought else stark yee see thing wherat paule amed bring v alwayes backe god free election wee know goodnesse dependeth theruppon addeth immediatly wee predestinated adoption iesus christ according good pleasure wheras sayth god hath predestinated v shewe wee bee god child nature onely grace onely grace respect thing god foresawe v touched bycause erst marked v adoption yea euen wyse cause thereof bee sought elswhere himselfe cause addeth immediatly according good pleasure ovvne vvill also repeteth declared forenoone namely done christ yee see therfore thing wee haue marke sentence none cause maketh v god child onely choozing v himselfe wee haue birth inheritance nother commeth fleshe blud sayd first chapter iohn insomuch al euer bee sought owne selues vtterly excluded abolished shewe v men bee let alone former plyght haue intercommoning god vtterly cut kingdomegen c trew first father adam created image god excellent first state comming sinne wee vtterly forlorne insomuch euen adam stay himselfe free giuen serued none purpose make vnexcuzable fell wilfully ow e malice heereby see maner constancie sith sooner made fell drew v downe intoo fall ph nowe wee bee v borne child wrath cursed god long wee abyde former state plyght nothing endlesse death v therefore god must bee fayne call v home wee able purchace prerogatiue goold siluer buy withall w ere vertewes wherewith recompence god great excellent priuiledgeiohn bee short sayd alredie vppon sentence commeth nother flesh blud say commeth anie thing wee fynd world alonly god adoption word paule vseth betokeneth appoynting child lyke man adopteth chyld choozeth bee heire good hath afterward doo passe vnder tytle euen wee heires heauenly lyfe bycause god hath adopted chozen v child yea paule contented haue magnifyed god grace farre foorth sayth moreouer god also predestinated v appoynted thing aforehand wee see paule g ereth toogither thing may beate downe fond imagination wee myght conceyue bringing aught vntoo god auauncing selues towards make selues acceptable vntoo therefore thinges mu bee layd awater god grace may bee acknowledged behalfe also cause repeteth iesus christ bee demaunded wee bee predestinated god bee child bycause voutsafed looke vppon v christ haue sayd afore register wherein wee atteine heritage lyfe saluation pitie misery yit alwayes hateful iesus christ came bycause v descended adam one mould making none better among v one sorte bycause god looking vppon dooth mislyke choozeth v lorde christ looketh vppon v glasse lyketh yee see whereof difference proceedeth thing yit better sayeth god choozing v trew god doeth good paule ment set thing seene workes god wit none cause moued chooze v owne paule therefore taketh respectes sayeth god choze v himselfe desert woorthinesse found disposition found goodnesse vertew found one drop aught myght like chozen v himselfe wee selues shoulde partnership seyng paule thinges god purpose belong saluation election also shet vp one saye men doo fowly ouershoote themselues take bee thing woorth haue bin furtherers themselues receyuing grace therefore bee caryed vp aloft wee knowe whereuppon grounded originall welspring cause yee see ment god himselfe ut paul addeth yet according good pleasure owne set downe onely woorde bin ynough accordingly wee haue seene heertoofore declared vppon sonday last paule chozen god bycause nother fit haue prerogatiue pleased god choze paule therfore braggeth gotten myldnesse acknowledgeth bee free gift thus yee see woord betokeneth one place throughout whole holie scripture therfore whensoeuer god wil mencioned shew men cannot bring ought owne neuerthelesse paule setteth downe heere woord ouerplus sayeth according good pleasure sayd truly seing god cause saluation wee fleete froo seeke reason meanes therof howbeit forasmuch men vnthankefull malitious would alwayes darken god glory puffed vp fond ouerweening continually chalendge theselues tha belongeth vntoo therfore sufficiently perswaded god wil let vnderstand cometh good pleasure say free inclined wil dependeth vpon thing selfe hath respect one way vou safeth chooze v freely bycause lyketh ly eth wee see serch cause god hath chozen v woold lay ouerthrowe euerlastyng ordinance one vnseparable god haue chozen v shewed v heere nothing hang vppon desert vppon aught wee myght haue comme god wrought according owne free inclyned found reason moue therto owne good pleasure think strange geere bycause would haylefellow god heerin appeereth diulish malapertnesse cannot suffer god raine freely thing lyketh myght bee receyued good iust ryghtfull without geynsaying let folke barke lyke doggs asmuch list yet sentence definiti e vnable bee repealed holie ghost hathe vttered heere mouth paule namely v searche cause election good pleasure god say owne free inclyned wil wherby hath choze v though worthy none respect listed say pleaseth yee see effect wee haue gather vppon word paules sayeth immediatly prayse glorie grace heere sheweth finall cause god looked c zing v namly grace myght bee praysed comon ordinary manner certeyne glorie hath cuppled twoo thing togither intent wee see god hath drawen v bottom open v gate kingdome call v saluation heere wee see yit ageyne thing treated namely woold put awaye god loth heere spoken doo therin shewe bee mortall enemy god prayse seeming vanisheth away yea competent iudge themselues wyzer god hath spoken alledge say open mouthes many blaspheme god wicked certeyn wil alwayes find wherat cannot letted doorom yit god shal wherwith iustifie himselfpsal doo spyte rightuousnesse shall bee confounded howsoeuer cace without cause sayd heere god dewly glorified praise maynteyned wee acknowledg hath whome listed none cause betweene man man wil doo perishe bycause woorthye calleth saluation must seeke cause therof elswhere sayd free bestowed adoption twoo woords paule ment also stirre greater feruenter earnestnesse praysing god nough v confesse coldly saluation springeth good wee must bee inflamed selues wholly praise wee wholly wedded peter sheweth1 pet b forasmuch wee bee drawe darknesse death good reason wee vnvtterable prayses godpsal hereby dooeth v faythfull haue streyned themselues luke b discharge themselues praysing god goodnesse yit neuer compasse bycause thing incomprehensible well therefore wee haue beare mynd vpon grace wherof speaketh behoueth v gather shall neuer yeeld god dew glory till bee vtterly remayneth thing glory v put ca e god election neuer thought therefore ceasse bee praysed shoulde haue peece prayse still men say god causeth daysunne shyne vppon themmath g cause prayse open eye looke vpward downwarsd vppon wonderfull woorkes sheweth v large prouocation exercise v praise lyfe long moreouer gospell preached vntoo v also wee haue whereof praise though mention bee made election say ynough respect v bee robbed chiefe pra se wee yeeld peece dew faythfull thinke haue fayth owne selfmouing free inclyned told morning fayth fruite election none oddes betweene v vnbeleeuers god reached v hand drewe v secrete meane time wee turned backes vppon straungers himrom b bee short naught paule sayeth heere god praise shall neuer bee glorifyed ought bee till wee acknowledge election bee cause benefites bestoweth vppon v infinite mer adopted v set purpose euerlasting wee haue peece prayse selues dew vntoo god bee diminished abridged much ryght bee short wee see well ynough sayd heere men must bee vtterly abaced end god may haue right man bee made copartener men confesse beginner accomplisher saluation also wee must marke well paule addeth owne grace hath accepted v vvelbeloued vttereth yit much better saluation grounded vppon god mere election free bestowed goodnesse men neuer giue ouer foolishe ouerweening bee vanguished haue one woorde reply paule therefore bring v reason telleth v wee bee damned lost selues thunder bolt lighteth vppon heades v stand checking men bee foolishe still hunt wyndlasses haue somewhat alwayes belonging reserued themselues besides onely grace god needeth saying turne namely god fauour till wee iesus christ bycause damned accursed owne selues matter declared already wee ouer owe thing needefull ought cleere good sooth euen experience ought teache v surely hipocrisie blynded v much well perceyue nothing wickednesse god wrath would strike v feare wee shoulde wittes end god must bee fayne compell v strong hand else wee cannot fynd harte praise vntoo therefore let v marke well speeche sayd wee taken fauour christmath bycause welbeloued iesus god welbeloued according termed xvii place also shewed bee esai thereby shewed v god dooth iustly hate v long wee abyde owne naturall plyght peculiar iesus christ sayd welbeloued sonne well pleasedluke f iesus christ none creature claime although god loue angel yit bee beloued meanes iesus christ farre respect haue sayd alredy wee iesus christ mediator spokesman set one god insomuch bee constancie themcoloss c vphild rightuousnesse bee perfect chozen let serue one poynt v seyng wee bee estraunged god sinne take v enemyes aduersarie v therefore onely welbeloued among men v god vtterly mi yketh disclaymeth v yea euen g n b sayeth repenteth made man importeth wee bee woorthie bee ass dogges beastes continue still god plyght made bee leawd wee deserue bee razed haue cursed hatefull god nowe let v go brag boast seeke armes innoble selues wee see holy ghost disgradeth thinke themselues bee aught woorth wherfore let v consider wee bee enemy vntoo god wee bee woorser taking wee neuer bin created heeruppon paule telleth v god hath accepted v welbeloued seing lord iesus christ receyued god father bee beloued owne person also respect loue extended member bodie meanes wee bee called home agein god imbraceth v child wheras erst wee enemyes vtterly hated howsoeuer world go wee must alwayes come backe election wee haue spoken grace communicated v lord iesus christ dothe issewe lykewyse spring theruppon going foreward matter haue touched alredie sheweth v howe greate neede wee haue bee welbeloued iesus christ proued face wee woold neuer graunt meane vnfeynedly wee bee beholden god thing wee bee alwayes laboring aduaunce selues way euery v seeketh may reserue somewhat though bee mountenance pinnes poynt contrariwyze paule telleth v god must fayne loue v selues lyke well v must bee respect owne selues wee prisoner bond aues sin wee bee hild downe vnder yoke tyrannie satan finally wee bee shet vp bondage death till wee bee raunsomed lord iesus christ wee see summe lesson men admonished depart themsel e seeke saluation god goodnesse euen holding meane shewed v heere resort lord iesus christ two euill extremity wherof wee must bewaremath one comming lord iesus christ wee must imagin anie woorthynesse v make v partaker benefytes may vyce bee corrected euen led god free election verye cause men presume much vppon owne free ground also wheron build opinion haue conceyued owne desert woorthinesse know bee nothing respect god hath accepted owne mere free goodnesse bycause chozen alredie owne euerlasting purpose therfore wee cannot meanes father beginning saluation vppon god except wee confesse shewed v heere namely wee vtterly damned accursed tyme adopted v verie originall cause adopting v predestinated v hand yea euen making world marke one poynt euill extremitie whereof wee must likewyze beware speculation many fantasticall folke say mee shall neuer knowe whether god hath chozen mee therfore must bee fayne abyde still destruction yea want comming iesus christ knowe wee god hath chozen v making world beleeuing iesus christ sayd heeretofore faith sprinketh election fruite sheweth roote hidden within beleeueth therby assured god hath wrought fayth copie counterpane god deliuereth v originall register adoption god hath euerlasting purpose determination keepeth alwayes himselfe chiefe president originall record whereof gyueth v copie fayth speake heere manner men wee knowe god vseth nother paper parchment ingroce v haue told alreadye speake properly register wherein wee bee inrolled lord iesus christ neuerthelesse god reserueth himselfe knowledge election prince would doo originall president register record yit giueth v copy counterpane autenticall ynough imprinteth harte holy spirit wee bee child yee see fayth haue lord iesus christ ynough warrant v election therefore seeke wee tolde euen iesus christ looking glasse wherein god beholdeth v lyke well v likewyse also side glasse wheruppon wee must cast eye lookes wee mynde come knowledge electioniohn b whosoeuer beleeueth iesus christ1 iohn c god chylde consequently heire haue declared dooth followe wee haue fayth wee bee also adopted wherfore doth god giue v fayth euen bycause choze v creation world therefore infastible order inasmuch faythfull receyue god grace imbrace mercy holding iesus christ head intent obteine saluation meanes knowe assuredly god hath adopted trew election selfe secrete deepe hidden determination beh ueth v honor yit notwithstanding god sheweth v farrefoorth requisite knoweth bee benefite welfare dooeth inlyghteneth v beleefe gospell thus yee see paule spoken god euerlasting election setteth foorth iesus christ partie wee must resort bee assured god loueth v auoweth v child consequently adopted v wee knewe yea world made moreouer haue gather vppon sentence doctrine predestination serueth carie v away intoo wandering speculation beate downe al pryde v fond opinion wee conceyue alwayes owne woorthinesse deseruings shewe god hath free power priuiledg souereyn dominion ouer v may refuze listeth chooze listeth meanes wee bee led gloryfye therwith acknowledge choozing v iesus christ end wee bee hild fast vnder fayth gospell wee bee member take head according couenant holie vnion betwixt v neuer bee broken long wee beleeue gospell wee must repayre made sure saluation bycause see feele experience god adopted chozen v presently calleth v telleth v assurance hath giuen v dayly giueth v gospell namely bee father specially ingrauing hart holy spirit deceytfull thing gospell may well bee preached men yea euen castawayes yit god graciouse touch quicke therfore wee haue god adoption ingrauen hart shalbee declared herafter wee haue good vndeceyuable gage god guyde v vntoo end sith hath begunne lead v intoo waye saluation bring v perfection wheruntoo calleth v verely bycause without could continew much one day let v fall downe maiestie good god acknowledgment fault praying make v perceyue vtterly ashamed wee may hate vyces al whole lyfe naughtinesse frowardnesse therof resort alonly able remedie swarue one way communicateth hymselfe v lorde iesus christe keepe right foorth hym acknowledging chosen hym also wee bee mainteyned preserued sake wyll vtter power v vntyll wee haue finished race bee come heauenly heritage wheruntoo wee bee going beseechyng although yit farre yit voutsafe giue v stedie inuincible strength hold continually till haue fully renounced world quyte consumed selues renewed image god may shyne perfectly v vntill wee bee made parttakers glorious immortalitie hath bought deerely v may please graunt grace v also people nation c pthe fourth sermon vppon first chapter god hath accepted v welbeloued vvhose blud vve haue redemption vvit forgiuenesse sinnes according richesse grace vvhereof hath sheaded abundance vppon v vvisedome vnderstanding making v knovv secrete vvill according good pleasure purpozed intent deale foorth vvhen tyme full come vvit gather thinges toogither christ vvell thing heauen thing earth selfsame haue declared alredie wee cannot bee beloued god meanes onely sonne angells heauen bee woorthy bee taken god child meanes head mediator shall become v ceasse prouoke god wrath dayly wicked dooynges folke doo deede fyght ageinst god must bee fayne looke vppon v person onely sonne else must needes hate v abhorre v sai bee short sinnes doo set god v farre oddes wee cannot soone come towardes wee feele maiestie vtterly ageinst v armed put v vtter confuzion remayneth see god receyueth v intoo fauour meanes lord iesus christ thing saint paule meaneth adding vvee haue redemption blud vvit forgiuenesse sinnes according rich god grace heere wee bee first doone vnderstand enmitie god beareth v respect nature respect corruption say respect nature respect god hath creased v certeine cannot hate v inasmuch mankynd vtterly marred gyuen ouer naughtiness god must needes bee mortall enemie v aduersarie ageinst v till rememberance sinnes bee buryed sight wee bee subiect euerlasting death till wee bee restored agein reason whereof god fountaine iustice right ousnesse dooth vtte ly hate abhorre euill seeth v therefore vntill tyme sinnes bee blotted vnpossible v hope god eyther fauour loue v let v marke heere paule vseth twoo woordes expresse wee bee reconcyled god first setteth downe raunsom redemption afterward forgiuenesse sinnes howe commeth en passe god wrath pacifyed wee bee made one ith yea accepteth au weth v child pardoning umes sayeth paule ore bycause redemption requisite thereuntoo matcheth ith also trew respect v god wypeth away me owne free goodnesse sheweth himse fe altoogither untifull himselfe without respect recompence ndes good soothe man able make amendes least fault hath committed euery v im loy whole lyfe making satisfaction one fault alone meanes seeke winne fauour god hande certeine dooth farre surmount ability therfore god ust bee fayne receyue v mercy without looking ompence amendes handes yit attone ent freely bestowed respect v cost sonne god deere1 pet found none payment sheading f owne blud insomuch made himselfe borrowe ody soule answered v god iudgement get discharge lord iesus christ say imployed himselfe holly body soule bin ynough haue ffered cruell slaunderous death syght men houed also abyde horrible anguishe himselfe god bin become iudge came poynt susteyned person sinner make full amendes yee see paule hath matched twoo woordes ogither streyne therefore wee haue marke first wee obteyne god hand receyued till sinnes bee yped rememberance cleane put away reason hereof sayd afore god must needes hate sinne wher euer seeze long considereth v sinner ust needes abhorre v thing selues owne nature al maner naughtinesse confuzion enemy aduersaryes vntoo till wee come reme ie paule sheweth v heere haue sinnes forgiuen heereby wee see man bee loued god oorthinesse himselfe wherein lyeth loue god beareth v haue tolde already must bee fayne cast eye vpon lord iesus christ looke whit v yit therewithall declared god dooth neuer lyke well v till haue released v r dettes adopted v bee child notwithstanding wee bee woorthy death thus yee see assurance saluation sayd song zacharie god bee mercifull v forgiue v sinnes whereby wee become enemy uke howbeit let v also beare mynd cleere release sinnes god free goodnesse doone without raunsome payd lord iesus christ1 pet golde siluer sayeth peter first epistle wyse vnspotted lambe fayne serue turne owne selfe wherefore whensoeuer wee intend seeke god fauour mercy let v fasten wittes vpon death passion lord iesus christ may fynd wherwith appease god wrath furthermore seyng sinnes done away payment satisfaction let v vnderstand wee cannot bring aught owne wee bee reconcyled vntoo god wherin wee see diuell hath yghtes cut hope saluation world bearing men hand must euery man raunsome make owne attonement god thing men good woorkes merites vertewes papistrie ende tend inuentions haue forged martir themselues many fashion men neuer make end day night euer still making new wyndlasses course marke thing ame pacifie god good woorkes counted papistrie nothing else meanes whereby make amendes sinne howbeit defacing raunsome whereof paule speaketh heere yee would say inseparable bond betweene twoo thing namely god putteth sinnes rememberance drowneth bottom sea moreouer receiueth payment offered person sonne therefore wee cannot atteyne one without wherforeif wee intend haue god fauour let v consider wee bee enemyes till haue pardoned sinnes owne free goodnesse yit notwithstanding lord iesus christ must bee fayne step betweene v sacrifyze death serueth purchase v euerlasting attonement wee must alwayes flee thither refuge trew whole lyfe lord iesus christ become raunsome obedience yeelded god father world make amends adam offence iniquity wherthrough wee bee ronne arrerages howbeit paule speaketh heere purposely blud bycause behoueth v resort death passion sacrifyze power blot sinnes cause hath god represented figure vnder lawe men could bee reconcyled vntoo meane trew iesus christ shed blud namely death also feele feare terrour ought haue lyghted vpon v paule dooth heere vnder one parrell comprehend whole ordinarie maner holy scripture bee short let v repose right usnesse god shewing himselfe mercifull towardes v owne free goodnesse let v presume face vertew owne thereby bynd vntoo v let suffize v receyueth v intoo fauour freely without desert onely bycause rememberance sinnes buryed sight agein let v vnderstand canno bee doone death passion lord iesus christ thing wheruppon wee must wholly rest heeruppon paule addeth done according richesse god grace without cause dooth heere magnifye god mercie vttereth receyuing v fauour wee see one syde men doo wilfully ouershoote themselues foolish ouerweening men haue alwayes imagined myght make attonement god owne satisfaction wote shiftes besydes seeing men farre ouerseene owne imagination paule exclude dealing sayth wee must bee rauished loue richenesse god goodnesse could haue sayd simply god dooth according grace setteh downe heere greate treasure intent men bee fond bring farthing discharge ten hundred thousand crownes truly papist prattle satisfaction say bee able doo throughly poyntes opinion death passion lord iesus christ also able bring somewhat owne doo much patch peeces god shalbee satisfied contented thus yee see diuelish opinion reigneth papistrie needes found mass need bable many prayer need gad pilgrimage need keepe feast feast need performe wot deuotios wil need weare sack cloth next skin help foorth death passion lord iesus christ say sufficiet ynough self paule telleth v god goodnesse shewed v iesus christ greate treasure thing must need giue ouer thrust vnder fo te seing god vseth greate bountifulnesse wee ought bee wholy rauished outrageouse presumptuousnesse wee need bring owne pelting trash though going pilgrimage dooing deuotions valew estimation al one though blud iesus christ sufficient pryce say sufficient pryce raunsome saluation yee see one syde paule ment heere cut occasion fond imagination men conceyue surmizing themselues able pacifye god wrath owne satisfaction paymentes syde purpozed succour feeblenesse although wee bee giuen beleeue wonderous well owne vertuosusnesse beare ourselues hand god greatly beholden vntoo v yit notwithstanding commeth calling vppon god good earnest putting trust satan egge v despayre wee bee tossed trubbles temptation dismayed promise holy scripture said vntoo v death passion lord iesus christ cannot make v haue hope paule therfore remedie vyce vnbeleefe deepely rooted v doth heere set v greate treasure god goodnesse end distruste wee conceyue may bee swallowed vp seing god voutsafeth vse greate bounteousnes towards v heeruppon addeth hath made grace abound towards v wisdom vnderstanding ords doth v wit meanes wee come thing specifyed afore behold happinesse souerein velfare consisteth one god may take v h child may bee lawfull v call vppon father full libertie shall wee obteyne thing farre wyde sayde although wee bee naught w orth ne naught doo yit wee shall finde thinges iesus christ wanting selues death passion bee sufficient sacrifyze put away rememberance misdeedes howbeit dooth followe therefore men parttakers benefite purchaced v lord iesus christ vnbeleeuers haue nother part portion speciall priuiledge god gathereth himselfegal also paule sheweth eyther wee must haue fayth else christ shall boote v although christ bee generally redeemer whole world yit dooth death passion aduauntage none receiue thing paule sheweth heere wee see wee know benefites brought v christ offereth v dayly gospell muste also bee knyt vntoo hym faith turkes iewes papistes lyke cut estranged christ rot away theyr owne filth bycause presume worke wonder themselues common principle among papistes iewes turkes heathen men euer must appease god wrath great sort meanes owne deuising euery man imaginyng owne brayne men therfore haue part christ wherfore faith key openeth v doore inioy treasure whereof paule spake euen next way make v riche farre forth shalbe requisite saluation shal want thyng wee bee knyt vnto christ fayth notwithstanding nought paule hath heere set downe twoo wordes wisdom vnderstanding doo v wit lerning gospell ynough bring v perfection whatsoeuer added moreouer dung filth rottenesse short paules intytling gospell twoo honorable termes ende euery man quietly giue eare thing god teacheth meanes sonne wee yeeld selues teachable vntoo take vpon v know aught tha commeth mouth simply receyue whatsoeuer speaketh continew end though whole word despyze v men set themselues ageynst v passe sieyghts world many men doo haue tching ear alwayes desirous heere somme new thing end therfore wee bee wauering ouerled foolish desyre knowing lawfull v knowe let v marke well paule sayeth haue profited throughly gospel shall find wisdome full may reiect thing needlesse also noysome bycause wee shalbee turned pure doctrine wherby haue v knit vntoo bee short paule ment shew heere god dooeth v inestimable good turne voutsafeth call v knowledge lord iesus christ sonne haue wee must dispyze thing bee trubbled foolish desire knowing bycause haue sayd alredy full perfection knowledge wit lord iesus christ yee see also sayd colossianscoloss bin faithfull teacher yea euen bring men perfection wisdome2 cor b indeede confesseth rude homely speech nother wisdom eloquence hyghly commended world yit declareth doctrine receyued bee found full substance full rrishment men soules needeth added vntoo heere thing adayes must take warning brydle selues represse f nd ouer curiousnesse rooted deeply v wee may hold v pure doctrine gospell rest wholy therupon thus yee see effect wee haue gather vppon streyne heerewithall let v marke thing haue touched alredye namely oft gospell preached oft god grace spred vpon v acknowledge goodnesse liberalitie maketh v perceyue moystening earth end yeeld v fruit sustenance body much may wee vnderstand god sendeth v woord saluation watereth v welfare soules also giueth v largely therof drink wee may bee throughly satisfyed therwith paule thinkes ynough say
