wheras wee bee barren wee haue refresshing gospell sayeth god poure downe al undance water vppon v wee myght bee watered refreshed wee myght gather substance lustinesse hold end yee see wyse ought esteeme god goodnesse voutsafeth drawe v meanes gospell therwithall wee enter possession benefites haue bin purchased v lord iesus christ according offereth v woord haue v also receyue fayth nowe larger openyng matter addeth immediately dooyng bycause hath vttered secrete vvyll vntoo v euen accordyng ovvne good pleasure vvhich purposed afore hym selfe loe heere thing ought aduance dignitie gospell yit whiche haue secretes hydden heretofore god onely paule speaketh maner wee shall see yit larger discourse second chapterrom epistle cor b also euerywhere el sheweth howe wee ought bee rauished preaching gospell bycause god dooth open thing incomprehensible men beforeeph man would neuer haue beleeued thought seemed haue chosen onely lyne abrahamcoloss wise cast away world besides therefore wonderful thyng poured grace commo vpon al nation yit notwithstanding wee knowe suche tyme iesus christe came intoo worlde selfe people growen kynde god doctrine corrupted nothing superstition among iewes seemed bin past hope recouerie sodenly beyond opinion al men behold saluation offered nation beholde christe erst byn hidden deepe darknesse yea deepe darkenesse hope euer shoulde haue comme rose vp daysimne rightuousnessees giue light worlde cause therfore dooth paul say gospell wee bee made priuie secret god wyll trewe first sight seemeth bee nothyng simple stuffe gospel cause also many scoffer thinke thing conteyned gospell doo serue idiot beare themselues hande able deuize many wyttier thynges theyr owne dreames dotage doctrine concerneth iesus christe folke vnworthy taste thyng shewed v heere theyr pride dooth vtterly blynde make starke doltes notwithstandyng euer fare yit faythfull perceyue f wel diuine maiestie doctrine gospell cause paule doeth giue v wyt text commyng thyther must bee learne common thyng lyft vp selues aboue world shall neuer bee good scollers godward neuer towardnesse pro schoole except mount aboue world reuerence thing god speaketh owne holy mouth short beginnyng entrance fayth lowlynesse men wel humble theselues vnlesse know thinges god telleth doo farre surmount theyr owne wyt capacitie ye see thyng whereat paul amed wee reuerence gospell assuring selues v iudge whether god haue spoken well yll becommeth v fully resolued euer commeth hym infinite wisedome yea wisedome vtterly faultlesse end therfore glorying may beaten downe selues wee learne reuerence soberly modestly doctrine preached v god name paule hath purposely set downe secret end wee knowe much wee bounde vntoo god repeteth woord according good pleasure set downe doone put awaye shet opinion men might conceiue owne woorthinesse god good pleasure haue place vnlesse men barred al deseruyng repayre hym vtterly empty soone wee presume bring thyng vntoo god surely aduauncyng selues defacing god grace may haue beautie preheminence among v ought haue end therfore men forbeare presumptuousnesse paule sendeth v styll backe god good pleasure say none cause preaching gospell world franke free goodnesse god yit notwithstanding represse ouerboldnesse men addeth god purposed said ordinaunce said high incomprehensible determination wyll aforehand hymselfe cause men take great libertie questionyng disputing going lawe god seemyng treate matter ought open manifest vntoo paule perceiuyng v bee foolishe rashe presume ouer boldly inquisitiue god purpose saith sealed letter god hath purpose hymselfe lawfull creature mount high doo next way cast downe breake neckes trewe wee may well apply whole indeuer knowe god wyll howbeit must bee hath vttered woord woord light god doo holde peace haue v brydle imprison selues start wee woulde needes knowe graunted v say wee ought know imparted v woord entering intoo maze rather intoo bottome hell therfore let v marke well howe paules meaning text whe soeuer god keepeth purpose becommeth v stoope holde selues contented bee ignorant cursed wisdome wisdome sendeth v pit hell wee take leaue knowe god hath taught v contrariwise wee bee wyzer ignorance wyze men world wee take vppon v knowe thing god woord guydeth gouerneth v trew mo onely one single god neuerthelesse vttereth vntoo v according capacitie farre foorth expedient profitable v example wee haue seene forgiuenesse sinnes poynt wee cannot ouerpasse forbeare therefore zacharie calles knowledge saluation agein standeth v hand knowe forgiuenesse sinnes bee sought wee haue iesus christluke g wee continue still enemyes vntoo god wee haue agreement rest selues god iustice must needes pursue v iesus christ peace furthermore whe know thing witnessed v god woord wee must therwithall reuerence misteries hidden v hath bin sayd alredy must hereafter said agein wee come god election paule dooth yit agein set downe heere woord foreordeyning forepurpozing hewe god predestinated v making world yit hidden yea verily nowe discouered vntoo v sayeth thus yee see effect thing wee haue beare mynde wee bee called knowledge gospell owne towardnesse v putteth foorth owne accord wee haue bound god vntoo v vertue god owne infinite goodnesse listed inlyghten v hath doone bycause came sodeinly mynde doo men woont doo caryed sodeine braydes bycause determined owne purpose euen tyme wittes bee ticklish prouoke v bee inquisitiue say god chozen v aforehand vtter vntoo v sooner happeneth perceyued ere ende wee ouershoote selues paule sayeth purpose sort locked vp god till vttered vntoo v bee short lawfull v knowe vttered vntoo v gospell looke shewed v behoueth v reuerence cause added dooyng vvas set foorth fulnesse tyme heerin sheweth men may wel vexe themselues yit shall come short purpose witts imagination shall fayle go knowe god hath giuen leaue know man demaund god hasted rather therin sheweth would wiser tha god diuelish pride creature woorthie go vpon groud aduauceth self hygh cause paule sayeth appoynting therof belongeth vnto god man may set order maner owne house say haue folke fare thus haue drinke drinke haue eat kynd bread haue lodged maner much ought let god doo haue lesse priuiledge woormes earth therfore let v giue god leaue dispose church welfare chozen lyketh best tyme let v take full tyme shall please shewe v v eyther iudges vmpers cace measure tymes yeares oonethes dayes ought content v god listeth aue man argew cace say pray behold fower thousand yeeres passed betweene fall adam commyng christ could god haue remedyed matter sending redeemer world sooner see number retched folke wandered away darknesse behold destruction f mankynd awaterflud swalowed vp thyngs yit meane whyle iesus christ hidde bysids small nuber f men tasted alonly figure shadowes none ewe wayted redeemer obteyne saluation meanes yit euen faine vse calues sheepe brut beast asserteyne selues forgiuenes sinnes god mercifull aske cometh passe let v repayre sayd one word namely time yit fully come bycause god appoynted selfsame thing haue seene alredy epistle galathians wher paule repressed foolish ga ingsgal wherthrough men wander away mounting vp hygher lawfull therfore let v conclude god peculiar office appoynt tymes season wee must think dew appoynteth albeit winter sommer bee ordinarye v euery yeere yit sommer come ouer late wee must brydle selues grudge ageinst god wee may well say ala pleased god send v heate bee well welcome yit meane wee must fully resolue selues thus belongeth god gouerne souereintie authoritie perteyne wee ought behaue selues modestly respect order nature common among v wherein god shewes himselfe familiarly vntoo v ought wee doo wee come scanning heauenly secretes euerlasting saluation soules hygh misterie sonne god come set thinges n state agein lost perished doth become v stoope cace humbly take good woorth whatsoeuer god telleth v lyke lyketh thus ye see paule spake heere expresly fulnesse tyme say wee neuer profit gospell till wee yeeld god much honour hold selues contented onely wee step foorth reply ageinst face iangling glorify acknowledging bee rule wisdome ryght equitie better declaration hereof addeth immediatly vvas gather thinges toogither vvell heauen earth iesus christ himselfe touching woord gather paule ment shewe v thereby wee bee v horribly scattered till time lord iesus christ set v aray agein verifyed onely v also creature bee short one sayd whole order nature good defaced thinges decayed disordered sinne adam till wee bee repayred ageyne person lord iesus christ although wee beholde god woonderfull wisdome power goodnesse iustice rightuousnesse creature yit notwithstanding markes sinne aboue beneath creature subiect corruption disordered reason god hateth reiecteth vsrom needes therefore must restorement bee made iesus christ thing ment gathering toogither paule speaketh heere ende wee would learne mislyke selues bee ashamed disorder selues wherwith whole world fylled sinfull lyfe moreouer learne also magnify god goodnesse much one side holy ghost warneth v text onely wee selues order also wee haue brought whole world poynt doo keepe still stay dayly sinnes none remedy thereof iesus christ must bee fayne amend agein make gathering vnion wee may bee knit agein god yee see first poynt wee haue marke vppon text truly thing spoken fewe word neede bee muzed vppon length thing wheraboutes wee ought occupie selues earely late wee looke intoo selues wee myght bethinke v wise art thou wretched creature thou seest thou art separated thy god euen thy birth behold thou art enemy inheritour wrath side nothing thy selfe tendeth naughtinesse frowardnesse thou oughtest onely feele disorder thine owne person also perceyue thinges else order whole world reason thy frowardnesse therefore let v sink downe bee ashamed therwithall confesse much wee bee indetted vntoo god voutsafyng gather v toogether person onely sonne euen v haue torne sunder thinges set goodly order cause paule speaketh heere men estraunged god afore reason sin also thing heauen earth coloss c wherin comprehendeth euen verye angells although god glorie shyne foorth neuer yit separated yit neuerthelesse stoode hand gathered toogither lord iesus christ twoo sort albeeit neuer swarued asyde ne fell first god ryghtuousnesse doo alwayes shewe self insomuch bee mirrours paternes yit notwithstanding god li ted looke vppon rigour fynd themselues farre short perfection ryghtuousnesse sayd booke iobiob furthermore yit one reason bee matched aungells hane constancie stedinesse requisyte vnlesse iesus christ stablished myght neuer fall thus yee see one way gathered togither gathering wherof paule speaketh heere respect vniting agein vntoo v wee knowe inasmuch wee banished god kingdome wee cut hope saluation angells fayne become enemy bee still attonement wee haue agein meanes head common v heere yee see also ladder shewed vntoo iacobgen c said god stood vppon toppe touched heauen earth angells went vp downe lord iesus christ trew liuing euerlasting god touched heauen earth bycause persone god hath knit owne diuine substance nature man toogither thus therefore yee see heauen open angells begin acquaynt themselues vshebr yea become seruants sayd epistle hebrewes bycause care soules committed vntoo sayd thirtie foure psalme incamp vspsal watch v keeper yee see wee bee vnited agein angells heauen lord iesus christ uke cause also sayd hensfoorth yee shall see heauens open sonne man comming downe maiestie angells whereby doeth v wit heauen shet ageinst v wee also vnwoorthie fynd fauour god hand yit notwithstanding come bee head hath made attonement betweene father vscoloss taken vppon office mediator become head faythfull also angells hath gathered toogither agein wyse wheras diuells make warre ageinst v practize destruction without ceassing angells armed infinite power maynteyne v although wee see eye yit must wee certeynly beleeue watch welfare otherwyse thing wee knowe diuell roring lion1 pet seeketh nothing else deuoure v wee see number yghts hath wynd v needes must angells haue infinite power defend v withall also must needes bee wee bee preserued vnder protection lorde iesus christ head thus yee see briefly thing paule ment tell v text saith gathered togither agein wee scattered asunder wee bee onely reconciled god death passion lord iesus christ also henceforth knyt ageyn vntoo angelles become brother fellowes god hath giuen charge guide mainteyne v wayes watche ouer vspsal continuall battell withstandyng enemyes make warre ageynst v tyll wee gathered together intoo rest heauen let v cast selues downe maiestie good god acknowledgment faultes praying make v feele may drawe v trew repentance make v continue tyme lyfe yit notwithstanding wee may ceasse trust offer selues boldly sight forasmuch sinnes scoured blud shed washing wee may frame selues doctrine wee may tyme lyfe acknowledge seyng hath purchaced v deerely wee ought giue selues wholy seruice seyng hath shewed himselfe good redeemer towardes v wee may doubt wyll continue goodnesse day day full finishing thing hath begunne strengthen v assaultes tyll haue deliuered v crueltie satan vpholders yea quyte cleane taken v world make v parttakers happie blissednesse whereuntoo calleth v may please graunt grace onely v also people nacions c fifth sermon vpon first chapter also doo trust christ vppon hearing word truth say glad tydings saluation beleeuing vvhereof also sealed vvith holy spirit promise vvhich earnest penny inheritance vntoo redeeming purchaced possession prayse glory wee haue seene heeretoofore paule hath declared none grounde saluation god free goodnesse wee must seeke else cause choozeth one forsaketh becommeth v holde selues contented onely purpose vnchaungeable determination whosoeuer goeth must needes stumble intoo dimgeon owne rashnesse shall feele cannot honour god maiestie euerlasting ordinance lowlynesse reuerence must euery one say come shame therefore whensoeuer come serching cause saluation let v learne father altoogither vppon god trew bee god child heires behoueth v bee body lord iesus christ thing doone fayth yit wee beleeue gospell except god drawe v theretoo holy spirit nowe wee see dealeth alyke men could well inlyghten world bring passe vnbeleeuers wee see contrary therefore let v assure selues choozeth listeth man aske reason dooth loftie presumptuousnesse cause maketh many ouerweening folke breake owne neckes cannot fynd harte graunt god gouerneth men according owne good ryght may full well furthermore also paule hath heretofore set iewes gentyles one euen ground thing requyreth yit longer discourse seyng god chozen abraham ofspring myght haue bin thought bin woorthinesse surely wee haue eye specia l fauour god shewed iewes bee well worthy bee preferred rest world man take bee themselues shall fynd voyde ryghtuousnesse wee must alwayes come backe poynt god bound beholden man receyuing iewes free adoption better woorth men myght make maner vaunt themselues therefore yee see paule sayeth expresly beleeued iesus christ tymes past coprehended vnder god election well others others canot boast selues bee worthy haue deserued must come poynt well iewes gentyles god choze lyked listed ende nothing bee considered behalfe onely mercy mouthes myght bee stopped man bee able alledge brought thing owne howbeit paule entereth intoo comparison betweene iewes gentyles sayeth man haue eye god accepting iewes owne peculiar heritage holy linage giuen lawe promise meanes whereof excellent hygh degree residew forsaken shaken wee haue eye vnto god mannes glory must needes bee layd awater paule place speaketh alonely forgiuing sinnes imbracing god grace fayth thing sheweth cannot bee fathered vppon cause onely god pitying v also wee haue eene heretoofore assurance saluation beleeue iesus christ wist well men vtterly fordoone lost themselues bycause bring nothing god wrath curse therfore lyke textes paule hath shewed men beguyle themselues imagin haue desert woorthinesse better confirmation doctrine take away disputing beate backe replyings bringeth v welspring namely god onely giueth fayth listeth also hath elected chozen v making world yee see thing wee haue marke effect men least indaungered vntoo god none holie excellent exempt himselfe generall state men nowe hereupon paule magnifieth god goodnesse ephesian gathered toogither made one confuzion wherein herewithal paule sheweth thing whiche hee said afore verified vntoo v effectes god grace haue said afore election secret thing yea incomprehensible men haue inquired much possible surely must needes quaile owne imagination mynde enter intoo sayd euerlasting ordinaunce god therefore lawful v seeke scripture guideth v sheweth v way yee see god choozing v hidden hym selfe yit yeeldeth v recordes gift grace bestoweth vpon v faith gyfte holy ghost marke one poynt nowe suche gyft maketh sunne shyne vpon good bad causeth earth bring foorth fruit indifferently men ought also bee reckened among gyftes benefites god faith singular gift bestowed commonly vppon men reserued god iewell liketh well cause wee v chyldren adam one mould inlighteneth hee one sort letteth alone blyndnesse none cause owne choyse although conceyue nother wyt reason howe god hath chozen v making world yit wee know shewing vntoo v experience selfe auoucheth sufficiently asmuch inlightened faith cause receyue gospell sticke meane whyle others abyde styl beastly blockishnesse rather beare spiteful rancour ageynst doctrine saluation imagine commeth myne owne towardnesse traytour god wee must alwayes come backe wee haue seene alredy2 cor b say hee hath made thee excel others paule dooth saying pull downe loftinesse man end man aduance hymselfe alledge hath ught owne wee must thinke saith wee haue woorthynesse selues euery whit commeth god therfore text paule sheweth experience howe e esians byn chozen god behoued haue ole faith grounded thereupon wyt vpon god free good sse proofe thereof saith ye haue heard doctrine gospell beleeued commes passe th must needes bee confirmed holy ghost confirmed necessitie holy ghost must needes haue wrought beforehand purpose enter intoo deepe maze god euerlasting ordinaunce sheweth v finger hath chozen v least wise play churles hym acknowledge good hath done v bee fully perswaded resolued selues none cause hee giuen v marke euerlastingnesse say reserued v hym selfe owne chyldren nowe wee see paules meanyng therfore let v learne leaue making long raunges cace concerneth imputyng thing god onely mere mercy faith haue dooth shew wel ynough bycause ha e sayd afore commeth owne moother witte gifte commeth aboue one god communicateth men without exception onely lysteth furthermore heere many woords well worth weying one syde paule intendeth magnifie grace holy ghost shewing wee haue part portion lord iesus christ benefites hath purchased v except god put v possession saluation holie spirit therfore one poynt yit notwithstanding paule fayleth shew therwithall ine timable benyfite wee haue gospell termeth woord truth glad ydings saluation first ment assure v ent wee myght haue infallible warrant call vppon god without doubting grudge conscience long wee bee doubt whether god loue v hat v vnpossible v praye truly vntoo meanes yee see saluation vtterly defeated according sayd prophet ioellioel f common doctrine holy scripture wee cannot obteyne saluation fleeing vntoo gyd prayer supplication wee shet wee sayd warrant wee shall see fully third chapter therfore stand v throughly assured god father accepteth v child shall wee bee warranted vnlesse doctrine gospell bee certeyne poynts bee lawfull v bring question therfore cause paule sayeth word truth doubt truthes also euen god threatneth v dooth est yit vayne well threatninges promise haue execution sure certeyne howbeeit forasmuch present cace concerned correcting al distrust v wherunto much inclined paule hath termed gospell doctrine truth say frendes god faithfull witnesse vntoo owne wyll gospell much laid forth hart vntoo therefore settle selues vppon moreouer also saith saluation lyeth inclosed gospell make v looue esteeme wirlesse rather starke mad holde scorne owne welfare yit notwithstandyng saith al commeth god mere mercy euerlasting electio respect selues farre vnknowen v haue knowledge gospell meanes instrument therof purpose lorde iesus christ hath offered hym felfe sacrifice reconcile worlde god father vnlesse wee made partaker faith faith opinion man conceyuyng owne brayne setled beleefe god cannot lye deceyue v feared hope shall come good end wee wayt vpon hym short paules intent shewe haue skyll make profit doctrine gospell wee shall longer stand mamering perplexitie shalbe able call vppon god open mouth acknowledgyng selues bound wholly indetted vntoo hym thing wee feare auoweth v child accepted hande hee heareth v prayer wee make vntoo hym thus much concernyng first poynt therfore v backe ageyn god gospell let v set store treasure bee well aduized make profite let v hardily despize diuell hymselfe temptation practizeth ageinst v seeing god calleth v hath given v sufficient offreth v grace man shoulde offer apple litle hee could ronne best come haue god cast certaine greatest parte saluation shoulde proceede owne power policie commendation therof redound selues paul hath shewed god hath called dayly dooth call v inheritance heauenly kingdome dooing proceedeth mere free goodnesse addeth behoueth v necessitie touched holy spirite deede setteth downe one part grace holy ghost bycause set downe part hath discourse forgotten aught belonged matter began god free goodnesse wherewith wee bee filled shewed fayth springeth said fountaine free election nowe second part addeth god inlightening v holy spirit wheras blynd hath printed grace harte bowed bent obeying hym ynough v moreouer muste bee fayne confirme v strengthen fayth geuyng v inuincible constancie holde end yee see thing wheretoo paule bringeth v besides receiuyng fayth hand holy ghost besides inlightenyng v grace wherof haue spoken alredy dooth also stay v wise wee fal away better vnderstanding hereof wee must first call mynd thing hath bin treated length alredy wit long god letteth v alone owne state plight wee bee blind wretch wandring darkenesse soeuer preached spoken vntoo v wee abide styll blockes brutishnes sensual man shall neuer vnderstand thing belongs god1 cor hys owne saluation yee see howe wee bee vtterly barred excluded heauenly light tyll god pitie v giue v spirit light insight marke first poynt howbeit asmuch poynt hath bin discussed heretofore suffizeth doo put mynd yit another poynt wee haue imbraced god grace fayth wee knowe lord iesus christ wee fynd requisite make v perfectly happie standeth v hand stablished let v marke wauering men best dispozed followe god shall fall bycause wee frayle diuell ouerthrowe v euery minute houre god hild v n vp strong hand cause sayd god vttereth power mainteyning v hath chozen v giuen v lord iesus christ fought v ala woulde become v wee bee confounded hand shou take one twoo falles infinite falles sayde afore soone way saluation surely bee tu ned owne frayltie lyghtnesse vnconstancie vnlesse wee hild backe god wrought v wee might holy spirit ouercome assaultes diuell world thus dooth god spirit woorke dubble v respect fayth inlyghteneth v make v vnderstad thing else bee hidden v receyue god promise obedience first woorking second spirit fayne continue v giue v perseuerance wee quayle middes way thing hat paule treateth say friendes yee haue knowen god grace yee haue experience hath drawen obeying gospell neuer rome vntoo shewed himselfe pitifull towardes yit assure selues dubbleth grace giueth power hold ye continued two three dayes two three yeeres yea needes must bee god helped therein else yee alwayes haue bin mamering yea poore wretch wittes ende without certeintie god hath promised haue care guyde continually till bee come wayes end haue accomplished course therefore cause sayeth heere sealed signed holy ghost behoueth v marke well similitude paule vseth wee know euidences made authentik ale hath bin tymes trew men set maner doo adayes yit notwithstanding stead signing owne handes deliuered seale ring maner publication testamentes euidence bargaynes couenants respect paule sayeth wee must bee sealed harte trew speake properly haue sayd gospell sealed howbeit end doo v vnderstand fault commeth springeth selues gospell doctrine sufficient authoritie selfe mynded shewe v god sealing truth respect hard hartednesse vnconstancie shaken euery wynd lyke wouering reedes vntill time haue strengthened v howsoeuer cace stand let v marke holy ghost scale wherewith ratifyeth warranteth truth vntoo v nowe haue told alredy greatly wee stand neede thereof although wee graunt god word deserueth admitted without geyns ying reply yit ceasse wee doubt doo wee fynd well ynough experience whensoeuer trubble vexation commeth wee e folke dismayd wheras wee throughly perswaded god goodnesse wyse assureth v certeyne wee bee feare tempta ons shake v doo shewe well ynough wee profit wee ought doo gospell therefore god fayne warran behalfe holy spirit print surely harte wee may bee stedfast stedfastnesse may bee beaten downe euer diuell woorke deuise ouerth owe wee shall vnderstand thing yit better making continually examination owne weakenesse haue spoken take wee reason world yit shall wee neuer bee certifyed fully perfectly requisite god bee mercifull v defend v middes perills world wee bee heere sea wyndes stormes assayle v euery minute wee still daunger swallowing vp may wee despise sathan b ing wretched sheepe vnprouided armour weapon meanes helpe wee merye life death knowing satan might doo thing ageinst v wee wel sealed authentical manner besides te te wee bee warned rid selues presumption ouerweening onely god may bee prayzed magnified wee may also gather therwith vppon paules woords wee haue armor weapon wherwith incounter fight well although enemy bee mighty sturdie yit shal neuer ouercome v wee take aduauntage sayd heere namely god spirite seale h truthe certeyntie promise gospell v paule addeth yit one similitude saying god spirit earnest pe ny let v thinke straunge paule hath myghtily confirmed doctrine forasmuch diuell hath neuer ceassed fro beginning world puffe vp men continually fond opinion owne wisdome vertew cause adam fall would needes aduaunce hygher lawfull wyser god thing god gaue leaue doo euen standeth cace v diuell pursueth chalendge still behold ouerthrew mankynd sleyght indeuour yit still make v beleue wee able doo therfore stoode paule hand rid men false cursed opinion owne reewill selfuertew shewe beholden holy ghost mark one poynt secondly grosse earthly neede haue doctrine chawed vntoo v wee cannot conceyue god gratious giftes inuisible see eye touche hand therfore requisite paule similitude declare god holie spirit putteth v possession gospell benefit conteyned therin holdeth v vntoo end wee knowe bargaynes confirmed giuing earnest penny men doo comonly call god penny asmuch buying eyther land house inheritaunces ware although man bare word ought suffyze yit notwithstanding yll dispozed perceyue disaduauntage themselues matter bee ashamed eate woord therfore ceremonie giuing earnest penny added one payment fully performed bargayne vtterly past calling backe ageyne paule meaneth heere god spirit serueth warrant saluation full end inheritaunce sayeth day redemption trew god heyres euen wee bee child wee must note sayd eyght romanesrom c saluation shet vp vnder hope wee cannot see inioy according third colossianscoloss sayd wee lyke dead men departed world lyfe hidden god christ therfore although wee god child yit haue wee full inioyment yit one iohn sayeth cannonicall epistle1 iohn wee nowe sayeth wherby sheweth fayth doubtfull yit addeth yit seene dooth yit appeere wee must wayt day wherin wee shalbee lyke vntoo god shal haue lyght see thing perfectly doo beleeue ageyne wee haue seene paule sayd second corinthians2 cor b long wee bee earthly pilgrimage wee bee sort absent god wee walk sayeth hope wee see thing present wee see faythiohn bee short although wee bee passed death lyfe sayde fift iohn yit fyght ageinst infinite number deathes bycause wee beseeged paule dooth well match bothe toogither text one syde sayeth wee bee yit come redemption herytage yit therwithal sheweth bee neuerthelesse sure nothing owne vnthankfulnesse letteth v glory fu ly god say full mouth wee doubt comming heauenly lyfe forasmuch wee haue earnest penny therof holy ghoste knyt lord iesus christ goodes hath doo belong vntoo v made common v fayth therfore let v mark well conteyned word paules sayeth holy ghost earnest penny seing wee must need sure redemption wherof shall haue possession last day yea euen full doth thing lf shew sufficiently sillie wormes earth wee bee compassed aboute rottennesse corruption wee bee beset many misery pitie see world rayleth vpon v mocketh v simplicitie bee fayne indure hunger thirst seemeth often tymes god hath forsaken v sort cut v yea vou safeth pitie v despyzed creature worlde lo poynt wee bee outward appeerance therefore standeth v hand haue remedie warrant selues withall middes many perplexity hartgriefes cause paule sayeth purposely holy ghost earnest penny although world haue brydle looce trample v vnder feete say although lord keepe v occupyed many temptation although humble v wyse may seeme wee bee sheepe appoynted slaughter death bee continually betweene teeth yit wee vnpurueyed good remedie seyng holy ghost reygneth harte wee haue whereof boast euen middes temptation according sayd viiirom c romanes assured god taketh v child wee may call vppon also although wee bee afflicted tormented yit wee ceasse bee alwayes fully infallibly resolued father leade v glory heauen euen also meane whereby hope tryed furthermore wee bee warned also walk pacience seing god hath giuen v holie spirit earnest pennye wee must bee hastie impaciente wee haue bin woont bee god handle v roughly wee fall grudging loth suffer thing wee see tender nyce bee nature wee must indure paciently bycause god haue v come kingdome one leape say haue v passe world midds thornes breers wee shall haue much doo get wee shalbee greate distresse seing haue v led way yit notwitstanding giueth v good remedie ought suffyze v strengtheneth v inuincible constancie holie spirit let v stand redinesse fyght till tyme victorie bee fully come trew fayth doth euen alredy get vpper hand wee receyue yit fruite nother doo wee fully inioy therfore wee must determine selues sygh grone continually yit therwithall reioyce also reioyce harte also cry paule ala wretched wyght shal deliuer prison bodie thing may match verye well toogither therfore let euery v moorne yea bee greeued hart wee bee still much giuen wicked lust number vice v yit notwithstanding let v ceasse also oo say wee thank god bee contented giuing portion v v ought suffyze v tary leyzure till accomplish performe thing hath begunne seing wee haue holie spirit dwelling v promis wee shall neuer bee destitute vntoo end thus yee see wee bee heere incoraged take hart grace walk constancie misery world may stop v till wee bee race end cause paule speaketh purposely redemption trew wee bee redeemed lord iesus christ1 cor c giuen v redemption raunsome sayd another text yit notwithstanding wee haue effect full fruition yit1 tim b dubble redemption one accomplished person lorde iesus christ anoother wee wayte shalbee shewed vppon v comming ageinerom c according wheruntoo paule sayth viii romanes although wee grone bee hild downe anguish yit wee must bee dismayed think straunge bycause creature sayth doo beare v companie yea bee woman trauelleth child wee see world subiect corruption sin adam seing let v quayle gronings let v measure affection hold v contented haue redemption purchaced person lord iesus christ thereuppon trust accomplishe thing v person hath brought v owne thing therefore paule ment say god spirit earnest penny duryng tyme wee wayte taken transitorie lyfe bee set free misery specially bondage sinne heauyest burthen bee untill tyme wee bee deliuered thinges wee must rest vppon god spirit dwelleth v touching redemption purchace may well bee taken purchaced redemption ryfe maner speech lyke sayd spirit promis ment spirit assureth warranteth al promise spirit feare god bycause maketh v obedient rightuousnesse lykewise speaketh redemption purchace may well bee sayd redemption purchaced v shewe wee feele effect selues wee doubt thing iesus christ hath doone v must mistrust hath suffered vayne surely suffering purpose towardes v vnlesse came vntoo v myght redound profit wee inioy therefore thing purchaced person lord iesus christ yit meane season respect selues reyneth v short oo ende wee owne vnthankfulnesse refuze benefite god offereth v wit reioycing affliction bycause wee knowe saluation sure repyne ageinst god blaspheme walke quietly till wee bee deliuered prison wherein wee bee till wee bee fully set free beyng gathered togither lord iesus christ let v cast selues downe maiestie good god acknowledgment faultes praying make v feele yea euen farre bring v vtter mislyking wretchednesse selues wee fynding nothing v dungeon naughtinesse may learne resort righteousnesse seeke well head acknowledge hath shewed himselfe mercifull father towardes v doubting thereby ment assure v also adopted v beginning worlde intent wee continue calling vppon trew stedfastnesse neuer giue ouer let v say almightie god heauenly father c pthe sixth sermon vppon first chapter cause also hauing herd fayth vvhich yee haue inlyghtened might vnderstand vvhat hope vvhich yee ought haue calling vvhat rich glory inheritance among saintes wee haue seene already howe saint paule brought epesians onely chief also onely cause saluation shewed must necessitie father whole vppon god without mingling foolish presumption therwithall say themselues furthered god grace receyued eyther free wil good intent saint paule therefore hath shewed effect onely ephesian spake also bin god church ought without exception confesse welfare proceeded god onely free goodnesse onely bycause redeemed meane lord iesus christ also bycause called beliefe gospell according choozing creating world nowe warranteth sayd doctrine recorde yeeldeth vnto god doth euen magnifie goodnesse separated mannes eye sight witness trewly doctrine gospel oughte bee lesse esteemed preached published open face whole woorld yit behoueth speaketh haue throughly printed hart say thing himselfe god angel speaketh otherwise iangling rather vnhalowing god word step vp intoo pulpet talke lyke angell meane haue meaning hart bee perswaded thing speaketh better man drowned hundred time beare abrode excellent record saluation god truthe meane season bee perswaded himselfe thing preacheth god angells might knowe hath thing printed harte therefore without cause paule hath preached god free goodnesse choozing lyked calling knowledge gospell chozen confirming strong hand giuing inuincible constancie stedfastnesse whe called nowe addeth god knoweth witnessing therof bee good earnest vnfeynedly protesteth heere concerning prayer maketh alone himselfe man could know thought sayeth vttereth mouth euen auoweth doctrine god inasmuch prayeth voutsafe accomplishe thing hath begunne heere therfore wee haue marke first mynde haue labour profitable edifying churche haue trew zeale must onely giue themselues teaching also therwithall pray god woorke power grace oftentymes befalleth wee doo beate water yea though wee haue tongue angells bycause wee pray god doc rine wee preach selues wee bee vnprofitable instrument hath giuen v vtterance must also make effectuall1 cor b according sayd planteth nothing watereth nothing god giueth increase seing let haue charge teaching god church walke fearfully carefully onely indeuer win men vnto god also humbly acknowledge doo nothing themselues cast foorth sounde intoo aire would vanishe away hand god wrought secrete power spirit therefore thing wee haue remember vppon woords paule speaketh heere euerye v also ought apply generally owne vse therfore wee come bee taught god woord v readeth alone himselfe let v imagin witts bee suttle ynough wee bee able ynough vnderstand whatsoeuer scripture telleth v let v acknoweledge beastlinesse praye god make doctrine preuaile wyse v may slip fro v thing perceyued better processe paule holdeth heere wee wey well woords vseth sayeth yeeldeth thanks vnto god without end ceassing fayth hearde bee church ephesus loue towards saint yit notwithstanding continueth praying vntoo god inlighten bring perfection faythfull ought labour attayne vntoo till god haue taken world sayth ceaseth giue thanks vnto god wee see example wherabouts faythful ought spende time deede cheife sacrifyze god requireth alloweth wee shoulde honour benefit yeelde deserued prayse bee thought bee doone yee would say start patch lyke god side ceasseth poure benefit infinitely also behoueth euery v inforce ourselues blesse prayse without ceassing paule speakes heere vnfeynedly blessed god ephesian ment much church vnkindnesse thinke vpon benefit hath receyued god hand wee v bound prayse god neighbour wee heare reported god hath prospered churche shewed mercie people hundred leages bee short wee heare thing ought make v glad becometh mouthes open prayse god wee bee bound doo good turnes wee see neighbour feele though bee distant far countryes v bee thought v god filleth mouthes sayd psalmepsal yit meane whyle wee haue mind yeelde thanks wee haue note wee bee bound prayse god meate drinke thing belong flightfull life bindeth v hym much without comparison calleth v heauenly heritage blisseth inritcheth v spirituall gift grace serue leade v farre worlde seing god vseth bountifulnesse towards v excuse wee haue wee followe example shewed v heere paule life long wee must occupy selues continually praysing name god heerewithall sheweth faith charitie verye giftes god come selues men doo alwayes imagine diuelishe pryde told afore paule playd hypocrite geuing thanks god fayth charitie ephesian euery man could beleeue faith owne inclination cold get power owne prayse therof ought bee giuen vntoo god mockerye acknowledge selues beholden thing wee haue others heere paule blisseth god name inlightning ephesian fayth framing hart vntoo well graunt god grace must bee fayne help v par e ub yet wyll haue man bee still exalted attayn yth owne motion eere paule shetteeh di lish opinion sheweth wee haue seene heertofore whensoeuer churche intoo fleshly harte namely sof en bow obeysance furthermore vnder theis twoo woordes fayth loue paule hath comprehended whole perfection christian marke wherat first table lawe ameth wee worship one vpryghtnesse deale wyze neyghbours wee streyue selues helpe men without hurting man wee bee sure god hath set foorth good perfet rule good lawe nothing bee added vntoo seing without cause dooth paule place set downe fayth iesus christ charitie towards ney summe whole christen come shewing wherunto wee ought frame selues rule herewith wee haue also marke vnder worde fayth comprehedeth whole seruis god imposible wee wholy rauished loue heauely father acquainted goodnesse hee hath shewed v person sonne behold god draweth v dungeon confuzion death openeth v gate heauely kingdome telleth v take v child heare beleue wee shalbe wholly geuen ouer vnto forsaking world hating euill selues bycause separateth v yee see woorde fayth importeth full yeelding ouer selues wholly vnto god ageine faith ydle howe fayth importeth contayned first table lawe trew part put whole howbeit bee considered thinges wee haue spoken cannot bee put asunder standeth v hand liue vprightly indifferently neyghbors said sixtenth psalmepsalm bee beholden god al thing wee cannot yeeld hym recompence agein wee haue streyned selues vttermost bestow aught vpon ym wee doo nother hym requireth wee bee giuen dooing good poore faithfull one according paule also nameth saintes expresly text trewe wee ought vse charitie towards men without exception wee cannot bee child god maketh sunne shine vpon good bad except wee loue enemy streyne selues succour helpe therfore marke must ame yit notwithstanding hindereth v loue god child brotherly loue bycause knit vnto v streyter bod cause said aswel forealleged text sixtenth psalme present one paule wee muste haue loue towardes faithfull yea paules hym selfe place doth well discusse doubt may bee cast behalfe wylleth v haue charitie men generallgalat c chiefly houshold faith god wyll haue v becomme lyke hym folowe example good al men yea euen woorthy much wee shoulde vtter ost power procure welfare seeke nothing el picke eye moreouer much hath set arke wyt first must giue ouer selues wholy god stick stedfastly vntoo secondly lyue euenly vprightly neighbour absteynyng euyll doyng indeuoring doo good men accordyng power abilitie howe may come passe euen knowing heauenly father acknowledging inf nite good turnes hath done v wherof voutsafeth make v partaker dayly whole lyfe depend vpon hym onely party whose hand looke euerlasting saluation callyng vppon hym yeelding hym thankes life long let serue first poynt ageyne touching second possible v loue eighbors wee must also lyue soberly without shewing euyll ample looke wize behauiour man maye haue cause complayne v charitie whore onger go dishonest another man wyfe theefe seekes steale another man goodes ageyn seeing lyfe ought guided honestie soeuer man bruste h intoo drunkennesse suche wize wee shall buzie r selues vayne fancy papistes doo take paynes ceremony call god seruis bab e much gad heere pilgrimage doo meane doo plonder away ow e imagination onely want knowing requisite leading lyfe becommeth v volume long without end wee would excuze selues wee great clerkes wee could beare away many thing seing lord vttreth whole demauds twoo three word must need grat image power god father although persones bee distinctiohn yit dooth represent vntoo v thinges belonging requisite ou saluation knowing sonne wee knowe father also sayeth iohn hathe sonne renounceth father protestation soeuer make going wheras sayd heereiohn wee must beleeue iesus christ let v bethinke v warning giueth disciple beleeue yee god sayeth beleeue ye also hee sheweth auncient father gospell cause also told called image god owne nature inuisible wee could knowe vnlesse tered meanes bee short let v mark wee oo nothing else wander till wee haue fayth settled iesus christ wil bee better perceyued error wherwith world hath bin imbrewed vnto day papist pro est well ynough beleeue god much doo turkes iewes also trew papistes iewes seeme come neerest truthe iewes protest worship liuing god euen god gaue lawe moyses meane whyle reiect christ end substance lawe papistes although fesse christianitie auowe iesus christ sauiour yit pparant make warre ageynst much set vp seruing god owne lyking nothing disorder doings touching turkes wel ynough say almyghtie god maker heauen earth shall wee thinke god renounce himselfe vnsaye hath sayd man come vntoo welbeloued sonne whome hath ordeyned bee mediator tweene men ageyn wee see papistes well ugh say beleue god yit therwithall wil need patron aduocates bring presenc agein ynough bee bought blud ou iesus christ must also put themiohn go god god father father lo iesus christ ioyneth wyse faythfull one sayth haue one selfsame god yea verily sort god yi howbeeit forasmuch clothed flesh inasmuch voutsaued bee made fleshe ende
