lo companie child thou hast giuen mee howsoeuer cace stand wee see iesus christ draweth v god father end wee repayre ful trust receyue v otherwyse durst bee bold hight request heard grace could wee obteyneiohn gate opened v iesus christ performed thing hath spoken namely way howbeeit intent wee myght better knowe neede wee haue bee guyded lord iesus christ paule setteth heere v infinite glory god dare wee bee bold offer selues intoo god sight haue aduocate maketh v way thither sunne doo dazle mennes eye heate sindge v though wee bee farre become v wee preace vntoo god else sunne little power hath breathed intoo must wee needes bee swallowed vp wee preace incomprehensible maiestie god yit notwithstanding wee haue iesus christ wee haue vnderstand god onely father glory also father mercy looketh pitie vppon miserable reproche disdeyne world lo whereuppon wee ought rest praying vntoo god paule prayeth god heere expresly giue ephesian spirit wisedome reuelation certeine god alredy reueled truth gospell seene verily wee could haue one sparke fayth lyght except god wrought v alredymath c according sayd peter sixteenth chapter mathew flesh blud hath opened thinges vntoo thee heauenly father heauen yit peter sheweth afterward knewe whit christes spiritual kingdome although silly nouice sat b c yit witnessed hym smal taste gospel gift heauen hereby wee see god must faine increase giftes v respect life termed way bicause wee must alwayes go forewardes tyl race bee ended soeuer imagineth perfection worlde possessed satan vtterly renounceth god grace yit notwithstanding let v surmize god changeth purpose variable suffereth grace bee chopt gobbet cantle men pleasure hath appoynted order wee shoulde growe day day yit therwithal learn acknowledge soberly wantes grone mislike hold selues alwayes awe ye see two thinges agree wel namely ephesian alredy receyued spirite reuelation yit needed haue giuen god although one spirit yit gyftes diuers distributed euery v measure pleaseth hym giue none iesus christe whiche hath receyued fully onely fountaine neuer drayned dry vpon god spirit teth end al v bee made partaker owne part let v acknowledge wizest v haue neede bee alwayes scol er learne styll euen dying day howbeit way let v marke woorde reuelation condemneth v al blyndesse wee haue eye open discerne betweene white blacke wee see sunne moone wee see worldly thing able iudge wee neede newe reuelation geere wee haue nature true eye instrumentes god power goodnesse wherby maketh v inioye light common thing heere paule sheweth v wee bee blynd conceyue whyt god spirituall grace except open eye take away kercheefe veyle yea giue v newe sight wee haue wee haue eye woorse tha stopped vntyl inlighten holy spirit thus ye see wee haue beare mynde thing proceedeth styl withal namely saith haue eye vnderstanding inlightened man might reply wee haue spirit reuelation alredy haue wee neede uerily say sawe nothing true see partly haue eye styll much dymmed may said generally al men1 cor according saide worlde wee see thinges ly glasse tyll wee bee able behold god heauenly glory tyme shalbe fashioned lyke vntoo hym agey e intent men shoulde alledge say st god reuele thinges suche wise vntoo v wee taking wee could see nothing shall man bee bru e beast without discretion iudgement answeare heereunto true wee haue wyt yit wee blynd bycause wee corrupted sin god therfore must bee fayne giue v new eye sayd afore addeth woord wisdome better beate downe fond ouerweening men conceyue themselues needes flye without wing come vntoo god man woulde bee wyse wee desyred trew wisedome seeking god hand good well ruled desyre twoo fault v wee needes bee wyze owne conceyt wyze ynough gouerne selfe wyll foole say meane whyle wee despyze god word euery v needes haue rydle layd looce necke haue leaue giuen doo thinketh good great ouerweening vyce reading holy scripture wee still imagin come knowledge thing conteyned owne discretion heere twayne excluded paule desyreth god giue faythfull one spirit wisdome sheweth haue discretion brute beastes except bee guyding lord iesus christ purpose come kingdome heauen euen ciuill matter worldly affayres god giueth thinketh good keepe speciall goodnesse alwayes himselfe giue discretion listeth guyde himselfe withall bace thing world dooth make vnbeleeuers bee well syghted therefore cace concerneth heauenly lyfe preparation v paule presuppozeth thing haue sayd already namely wee must bee taught god hand know doctrine truth record gospell without wee shoulde bee lyke fantasticall fellowes roue vnder pretence hauing reuelation god holy spirit howbeeit maner paule taketh word reuelation prayeth god giue child example iesus christ speaketh spirit doth separate doctrine preached spirit commeth sayeth shall tell truthiohn apostle receyued alredy yi addeth shall shewe thing heare mouth bee short peculiar office holy ghost teach v wise word heare may therwithall haue course place may profit theruppon paule sheweth also wherin lyeth light knowledge namely knowing god person onely sonne say thing wherwith must content selues wee haue klishe wit bee inquisitiue thing passe capacit e let v consider little weake rawe vnderstanding wit grosse heauie shall wee doo wee would ye aboue heauen earth wee able comprehend small roome yit neuerthelesse see men take vnmeasurable leaue bee inquisitiue put foorth question way pleading disputing ageinst god cause paule sheweth v wee mynde bee wize behoueth v bee sober wit must vnderstand manner thing god lord iesus christ himselfe shew anone wee come poynt wee haue much ought wel suffize v wee presume go wilfull ouerthrowing selues paule wil shew length hereafter ought suffize v wel text whole holy scripture ought learne god wee ought serue may haue trust entrace may haue pray flie succour time thing wherunto must imploy selues canot doone vnlesse al euer haue neede auaylable welfare bee iesus christ god hath manifested selfe maiestie god high thing wee bee vndone hundred time wee could come nere come downe vnto v wee haue iesus christ wee haue lyuely image wherein wee may behold whatsoeuer requisite saluation vnderstand god father wee bee clenzed sinnes transformed intoo glorye god wee see god accepteth v rightuous wee bee reconciled god ageine wee perceyue hath raunsomed v wee shall neuer bee left destitute grace holy spirit till haue brought v ioying inheritaunce thus doo wee knowe thing lord iesus christ1 cor cause also paul sayeth another place desired knowe thing iesus christ onley intended boast according whereuntoo wee haue seene heretofore forsooke thing abyde vnder crosse lord iesus christ althoughe hath worldward nothing shame reproch yit protesteth giuen ouer al esteemed afore estemed hinderaunce losse yea filth dung intent cleaue lord iesus christ shewe possessed fond opinion owne deseruings separate themselues lord iesus christ wee bee knit vntoo wee must giue ouer imagine selues haue owne offer selues vnto oyde goodnesse bee filled hand ye se also paule sayth leuer come hauen saluation poore starke naked liue mids sea bee swallowed vp although taken holy man halfe angell yit made reckening might bee partaker remission sinnes giuen iesus christ grace hath communicated member therefore let v learne magnifie god grace wyze wee may vtterly forget toyes wherwith diuell de iueth vnbeleeuers puffing vp wote manner pryde come vtterly emptie lord iesus christ oo beg grace wee cannot receiue one drop confessing selues bee vtterly vnworthie let v fall downe maiestie good god acknoweledgment fault praying make v perc yue may humble v wee may bee stablished grace labour come nerer nerer vntoo beaten downe selues wee may bee rayzed vp mere mercie depending altogither vppon resort vntoo father continewe till haue taken v prizon sinne ioyned v perfectly himselfe may please graunt grace onely v also people c seuenth sermon vpon first chapter pray god lord iesus christ father glorie giue spirit wisedome reuelation haue knoweledge wit haue eye vnderstanding inlightened end ye may know hope ought haue calling rich glory heritage among saintes men haue naturallye vnderstanding sheweth soone bee borne processe tyme haue discretion good euill cause thei reasonable creature vnderstanding wee haue nature ynough bring v kingdome heauen wee stop farre short matte concerne heauenly life doo come question wee see euery man hath wit matter affayres world euery man looke agein although dyuers could fynd hart owne conscience dead yit notwithstanding god hath graued kynd feeling hart liues must need bee brydled euen wickeddest woorst natured v shall force haue remorse hartbyting bee constreyned whether allow good condemne euill trew haue committed fault labour hyde vayne excuces man aske whether murther extortion robberie whoredome deceyt forswearing bee vertewes thy say bee vyces woorthy bee condemned euerie man talke god bee knowledge printed man harte end bee condemned without excuce bee inforced bee thir owne iudges said afore ynough leade v vntoo god open v kingdome heauen wise wee may knowe bee saued howe call vppon god wee starke blynd behalf insyght reacheth beyond world therfore god must bee fayne woorke v giue v new eye spye thing requisite saluation cause paule prayeth vntoo god heere giue inlyghtened eye wherin presuppozeth men haue alredie enterance atteyne hygh requisyte haue seede religion perceyue god furthermore god must bee fayne giue greater lyght one wee quyte voyd reason adam sin wee bee plundged darknesse go cleane awk fro ryght way till god haue reached v hand yee see thing conteyned heere god hath doone v giuing v eye vnderstanding making v men putting v intoo world bycause therby reformeth v giueth v cleere sure insyght hath chozen priuiledge peculiar owne child common men truely wee see god vttereth power knowen onely haue inlyghtened eye according saying moysesdeut thy god hath giuen thee hart vnderstand eye see euen vntoo day wee knowe miracle wrought sight people yit notwithstanding passing red sea issuing water rocke falling manna downe heauen thicke cloud day fiery pillar night abundaunt comming fleshe vntoo horrible punishment god layd vppon rebells vppon giuen full scope owne lustes geere people vnderstoode moyses telling neede referre themselues god might bee inlightened spirit sayeth see euen vnto houre god gracious dooings haue bin buryed among vnthankfulnesse bycause men blockish doo neuer vnderstand aught belongeth welfare till god haue wrought therefore standeth hand rid selues ouerweenyng craue vnderstanding god hand acknowledging selues bee vnable reache hygh iudge ryghtly god woorkes profite selues vntill haue gyuen heauenly syght myndes summe thinges wee haue marke streyne hereupon easye gather wretched world hath bin beguyled opinion freewill hath bin put heades papistes wel ynough graunt without god grace cannot walk ought doo yit say therwithal may well god grace owne freewill make medly togither whe mynd defyne freewill say mingled thing wee haue reason wit chooze good refuze euill therwithall haue also power abilitie performe put execution thing wee haue purposed wee see manner paule speaketh heere mamies reason terme queene ouerruleth brydleth thoughtes deedes sheweth shee starke blynd vntill god haue renewed hir dooth supply wantes bee though peece power v bin paule would haue sayd god furthereth light increaseth addeth whatsoeuer hath neede howbeit speaketh sayeth god giue inlyghtened eye shewing therby free gift lord must bee fayne beare infirmity put portion theruntooo also blynd see nothing till haue opened eye wee bee guyded gouerned sayd manifestation holy spirit wee haue touched heertoofore forasmuch men runne alwayes flinging ouer feeldes buzie heades many vnprofitable thing paule sheweth v wherto ought apply wholy vnderstading wit namely seeking knowe hope calling haue told alreadye men yee would say borne curiositie roue raunge frame many wicked gaze heades cause many men doo martir themselues measure2 tim b euer lerning neuer atteyning knowledg truth sayeth paule therfore let v mark well trew knowledge wee must seeke atteyne hope wheruntoo god hath called v scripture serueth feede v vayne superfluous thinges edifie v welfare wit make v perceyue god goodnesse wee myght ioyned vntoo bee trew happinesse hereuppon wee may gather also vntill tyme lord haue inlightened v holy spirit wee find nother waye path come neere heauenly lyfe much gesse meaneth wherfore behoofe lord put v possession saluation power holy spirit told heertoofore fayth serueth giue v enterance intoo kingdome heauen intoo heritage purchased v lord iesus christ god must bee fayne giue v holy spirit sith let v marke wee haue neede haue gospell preached vntoo v also god bore eares wee may hearken thing conteyned open eye see thinges sheweth v short may begyn bring passe howbeit much men saide afore doo fond imagination take vpon ought doo syde despize god giftes paule magnifyeth heere hope whereof made mention saying vvhat richesse glorye heritage among saintes doubt speaking god lorde iesus christ wee say ey high thinges howbeit exempt selues em wee coulde scape soo wee coulde bee contented knowe ightnought thing concerne saluation wee bee vn aciable body feedes v vanity leazings god call v schoole wee shrinke backe muche wee ossibly yea wee set afore v shielde wee bee rude nd wee haue smal ouer grosse vnderstanding secretes god word deepe incomprehensible v haue skyl inough say yit al hypocrisie feynednesse proofe therof men wyl alwayes iudge owne liking thing propounded fro god word say howe possible reason scan beholde god speaketh yit wyll without gainsaying receiue thinges shewed name god wee see doo lye saying bee dull grosse witted thinke cleane contrarye starkest idiot say veryest doltes al styl bee wizer god ageine syde causeth gospel bee despized number per fantastical felowes thinke bee simple doctrine hath finenesse suttletie ynough much neede therefore haue wee bethinke v thing shewed v heere paule glorious heritage wheruntoo god hath called v infi ite rich besydes wee bee nothing else myre rottennesse shetteth v hope saluation long wee bee god enemyes wee looke hand vtter confuzion yit notwithstanding pleaseth make v fellowes angells heauen yea made member lord iesus christ end bee parttakers lyfe glory excellent rich wee shall haue imployed wittes ought wee bee tootoo much ashamed seyng god hath vttered inestimable goodnesse towardes v paule waken vp mennes drowzinesse rebuke correct vnthankfulnesse commend hundreth part god grace ought doo telleth v wee thinke better vppon wee shall fynde speaking maner stirre v vp pray god inlyghten v bycause without wee bee able come thing neere fayth neere knowledge thus wee see paules meaning hee pursueth continueth much adding excellencie power v haue beleeued ageyn according effectual voorking strength power gathereth heapeth vp many woordes heere toogither import one thing neuerthelesse correcting man leawdnesse labour deface god goodnesse much insomuch wheras bee able deface altogither diminish wyse appeereth sparke wheras ought haue full light way let v mark wheras paule setteth downe saintes beleeuers meaneth faithfull god hath already called therein sheweth euen wee haue fayth holynesse proceedeth god mercy men bring nothing owne growing truely title saintes honorable yit behoueth v go welspring holynesse selues haue nothing vnclennesse god child must nedes holy yit must consider whece haue whether haue owne purchace polli ie god gift paule sheweth prayse thereof ought bee yeelded simply vntoo godleuit g et c nought sayeth oft holy agein wee know iesus christ sanctified v inten e wee might bee washed scoured vnclenenesse thus much concerning first poynt afterward followeth cause fayth namely men atteyne otherwise tha drawing secret motionmath according sayd hat must learne god bicause woord conteineth wisedome god doth thereby teach v faithfully thing behoofe also bicause lord expoundeth moreouer saying heareth father spake itiohn e wisedome god yit sheweth thing e vttered mouth could preuaile except god spake man holy spirit iesus christ could profot men teaching foorth god spirit wrought within hart shall preaching doo wee heare mouthe mortall men nothing men must plant water god must giue increace1 cor b paule sayeth third chapter first epistle corinthian furthermore haue told wee must drawe holynesse fro iesus christ shall finde al fulnesse plentie also let v vnderstand saying bee warned wee bee called filthinesse take leaue doo euill bee sholed seruice god men well ynough brag bee faythfull word runnes roundly vppon euery man tongue fayth preciouser thing wee thinke hart sayd foftenth act intent wee bee sholed set sideact b giue selues wholly god seruice ment men corrupt infected lump till god haue drawen one differ wee nothing hem deepely plundged possible manner euil wickednesse wee bee alike say touching nature beleeue lord iesus christ must bee orted rest worlde peter also sayeth first epi le agein wee haue seene heeretofore wee bee clenzed b ud iesus christ intent bee drawen worldeiohn c according also sayeth iohn prayeth father take v world transitorie lyfe keepe naughtinesse world bearing rule v exempt v yee see thing wee haue beare mynde holynesse trew recorde ou fayth therefore whosoeuer called christian ought fee consecrated vntoo god intermeddle defyle vnclenenesse f thinesse world trew holynesse shall neuer bee perfect long wee bee world wee doo alwayes drawe lynes v although sinne ouer mayster v yit dooth dwell v wee keepe continuall battell ageinst get vpper hand howsoeuer world go yit god hath sanctified v must apply selues seruice must indeuer clenze selues vyces wee must giue selues wholly vntoo wee bee worldling take leaue doo list effect thing paule ment say moreouer place maketh comparison betweene drowned ignorance rather hardened haue mynd submit themselues obedience gospell doo fyght furiously ageinst faythfull sillie sheepe herkening voyce good shepherd paule condemneth heere scoffer scorner despyze god doggs brute beast without feeling religion wee see thing mirrours vntoo v make heares stand vp vppon heades making v knowe wee god pityed v therfore see folkes scorne god openly rush forth randon al leaudnesse let v acknowledge infinite goodnesse god hath separated v companye wherefore wee see one sort sotted vnbeleefe sort full pryde bitternesse stubbornnesse ageinst gospell let v vnderstand wee selues bee lyke god hath reached foorth arme vppon v let v marke well woordes paule vseth heerein saying excellent greatnesse ghtinesse according effectuall vvoorking povver strength seeme holie ghost ment thunder downe vppon diuelish opinion wherwith world hath tymes bin besotted wit freewill heathen men presumed farre say god deede created bee world power giue good bad fortune termed euerye man owne power freechoyce follow vertew behaue wyse fault myght bee founde loe heathen men parted stake betweene god themselues lesser matter setting v heere beneath crawle heere lyke frogges left vntoo god greater matter namely atteyning vntoo heauen ruling selues vertew sayd man owne abilltie belonged iewes papist haue bin altoogither mynd haue touched alredye confesse haue neede god helpe yit haue v mingle peece owne holinesse god grace bee able woorke ioyntly say insomuch commeth reckening cheef part shall alwayes bee found selues let v see holy ghost speaketh end vseth terme hyghnesse power strengh effectual vvorking myghtinesse wherfore heapeth vp toogither shewe men bee mad take vpon becometh ther woord heere serueth abate cackling wee boast neuer little drop goodnesse men say haue yit good mouing mee haue peece vertew behold paule speaketh hyghnesse ment shew goodnesse haue aboue world hath roote spring selues cometh aboue iames sayethiam c agein men say wee haue power withstand owne vyces fyght ageinst temptation paul sayeth heere strength power myght commeth god must bee fayne vestowe vppon v receyue men say still yit streyning selues may able doo somewhat paule telleth v ther effectuall working ther bringing thing passe vnlesse god giue v according speaking second philipians sayethphil b standeth v hand walke feare warinesse bycause god giueth abilitie performe according owne good pleasure say beginneth woorke bringeth end knitting vp bee short let v marke looke many woordes heere many great thunderclappes lyghteninges beate downe sinke pryde man intent confounded selues wee myght giue god glory deserueth lowlinesse frankly freely yeeld selues giltie acknowledging al goodnesse commeth beholden thus yee see effect matter wee haue marke vppon streyne imbace selues wyze wee myght haue desyre part halues god saye dooth helpe v portion grace holy spirit owne freewill yeeld purely simply whole prayse saluation furthermore let also make v despyze world wee may content selues hope euerlasting lyfe purchased v lord iesus christ wee knowe although men bee generally subiect many affliction lyfe bee notwithout cause termed vale wretchednesse yit god exercizeth owne childre greater abundace aduersities dooth sorte also haue neede bee alwayes put mind renounce world wee liue heere much ase pleasure woold become v seeing wee misse fall sleepe heere notwithstanding god doo pricke v quicken v vp many wayes passe hence poste without esting heere bylowe yee see fewe woordes howe god exercyze v many wayes hath called v fayth gospell else wee would bee weery seruing would seeme v loue slender thing wee learne giue ouer thing little nothing woorth imbrace iesus christ therefore let v learne paules intent heere drawe v wyse vntoo god nothing may let v walke calling wee haue thinges lyking world wee may lerne esteeme inestimable benyfites god better wee haue doone wee may say dauid speaketh sixtenth psalme haue myne heritage suffizeth seeing god hath giuen mee haue excellent portionpsal passe going affliction world pouertie sickenesse reproche feare threatinings thinges shalbee sweete mee possesse god make mee feele hath chozen mee reserued mee himselfe mynded haue mee partaker goodes thus see effect text wee may bee hartened strengthened vntoo pacience beare myldly affliction aduersities worlde bee greeued conceyt although god make v drinke bitter cup giue v cause sigh lament yit wee must fall repyning grudging assure selues god hath giuen v good comfort hath called v bee parttakers kingdome vttered power already v wee ought aduaunce selues aboue earthly thinges looke downe feete much wee doo yit perceyue fulnesse god grace wished therfore paule sendeth v person lord iesus christ surely added god hath vttered power sonne maner haue herd thing myght alledge way reply howso rich god bereft good world also dry barrein groud respect grace god holy spirit bee portion v smal wee ought bee ashamed yit wee bee moreouer plundged infirmity yee speake god power ought get vpper hand sinne v wee bee weake wee bee good beaten downe agein meete god image shyne foorth v wee beare store fylthinesse blemish v pitie see wee bee wholly consecrated god worlde holdes v backe wee bee snarled loe faythfull myght bee abasshed talke ministered concerning god grace stayed led foorth iesus christ without cause therfore doth paule adde god vtter excellencie power rayzed lord iesus christ death speaketh purposely resurrection bycause death wee see nothing astonishment appeered nothing weaknesse vanquishing death shewed bee sonne god yea lord glorie lyfe ad power also cause paule sayth god set ryght hand bin ynough iesus christ haue bin rayzed agein except continuall abyding dominion trew euen resurrection wee haue record sonne god yit wee must passe one step namely blast power away ryzing agein atteined superioritie world gouerned set downe right hand god father maynteyne preserue seruantes call vppon put selues intoo keeping hath sufficient power ouercome satan al world enemyes wee see paules meaning forasmuch wee myght bee cast downe fayth least wyse sore shaken wee looke selues therefore setteth iesus christ v trew patterne wherin wee may see thing yit vnseene selues wit god inestimable power surmounteth whole world first rayzed death secondly set ryght hand father speaking god ryght hand resemblance taken men certeyne god hath nother ryght hande lefte infinite fylleth heauen earth agein hath body spirituall beyng therefore wee must imagin place certeine god ryght hande spoken wehn sayd iesus christ sitteth shewe filleth world power trew respect manhood heauen one article fayth ascended heauen yit notwithstanding although bee absent v body great distaunce betwixt v let filleth thing holy spirit dwelleth v himselfe wee bee nourished owne substaunceiohn f according saying flesh meate blud drinke yee see god right hand certeyn place christ sit souereinty hath obteyned gouerne whole world sayd afore similitude borowed men prince maketh vicegerent setteth right side say loe second person realme haue men obey god person lord iesus christcolo b ment shewe father trew whole fulnesse godhead iesus christ howbeit forasmuch wee bee heauie sothfull vnable atteyne maiestie god therefore sayde iesus christ hath obteyned souereintie wee bee sure hath v protection vnder hand wee safe diuels hell doo cannot preuayle al ageinst v hath al power eue head although member weak yit strength ynough head chiefe part body ye see cause sayd iesus christ set right hand god father namely shewe v wee neede seeke farre help seeing gouerneth thing aboue beneath wee ee committed charge sayeth god hath vttered high infinite power v howebeeit forasmuch suffizeth reason infirmity wee feele much amisse v still wee bee yit come full measure hundreth part therefore intent may bee better assured thing wee want wee must consider iesus christ wee subiect yit still vntoo death behold iesus christ receyued vp intoo euerlasting life cause became mortall man wee bee life hath might belong vnto v doth sinne dwell still v behold iesus christ hath spot blemish wee weake power god father looke whatsoeuer receyued manhod tooke v sake behoofe bee short looke whatsoeuer wee want whatsoeuer may comfort quicken v shall fynd lord iesus christ bycause wee bee care perplexitie though excluded benefites paule hath made mention heretoofore finally wee neuer haue settled trust except wee knew thing wanting selues head measure god gracious giftes fimall yea euen perfectest folke forewardest haue profited sith wee alwayes hang mamering doubt wee know accomplished lord iesus christ first fruites wee sanctifyed person wee haue receyued thing aforehand shall bee v plentifulnesse hereafter hath taken v world verily lyeth certeintie wheruppon wee ought rest wee bee shaken downe temptation bee short wee bee taught text although god grace bee weake v say although haue put small beginning v large abundance requisite bee wished yit notwithstanding giueth v taste sauer trust cannot bee little grace holy spirit v sayeth paule eyght romanes know gage earnest penny aforehand lyfe hath promised trew lump sinne dwelleth still v ought content v god voutsafeth bestowe neuer little holy spirite vppon v furthermore asmuch wee sure thing consydering slendernesse selues infirmity wantes wee haue therfore wee must lift vp eye iesus christ yea auaileth v wee may fynd perfection hym wee bee tootoo farre hym wee bee farre hym respect distance place respect doth paul say wee bee absent hym bicause walke faith open eye syght beholding yit al wee member body seeing like roote cannot bee separated tree sendeth foorth sap intoo boughes braunches euen let v vnderstand end wherunto lord iesus christ hath fulnesse receiued spiritual gift belong heauenly life communicate v farre foorth needeth euen degree degree according w shall haue profited faith heerewithall let v continually beare mynd wee must stoope humble selues bee contented bee still farre perfection whereuntoo becommeth v aspyre bee hungrie folkes wee feeling owne necessitie lacke must runne god beg hand knowing able increace day day wee bee vndoone hand al go wrecke vanishe away continueth thing hath begunne yee see standeth v hand bee ioyned lord iesus christ knowe inseparable bond betweene v inasmuch became poore make v ryche sayde another place meane wherby rich day communicated vntoo v wee haue full fruition sayd afore bycause ynough v wee haue small portion make v taste loue god knowe fayle v thing sith hath giuen v warrant come neere vntoo v dwelleth v holy spirit wee haue seene second corinthian also v euen vntoo end vsing woord inriche shew shall alwayes want needinesse vsphil neuerthelesse let v trust boldly promis hath begun good work v go yea euen vntoo day lord iesus christ sayd giue v refreshing lyfe seeming ouerlong wee would fayne sayde perfection alreadie shewed openly v iesus christ come agein sayd vntoo day wee must alwayes bee iourneying go still foreward beseeche god suffer v quayle sure wee bee wee shall neuer fayle susteyne want necessitie yit succour v wise wee shall perceyue haue voutsafed behold v eye mercie accomplish oorke saluation throughout doo v wit hath knit v lord iesus christ nought dooyng hath bin ende euery v myght euen according measure fayth possesse good peculiar till haue fylled v full shall bee hath knit v fully let v cast selues downe maiestie good god acknowledgment sinnes praying make v feele may drawe v cause v direct lyfe obediently according commaundements may shewe deedes hath bought v deerely vayne wee giue ouer owne fleshly lustes yeeld selues wholly seruice hath adopted v heritage therefore let v say almyghtie god heauenly father c eight sermon vpon first chapter may knovv vvhat excellent greatnesse povver tovvardes v beleeuers according vvorking myghtinesse strength vvhich vttered iesus christ vvhen raised dead made sit ryght hand heauenly place aboue principalitie myghtinesse povver lordship aboue name named onely vvorld also vvhich come hath put thing vnder feete set ouer thing bee head church vvhich body vvhich filleth began tell morning howe god hath sufficiently declared vntoo v haue possesse sonne iesus christ wee haue full perfection good thing wee cast eye vppon wee may see bee wished therefore although bee many thinges blame woorthy v yea fynd nothing frayltie selues yit wee shall haue sure substantiall stud leane vntoo lord iesus christ calleth v telleth v thing hath receyued god father common v although wee inioy yit full yit wee cannot bee disappoynted bee short told also lord iesus christ set ryght hand god father ende wee myght bee sure thing vnder hand rule whole world good thing able disappoynt anoyances insomuch vnder protection wee may defye diuell enemyes intent wee lerne content selues better iesus christ alone wander heere woont doo paule addeth expresly vvas set aboue myghtinesse souereintie principalitie povver dout meaneth angells howbeit hath vsed maner speeche hold v better lord iesus christ fancy myght turne v say although god haue imparted portion glorie dignitie power among angells yit dooth whit diminish hath giuen iesus christ therefore wee shall fynd thing needfull wee neede gad heere nother lawfull ioyne companion bycause preeminence whatsoeuer else may bee thought deuyzed bee moste noble excellent say lord iesus christ bee sought vntoo paule himselfe sayeth also first colossian alate world hath sought occasion turne away lord iesus christ vnder colour seeking angells heauen wee see god creature alwayes drawen superstition men make idolls bycause god executeth souereintie angellspsal c handes officer instrumentes cause men think selues haue doone much betaking themselues michaellheb b gabriell wote else sayd vyce newly deuyzed diuell father author lying hath intangled men tymes fancy yea euen christian haue folowed example heathen men doings behalfe heathen men haue alwayes surmized angells bee halfe goddes thought haue mediator wherby come vntoo god bycause woorthie themselues euen maner talk papistes day selfsame abhominations began buylded vppon earth euen paules tyme cause sheweth lawfull match thing iesus christ although angells ee magnifyed bee called vertewes power lordshippes domination men giue tytles li yit must stoope bee inferiour head cheefe dignitie must bee reserued god sonneesai bycause knee must bow himrom b worldly creature also heauenly wee see cause sphil b paules packing toogither manie woordes place expresse angells withall wee better bee hilde lord iesus christ rest wholly vppon without wandering one way vnder pretence angells haue excellent noble giftes wee see may gather vpon streyne dotage popedomme imagining patron aduocates mediator vntoo god sprang vp euery whit none cause want knowing lord iesus christ thing giuen vntoo god father wee haue mynd repoze selues vppon except wee know ende come papistes haue one syde imagined themselues bee separated lord iesus christ knowing become brother end wee repayre familiarly vntoo syde haue robbed office allotted holy scripture made dead thing much therefore behoueth v marke wel saying made al one gathered togither one body angells heauen holy father lyued vnder lawe wee prophetes apostle martirs must one common accord glorify commo head iesus christ resort vntoo must bee set vp hye euery man looke wee must wilfully put blyndfoldings eye take away impediment glorye wyse dimmed meane ouercome let satan shall cast way stop v comming iesus christ consider dignitie worthinesse whole world neyther aboue beneath made stope end wee v bee ioyned vntoo one accord thus see effect wee haue gather vpon text trew wordes wee doone vndestrand also god distributeth office among angel pleaseth one hath greater charge another yit notwithstanding power knowe case standeth let v bee contented knowe according measure fayth onely giue eare god woord sobernesse learne without giuing brydle owne fond curiositie number doo wee see disputing finely angel though euery would bee marshal god house place euery angel according degree diuilish malapertnesse babble sort god secret god hath made v priuie woord therefore let v hold selues contented angel noble euer bee ordeyned minister welfare meanes iesus christ whensoeuer wee intend haue familiaritie acquintance helpe let v doo papist doo haue peculiar prayer make vnto let v repayre iesus christ meanes shal thing become common betweene v hauing spoken churche wee say beleeue communion saincts certeyne angel comprehended therin seeing god imployeth doo v seruice doth wee bee worthye bycause hath gathered v toogither vnder iesus christ therefore verye bond concorde brotherhood betweene v angel hereupon paule addeth iesus christ hath obteyned name say maiestie aboue al name vvell heauen earth paule sheweth v briefly wisdome know benefit brought vnto v sonne god wee possesse alone fayth bee settled wholy vppon according sayd act apostlesact b none name giuen vnder heauen whereby wee must bee saued told morning inasmuch god incomprehensible dwelleth light wee cannot approche vntoo1 tim c paule termeth iesus christ must step betwixte v end wee may preace boldly vntoo know far distant farre separated v wherfore let v marke whereas mention made name bycause god wilbee knowen person onely sonnedeut f sayd herewithall1 cor b manie godhead touching essence wee haue onely one god yit iesus christ wee haue liuely expresse image fathercoloss b c ther wee finde whatsoeuer expedient requisite saluationie e g said wee ought glorye knowing onely one god yit accomplished person lord iesus christ bycause men go seeke god enter intoo terrible maze vnlesse iesus christ bee way leader thus wee see whereat paule amed added also onely worlde also wherby ment knoweledge wee haue iesus christ suffize v heauenly lyfe nowe seeme first blush contrarietie beetweene text sayd fifteenth chapter first epistle corinthian sayeth latter day worlde shalbee iudged lord iesus christ shall yeeld vp kingdome god father holdeth sayeth christ stab ished aucthoritie yea euen worlde come twoo agree well wheras sayeth iesus christ hath name aboue al name image god father bycause rudenesse infirmitie according also called god liuetenant bycause could bee rest except wee knewe god hath hand stretched succour v neede wee perceiue better iesus christ inasmuch come neere vntoo v become brother god dooth reigne meane iesus christ shoulde giue ouer owne offyce sit ydle heauen himselfe leawd dotage thinke truly wee see lord iesus christ speaketh therof fifteenth iohn father sayeth haue alwayes hand woorke sheweth ordeyning bee ruler worlde ende father meane whyle sit vnoccupied heauen saide respecte v intent doubt god continually neare hand v wee seeke hym faith latter day iudgement wee shall haue new eye saith iohn much wee shall bee like vntoo god iohn transfigured intoo glory wee shall see hym whiche thing wee doo bicause wee haue dull wit wherefore ynough v nowe1 cor wee behold hym glasse darkely saith paule wee knowe hym part see yeelding vp kingdome lord iesus christ vntoo god father wee shal behold god maiestie substance incomprehensible v nowe wee shal haue nature changed wee shalbe newe fashioned heauenly glory shal quite cleane rid al corruption wherewith wee compassed yit al ment iesus christ shalbe abaced hee shalbe muche better perfection according said third colossian life hyd god iesus christ iesus christ appeareth shal life bee discouered likewise short wee come souerein blisse purchaced v shal wee haue thing lieth yit hope iesus christ shal gather al thing hym selfe wee shal partaker glory euery man according owne degree measure thus yee see two textes agree wel namely god hath giuen christe name aboue name also shal yeeld vp kingdome god father wee shal see heauenly maiestie bee able conceiue bicause wee fleshly also wee shal perceiue wheras iesus christ appeared vntoo v mortal man hath bin glorifyed humane nature deede god one selfe substance father say shalbe fully knowen wheras nowe wee haue litle shadow furthermore let v learne iesus christ exalted god father ende aduancement serue euerlasting saluation therefore ix esay called father worlde come end wee might knowe giuen vntoo v transitory life also substance faith grounded hym heauen wee shall feele fruite thing hidden wee taste yit part wee shal enter intoo full possession goodes giuen hym already thus yee see paule hath purposely made expresse mention world come addeth immediately god hath put thinges vnder feete made hym head church aboue thinges speaking subiection whole worlde shewe soeuer thing wee haue neede wee resort lorde iesus christ able succour v hath wherewith doo yea wee must marke well sayd eyght psalme god hath care thinges yea euen vntoo sheepe byrdes ayre fish sea bee short al creature put vnder feete end holy ghost ment drawe v therby litle babe shew spiritual benefites wee ought haue greatest estimation communicated v lord iesus christ saying wee might eate one byt bread saue respect wee bee member iesus christ one intended traine v vp higher apcie much thinges giuen lord iesus christ condition wee bee member body deede al thing hath doo belong vntoo v wee separate selues wyl hereafter make v partaker farre higher excellenter goodes wit shalbe named god chyldren bee taken bee become temple holy ghost thing thing wee may come freely vntoo hym cal vppon hym boldly father thing bee inriched ageine giftes wee bereft sinne adam thing bee matched felowship angel stead vnder tyrannie satan vnder thraldome sinne howe wee haue high noble thinges sith wee clayme much morsel bread owne without theft sauyng wee member lord iesus christ wee see whereat paule amed saying thing made subiect lorde iesus christ let v learne giue god thankes name onely sonne lord iesus christ hath sent onely feede nourishe bodyes also bee foode soules may lyue euerlastingly meane let v learne inure selues acknowledge lorde iesus christ hath wherwith succour al necessity diuell make violent assault vpon v may afrayde vtter quayling let v vnderstand lord iesus christ hath inuincible fortresse wherwith defend v ageinst hym armyes wherewith make v inuincible al battels therfore wee bee weake let v resort strength wee want grace let v desyre giue v thinketh necessary enemyes play mad beastes seemeth wee shoulde quite cleane swallowed vp gulfes let v beseech lord iesus christ hold v vnder protection hold satan chayned al vpholders suffer v ouercomme yee see thinges made subiect lord iesus christ owne vse neede sake end giue v soeuer knoweth bee behoofe wee also shoulde learne seeke thinges hand seeth enemyes haue aduantage v represse wel furthermore wheras paule sayeth heere ordeyned head church ouer church thinges continuing matter bring v wholly iesus christ say trew god gracious giftes delt abrode yea angelles mortall men also may bee minister vntoo v yit howsoeuer cace stand must alwayes resort welhead veynes dispersed throughout whole bodie may well giue strength euery part bee cunditpypes blud yit howsoeuer world go brayne must alwayes welspring lyfe wel seen tree sap spred throughout yit notwithstading albeeit roote ascende vp giue nurrishment euery braunche leafe nurrishment commeth roote man woold say whole tree maynteyned alyue one brauch cleane contrary seene trew great bough may well giue nurrishment braunches twigges meete preiudice roote therfore surely member man body ought preiudice heade though euery member doo dewty paule sayeth lord iesus christ giuen churche hir heade aboue thinges say behoueth v resort vntoo cace ther nother paule peter virgin mary michaell haue ought owne needie hungery sauing farforth iesus christ filleth therfore al well che great small must fayne draw plentie cause selfsame text alledged first colossianscolos c paule sayeth pleased god father plentie fulnesse dwell tytle head alonely style fleeting honour serueth expresse power lord iesus christ much better therefore lyke naturall head onely hath superioritie preeminence aboue whole body also yeeldeth nurrishment whole keepeth man alyue euen betweene lord iesus christ v much go wrecke wee depended vppon although say seeme wee haue receiued ryght excellent giftes god hande already yit notwithstanding wynde smoke vnlesse wee holde vnion lord iesus christ herewithall behoueth v note also inasmuch christ called heade meete others obey wee yeelde vntoo doctrine may rule thing head ruleth rest mannes body feete go handes stirre bee short part willing forewarde doo whatsoeuer head shall appoynt lyke must bee doone church iesus christ must rule men must quietly obey haue marke text first saluation dooth depend vppon iesus christ nother angells men holy soeuer bee haue neede receyue hand thinges want themselues therefore wee stand neede thing requisite eyther present lyfe heauenly lyfe eyther bodyes soules running peter paule wee must go streyght lord iesus christ marke one poynt secondly also let v lerne suffer selues bee ruled bee hild awe hand lord iesus christ therby wee may shewe selues bee trew member bodie cannot bee head must needes therwithall bee shepherd haue authoritie ouer v lyke told diuell hath labored deface glorie god sonne vnder pretence angells othersyde hath sent v ydole intoo world bee barre way iesus christ myght bee separated v pope ashamed spew blasphemie chruch bee headlesse bodie himselfe reygned ouer ne vniuersall dominion euery man looked seate aboue whole world much say iesus christ hath doo ought hold contented heauen let successor alone rule stead herein wee see uershoots himselfe abolishe whole souereintie sonne god much therefore doth stand v hand beare well text mynd wherein paule sayeth iesus christ appoynted bee head churche aboue thing trew pope affirme himselfe bee vnderhead therefore iesus christ thrust place let v looke backe haue touched alreadie iesus christ haue imaginatiue title haue power reserued vntoo belongeth vntoo head requireth onely bee set hyghest also haue men receyue thing behoueth v vnderstand roote life fountayne whence behoueth v draw notwithstanding send foorth spirituall benefit good among v chanels undits think good thus yee see wee haue yit briefly beare mynd matter layd foorth large first chapter colossian paule sheweth lord iesus christcoloss b appoynted bee head euen beginning world forsomuchas thing created alonly forsomuchas redeemer day put cace adam falne intoo ruine wherintoo hath drawen v yit god sonne bin alwayes still first borne al creature himselfe creature bycause foundation according also paule addeth reason thereof angel created haue abiding yee see sonne god haue ceassed haue preheminence aboue beneath though wee falne father adam intoo confuzion wee bee lord iesus christ must bee head another manner wit make v one agein god father aud gather v toogither agein vntoo wee estraunged sinne deadly enemie til brought fauour agein meanes iesus christ forgiuing v sinnes besides paule declareth text iesus christ ordeyned head churche end fulnesse bee thus wee see wee ought knit angel auncient father prophet condition lord iesus christ must neuerthelesse onely continew first chiefe also haue thing referred vntoo wee communicate wise toogither euery v keepe place bee member one body bee mo head thereof onely one adde fellowe iesus christ bereeuing thing god father hath giuen alone let v bee contented maketh v partaker benefit vppon condicion wee acknowledge thing come seeke thing fiue fortith psalme well shewedpsal b al v fellowes iesus christ receyue portion good thing giuen vntoo yit bee sayd fellowe fellowelyke v cannot bee discerned apostle papist prate peuish prouerbe end wee knowe none good thinges wee wishe farre v bee offered v liberall desyreth nothing else hand receyue thing owne welfare according himselfe sayeth come vntoo mee yee thirst come drinke water yea euen without money moneyes woorth drinke fyll water wyne mylke lord sheweth howe wee must resort vntoo wee looke vppon maiestie hygh farre v iesus christ therefore must bee meane forasmuch come downe v let v also repayre vntoo himiohn f according sayd seuenth iohn come vntoo mee yee thirstiohn b whosoeuer drinketh water wyll giue shall haue belly full fountaines water shall flowe condicionally men seeke faythfully iesus christ thing haue neede giue v much shall serue turne euery one v himselfe also much wee shall bee able bestowe vppon neyghbours succour want conclusion paule addeth church bodie accomplishment accomplisheth performeth thing men terming church body iesus christ sheweth thing haue touched already wit wee neede make long windlass harde iourneyes get thing wee haue neede sith wee bee vnited ioyned sonne god require wee wee must needes graunt principle haue nother lyfe gladnesse good thing onely god alone beeing confessed let v see meane wee may atteyne meanes lord iesus christ yee see cause sayd heere fulnesse dwelleth charge vnite v vntoo god drawe v backe scattering wherein wee bee therfore wee cannot swarue aside one way conuey peece thing peter powle reserued iesus christ alone wee must rob god dew trew wee bee acknowen yit shall hipocrisie serue acquit v god wee may well pretend many starting hole yit doo wee giue sentence condemnation vppon selues confessing wee ought seeke welfare god hand well wee alledge wee woorthye preace intoo god presence trew wee aske wee may bee able fly without winges trew wee say must wee repayre peter paule wee speake owne head god sayeth cleane contrarie send myne onely sonne sayth shall fynde want feare yee shall haue scarcitie yee bee fylled grace haue put abydeth cause prophet esayesay speaketh purposely wyne water milke say wee haue fulnesse lyfe iesus christ gad peter paule needes haue patron mediator onely doo wrong iesus christ cantling thing peeces gobbet giuen wholly vntoo also rob god honour sith fulnesse dwell iesus christ accordyng haue alledged afore certeine wee go defye openly wee abyde within boundes hath set v putting v subiection person hath giuen vntoo v end giue v wee haue neede yit thing addeth ought greater larger comfort v saith chruch accomplishment accomplisheth woord accomplishment meeneth lord iesus christ yea also god father account selues vnperfect except wee bee ioyned vntoo sayd record god infinit goodnesse wherat man neuer maruell ynough first formost god needeth borrow men handes perfect nother wanted aught euen made worlde made owne profit owne aduauntage alonely intent wee knowe goodnesse power wisdome ryghtuousnesse bee witness hath set v heere stage end wee see glorie creature yit notwithstanding could verye well forbeare v put cace god borrowe others perfect withall lyke mortall men none able forbeare companie put cace god one wee fare better ioyned vntoo v one sonne matched quamyre haue wee infection filthinesse else thing corrupted adam sin horrible think wee bring perfection vntoo god although bee nothing frayltie v although wee bee froward leawd although bee nothing v manner filth bee shorte although wee bee lothely syght yit notwithstanding haue v ioyned yea euen vppon condition bee perfected v ioyning sort toogither father say mee thinkes house emptie see child husband man say mee thinkes half man wyfe mee manner speaketh god thinkes himselfe full perfect gathering v making v one himselfe taketh whole pleasure v haue glory shine foorth v beames may sheade side although whole glory bee himselfe yit haue seene wee haue part portion thus see effect paule ment calling churche accomplishment god iesus christ wee bee excuzed god wee say wee cannot come seing wee bee bodie person lord iesus christ one feete diseased would runne wote whither raunge vp downe saying go seeke remedie e else performance thereof would bee cut bodie say member bodie vnderstanding discretion could speake maner madnesse foote say would bee rent bodie seeke else thing wanteth euen papistes idolater alledge must bee fayne serue turne saynctes haue diuers mediator meanes bring god one say iesus christ nobodie nother haue wee successe enterance vntoo yea membes separated head truthe paule hath heere accused condemned vnthankefulnesse vnkyndnesse vnder colour vnwoorthinesse come vntoo god doo deuyze themselues new meanes separate themselues iesus christ diminish power rend peeces paule condemneth cannot fynde theyr harte accept benefyte priuiledge offered lord iesus christ hath voutsafed become one owne body nowe let v lerane haue familiaritie lord iesus christ resort vntoo time whensoeuer wee bee warned default wantes furthermore intent maiestie shoulde bee defaced thereby paule addeth ceasseth accomplishe thing men wee see one side men indewed god giftes fall thrusting themselues intoo place would bee esteemed stead maner doo wee deale wee beare selues hand gyftes god hath bestowed vppon v freely pray bootie boast aduaunce selues lawfull agein syde wee heare iesus christ spoken abaced sake went downe intoo dungeon death voutsafed bee subiect reproche seemeth v wee may well despyze paule therefore beate downe pryde shew iesus christ abaced glorie diminished sayeth yit neuerthelesse hee dooth thing wherefore let v learne receyue blissing grace benefites giuen v lord iesus christ therewithall let v acknowledge made nothing lyfe flyghtfull vanishing shadowe also vertue excellencie wee weene selues haue lyke greene flower withereth hand soone god breatheth vppon therefore let v imagin selues bee riche wheras wee bee poore let v vaunt selues owne free let v presume vppon owne desertes vpon flimflammes diuel hath deuyzed poperie let v draw let v draw foutaine cannot drained dry wee may fynd wherwith staunche thirst whensoeuer dry finally two meanes wherby god doth thing like himselfe created worlde also must thinges bee guided gouerned hand bee demaunded causeth sunne ryse set euery day guideth whole order nature ordreth dayes moonethes yeares maketh intercourse day night god dooth thing much bee sayd thing perceyue vniuersal gouernement whole world therefore wee must imagine god creator minute houre dooth also hold mainteyning thing created howbeeit paule speaketh spirituall good yee would say peculiar heritage god child god doth thing v yea alonly common order nature inlightening v beleefe gospel halloweth v clenzeth v vice wicked lust fleshe draweth v world bee short pr uideth v thing requisite welfare saluation yee see doeth thing paule declared one woord faythfull thing ne doo thing ne haue thing themselues speaketh nother sunne moone tree fieldes frute nother speaketh beast yit men respect child adam god hath begotten agein holy spirit whatsoeuer concerneth saluation belongeth heauenly lyfe bee onely hand hath thing himselfe dooth thing sayd therefore let v learne emptie selues offer selues sacrifize god trew right humilitie yeeld deserued praise none v separate selues owne vnkindenesse v doo honour confesse wee hold wee bee ioyned lord iesus christ euerlasting god acknowledging good thing come also ought bee yeelded rendered therefore let v cast selues downe maiestie good god acknowledgment sinnes praying make v perceyue may cause v haue mislyking selues wee may earnestly hartily seeke giue ouer selues wholly lord iesus christ forasmuch hath called v already gospell wee may frame selues thereafter renounce superstition assure selues euer wee imagin bring v kingdome heauen deceytes satan ynough v haue iesus christ alone make recourse vntoo lyke father aduaunce high intent men looke also wee may haue eye fastened vppon apply whole myndes wyse thitherwarde wee may haue none way preparation alone swarue one way wee bee brought intoo ryght way holde continually towardes marke till fully come thither may please graunt grace onely v also people c nienth sermon first vppon second chapter euen dead offence sinnes vvherin yee walked tyme according course world prince power ayre spirit worketh chyldren vnbeleefe among vvee also al v sometyme conuersation vvit lustes flesh dooyng vvyl flesh thoughtes vvere nature chyldren vvrath others vvere god vvho rich mercy great loue vvhervvith loued v euen vvhen vvee vvere dead sinne hath quickened v toogither vvith christ vvhose grace bee saued wee haue seene already heretoofore knowe god infinite goodnesse throughly wee must alwayes consyder wee bee selues state tyll god haue pitied v succour wretchednesse vntyll men haue examined selues howe wretched miserable bee surely wyl neuer yeelde god hundreth part honour deserueth wherefore let v beare wel lesson remembrance yeeld god prayze due hym euery v must consider wh hym selfe god reached hand vntoo hym good faith nature generall thinke nothing al maner euyll matter paule treateth first chapter matter treated continually wee cannot sufficiently exalt god considering mercie vseth towardes v expresse yit better touch v quicke sheweth v picture glasse men til god haue preuented grace called backe himselfe therfore sheweth wee plu dged horrible dungeon thinking ought abash v make heares stand vp vpon heades cannot bee theruppon wee must needes bee moued inflamed blisse god name hath sought v bottome helliohn drawe v vp kingdome heauen lord iesus christ shew cace findeth v sayeth come end deade ryze voyce yee see th n office sonne god taketh vppon draw v death lyfe doctrine gospel according wherunto addeth beleue passed death wherin hild downe entred heauenly lyfe faythfull doo inioy heere alredy bycause possesse wyse hope throughly assured wheras lord iesus christ sayeth voyce hath power rayze dead taketh similitude lyfe soeuer wee su myze r selues haue yit notwithstanding separated god weel bee spirituall death howsoeuer vnbeleeuers imagin themselues alyue owne wisdome vertue therein doo harden themselues make brag vttermost let v see welspring lyfe god bee alienated also let v see trew lyfe man bee ttle fine witted bee able compasse matter well world owne cunning pollicie purchace himselfe renoune bee wittie well aduized giue counsell men excell humane science art nother bee esteemed renouned noble corage one hath vertues commendable among men hygher thing wee must begin namely knowe god father wee bee defended preserued light word inlightened fayth knowe way saluation assure selues whole welfare lyeth wee seeke al lowelynesse also knowe meane whereby atteyne wit hauing lord iesus christ whole fulnesse grace offered v thus see spirituall lyfe man lyeth wit lyght god woord woorking holie spirit wee new fashyoned agein according image lost vtterly defaced v adam sin bee found among worldly men yea euen among honored surely without cause lord iesus vseth similitude saying wee bee raysed death meanes gospell florish wee neuer much beare wee neuer fayer glosse men seeme wee haue neuer much wherfore bee estimation yit wee wretched carions nothing rottennesse filthinesse v god lotheth v wee bee damned forlorne angells abhorre v creature curse ban v thing aske vengeance vppon v bycause wee defyle corruption man heauen earth must bee infected vntill god haue chaunged themrom b thing lord iesus christ saying importeth vntill wee bee renewed gospell fayth proceedeth wee bee dead men one drop lyfe v deserueth name lyfe bee short wee bee good buryed graues must bee fayne go agein whereby wee bee doone vnderstand wee bee cut god kingdome consequently nothing filth v yit notwithstanding god voutsafeth bee knit vnited vntoo put trust goodnesse say rysing agein bee short wee must alwayes consider man bringeth death euen birth bycause mortall also bycause separated god bee mortall wyghtes respect wee must needes passe world depart thence whensoeuer pleaseth god wee bee also dead afore hand bycause soules altoogither sinfullrom nother thought affection v tendeth euil repugnant rebellious ageinst god ageinst rule ryghtuousnesse wee imagin eyther one thing wee neuer deuyse thing myndes sin vnryghtuousnesse according sayd genesis god knew euer man thought imaginationgen sin sith let v vnderstand although wee knowledge good euillrom b wee farre greater skill discretion wee haue yit wee marred desire lustes rebell ageinst god make warre ageinst seyng corrupted soules nother thought affection vtterly naught let v thinke straunge god owne mouth auoweth v bee dead notwithstanding owne fond ouerweening wee imagin lyfe v thing paule treateth saying ephesian parttakers aboue mentioned grace though deade owne sinnes iniquity saye intent yee may better esteeme valew god grace bringeth thinke vppon present state consider god left selues succored let followe owne swindge bin vndoone consider nature yee dead hope euer bee quickened agein bicause power man owne freewill giue himselfe lyfe agein dead knowe yee therfore god draw dungeon destruction yea rather bottom hell voutsafed adopt bee child call knowledge gospell wee see saying saint paules conformable doctrine recorde lorde iesus christ let v alwayes runne backe welles head whensoeuer tempted glory owne vertewes imagin selues haue wote aduaunce v withall let v resort naturall state let v consider wee bin vndoone wee vndoone yit still day god infinite mercy drawen v confuzion wherin wee deliuered v meanes lord iesus christ purposely sayd offence sinnes stoppe mennes mouthes man myght make profer withdrawe himselfe common araye think thing greeuous corruption nature cannot bee stayed death paule set downe one word eyther offence sinnes woold haue bin answearing replying woold haue thought themselues haue bin common aray would haue said uery wel though bee synne v though bee fault v doth therfore folowe wee bee vtterly condemned cursed god wyl vse suche rigour extremitie ageinst v paule hath ioyned woordes toogither shew nothing nature wickednes sinne woord one drop life bee found therfore al one though ment aggrauate make thing heynous men part would make light wee haue neuer smal portion vertue yea shadow wee wyll needes exalt aboue mountaines worlde bee vice v though bee neuer grosse apparant yit wee make light faultes therefore stood paule hand beate downe fond presumptuousnesse men shew bee wholly saped sinne although speake heere ephesian yit speaketh generally men good sooth expresseth yit better saying vvee vvalked according trade vvorld euyll lurketh vnespied tyll bewray selfe fruites cause men cannot humble themselues god requisite flatter themselues till bee conuicted bee compelled stoope hold downe heades spyt teethe wee see hipocrisie v insomuch wee woold beare selues hand blacke whyte neuer fynd selues faultie long misdeedes could bee layd open face man stop mouthes witnessing head haue many wicked thoughtes bee tempted doo euyll wee thinke sinne al bee short paule hath iustly set downe ephesian walked sinnes intent shewe speaketh thing ought bee vnknowen beholding owne lyues beholding bin trace followed driuen confesse vtterly forlorne cursed afore god therfore soeuer hypocrisie hindereth v submitting selues vnto god beating selues acknowledging synnes let v learne looke intoo life truely although wee perceyued whole million faultes wee haue co mitted yit nothing comparison whiche god knoweth yit notwithstanding waken v better wee may deceiued owne selfe soothing wee haue bin woont bee let v alwayes iudge roote fruites seeing wee bee gilty offending god many wayes let v conclude thereupon nothing frowardnesse nature shewe better speaketh one sort men al mankind paule addeth vvas according trade vvorld woorde vseth betokeneth course tyme say euen wee see sunne dooth dayly ryse go downe wee see winter sommer followe one another ordinarie custome yea euen nature man bee vtterly froward spytefull rebellious ageinst god nothing maner leawdnesse corruption men say ush euill custome hath gotten vpper hande agein serueth men doo nation sinfull othersome stubborne malicious others yet alwayes vertew bee found men nay sayeth paule common course worlde saye naturall men disputing whether one man bee bad another good like fishe made suck vp water ar suckled rather made starke drunken withall maner iniquity sinnes wee filled stuffed burst agein thus yee see paule ment heere rebuke one sort men shewe men without exception state till god haue redressed therefore let v open eye looke intoo thing paule sayeth wee shall perceyue woorthinesse noblenesse decyphred vntoo v heere heere armes blazed wit wee bee dead men till god quicken v mere grace agein end wee knowe death proceedeth elswhere owne sinnes sayd wee bee corrupted nothing v faultes sinnes offence whole lyfe beareth record thereof fruite sheweth roote syde starting aside wee tend wholly thither say euill wee bee inclyned thereuntoo nay rather wee bee caryed headlong thereuntoo yea wee bee driuen rage wee neuer ceasse stryuing ageinst god tyll haue broughte v subiection holye spirit paule thinkes ynough saye addeth thing ought make v tremble yet saying according prince aire according hath power vvorlde according spirit ruleth vnbeleeuers talking maner shewe till god haue quickened v meanes lord iesus chryst vntill haue gathered v vnto diuell hath dominion ouer v see pray dignitie men vntill iesus christ haue raunsomed dye away euerlastingly must bee fayne gospell make parttakers saluatinn hath purchased vntyll god haue wrought v grace whose wee diuels prince bee short hath authoritie ouer v ruleth v tyranny nothing haling v force paule vseth word spirit purposely shew diuell ruleth thought affection desyres possesseth v wee bee wholly bondslaues woord wee cannot stirre one finger wee cannot moue wee cannot thinke one thought diuell elbowe haleth v wyse wee vtterly become deadly enemyes god wee heare thing time v fall sleepe flatter selues bee lustie presumptuous go lawe still god though goodnesse v boud acknowledge vertues must men needes bee farre wittes continue still hipocrisie needes stand tackeling ageinst god win replying holy ghost hath thundred dreadfull horrible sentence vppon heades man bee considered himselfe owne nature shall bee able say behold creature cursed god woorthie bee cast common account creature yea euen woormes flyes lyce vermine valour vermin world man man creature wherein god image defaced good put corrupted nothing sinne insomuch wee bee diuells limbes onely ruleth v also possesseth v prince bee wee throughly perswaded harte shall wee one side haue cause runne quaking lord iesus christ holde v shrowded vnder shadowe winges syde must needes bee beastly blockishnesse wee bee thanklesse magnifie god goodnesse hath drawen v dungeon vntoo himselfe make v fellowes brother onely angells heauen also lord iesus christ lord glory thereby put away reproche stead hatefull creature make v beare marke bee honored bee imbraced angells brother bee auowed lord iesus christ member bodie wee see paules meaning intent replying ceasse sheweth power diuell could haue sayd one woord yee haue liued maner world say diuelishly doeth thing speaketh import sted naming diuell one woord sayeth first according prince hath povver aire spirit vvoorketh euen novv rebellious child saying prynce hath power aire disappoynteth v starting hole n ught diuell named prince world yit reygneth ouer sonne moone starres skyes earth holdeth v captiue bondes bycause wee bee woorthie bee gouerned god adam continued soundnesse wherin god created god woold haue hild v child fall first father god left v satan tooke v possession true satan cannot doo thing without god leaue wheras named prince woorld ment fyghteth wyse ageinst god cannot bee knowen stronger cursed blasphemie lyke heretikes seeing phrase scripture haue imagined diuell dooth resist god hath force power god fayne sometymes giue place woordes stark madnesse neuerthelesse souereintie satan god iust vengeance according sayd deliuereth v intoo handes enemyes wee cannot abyde reigne ouer v thing fulfilled verefyed v forasmuch god hath printed mark v wee ought bee gouerned spirit father would needes exalt himselfe would needes set vp bristle ageinst god contented owne state boundes forasmuch therfore rebelled wyse could fynd hart abyde souerein dominion god giuen vp diuell made subiect forasmuch could abyde god reigne ouer fayne haue another mayster subiection must reach vntoo men generall let v marke souerenitie tyrannie diuell iust vengeance god vppon men sinne let serue one poynt therfore let v imagine diuell hath reynes brydle layd looce necke hath libertie doo liste though god withstand wee bee left vp giuen ouer vntoo intent wee may yit better knowe subiection paule sayeth aire speake large ageyn ende epistle could haue sayd simply according prince hath great power according lord iesus sayethluk strong man possesseth world peace yee see diuell called prince bycause hath power wee bee able withstand besides paule giueth place ayre diuels inclozed place certeine wee selues see enter intoo men body yea bodyes swyne lord giueth leaue powerluke speaketh purposely ayre make v vnderstand bee aboue head wee haue enemy wee see ouerthrowe haue foote vppon throte alreadye treade vppon bellyes bee already gotten vppon v remedie none part cause paule speaketh expresly ayre say men may well brag lifte vp nebbes bee brazenfaste auauncing themselues yit diuell aboue make bee short sheweth wee bee vtterly giuen vp cursed bondage make matter playner addeth according spirit cause wee perceyue state speaketh bycause wee fleshely reygned tyran ouer v would lay subsidie vppon v day tax morrow sacke men house next day cut man man throte rauish men wyues commit enormity outrage wee would well ynough perceyue bycause wee quicke feeling thing touche fleshe earthly wee cannot perceyue thing except concerne present lyfe cause wee perceyue owne misery bee inuisible wee thinke diuell tyran horrible bycause wee see paule telleth v must looke higher world wee must haue eye beehold visible thing standeth v hand looke vppon diuell though bee ghostly although haue nother armes strike v legges go thing yit fayleth woorst tyran bee deuized whole woorld entreth vnseene man could enter men head hart yea intoo thought affection without swoord staffe without venim poyson without threatening thing else hundreth deathes hand could make enter without feeling pray enemy much bee feared come furnished great force make great noize yi surely paule telleth v diuell one spirite sayeth let v fleshely haue bin wont bee nother let v iudge according owne rude fond fancye sayd spirituall enemye spoken let v assure selues able doo v much mischiefe without al comparison wee could see came towards v entered intoo v forasmuch spirit let v bee much afrayd intent faythfull bee better dispozed come foresayde poynt say know owne confuzion till god haue prouided paule addeth yit one confirmation saying soone wee haue receyued fayth bee inlightened god holy spirit wee haue desire doo well wee shall indeuer serue god seeme inough faythfull man looke intoo himselfe shall finde ynough mislike sighe groone according haue tolde euen paule confesseth himselfe haue bin vnhappyrom c crieth shall set mee free prison death faythfull shall alwayes fynd ynough themselues wherfore morne god yit notwithstading forasmuch god hath put goodnesse wel meaning good intent intoo v doth halfe couer leawdnesse nature wee knowe long time requisite howe wretched state long wee thinke vppon selues say vppon selues wee bee god hath partly reformed v holy spirit cause paule sendeth v behold vnbeleeuers wee looke vppon worlde wee shall see giuen couetousnesse pilling poulling onely little theeues whipped hanged euen robber say wood forest house market place iustice wee shall see nother fayth loyaltie among men men giuen pilling pouling without respect equitie vprightnesse wee shall see rushe intoo whoredome dishonestie intoo drunkennesse intoo leawdnesse looce behauiour wee shall see men rap othes periuries cursed thing agein wee shall see secret conueyances impoysonings spytings malicings treason wicked practizes bee short wee shall see diuelish fling selues headlong altoogither though ment make warre wilfully ageinst god thing may astonish v although wee bee dull yet ought wee haue remors see thing farre order world neuerthelesse paule sayeth consider doone thinges turned topsiteruie libertie world taketh withstand god behoueth v apply selues conclude thus betyde mee yea euen much see moste wretched wee looke vppon disease abrode eaten canker filthie disease othersome haue terrible sickness must prie vpon say ill yea worse lyght vpon god pitied v doo carye seede v bodyes also soules may diuersitie coplexions shalbe stronger lu yer soule man vtterly corrupted marred sinnes reigne v warning make v cast downe eye ashamed god angells yea make v hate vtterly abhorre selues thus yee see paule hath added diuell woorketh still vseth woord say frendes looking vppon present state fynd thing well keepeth humbling selues throughly feeling miserable yee shoulde haue bin god shewed pitie mercie towards see doone see vnbeleueres behaue themselues shall fynd wyld beastes enemyes owne saluation shall fynd stark mad ageinst god ageinst ryght short yee shall see great enormity shall abash men make say ala possible bee thus yee see yee bee say fy thee naughtipacke yee may well fynd fault one ye must therwithal adde sauce season greate hath god mercie bin towards let v neuer condemne sin wee see euerywhere men without cosidering therwithal god brydled v falne deepely wee see others haue falne therfore let stirre v vp immediatly pray god leade v temptationmath b let v acknowledge god infinite goodnesse pleaseth reyne v wyse wee fall intoo horrible falles wee see v wee looke vpon wickeddest world yea euen vpon wee bee driuen abhorre monster wee must said afore conclude thus selues ala much befal v god remedied yee see wee ought put lesson vre paul speaketh expresly rebellious child shewe wilbee obedience v except god put intoo v reforme v chaunge naughtinesse whereuntoo wee giuen afore continue increace goodnesse hath begunne else sa hath taken possession v must needes drawe v lyke brute beastes trew paule addeth anon serued heathen howbeit god grace apparant euen excellentest men comprehended therin iewes thought themselues haue singuler priuilege exemption common cursednesse men also forlorne damned till redeemed lord iesus christ wherin wee see yit better thing wee touched long since wit heere mention made one sort men alone holy ghost thudereth vpo al men end al v shold beaten fro least cannot discoursed therfore must conclusion take paule treateth god hath quickened v wherby dooth v wit bring lyfe v mother womb reason sin bee death wee come intoo world worse wee yea geynsaying bycause wee shall find thing selues corruption wickednesse bycause man stirres stinketh wee shall bee loth see great deepe dungeon iniquitie v therfore standeth v hand bee quickened haue lyfe giuen v nature bu grace lord iesus christ bycause wee bee renewed yea knowe god hath taken v wretched cursed state theruppon forget vayn glorie let v think euer wee shall yeeld vntoo god prayse hee deserueth till wee abhorre owne wretchednesse bee come poynt know deuill reigneth ouer v till god pluck v pawes set v free cursed tyranny thing irksome say wee bee subiect diuell reygneth ouer bodyes somme worldly tyran myght doo also ouer soules ouer thought spirit thing v corrupted filled poyson sith know let v consider also god hauing found v plyght hath notwithstanding disdeined v let ed succor v according also paule vseth reason sayeth wee god deadly enemyes tyme iesus christ redeemed v let v conclude god respecteth nothing misery calleth v hee looketh whether wee seeke possible wee drawe cleane arsward looketh whether wee bee able doo seruis wee bee rank rebells ageinst looketh whether good spirituall death cannot bee recouered meanes remedy world god must bee fayne put hand yea myghtily may bee knowen aueth v myracle nowe let v cast selues downe maiestie good god acknowledgment sinnes inclyned followe euill rather good also matter euery v bringeth sinne euen birth eate drinke thing accompany v yit sinne rooted v thing belong lyfe truely heathen men thinke straunge young babe able discerne betweene good euill haue discrecion alreadie bee sinner damned god according paules saying calleth child wrath yit must wee needes yeelde selues condemnation whether wil soone babe bee able make signe certeyne shewe inough much bee froward naughtie secrete poyson lurking although cast first yit bee broode serpentes sith let v vnderstand saint paule dooth without cause call v child wrath well iewes excepting infantes number men terme innocent take bee wee must regarde owne opinion thing wee see eye wee must giue glory vntoo god competeent iudge thereof although wee finde incomprehensible soeuer world go wee must alwayes come backe sayd one fiftith psalmepsal b namely wee onely offend god dayly diuerse manner also lothsome hym beforehand yea euen wee haue eyther done thought thing bycause wee begotten sinne cursednesse word child wrath paule meaneth wee bee heyres death god must needes bee enemie yea euen soone wee bee conceyued yit god cruell nother hateth thing owne making trew purenesse v forefather adam according saying thing god made good god hate owne workemanship v wee must conclude sith hateth v armed take vengeance v haue well deserued although sinne cannot poynted inger yee would say yit dooth god know well ynough wee must hold mouthes shet effect thing wee haue gather vppon text applying paules meaning iewes seemed haue ought haue peculiar fauorable towards towards rest world cause also dooth paule adde god rich mercie hath quickened gentyls euen according great loue vvhervvith loued cheef poynt told morning paule handleth wee lerne bee cause doctrine lyfe come downe bottome hell quicken v wee sunk downe thither thefore wee must marke well wordes sayd god rich mercie quickened v wee dead according great loue beareth v trew tytle treasure mercie vpo v according greatnesse misery cause also addeth great loue wherwith loued v needes must haue bin goodnesse god able rauish v seeing surmounteth capacitie wee bee able taste hundredth parte though wee giue selues neuer much vntoo paule sayeth god loued v speaketh expresly lyke bin chozen among people greater part cut although iewes first borne preheminence aboue v ryght inheritance silly thing borne season1 cor paule speaketh yit notwithstanding wee see bee banished god kingdome become president ought make heare stand vp vppon heades wee behold wrath vengeance god vttered vppon therfore wheras paule small number mo chozen among iewes god loue greater apparance towardes lykewyse nowe adayes gospell preached purely throughe whole world fayth giuen indifferently men soo none touched immediatly holy ghost v alyke woold seeme course nature lyke meat drinke common men woold seeme wee owne naturall motion speciall grace god wee see manie country hungerstarued
