haue eares beaten gospell yit apparant mennes eye become hard harted waxe woorse woorse certeine man shall see horrible monster papacie gospell preached professed say bee reformed yit seeme bee diuells incarnate wee neede go farre see syghtes let v marke heere wee must surmyze v hath aught wherwith please god felowes presume make account selues must alwayes repayre fountaine annot bee drayned dry go pit full hole holde water rather haue nothing id filth gloriousnesse brauerie men better drawe sayde loue god confesse god must bee perswaded moued folkes onely pleased loue v freely receiuing v vntoo inlyghtening v holy spirit fayth gospell yee see saint paule ment note heere side end men alwayes suttle witted seeking shift starting hole excuze themselues vnder tyrannie diuell alledge ought bee layde charge saint paule sheweth sayd bondage ceasseth bee wilfull shewed morning notwithstanding free choyze notwithstanding reason yit fettered satan seruice wee doo nothing naughtinesse nother wee bee better nature arrantest theues world god pitied v accordingly saint paule setteth forth al men vntoo v looking glasse yea euen despyze god order driuen satan intoo outrage saying wee bee lyke god bin mercifull v many grudge ageinst god go lawe saying free bee defaced shall become v men able giue themselues vnto goodnesse yit notwithstanding made none account gaue themselues euill surely good right reason bee hild giltie cannot doo euill god condemne leastwise ought bee borne withall seing apparant bee hild vnder satan dominion euen mother wombe loe many men alledge hope washe handes yea bee contented iustifie themselues vayne shift doo also rayle ageinst god though cause damnation paul preuent aunders sayeth vnder bondage satan sinne ceasse condemned good right constreyned theruntoo force bee subiect deede owne good cause sayeth euen brought backe agein lord iesus christ haue walked lustes fleshe say god chaunged brought obedience holy spirit walked owne wicked lust true men graunt nature bee sinfull yit say suffizeth bee otherwyse men graunt putteth difference betweene vice vertue philosopher spake fashion opinion wee haue francke free thing deceyued bycause knewe wee marred fall adam yit notwith anding ceasse iustly accursed forsomuch offending god owne good therfore also addeth agein dooing desire fleshe thought say possessed satan hild vnder au rie sinne cannot alledge compulsion ne dryueth thereuntoo thus yee see effect paule ment stop mouthes misspeakers intent men picke quarrells god pretending ought bee shent naughtinesse seing bee subiect nature let v marke heerewithall paule hath matched thoughtes fleshe end wee myght knowe sinne reacheth throughout v wee haue peece v cleane pure wherintoo infection spred papistes well ynough confesse wee bee corrupted adam say wee doo deede tend alwayes vntoo euill wee bee tempted vntoo yit neuerthelesse wee herken vnto reason brydle lustes ruling well wee shall see playnely wee bee altoogither vnable doo good opinion papistes man free force beginning wounded yea sore maymed howbeeit hath yit still lyfe say vertuousnesse imagin wee haue seene morning determinate sentence holy ghost generall wit wee bee onely sicke also dead till wee rayzed agein iesus christ nowe paule confirmeth thing saying wicked lustes affect termed sensual appetytes wherin wee resemble brute beastes onely thing harrie v heere must take matter strictly thoughtes determination euer deemed bee best man bee sayeth paule starke wickednesse god let v go owne thoughtes certeine horrible confuzion would bee wee see men humbled heere halues confesse onely frailtie haue partly neede bee succored helped god hand wee see bee vtterly damned sit thoughtes heere called wicked froward haue nothing prouoketh god vengeance ageinst let v one side yeelde selues giltie assuring selues wee iustly bereft god grace person adam agein side let v take excuse hope scape shifte say bodslaues sinne wee selues whit blame bycause wee bee hild downe satan snare nettes euen birth behoueth v consider alwayes euery v shall fynde welspring disease owne conscience men may hold plea much list enter intoo themselues aske owne conscience yee shall see condemned confounded without nay man hath babled thinkes hath wonne gole saying hath free owne abilitie resist god needeth thys one woorde thinkest thou bee thing prouoketh thee euill ho diuell thou sayest well yit marke little whether dooth fully excuze thee thou perceyuest ryght well thou wart stirred vp driuen thine owne selfmouing knowest thou welspring roote mischiefe thy selfe thou art rebellious ageinst god thy thoughtes full vntruth vnbeleefe much bycause thy lustes square imbattelled ageinst god rightuousnesse euen make warre thou seest must thou yit hold plea let v seeke starting hole seyng wee carie sufficient iudge v euen within v namely seyng euery owne conscience rebuketh v thing paule amed streyne thereby wee also war ed presume aught selues brydle sens imagination vnderstanding reason wee weene selues haue vntill wee haue renounced selues certeine shall neuer bee meete apply selues seruing god paule sayeth expresly god hath quickened meanes made felowes lord iesus chryst euen haue theyr lyfe trew ought seeke god howbeeit forasmuch hygh v wee cannot come thing nere therfore lord iesus called wayiohn offereth tary th till wee seeke though weere farre v reacheth armes allure v insomuch gospel sayeth man bee hirst let come vnto mee drink fulfilled personiere hath bin said erewhiles let speeche bee marked paule sayeth dead afore quickened agein iesus christ heere wee see yit better thing touched shortly morning paule speaketh visible death wherof men may iudge outward syght corruption soul fyndeth fault v may wee atteyne heauenly lyfe shall bee rayzed quickened agein possesse heri age promised v wee see contrarie part wee bee subiect many misery bee therfore must need bee ment newnesse lyfe speaketh place certein lyfe yit perfeet v little enterance serueth leade v bring v end shalbee wee bee come full glorie speaketh heere wee see also paule setting foorth example alledgeth giuen ouer thing lord iesus christes sake yea euen fond opinion owne ryghtuousnesse insomuch although men esteemed little angell yit notwithstanding knewe behoued bee saued god free grace iesus christ sted honour rich suffred many reproches many torture many beating many imprisonings man would haue saidphil bin lyfted vp aboue world yit notwithstanding addeth yit come marke streyne self foreward forget tyme past stay vppon thing haue done alredy saying haue ouercome many incounters haue delt thus valeantly haue ceassed preach gospell euery haue wrought wyse frute doct ine come whole world haue passed sea haue bin among barbarus nation god gospel neuer erst heard haue number let haue ouercome haue incountered thus manie enemyes haue got vpper hand paule say consideration become cold easye matter v shrink away wee think selues haue doone ynough part let others marche aray euery v woold take leaue thing ot paule sayth forgets tyme past intent cut occasion slothfullnesse myght come head sayeth streyneth self foreward holdeth armes ope atteyne vnto long tyme paule streyne himselfe foreward euen end let v mark well glorie shall neuer bee perfect say wee shall neuer throughly inioy glorie wee wayt vntill end therefore behoueth v alwayes take warning owne wretchednesse moorne god confesse wee beholden goodnesse thing howsoeuer wee fare wee see reformed vnto newnesse lyfe god spirit although wee dwell among vnbeleeuers bee subiect manie misery yea haue sin dwelling v yit none v feeleth handsells god hath giuen v holie spirit vayne vnprofitable man alledge tyme iesus christ woork v wee haue alredye lyfe seene answer made shortly morning forasmuch euer men haue nature able bring vntoo god maketh rest vppon world none ought bee made account heauenly lyfe commeth question let men calp hand v syds yit wee dead men god layeth brydle looce neck suffereth v walk owne fancie lyking man may well haue reason doo long owne nature fyght ageinst god ageinst truthe yit notwithstanding man say hath howbeeit bee wicked trew haue sayd alredye hathe strength yit notwithstanding forasmuche man wicked froward hath cursed roote rebellion cannot doo euill offendeth god willingly seing let v boldly conclude wee bee death till wee bee made partner lyfe lord iesus christesay luk c deale vntoo euery v spirit hath receyued measure listeth according sayd god spirit rested vppon giuen vntoo plentie nowe must deale euery one hys faythfull one therefore according lord iesus christ maketh v taste holy spirit according strengtheneth thereby wee quickened heeruppon addeth hath made v sit heauenly place vvith lord iesus christ serueth magnifye grace haue hithertoo spoken yit much sayd one woord wee q ickened bin ynough ought well haue inflamed harte sing god prayses occupye selues therin apply al indeuers theruntoo heere greater vehemencie bycause coldnesse lazinesse paule hath shewed one syde wee dead hild bondag vnder tyrannye satan ala terrible thing setteth downe syde god hath loued v also glorifyed v wee bee lifted vp bottom hell aloft vntoo kingdome heauen hath lodged v giuen v seates among angells seing wee heare needes must wee bee much doted witts much brutish make good earnest glorifye inestimable goodnesse god conclude wee bee beholden bound vntoo although wee doo nothing else lyfe long preache grace wee haue felt experience hand yit nothing yee see paule hath purposely set downe wee lifted vp heauen wi h iesus christ heeruppon wee haue profitable exhortation gather although bee heere myre craule lyke poore frogges yit ought beare state paciently somuch syde god hath lyfted v vp hygh euen v nothing yea cursed creature therfore whensoeuer wee fayne suffer hunger thirst world mocked vnbeleeuers put abiding manie outrage let v resort sayd heere namely yit neuer helesse wee set alredy heauen iesus christ howbeeit wyse apparant vntoo eye behalfe wee must giue place hope vntoo sayd another text namely lyfe hid must hold selues quiet till appeere comming lord iesus christ thus see effect beehoueth v vnderstand thing spoken heere diuers state god child bee called fayth gospell way must imagin earthly paradyse world shall haue nother trubble greef wee must make reckening wee shall neuer liue heere ase wee must make roome fayth sayd afore besydes wheras holye ghoste auoucheth mouth paule wee shalbee lifted vp hygh standeth v hand cast downe heades suffer selues bee oppressed enemyes bee ouermaystered pryde say must suffer thing yit meane whyle bee fully perswaded throughly resolued doctrine wee shal fayle inherit kingdome heauen vnpossible head bee separated mbers lord iesus christ gone thither owne sake alone wee must alwayes repayre principle confessing iesus christ rizen dead gone vp intoo heauen alonly glorifye owne person trew first must come passe hil b knee must bow creature heauen earth yea euen hell must doo homage yit notwithstanding vnion wherof wee haue treated heertoofore fulfilled iesus christ hauing gathered v intoo bodie hath begunne thing intendeth performe v namely conuenient tyme commeth iesus christ gone vp intoo heauen open v gate dayes shet ageinst v adam sin verye maner sitting alredye therwithall paule sheweth one woord intended deede saying shalbee declared lenth dew place paule treat large next sermon yit notwithstanding wee may see wherat amed end wee may haue sure ryght marke shoote wee bee saued grace noman able clayme thing owne neuerthelesse ynough v haue confessed one woord saluation commeth god free fauour haue felt also within selues wee must also therwithall bee taken loue infinite greatnesse grace considering wee bee euill commeth selues saying nay bycause faultes doo much conuic v somuch god execute hundred tymes rigour ageinst v dooth wee could contend dispute wee alwayes haue record owne conscience wee bee iustly woorthie death dew vntoo v desert seeing let v hold fast doctrine wee shall haue profited greatly whole lyfe wee know one naughtie touche infinit number euils v therefore let v lerne mislyke selues hate abhorre selues afterward wee bee come grace shewed v lord iesus christ let v vnderstand without diuell needes haue full whole possession v reigne ouer v doone afore also let v beware wee profit selues grace may serue put away cursednesse let v assure selues misery shall turne benefyte lord iesus christ also giue v strength wee may well glorie state although wee bee driuen fyght ageinst manie temptation wee bee frayle owne behalf yit neuerthelesse wee shall ouercome wyse wee shall haue cause yeeld god thankes lord iesus christ insomuch ioyned vntoo wee cannot fayle come full perfection good thing let v cast selues downe maiestie good god acknoweledgement fault praying make v feele make v onely confesse three foure also go vp euen birth acknowledge nothing sinne v way v bee reconciled god blood death passion lord iesus christ therefore oft wee feele hartbytings urne v aside grace god cite v iudgement ate let v haue none refuge sacrifize wherby lord iesus christ hath made attonement betweene god v w ensoeuer wee bee weake let v desire remedie holy spiri meanes hath ordeyned make v par kers gracious giftes let v continue wee may bee example vntoo others labour drawe v fay h vnitie doctrine life good conuersation shewe wee haue gone schoole vayne good schoole schoole sonne god may please graunt grace onely v also people c eleuenth sermon third vppon second chapter surely bee saued grace fayth selues gift god woorkes least man myght boast wee bee vvoorkmanship created iesus christ good workes god hath prepared v walke ssaint paule hath shewed heeretoofore saluatio true looking glasse wherein behold infinite glorye god knowne goodnesse aboue thing cause also hath shewed god choze v making world howbeeit respect thing could bee found v content owne onely mercie therefore concludeth matter sheweth ment told v adoption hangeth proceedeth god chozing v owne euerlasting purpose wit intent wee cleane defaced confesse whatsoeuer wee bee whatsoeuer goodnesse wee haue wee hold wholly god onely free goodnesse cause sayeth wee bee saued grace selues god gift work bin ynough haue excluded goodnesse vertue man could imagin asmuch hard beate downe pride wherto wee bee much giuen paule reherceth matter agein end might bee better vnderstoode confirmed large therwithall wee haue mark matcheth fayth ageinst well shewe meane wherby come saluation also page page therfore doth stand v hand marke well thing sayd streyne wee bee saued grace wee doo nothing god giueth v euer belongeth saluation bycause wee doo nothing haue nother good workes deser e alledge selues furthermore speech well worth weying saith least man myght boast theruppon wee haue gather ynough v father part saluation vpon god must come poynt yeeld farre make countenance abyde haue owne glory abaced god may haue preheminence wee haue seene textes specially place ieremie alledged ere g god glorified ought bee nother possible v glorie till euer wee think selues haue owne bee cast downe doone away nother vertue wisdome abilitie ryghtuousnesse man mu bee put foorth wee intende god keepe still owne reserueth therfore wee see partnershippes world woold make god fond dotage yea illusion satan laboreth make v beleeue wee able doo somewhat selues intent plucke v therby quyte cleane ou god long man imagineth himselfe haue one drop goodnesse owne neuer giue ouer vntoo god bee puffed vp vayne presumption rest vppon satan therfore hath wonne much handes hath perswaded v wee bee able doo thing selues wee make meanes atteyne saluation drift make v leaue seeking thinges god god offereth v meanes wee abyde emptie still according virgin mary songluke g sayd filled ouerweening shall abyde still hungrie god laugh vayne presumption scorne wee bee fed god grace except wee long feele owne lacke according saying psalmep al b open thy mouth fill let v marke well men shall bee dispozed receyue god hand requisite saluation reserue nothing themselues acknowledge self boasting must bee put away sayd afore meanes partnershippes world pretendeth make god doo fall ground papist driuen confesse without god helpe doo nothing bee weake withstand satan bee strengthened holy ghost fynd harte graunt cannot deserue aught except god supply wantes also haue neede forgiuenesse sinnes yit cannot abyde giue ouer freewill imagin verily partly themselues theruppon alwayes buylding desert although graunt god grace preuent first yit alwayes mingle therwith indeuer good owne flee vntoo god release sinnes bring owne satisfaction yee see papistes wise freely wholly yeeld gyue ouer vntoo god prayse saluation keepe backe part commonly one halfe themselues paule passeth sheweth doo wrongfully alwayes defraud bereue god glory till wee haue forgotten false opinion wherwith world deceyueth selfe therefore onely way v glorifye god acknowledge wee bee nothing selues humilitie lowelynesse feyning false pretence many suppoze thinke themselues haue contented god saying one woord bee wretched sinner weake possible wee must bee fully resolued euer men imagin owne braynes concerning desertes freewill preparation helpe satisfaction euery whit leazing trumperie satan know submit selues ought doo shall god keepe estate deserueth also shall yeeld honour dew cannot done sayd vnlesse euer men conceiue imagin concerning good workes wherewith deserue well god hand bee vtterly razed moreouer let v mark therwithall wee wil bee partaker saluation god offereth v wee must bring nothing v fayth sayd another place fayth taketh help good woorks although haue record lawerom yit dooth bring aught vntoo god wherby bynd v rather witnesseth wee bee vtterly emptyed wee haue none hope free goodnesse lyke man pinched great distresse scarsly stirre fynger hath nothing tongue cry ala body woulde helpe pitie mee eue must fayth ryd away al ouer weenyng wee haue selues wee may receiue soeuer god offereth v al prayse thereof bee reserued vntoo hym therfore thing wee haue beare away heerby wee bee warned bee vnthankfull god calleth al ureth v gently run vntoo poore hungry soules haue earnest mynd bee succored hand bycause pleaseth cause lord iesus christ profiteth great number haue deaf eares god incorageth come veryly beastlyke passe heauenly lyfe haue heere wherof feede drink lyke swyne wherewith wallowe owne delyghts pleasure spirituall good wee ought labor bee nothing yee see one sort shet god doores bycause bee dulled allurement satan drunken rather vtterly bewitched delyghts world eyther pomp honour rich else whoredome loocenesse sort think haue wherwith make god beholden wee see manie hipocryts doo cannot giue ouer vayne selftrust wherwith bee swolne lyke toad wherfore bee short let v marke well woord fayth pleasure ease world hold v backe lifting vp hart vntoo god way fasten anker heauen wee neuer haue sayd substancialnesse fayth paule speaks dubble birth al faithfull wee haue v one generall creation wherby wee liue world god createth v new agein voutsafeth giue v newenesse life gospell meane printeth hart mynds owne secret working word alone ynough doo respect first creatio differece betwene iewes turk heathen men v wee al v taken one lump wee al child adam yea wee heyres god wrath cursed nature wee haue seene alreadie heretoofore men examine selues searche bee first birth shal finde nothing v sinne wickednesse wisedome wee weene selues haue beastlynesse light whiche wee thinke wee haue discerne betweene good bad stubbernesse starke spytefulnesse ageinst god yee see wee corrupted part soule wee doo finde fauour god hand make beholden vntoo v wee doo nothing euil kindling wrath ageinst v wee bee worthye endlesse death alreadie wee come mother wombe somuch although wee perceyue sinne yong babe yit hath seede within god auoweth v deserue bee drowned bottom hell little babe bee rightfully condemned afore hand euen ere haue seene light world bee sayd v bee come foorth doo shewe wee bee naughtie deede nature altoogither sinfull wee bee come age said afore fal coposition god might helpe foreward grace dooing might bee meanes saluation loe paule meaneth text sayth wee bee god woorkmanship shoulde saye poore creature thou thinkest play utie fellowe behalfe putting thy selfe foreward alledge deseruing thou art able begin approche vntoo god syde must bee fayne bee beholden vntoo thee begannest thou thou say thou begannest thou wart borne thou deseruest men shoulde spit thy face thou say afterward betweene age seuen yeeres age twentie thirtie yeeres tyme thou wart inlyghtened gospell thou art contrarie part sufficiently disproued thou couldest haue one drop willingnesse doo good thy thoughtes desire vtterly rebellious ageinst god men warre fyghting ageinst rightuousnesse therefore thou hast doone nothing else fyght ageinst god euer since thou wart borne agein thou take bee time thou wart little babe vnable discerne betweene whyte blacke yit wart thou cursed race adam turne thee syde thou wilt reason must needes driue thee perceyue thou wart vnable doo thing godward consequently euer hath wrought thy welfare ought fathered vppon alone without chalenging drop thereof thy selfe thus wee see saint paule dooth text call v woorke woorkmanship god according also saide psalmepsal houshold folke church also flocke prophet sholeth child israell god gathered toogither owne mere goodnesse set asyde heathen nation certeine god found none cause keepe linage preferre others saue mere mercy theruntoo much sayd v day addeth namely wee created iesus christ ought touche v yit quicke sheweth creating v adam bringing v destruction therfore standeth v hand bee fashyoned cre ted new agein namely euen iesus christ second adam self termeth first roman fif eenth f rst corinthian yee see woord create ynough stoppe mouthes put away cackeling brag hauing woorthinesse say presupposing maker themselues chalendgeth fredome taketh vppon haue meane abilitie doo good certein meaning step intoo god place shew bee creator noman abhorreth blasphemie blyndest betles maddest bedlems worlde account woorde creation holie sacred thing say god verye creator maker thing thou hipocrite confessest thy mouth yit thou doost lye forasmuch thou thinkest thou hast freewil thy self welfare saluation thou denyest first article fayth thou makest god half creator well ynough confesse mouth god creator yea farre lyfe world come say holde much excellenter lyfe namely wee hope wee possesse alredye fayth howbeit wee inioy alredye presently much precious woorthie lyfe wherin wee shallbee parttakers god glorie wayfaring wee make world shadowe vanisheth away hand yee aske papistes haue heauenly lyfe wee haue partly god grace say partly owne feeewill forasmuch father peece therof vppon themselues thinke part stake fashyon god wee must conclude bee owne creator heeruppon reply protest neuer ment thing leuer dye vtter blasphemie yea meane whyle thing greater valew create man self bee mortall man world purchace euerlasting lyfe paule telleth v wee doo thing owne freewill power god fully creator sayeth wee bee woorkmanship making yea euen respect heauenly lyfe behoueth v beare alwayes mynd paule speaketh transitorie lyfe inheriting kingdome heauen wee see papistes defye god pryde lyke villanous blasphemer bee therefore part wee mynde bee parttakers grace purchaced v lord iesus christ wee must bee rid cleane selfweening acknowledge beginning doo well springeth god voutsafing call v preuenting v owne free goodnesse bee short paules meaning thinke themselues haue deserued aught god hand doo beare themselues hand bee men great abilitie wheras deede bee already dead nothing al dead man doo surely wee bee dead haue declared heretofore till god uicken v agein meanes faith woorking holy spirit wee bee dead good wee doo whereuntoo wee dispoze cur selues agein wee bee nothing woorde create importeth uer v god putting intoo v lyke sayde created worlde nothing much saye thing gaue beyng euen respect spirituall lyfe wee bee cre ted much say wee nothing wee bee nothing shall wee bee able bynd god gyue v thing vtterly ageinst nature let v marke well knowe wee bee saued mere grace wee haue thinges god gift free goodnesse wee must bee fayne come poynt namely god gaue v beyng according auouched example abraham fourth romanesrom abraham body wee see soules iesus christ promised abraham sonne isaacgen c yee knowe man altoogither drooping barrein wyfe also farre striken age therefore eyther syde beget wyfe hir side brede child thing impossible beleeued god calleth foorth thing notrom c giueth beyng seyng abraham withered blocke rength lustinesse yit notwithstanding receyueth promis made vntoo therein behoueth v behold wee cannot bee parttakers god grace except wee acknowledge owne vnabilitie bee first v terly abaced selues lord may begin lyfe continue till haue brought ful perfection furthermore let v marke well saying iesus christ sende v backe corruption wee haue inheri unce adam wee neuer fynde heartes yeeld selues giltye tyll wee feele proceed selues moreo er serueth shewe benefyte common indifferently men god hath chozen accordingly wee haue seene alredie chozen making world extendeth generally adam ofspring many renewed iesus christ therfore one paule shewe wee neede remedie somuch wee bee alredye forlorne damned tyme god meanes iesus christ plucketh v dungeon wherin serueth confirme yit better thing haue seene heertoofore wee faythfull except god make v new agein wee hold thing belong heauenly lyfe spirituall good wee haue seing wee bee created iesus christ one sayd ryghtuousnesse wisdome vertue al goodnesse v wee drawe fountaine god scattereth abrode aduenture hath put fulnesse thing belonging saluation iesus christ somuch wee bee made member bodieiohn b colos c b wee allso made parttakers benefyts without wee bee cut part saluation though wee rotten stinking wretched carkesses nothing v filth haue declared thus yee see wee haue mark paule sayeth wee bee god woorkmanship also created iesus christ addeth good vvoorkes vvhich hath prepared v vvalke setting good woorkes place shew follie rather madnesse frentiknesse men beare themselues hand bring good workes behalf say sleeues owne growing needes must god haue prepared sayth wee haue hand one say go shew heere prowesse vertewes enter litle account god seeing pryde bee daunted yee haue wayes bristle set vp still bring foorth yee think may make yee well say wee bring good workes papistes wont doo alledge wyse shall saued owne merites good workes whence draw ye sayeth paule haue yee coyned owne shop haue ye gardin owne planting whence gather spring wote owne trauel pollicie may selues contrarywyse knowe yee god hath prepared meete fall replying ageinst hath pityed shewed bountifull towardes meete yee presume step foorth pay though yee wherwith awne man hath bin well kept tended host hath lent mony neede hath receyued hand pay withall shall afterward boast hath payd hoste hoste onely contented doo charitie vpon man also hath found hym bed boord wyll say hym hold wherwith pay intent may seeme charitable dealing hath bin make vnderlyng wyll receyue payment hand yea ut yit shall come myne owne purse nowe shall suche franknesse hath bin vsed go say hath wel payd host yea money euen money put intoo hand standeth cace put forth theyr good woorkes say god hath saued freely selues helpe yea come good workes thing paule amed sayd god prepared good woorkes trew god prepareth mennes conuersations lawe wherein gyueth v certaine rule walke according one prepared way v go wee ought doo would nothing boote v except wee receyued good woorkes themselues god hand god commaundeth v thing wee may well haue eares beaten sound neuer enter intoo harte wee bee full pryde naughtinesse bee short impossible v obey god till haue softened harte vtterly chaunged thing declared v prophet holy scripture god therefore must bee fayne make another preparation wit hath taught v told v good lykeeh afterward must reforme v guide gouerne v holy spirit may bee one accord betweene life lawe vntill time god prepare good woorks fashion say till giue v shewng v also make v power wee must needes bee vtterly vnprofitable sith let v learne humble selues god past also come past let v acknowledge god hath plucked v gulf hell whereas wee nature damned hath voutsafed haue v bee child therfore let v bee ouerweening thinke wee haue let gloryfied deserueth let v assure selues hath pulled v backe death intent beginning welspring roote onely cause saluation proceede onely free bestowed goodnesse thus ye see effect poynt trew humilitie giue glory saluation vntoo god come behoueth knowe wee could stirre one little finger doo good except wee gouerned god receyued good work selues hand holy spirit oft wee feele owne weakenesse let v flee refuge wee haue doone good let puffe v vp pryde let v alwayes thinke selues much straytely bound vntoo god yea euen dubble yit weake must confesse selfe exceedingly bound vntoo god mercy bearing goeth afore others mirrour holinesse must confesse himselfe much bounde vntoo hath nothing owne holdeth thing god onely free goodnesse wherefore let v life long walke sort wee may still yeere yeere mooneth mooneth day day houre houre fro minute minute continually acknowledge selues bound vnto god goodnesse hath giuen v owne mere mercy let v thinke selues beholden thing let v marke way conclusion paules intent decypher al cause saluation one one abate men lustinesse might make bragges countenance god debt therefore ynough paule haue stopped men mouthes wyze may take vppon haue aught owne contrariwize whensoeuer god giueth v good work although bee fruites mere goodnesse yit purchace v thing hand wee must alwayes ground settle selues vppon forgiuenesse sinnes lyeth rightuousnesse bee short twoo thing requisite yeelding god prayse dew saluation first wee acknowledge selues haue thing secondly wee acknowledge good workes good hath giuen v already serue purchace v fauour hand v trust vppon shewe v neede vpholde v burye forget sinnes meanes wee bee iustifyed bycause acquitteth v notwithstanding wee deserue bee condemned hundred tymes shor tolde v nother freewill thing else man ende wee learne gyue glory vnto god haue cause vaunt selues afterwarde vppon knowing thereof wee vnderstand wee bee continuall trubble perplexitie wee bee sure wee shall alwayes obteine grace mercy comming god teares lamenting bycause voutsafeth acquit v although could thunder downe vppon drowne v yit buryeth sinnes meanes ur lord iesus christ receyueth v alwayes mercy thus yee see men ought poyntes caces bee confounded themselues bee ashamed owne leawdnesse may glorifie god therwithall ackowledge alwayes bee doubt anguish god dooth euermore pitie death passion lord iesus christ sacrifize wherby wee reconcyled therfore trew way vphold auow god bee sauiour world also way v father thing vpon grace lord iesus christ deserueth namely rayzing putting quyte away glorying pretend haue selues theruppon confesse goodnesse v god putting intoo v also must bee fayne beare infirmity bycause wee ceasse prouoke wrath till make satisfaction auaylable made death passion lord iesus christ let v cast selues downe maiestie good god acknowledgment sinnes praying make v feele till wee bee pulled downe may bee showe sin v meane whyle wee may neuerthelesse seeke ayde helpe lord iesus christ forasmuch hath partly inlyghtened v alredy holy spirit may please increace grace v till haue communicated wholy vntoo v meane tyme vphold v gouerne v holy spirit whole indeuer may bee nothing else frame lyfe holy lawe passe vppon great number sinnes commit neuer ceassing stray away owne vndooing hold v backe secret power vntill take v away world ioyne v lord iesus christ fountayne perfection wee also may bee perfect let v say almyghtie god heauenly father c twelfth sermon fourth vppon second chapter vvherfore remember vvhich vvere sometime gentile fleshe beyng called vncircumcision respect vvhich called circumcision made hand flesh vvere time vvithout christ straungers common vveale israell straungers couenants conteyne promise vvithout hope vvithout god vvorld novv iesus christ vvere erevvhyle farre made neere blud christ although thing preached vnto v generally cocerning god grace ought mo e v magnifie name acknowledge benefyts wee haue receyued yit notwithstanding thing bee doone priuately vnto v ought wee bee touched yit therwith order keepeth paule wee seene morning made cleane riddance man myght bee one ground woork saluation wit mere goodnesse god hee applyeth particularly ephesian willing bethink themselues plyght wherin god found speaking mankynd send euery one v owne experience verye deede spoken heere ephesian concerneth v also lyke man hauing told v forlornnesse wherintoo wee bee tumbled adam fall say consider also sort liued beastlinesse tyme god called knowledge thing wee haue mark paule hauing shewed greatest least ought confesse haue saluation god goodnesse addeth another particular declaration wherin sheweth thing euery one faythfull ought knowe trew thing hath sayd tyme would agree poynts dayes yit shall paules answer alwayes haue course serue good purpose although wee haue bin baptized infancie yit come wee erst cut god churche iewes sholed nacions world people god ordeyned himselfe wee heathen meane respect forefather gospell preached world agein wee see confuzion come vppon v vnthankfulnesse called truthe gospell wee haue strayed away sort wee haue bin good cut god churche agein baptim wee receiued chyldhod stoode v none sted make v dubble giltie god plundged superstition poperie idolatry committed good renounced baptim become renegats wee excuze selues haue bin forsworne vntoo god seing wee start away obeysaunce therfore v make boasting seeke excuce couer wretchednesse withall rather confesse freely wee deadly enemy god woorthie haue bin vtterly giuen ouer bycause reached v hand bring v backe agein way saluation first wee take text lyeth apply ephesian afterward looke take profit selues let v see content substance woords bethink selues remember yee sometyme gentyles first putteth difference betweene iewes god suffered walke still owne darkenesse speciall priuiledge god gaue vntoo abraham ofspring adopted say shalbee people lyke though yee myne owne houshold came abraham lyne good banished god kingdome church addeth fleshe speaketh dyuers place vseth woord reproche shewe god shewed visible fashion wretched state needed greate deepenesse wit perceyue circumcizion sayeth serued rid men vncleannesse furthermore sacrament ordeyned god shewe seede man cursed wee cannot bee ryghtly made holy pure cutting putting away thinges wee haue nature bee shorte lyke nowe adayes wee bee taught baptime renounce whatsoeuer wee haue birth also circumcizion token shew men filthy lothsome till forsaken owne kynd paules meaning sayd visible signe shewed well heathen yee would say vnwoorthie preace vnto god voutsafed receyue companie faythfull iewes inuented circumcizion owne brayne haue sayd afore god sholed rest world reason priuiledge owne mere grace goodnesse theruppon paule addeth tyme vvithout christ serueth shewe yit better men horrible scattered nothing runne astraye till god haue knit toogither bodie sonne adopted bee child wee knowe iesus christ lyght worlde ryghtuousnesse dwelleth redemption lyfe long wee haue none acquayntance wee must needes bee poore blynd men darke wee must needes bee good dead wee must needes bee naked holynesse ryghtuousenesse power goodnesse forasmuch freedome dependeth vppon wee must needes bee hild vnder tyrannie diuell sin till haue raunsomed v cause therfore doth paule send v heere vnder person ephesian iesus christ end parttakers god sonne knowe better bee drowned hundred tymes continew alwayes state sith wee haue nother lyfe soule health ryghtuousenesse ought else allowable iesus christ one sayed wee haue nothing vtter naughtinesse destruction selues addeth thereunto common weale israel shewing thereby promise made iewes grounded vppon iesus christ therefore belong body foorthwith depryued god promise cannot conceyue hope lyfe onely imagination wherin beguile themselues verily addeth instrumentes couenantes conueyaunces promise say god called iewes hudder mudther passed solemne conueyance euidence serued leaue world condemnation therfore forasmuch god aduaunced abraham linage must needes bee rest world much confounded like prince city make league others comprehended good depriued benefite conteyned god declared tooke iewes bee flocke would father sauiour declared also part thereof could come gentile sort forsaken voutsafed shew like mercy finally sayeth bin vvithout god full measure mischief shall become man god hath shaken accesse comming agein onely forsaken god also cannot plundge himselfe deeper deeper intoo bottom hell make warre ageinst god though defiace bicause stubburne rebellious ageinst goodnesse thus yee see thing paule setteth forth intent ephesian profit themselues thing sayd morning concerning onely cause saluation none thing v trust vntoo onely god meere grace let v come r selues haue alreadie declared breifly father state paule setteth downe therefore wee haue cause brag oft thinke roote originall wee spring iewes bee day record god wrath horrible vengeance layeth vppon vnbeliefe much cause cast downe eye thing borne tyme iewes holy roote god chozen wee bee graffed intoo steade god hath spared naturall braunchesrom b c doo v haue bin brought ageinst nature loe paule exhorteth v lowelinesse end wee lerne submit selues alwayes god meere goodnesse frankly freely confesse welfare consisteth therin also told secondly onely father straungers hope saluation bicause adopted well iewes also horrible scattering came vppon whole world reigneth still day ought beate downe al pryde presumption god grace may shine brighter vppon v sayd although wee bee baptyzed haue badge god goodnesse free adoption yit notwithstanding haue bin wretched idolater gone away lord iesus christ thing wee greatest estimation turned greater damnation steade welfare therefore wee haue good cause bethinke selues furthermore asmuch wee bee short witted magnifying god grace let v wey well woord paule vseth heere bring v remembrance thing wee myght forget wee bee indewed god grace hath pleased giue v good desyre walk feare hath wrought v holye spirit men may perceyue goodnesse v maye make v forget wee afore meanes wherof god grace good buryed intent therfore present plyght hinder continuall praysing god esteeming goodnesse grace deserueth let length tyme darken benefites haue receyued god let v enter intoo examination euery day although god haue chaunged state day wee bee men wee afore yit notwithstanding let v beare mynd god pitie vppon v wee seely sheepe went astray beastes vtterly lost without small beginning wee bin damned ten hundered thousand tymes erst god preuented v giuen v remedie cursed state wherin wee yee see thing haue consider vpo sayd speech wherby paule putteth ephesian mynd afore although god put awaye thing shoulde haue made ashamed marked afore hand holy spirit become precious perles yit notwithstanding haue bethink themselues lyke deede frutes repentance scripture setteth downe god hath reached v hand brought v home agein straying wee ceasse beethink v former sinnes euen wyze wee may bee sorye abashed ashamed whereas sayeth gentyles haue good cause hold downe heades bycause sometyme without assurance god goodnesse loue therby wee bee put mynd wee receyue singular benefyte god hand wee haue vse sacramentes warran e taketh auoweth v bee household church trew wee abuse wee shall pay deerly yit whatsoeuer come sacramentes put end wheruntoo ordeyned certein bee inestimable treasure sayd afore although wee haue god promis taketh v child euen comming mother womb yit nothing vnclennesse flesh haue wee baptim shewed v god washeth clenzeth v vnclennesse pulleth v confuzion wherin wee father adam haue v clothed iesus christ bee parttakers good though owne wee see baptim importeth consequently much ought esteeme grace god comming vntoo v wyse shewing bee father homely maner much bee sayd supper shewed v visibly iesus christ trew foode ules like bodyes susteined nurrished bread wyne wee haue spirituall lyfe verye substance god sonne seing lord iesus dooth hand hand shewe v giueth v bodie blud bee spirituall meat drink thing much worth thing bee found world herin wee see malicious frowarde men touching lord supper manie come rush thither lyke wretched beast knowing ordeined agein make custome ordinarie vse although thei haue bin taught purpose auaileth v yit wring mouth one past othersome defyle euen wilfully touching baptim se world goeth wheras ought think dayly aday euery houre day vpo babtim also vpon lord supper confirme selues better god grace little dooth man sett mynd way baptim bee minnistred church men make none account scarsly one bee found among hundred fitly tell vtter signe adoption betokeneth yit yee see disdeyne matched ignorance must god long suffering v pacient wayting v reuenged dishonour grace lyghtly esteeemed among v much therfore dooth stand v hand marke well paule telleth v heere sayeth gentyles depryued sacramentes god giueth child warrant goodnesse loue miserable taking end wee may lerne make much priuiledge hath giuen v boast folishly hipocrytes doo abuse god name continewally make v fare better thing greate pryce valew make v knowe wee bee whit better poore hungrestarued soules ageinst god shetteth gate still voutsafeth tooo impart pledge wherein sheweth witnesseth bee father yee see turkes haue circumcision well iewes yit nothing woorth bycause promis god goyng yit notwithstanding wee come adam race well wherefore haue wee baptim bycause god intended shewe himselfe pitifull towardes v vtter rich goodnesse agein papistes needes bee called christian haue baptim well wee yit meane whyle bee bereft holy supper yea haue abhominable masse wherein renounce death passion lord iesus christ cause wee bee preferred sauing god would haue v bee myrrours infinite mercy much therefore behoueth v walke awe warenesse set store thing god sheweth v bee woorthinesse excellencie wee may fare better wherefore marke speciall poynt paule speaketh heere circumcision vncircumcision1 cor gala although say place circumcision nothing howbeeit bycause abolished vse therof ceassed figure law yit notwithstanding tyme god ordeyned long iewes vsed holily sure warrant god adoption clenzed filthinesse adam race appropryed vntoo himselfe hath sayd addeth vvere vvithout christ vvithout promise sheweth sacrament take borrowe force god woord nomore bare signes matter great importance circumcizion bin giuen iewes without doctrine instructio purpose serued surely bin neuer better god sayeth god sanctifyeth shalbee child receyue therwith take myne heritage syde also giue self wilbee lyfe forasmuch circumcizion promise inestimable treasure iewes bicause foundation wit lord iesus christ layd sure wheron promise setled yee would say confirmed cause paule ioyneth heere disalloweth pelting trash woorde sanctifyeth let v marke well profit selues sacramentes wee must alwayes taught god doctrine thereby wee may iudge manie cut church god notwithstanding adayes thought vntoo god pr myses saluation without christ addeth thing may seeme hard straunge first sight saith ephesian vvithout god certaine although wretched idolater yit certeyne opinion world made selfe wee k men haue continually hild e seede religi n euen ouersho e selues farre wype knowledge god first vgly monster secondly although striue thrust knowledge god vnder foote yit must needes haue harthitings sting spyte teeth bee driuen feele cannot scape hand god howsoeuer cace stand wee bee na u ally inclyned knowe god heathen men haue alwayes deuotions deuine seruices hey termed shew worshipped godhead yeeld euery wynd theruppon make sundrye shape god euery man buildeth forgeth crooked conceytes owne brayne wee knowe man wit shop idolatrie perstition somuch man beleeue owne conceyt certeyne shall forsake god forge idoll owne brayne lo wee bee may right wel sayd without god wee wander away fashion owne imagination false opinion cause paule sayeth haue mynd worship vnknowen god haue woorshipped nothing idoles fantasticall imagination god belongeth vnto consequently vtterly forsaken lyke become renegates renounced somuch behoueth v trauell take peyne knowe god wee ought worship haue told alreadye ynough man alledge hath good intent ment worship god go payment god lyketh libertie men take make themselues beleeue sith wee must present selues god warenesse may shewe v way come vntoo else masse ball boule bee hild vp woold neede help behold sunne hath nothing hold vp secret power god yit notwithstanding huge infinite masse exceedeth whole earth mount vp go lowe turne returne one side mediator shall euer nquie although assure themse e beare themselues hand yit neuerthelesse afterward afrayd find resting place stay foote nother haue safe harborough wherin eschew storme therfore standeth v vppon go lord iesus christ hee throughly resolued peace intend cal vppon god freely without anie doubting finally men exception must come thither wel neere god farre bee think valour worthinesse themselues surely neuer repayre lord iesus christ till haue layde imagination vnder foote agein yde though wee bee thousand tymes past hope outward apperance yit let v assure selues lord imagination yee see wee gather vppon chose wordes paule eth iesus christ hath broken dovvne vvall vvas betvveene vseth declare ceremonyes figure abolished let wee may bee knit together concord brotherly loue anon compareth ceremony e emnitie lyke dayes haue baptim separateth v heathe god choze iewes gaue circumcision bee one baptized beare marke wherby god haue v knowen bee church flocke destruction according sayd god voutsafed fa manifest rightuousnesse vntoo paule also sheweth pre god suffered walke bin wretched beast taht behalf wee paules meaing speaketh ceremony wa deuyde iewes gentile broken downe bycause iesus christ trueth verie substance come put away shaddowes giuing ceremonial la people shouuld themselues wholly put hypocrits doo peruert god meaning oo intent pply absence iesus christ paul speaketh second colossian iewes yit pledge giuen v lord iesus christ therefore needefull bee vphild good hope till shewed world wherefore without cause thing cast downe comming vntoo v day sonne rightuousnesse therefore reason wee ee led darke shaddowes meanes emnitie done away bycause day bee ioyned linage god dedicated diuersitie forasmuch wee bee made child abraham fayth one spirituall ki red among v let v marke baptim lord supper sacrament christ hath ordeyned diuision lyke figure lawe although wee bee separated vnbelee neuer came yit within god church yit one certeyne nation world accepteth peculiarly self haue grace spred ouer distin ion bee sayd wee come linage abraham wee bee god voutsafed adopt none say nother iewe gentill sayd many place scirpture therefore whosoeuer calleth vppon god name purely nation euer bee well lyked accepted sayeth peter sixtenth act also first epistle baptim lord supper serue dayes vnite whole world let barbarousest sort come god receyue baptim shalbee ministred vntoo bycause belongeth kni togither intoo body onely sonne god herewithall let v looke applye text dif cation first let v vnderstand abolishing ceremony namely touching vsing key open v kingdome heauen accomplishment fully shewed lord iesus christ knowen better euer trifle vnprofitable yit v vse seeing wee haue full perfection iesus christ meanes wee see god hath powred goodnesse vppon shaken afore meanes whereby belong day respect gospell published indifferently world foref thers heathen men receyued intoo churche wee bee succeeded roomes although bee seene world hath bin vtterly forlorne hath bin horrible desolation yit hath god made thing effectuall spoken laweexod b namely contineweth mercy thousand generation thus yee see wee haue remember first place secondly although baptim serue peculiarly one people citie countrie yit wee yee would say marked god giueth v vse sacrament assure v adoption nurrish hope hathe giuen v gospell trew shrink away lord iesus christ doo sort make theyr baptim vayne shall cost ryght deere pledge earnestpenny god gi eth v shewe wee bee ioyned lord iesus christ clothed sayd xii chapter first corinthian precious thing bee misused therfore inhonour themselues name church yit notwithstanding disordered dissolute person shall one day feele trayter nesse haue vnhallowed baptim god ordeyned saluation let v syde ake heede wee walk folk sholed filth world sayeth peter verye cause lord iesus christ hath gathered v vntoo wee glorifye deliuering v darknesse world diuell intoo owne lyght wee haue seene heertoofore epistle galathians iesus christ haue death serue drawe v vnclennesse filthinesse world lykewyse first thessalonian s1 thess b paule sayeth wee bee called vnclennesse wee ought bee pure dedicate selues god purenesse wee may shewe deede wee intende honour euer hath giuen v thing wee haue gather vppon word paule wee must runne astray lyke wyld mad beast yit kicke ageinst quietly beare yoke god approch vnto true obedience moreouer owne wandering lust end wee may walk lyke holie people lyke people dedicated god finally heritage thus yee see text bee prac sed v day addeth purposely iesus christ hath doone flesh meaning nature end wee myght bee sure personne wee bee owed bee god child lyke adam wee bee lost lord iesus christ second adam wee bee restored hope saluation deede selfsame maner dooth apostle shewe v wee may boldly trust god alwayes bee r father fakehebr hath taken nature angells sayeth seede abraham although mathew genealogie iesus christ beging person abraham welspring roote yit doth luke leade v telleth v iesus christ appeared alonly iewes truely mathew dooth vppon good reason namely shewe iesus christ came specially performe promise bin made old tyme luke sheweth thing paule declareth heere namely wee haue gone vp farre ur first father adam wee shall fynd lord iesus christ yit stil trew conceyued secret woonderfull power holye ghoste womb mother yit ceassed bee trew linage abraham dauid also adam doubt wee bee ioyned god meane seing trew brother wee neede seeke farre bycause wee bee bone bone flesh fleshe wee shall see hereafter fift chapter thus yee see effect paule ment adding saying fulfilling performing thing doone flesh iesus christ wee consider nothing else iesus christ heauen ly glorie diuine maiestie would come wee would bee abasshed wee myght say farre v come vntoo seeing hathe flesh wee haue become man lyke vntoo v thing sauing sin vndert ke passion suffering want wretche nesse haue pitie v apostle sayth wee may assure selues th wee offer selues vntoo god wee shalbee ioyned vntoo person sonne lyke verye god syde kin v bycause hee came downe hither refuzed bee state bondage intent wee myght bee glorified meanes lyke abaced self also emptyed vtterly also lift v vp intoo heauenly glorie cause also called brother one saying ought breake distrust wee bee dout perplexitie whether god accept v seeing wee haue record iesus christ brother would wee haue wee may wel conceyue filth defylements yea gulf god hath drawen v seing hathe assured v fatherly loue wheruppon saluation grounded yea person iesus christ wee see wretched papist wote saint vow themselues yea barre themselues excuce may neede none processe condemne make common proueth euen one saying wote saint bow themselues shewe themselues bee faythlesse destitute aduyce stay themselues bee stray beastes haue multitude theyr sainctes haue made whole warreines trew haue uirgin mary aduocate catch holde saint michaell saint peter patrone saint superstitious mynd leades heere howbeeit doo vnquietnesse mynd shall neuer fynde rest bycause haue woord god stay vppon fynde themselues hampered perplexitie bee lyke wretched forlorne caytifes vtterly wittes end bycause see well ynough fynde ease haue ossed turmoyled neuer much seeyng wee bee sure hope wee ought haue bycause lord iesus christ yeare v vnite v god father let v vnder stande inestimable benefyte wee ought bee afrayd suffer ten hundred thousand deathes neede paule saith consequently law consisted ordinaunces decree shewe god abolished lawe good holy conuersation mynded call gentyles oo saluation away ceremony serued peculiarly present tyme giuen linage abraham yee see abolished therefore let v leaue figure lawe circumcizion sacrifizing feastfull dayes kept difference meates lyghtes perfume set downe wryting moyses thinges must bee vanished away comming christ yit let v hold still lawe god hath giuen v inuiolable wit let v woorship purely let v call vpo let v put trust let v homage benefites hath bestowed vppon v let v hallowe name agein let v aduyze selues walke purenesse lyfe conscience towardes neyghbours may doo man wrong harme finally let v withdrawe selues defilement world heere yee see lawe god hath giuen v rule lyfe must continew still abolished consisted tradition figure serued tyme haue end iesus christ seing behoueth v giue ouer shadowes vsed full scope tyme moyses prophetes much reason christian church adayes bee burdened men inuentions according wherunto paule elleth v must content selues god lawe serueth shewe v wee may vnblamable wit walking ryghtuousenesse iustice faythfulnesse mercy specially calling vppon god purely spirituall manner marke one poynt agein sayth shadowes law dayes superfluous also curtaine keepe v still darknesse let v seeing lord iesus christ wee ought doo mirror gospell therfore let v conclude ryghtuousenesse god requyreth handes another maner one papistes haue imagined thinges terme god seruice starke gewgawes yea wheretoo serue onely deface peculiar operation lord iesus christ poore ignorant soules hilde fast stand poring altoogither vppon speake ignorant soules meane ablest sort euen tho thinke themselues ee greatest capacitie intangled lyke wre chd beastes therefore let v learne holde v singlenesse gospell looke vppon lord iesus christ lyke also familiarly vntoo v intent wee myght bee aduaunced boldly call god father flee refuge doubting wil bee neere v whensoeuer wee cal vppon truth let v cast selues downe maiestie good god acknowledgement fault praying making v feele may cause v forsake true repentaunce walke continually aright giue selues holy conuersation forasmuch wee bee weake alwayes ee manie vice v may please hold v vp till haue taken v world throughly fashioned v lyke owne image according ground worke hath begun v let v say almighty god heauenly father c xiiii sermon sixth vppon second chapter iesus christ hath reconcyled v one body end knit one vntoo god crosse killing enmitie therby come preached peace farre nere hand twayne v haue accesse father one spirit therfore yee straungers forreyners fellowe citizen saint household folke god wee haue seene morning paul hath told vntoo erst without hope saluation much bound vntoo god calling bee number child seeyng common ordinarie thing thing looked syde also beate downe pryde intent iewes myght thinke themselues priuiledge adoption owne purchacing vaunt themselues though god preferred rest world goyng foreward still matter sayeth wee vvere reconcyled vvel one syde death iesus christ dooyng hath knit v toogither intoo one body putting enmitie death crosse serueth expresse better thing wee haue seene already sayd wee must come vntoo god meanes lord iesus christ without wee bee farre well iewes gentyles bycause wee bee sinner god enemye v till wrath bee appeazed towardes v paule sheweth done bearing sinnes vppon crosse obedience iniquity put awaye sacrifyzce sinnes washt away bee short death passion lord sus christ wee stand bound still hand wryting spoken second colossianscoloss wee come reckening durst open mouth excuze god looke scape damnation v haue deserued wee go alledge one poynt would bee thousand stop mouthes wee bee driuen stand still confounded till wee came remedie wit iesus christ hath death made full satisfaction dettes wee bee quitted released thing paule handleth end wee myght knowe maner accesse speaketh preace intoo god presence cace wee bee selues great boldnesse told v god wil lay sinnes misdeed charge bycause iesus christ hath put away death rashnesse v go vntoo god heades bolt vpryght haue good foundation boldnesse god lyketh well therfore oft wee haue occasion pray fyght ageinst anie temptation let v learne knowe wee haue neede bee incoraged patience bee asserteyned euerlasting lyfe repayre wholly refuge death passion sonne god knowing vntill tyme wee bee dipped blud washed woorking holie spirit wee shall euermore bee lothely god iustly shake v bee alwayes iudge v sted father ynough knowe iesus christ hath made amendes v yea thing requysyte saluation fully accomplished performed death passion wee must also therwithall receyue benefyte thereof maner ministred vntoo v shall auayle iewes turkes lyke god sonne vndertooke condemnation belonged v shal rather bee hild dubble giltie bycause vnthankfulnesse bereeue themselues benefyte wherof myght haue bin parttakers receyued promise gospell fayth iewes one syde blaspheme lord iesus christ turk syde laughe scorne count night ghost papist labour tooth nayle deface power rob greatest part grace therfore shall fynde death sonne god hath suffered serueth increace cursednesse kindle god wrath much ageinst yea euen also neuer heard gospell vtterly excluded treasure cause paule addeth iesus christ hath preached peace vvere neere vvere farre wherby sheweth whe gospel preached dayly put possession saluation purchaced v lord iesus christ eastwyse wee lay holde trew fayth hath taken lyuely roote harte bring foorth good fruite therefore twoo thing requyred one wee know matter substance saluation iesus christ bee declared v gospell intent wee may bee surer doctrine paule sayeth christ hath sent apostle set vp great sort bring v message christ himselfe come bryng tydings peace men nowe certeyne lord iesus christ hath executed office preaching since urrection sauing onely among disciple myght bee furnished aforehand preache euery doctrine committed vntoo paule sayeth preached erst bin farre god owne person certeyne paule speaketh preaching gospell doone minister appoynted god lord iesus christ yit notwithstanding sayeth christ preached namely end wee yeeld greater reuerence gospell hold truthe authorized god euerye v submit without geynsaying replying wee haue doubt let v thinke iesus christ shall boote v thing therfore wee must assure selues yea wee haue seene first chapter god promise must bee sealed hart holie ghost cause called earnestpennye lyfe wee hope verye signe manuell seale god printeth v end fayth bee full certeintie wee see wherat paule amed text saying iesus christ rayzed dead hauing performed charge inioyned god father redeemer also bringer sage vntoo v away continuall preaching insomuch haue mouth still open euen end witnesse vnto v wee shall assuredly fynd wee wish bring v heauenly lyfe must wee bee block touched quicke hearing woords trew sonne god fleeteth place place conuersant heere beneath among v visible fashion nother requisite yit doctrine wee preache name ought haue lyke anthoritie hee spake v himselfe mouth mouth cause also dooth hee say hee heareth heareth mee receyueth receyueth meeluke c likewyse reiecteth reiecteth mee ageiniohn c meanes god father honored euen beeleeuing gospel contrariwise hath great wrong reproch doone vnto thing douted wel certifyed pope al rabble clergie alledge mayntenance tyrannie lord iesus christes meaning warrant v message concerneth forgiuenesse sinnes wherwith eares beaten continually wee shall alwayes hang mamering doubt wee bee throughly perswaded resolued thinges conteyned gospell hild iesus christ infallible truth self wee haue eye men wee shall bee euer wauering doubtfull proofe thereof bring v owne growing vtter vanitie leazing although lord iesus christ abyde still heauenly glory wee bee absent body yea bee straunge thing v say dwelleth vsmath wheresoeuer twoo three bee gathered toogither name middes yit notwithstanding wee must bee fully assured poynt pure doctrine gospell preached one himselfe spake vntoo v familiarly conuersant heere among v bee short fayth must ame marke butte must rest vppon seeyng god father hath sent bee faythfull witnesse looke whatsoeuer old v truly name wee must receyue without geynsaying furthermore wee haue heere wherwith strengthen v trew constancie fayth arme v ageinst assaultes alarumes satan giue v great shame v wee bee deafe hearing gospell let alone thing hanging aire taking bee fable thing valew yit men adayes doo eyther despyze gospell else besotted discant tryfle else make mocke hauing heard sermon hauing bin taught lecture meanes perchaunce say possible may bee trew mee wil say nay forasmuch clerk diuine al one mee let alone still ordinarie course say tush hold mee fayth forefather daungerous matter chaunge agein say thus new doctrine wee neuer heard othersome contented scornfulnesse adde outragious crueltie fight openly ageinst much could find harte plucke god seate wheruppon fall sheading innocent blud indeuoring vttermost power wype away remembrance gospell meane whyle let v vnderstand whensoeuer message saluation set foorth vntoo v wee despyze wee shalbee giltie reiecting benefite brought v mortall creature also shetting gate ageinst god sonne came seeke v saluation therfore quicken vp slothfulnesse correct cursed stubbornnesse myght hinder full obedient yeelding gospell let v mark preaching therof thing doone haphazard nother doo men come owne selues sayeth paule also romanesrom c gad visiteth v commeth vntoo v lord iesus christ performeth still dewtie shepeherd calleth v owne voyce bycause seeth v bee sheepe go astraye although wee bee peaked asyde heere yit mynd gather v togither agein flocke well printed harte surely wee bee better disposed receyue doctrine gospell humilitie also bee inflamed zeale earnestnesse whole world nothing comparison v bee short god woord would bee sweete honnie v precious goold siluer considering sonne god glory god father doth neuerthelesse make v heare voyce one speaketh farre sound vanisheth away ayre wyse wee haue certeine record thinges speaketh one commeth preacheth v looke done authoritie according commission gaue commited apostle becommeth v receyue sake haue declared afore moreouer paules intent prouoke v receyue gospell obedience onely worthinesse person lord iesus christ also thing conteyned gospell self message peace sayth let v consider haue warre made v fashioned v wee haue enemy world although frayle man haue great credit yit wee bee afrayd least shonld practize pollicie spight ageinst v reuenge force bee short wee would euer bee vnquiet long enemy world must needes tootoo brutish seeing wee fall sleepe god sheweth bee ageinst v armed take vengeance vppon v considered well haue warre god deede sinnes ceasse prouoke displeasure finde contrary part benefite haue peace attonement seeing brought v gospell wherby wee enter possession attonement made iesus christ whe offered himselfe sacrifize death thing ought inflame v wise make v imbrace gospell earnest zeale giue ouer whole minde thereuntoo considering coldenesse lazinesse v let v much thinke vppon saying applye vse namely first knowe sonne god refuzeth teache v r scholemaster wee bee contented bee schollers secondly wee shall haue doctrine bee desired pleasure honour good world wit wee bee peace god sure fauour towards v wee may haue recourse accesse vntoo bee receyued child hand well ought wee note paule ment shewe trew peace bycause many men thinke themselues well ease notwithstanding haue peace god puffed vp diuelish self weening monk fryer popedome perswade themselues haue deserued well god hand fault bee found ground themselues manner vppon owne vertues good deedes thinke god bound vntoo may well bee luld asleepe bycause satan besotteth foolish self trust haue conceyued bycause ame god haue forged idoll owne head good fayth thing would content god withal gewgawes baggagely trifle would still babe papist must take sprinkling holy water must crosse themselues must fast wake wake must gad pilgrimage must forbeare eating flesh vpon day must babble thus many paternusters must set vp candle saynt must thus many mass must say thus many meaculpaze bee short man hath raked heape certeyne scraping offal filthinesse yit seeming god wel payd say idol little babe sayd afore wee see none hipocrits puffed vp presumption haue peace god forasmuch fetch windlass looke god askewe though make countenaunce approching vnto god yit offring themselues vntoo si glenesse substanciall soundenesse hart beguile selues fond flatterings also sort scoffer doo nod head men speake saluation saying ynough wee may giue one good sigh let v ceasse meane whyle make frolicke chere thing passe tyme life dumpishnesse would doo v good therfore let v play good fellowes hereupon fall vnthriftinesse one fashion another haue thousand wayes destruction confederate themselues ageinst god much possible therefore bycause haue alwayes bin many yea many bring owne conscience fleepe paule place lyke also ft romanesrom setteth downe tr w peace wee come vntoo god must present selues maiestie wee bee sure pitie v lay sinnes chage receyue v owne child intend enoye spirituall peace passeth good world let v earne haue warre selues first knowe wee bee damned forlorne hope remedie v wherby get pit destruction agein except wee bee recouered meanes lord iesus christ wee bee bereft vntoward selftrust desert knowe wee bee emptie starke naked let v repayre poore beggers vntoo god thing requisite atteynment trew peace way also let v thinke gayne thing blockishe wee fall sleepe world bnt let v vnderstand forasmuch wee haue certeyne tyme appoynted v duetye summon selues euening morning god examine sinnes throughly bee sorie ashamed wee haue learned make warre thus ageinst owne vyces plye throughly without hipocrisie counterfetting wee hygh way peace lord iesus christ dooth publish preache vntoo v euery day gospell cause paule sayeth expresly wee haue enterance vntoo father say vnbeleeuers heathenish worldlinges mocker god dullardes thinke euerlasting saluation meanes taste valew peace wee obteyne gospell conceyue precious amyable put many scarfes face keepe beyng abashed god iustice beyng striken terrour sinnes bee shorte make themselues wilfully drunken myght haue senslesse conscience bere ue themselues vnderstanding though brute beastes wee consider welfare consisteth beyng able haue recourse vntoo god comming certeine also yea way open v go thither familiarly surely wee forget thing long bee made parttakers lord iesus christ bee vnited intoo body ende god may receyue v wee call vppon full trust necessitie settle selues vppon loue beareth v doubting whatsoeuer offered v gospell one god vttered hart among v paule hauing spoken preaching gospell addeth purposely one spirit sayd afore wee bee knit toogither flesh lord iesus christ namely tooke nature vpon meanes abolished tooke away cursednesse adam neuerthelesse dooing therof person sonne god ynough gospell wer meane therfore third poynt paule addeth wee must communicate one spirit although gospell bee preached yit manie stubborne person others narled world thinke heauenly lyfe doggs swyne doo othersome agein saped hipocrisie although god doo call v allure v sweetly person sonne number come vntoo god verye small cause paule sayth wee must haue god spirit certein nature wee bee variable euery one v need haue opinion himselfe also wee change euery minute houre meanes whereof wee bee farre beeing one accorde none v abydeth setled opinion morning nyght except bee gouerned god standeth v hand wee heare gospell preached haue god spirit guyde gouerne v soo wee may throughly imbrace lord iesus christ haue accesse father therfore wee must beare mynd first lord iesus christ exhorteth v minister according also paule sayeth second corinthian wee ought bee well dispozed come vnto him2 cor yea runne vntoo euen inforcing selues aboue power man wee haue doone wee yit shall wee haue none accesse vntoo indeuer shall rather bee retyring backe going foreward vnlesse spirit guyde v much doth stand v hand pray god touch v holy spirit cause make v way vnto sayd eyght romansrom c haue seene also lykewyse galathians paule putteth difference betwixt god childrengala reprobats wee sayeth haue spirit adoption wherby wee crye abba father wee knowe selnes sayeth bycause nothing v infirmitie great rashnesse v call god father god hath sealed truth gospell v holie spirit inlyghtened v inwardly wee know speaketh thertoo hath assured v goodnesse mercie may wee freely open mouth crye father soo yee see effect wee haue beare mynd intent none v trust owne brayne gospell preached vnto cosideration rudenesse weaknesse v wee suffer selues bee gouerned god spirit chefe kye wherby gate paradise opened vnto v cause also sayd wee must besprinckled blud lord iesus christ peter termeth first epistle cause also apostle epistle hebrewes saythheb iesus christ offred vp spirit meaning sacrifyze wherby purchaced v ryghtuousnes still vayne thing v holie ghost wrought powre paul going forward matter hath bin declared hertofore addeth also vvell vvere farre vvere neere hand heard sayd message set afore v also day end myght bee confirmed haue sayd alredy neere meaneth iewes familiaritie god theretoofore bycause acquaynted himselfe giuing lawe telling receyued theyr linage protector thereof howbeeit knit throughly vntoo till pardoned sinnes doone meanes iesus christ lawe could yeeld nothing terrour anguish mynd curse throughout sink downe bottom hell paule sayeth third romansrom cor b specially third chapter second epistle corinthian therfore requisite gospell bee added thereuntoo certein dauid holy prophetes lykewyse king faythfull liued vnder old testament gospel manifestly haue yit substance god declared vnto owne free goodnesse receyued mercie redeemer sake trusted lawe bee separated gospell profiteth rest vppon also serueth beate downe thunder vpon shewe dreadfull god maiestie gospell wee haue peace therefore stoode iewes hand bee made partaker doctrine v come gentyles wee ought sayd morning acknowledge much better dubble recognisance wherin wee stand bound vnto god hath voutsafed make v fellowes peculiar people v say thing borne tyme put v companie chozen adopted afore wyse recordes prophet fulfilled wherin saydesay c yee gentyles nation glorifye yee god owne people wherby holie ghost foreshewed melodie men sing god prayses euen well gentyles iewes knit toogither gathered scattering wherin v sayd alredie wee haue seene afore wee see wherat paule amed saying gospell preached men well farre neererom treateth tenth roman sheweth wee euer bee scanning neuer resolued fayth wee knew preaching gospel proceeded god authoritie vnchaungeable ordinance men sayeth put foorth elues except god send god hath begunne teache worlde tymes heeretoforerom c though preaching wryting yit onely sight world sel e maruell therefore sayeth though god haue voutsafed time extend grace nation making knowe would bee father lyke one side stoode iewes hand knowe howe great neede bee reconcyled god iesus christ bee deceyued trusting theyr birthryght circumcision shadowes law behoued flee onely meanes haue treated namely god receyued mercy eternall sacrifyzes sake iesus christ offered let v syde learne magnify god goodnesse seeyng hath voutsafed cast v bee houshold church notwithstanding wee cut banished therefore let v looke selues wee let benefite vanish away ne depryued owne vnthankfulnesse excuce bee v god calleth v heauen person onely sonne iesus christ telleth v himselfe commeth seeke v oft tolde v god mercifull v sake wee runne apace vntoo hot zeale earnest carefulnesse shewe howe wee knowe welfare ioye happinesse glory consist beyng ioyned god cannot bee free goodnesse agein wee refuze receyue peace let v bee afrayde iesus christ chaunge voyce certeine gospell dooth alwayes behyght dan nation frame themselues god nought scripture speaketh binding wel loozing lord iesus christ ment shewe vsmath c nature dewtie gospell plucke v bondage prison wherin wee bee hild vntill hath set v free owne office alsoiohn c himselfe sayeth eyght iohn declareth thing howbeeit addeth bondes also prepared take redeemer ne suffer themselues bee set free meaneth iohniohn e sayeth whose sinnes soeuer yee release bee released vntoo whose soeuer yee withhold withhild dooth shewe wee preache gospell wee must first declare message reconciliation thing spoken first corinthian place mee alledged thus yee see thing wee haue doo continually shewe god hath bin kynd vntoo v bee one v person sonne yea receyue v bee himselfe myght washed scoured filthinesse bee accepted ryghtuous himmath c lo wretched soules vnbound lo poore captiues let prison lo erst plundged darkenesse death brought ageyn lyght lyfe syde wee haue also commission withhold sinnes threatening despyzers god woorde god horrible wrath telling haue shaken eares thinke themselues scaped doctrine haue heard must bee rope fetter bynd withall according wheruntoo s2 b paule sayeth expresly another place wee haue vengeance ready et themselues ageinst doctrine yea though bee hyghest world yit set vp bristle ageinst god de pyze shall scape damnation threatened leastwyse faythfull haue performed obedience deede enemie summoneth people trembling feare least shall fynde mercy reasonable condition bee refuzed shalbe doone god commeth onely v yeeld selues vntoo also offer himselfe v haue v possesse good person iesus christ shall become v wee refuze grace vseth kyndnesse towardes v must horrible damnation lyght vppon villanous pryde scornfulnesse men voutsafe receyue euen procureth saluation also created bee mainteyned let v learne marke well doctrine wherein peace spoken ende wee prouoke god ne turne bread intoo bane meate intoo mortall poyson wee may bee quickened truely grace god offereth v dayly cause saint paule concludeth touched god spirit obey gospell simply substancially straungers rather fellovvcit zen vvith sayncts god houshold folk tendeth still end haue noted afore wit god name bee glorified deserueth lined leueled vntoo wee sticke without adding one thing must needes disauow v cast v quyte away good fayth papist lyke doo well wray greate vnthankfulnes wandring adding new meanes owne pleasure wrong outrage doo lord iesus christ deserue wel tumble downe cut quite god church therfore wee mynd inioy benefite paule setteth foorth v heere let v beware fayth bee framed lawe gospell reiect whatsoeuer without making lawfull men adde thing yee see effect thing wee bee warned woordes paule wee belong lord iesus christ ne bee god church except following pure doctrine lawe gospell forsaking yee would say filth abhomination men haue deuyzed owne dreames dotage fayre colour wisdome soeuer beare fynd store ynough fyne pedlery make folke beleeue adding many gewgawes without cause howsoeuer fare wee couet bee ioyned vnited iesus christ must abyde make none account thing therwithall wee see also bee taken god child wee must giue wynds trew concord paule setteth downe bothe twayne heere verye deede thing inseparable christian taught god word purely one hart one mynd receiue thing set forth vnto haue brotherly concord among speake one mouth make one pure simple confession lyke hithertoo wee haue seene must builded vppon god pure woord alone shewed v heere wee must euery v bee bent owne opinion frame selues vnitie fayth accordingly paule speaketh therof third philippian saying ye intend bee perfect ame yee one mark yee knit truly toogither one wee know ambition tickleth v continually euery man would fayne haue somewhat set owne estimation withall cause wherof came al heresy euer pryde depely rooted mennes hart wheras v ought bee lerner euery v need bee teacher verye deede teach folk must set foorth thing owne purely impart vntoo thing hath learned lord iesus christ soo bycause men froward couet alwayes knowe lawfull therefore misbehaue selues euery man would keepe schoole make showe hym selfe said heere stead dealyng wee must bee knyt toogither wee may speake one mouth confesse wee haue one god one father shewing selues haue mo maysters onely iesus christe neuerthelesse true concord would bee ynough haue told already ende wee must begynne wit pure instruction wee receyue prophetes apostle papistes brag much theyr agreement may ful wel diuel possesseth wise wholly sotted deede ianglyng iarryng ynough among snatch one another lyke curdogs bee theyr synagogue yit sticke put foorth store doctrine prophet apostle seing papist haue banished holy scripture although make coutenance receyue doo neuerthelesse deface yea vtterly falsifie corrupt inuetions therby see farre fro reckening vant selues open mouth bee god church seeing haue doctrine prophet apostle haue marke church al although men redie receyue al thing holy scripture eue without geinsaying yit fal mingling fancy therwithall christianitie therby alredy corrupted cofo ded intangle god truth inuentions also vtterly ouerthrow al somuch god seruice vtterly corrupted poore soules harried fro lord iesus christ
