christ make cleane riddance possible haue made conscience manifest blasphemie insomuch euen little child ought haue spit face considering grosse beastlinesse hath bin among herein also bee seene howe diuell hath raigned full darkenesse god woord buryed yea vtterly defaced wretched world quite cleane eft tyme notwithstanding ordinary foode let v abhorre blasphemy assuring selues wee cannot bee grounded lord iesus christ wee bee faythfully instructed wee neede borrow elsewhere bycause hath brought v whatso uer requisite saluation meete wee doo great dishonour seeke supply one wee hold selues wholly vntoo therfore meaning thing paule speaketh heere theruppon addeth behoueth v bee buylded growe intoo spirituall building euen god spirit first whereas sayeth wee must bee builded stirre v vp much better growe dayly faith vseth also word growe meaneth effect twoo thing one wee must thinke selues bee perfect neede wee bee fantasticall head yee shall see puffed vp ouerweening imagine themselues wize ynough disdeyne looke vppon god word giue eare vntoo taught wo worth pryde wee cannot bee disciple lord iesus christ knowing behoueth v bee grounded profite al tyme life god word height bredth length man forbeare eating drinking sleeping buzie himselfe wholly yit neuer knowe wee ought trauell al life long knowing god intendeth onely set v way wee must go foreward little little bee hi continually humblenesse modestie agein paule sheweth v bee se tled lord iesus christ bee furthered good thing giuen v wee must haue word wee may bee builded vpp growe vppon bring passe wee must bee teachable day oo day labour seeke new helpe strenghthen fayth withall shal neuer perfect world fynde sufficiently experience thus yee see paule ment sayeth concerning growing going forward sayd building howbeit vntoo lord sayeth shewing therby haue goodly show uired hand cheife point god like well v wee bee wholly giuen vntoo haue place roome v dwel v temple papist wil make farre greater showe wee side haue great multitude wherwith bee p ffed vp vttermost theruppon despyze v bycause wee bee handfull men comparison say dooth christendome extende europe greece affricke yit see rascal haue nother authoritie credit thing else needes counted chruch yee see papist shake v diuelish pride malapertnesse bycause haue syde great pomp manner rich insomuch man go intoo temple rauished earthly paradice al gold glistereth although pompe bee able bleare eye poore ignorant soules see bee caryed away deede thing yit better abhomination god paule sheweth v wee must spite papistes though many number greatly multiplyed bee head without body rather bumbasted counterfet body bee short papist terme church monster hath head bycause iesus christ hath preheminence ouer part portion end therefore wee might knowe wee growe sayd vntoo v wee must grow vntoo lord spirit sayth paule heere draweth v backe worldly superstition dooyng v vnderstand bee pelting trashe yea dung god abhorreth therfore wee must growe spirit verily wee see shadowes lawe assed immediatly soone wee accomplishment substance body wit lord iesus christ come wee must gaze longer vppon figure sith wee ought much precious stone sion seing iesus christ giuen v bee foundation wee haue precious stone whervppon wee bee builded wee may bee sure saluation wee neede bee afrayd strong ynough vphold v neuer fayle v wee fall iustling ageinst stone cer ein wee shall bee able stand ageinst wee shall sink downe vnderneath end shall brooze v beate v peeces therfore let v take heede lord iesus christ turne intoo stone stumple manner world adayes maliceth insomuch euery man settes vp bristle proudly rebelliously come russhing ageinst let v bethink selues well meekely dispozed yeeld seruice may maynteyne v vntoo end although wee see iesus christ bee reiected world may seeme straunge vntoo v men fyght ageinst bee whyte shoote yit let v ceasse take still precious stone saint peter counselleth v second chapter first apostle prophetes spirit vvit gentyles fellovvheires one selfsame body parttakers toogither promise iesus christ gospell although euery v confesse doctrine gospell brings alwayes trubble persecution bycause world hateth yit wee ought bee dismayed shrinke away yit notwithstanding hard put thing vre wee confesse almost none v vexed maner shaken downe god enemyes offer vnquyetnesse wee see silly faythfull sor cruelly vsed handes neuerthelesse ought serue strengthening fayth wee see men frayle owne nature afrayd hazard lyues bearing record god truthe seeing power god spirit appeareth manifestly blynded vnthankfulnesse ought assure v much forasmuch wee aduauntage selues euill haue neede bee incoraged paule also dooth text wee see diuell stirre vp vnderlinges execute tyranny ageinst god child let shake fayth specially faythfull indure paciently al maynteynance god truth knowe doo also hold end without swaruing sayd ought bee lost cause dooth paule place saycolos suffereth welfare church could purchace forgiuenesse sinnes grace deathrom b bycause gospell god myghty power welfare beleeue wee go forward neerer maketh v come vntoo god vntoo euerlasting lyfe paule suffred example taught afore owne mouth therby knew speaking bin good earnest seeing spared owne blud lyfe seale confirme doctrine brought much doone text sayth ambassadour gentyles yea euen though prisoner iesus christ surely twoo thing seeme bee contrarie fyre water could iesus christ honour better sendeth name represent put shame reproche world cor c paule well heere place hathe sticked glorie imprisonment band deede kept ward euill dooer b meane record bothe god also man suffred wrongfully executing office finally seruing god faythfully therfore let v think strange one syde calleth prisoner othersyde ambassadour messenger liuing god euen representing person dignitie nought addeth name iesus christ imprizonment generally myght haue bred euill opinion bycause euill dooers punished order iustis cace putteth difference betewne euill dooers witness god lord iesus christ rause paule calleth prisoner simply without exception also sheweth cause saying iesus christ auoweth th ugh hostage pledge saying wee bee warned eyue paules doctrine greater authoritie seing hee hath rati ed well onely executed n preaching wee ought haue made acount obedience hee yeelded vntoo god also wrought miracle ured two three myght bee great thicke cloud apostle sayeth twelfth hebrewes sith let v make hand helpes certeyne god ment susteyne feeblenesse adding helpes woord ought bee sufficient authoritie self intent bee doubted called question thus yee see thing wee haue beare mynd blud apostle martyr hath bin shed confirme doctrine gospell good hudred seales yea whole milion seales warrant v thinges fully conteyned gospell trew fayth ought bee grounded vppon authoritie holy ghost although god neuer martyr shewe truth gospell firme certeine yit ought suffyze v speaketh agein wee haue seene heeretoofore truth shall euer bee doubted ill holy ghost haue sealed harte cause called earnestpennye2 cor bycause insureth v heritage wee hope according promise hath bin purchaced deerely v blud lord iesus christ last step wee must come experience wee haue dayes blud martirs shed still day god could well let wicked runne vpon brydle ageinst faythfull could well chaunge mischeeuousnesse rebellion wheras bee rauening wolues could make sheepe lambes surely could doo one syde ordeyneth satan driue stirre vp rage agein giueth licence leaue trubble faythfull end wee knowe power holy spirit pleaseth guyde gouerne v haue declared alredy weaknesse men needeth falling leafe tree make quake ageyne wee knowe death horrible self therfore wee must conclude god vttereth wonderfull grace strengtheneth seruantes wyse bee dismayed threateninges syght fyre enemyes tirantes contented single death adde thertoo tyrannicall tormentes bee deuyzed martyres perseuer constancie therin men perceyue god hath put hand wherfore wee heare bee handled cruelly god word scape notwithstanding redye dye othersome knowing death shall bee precious eye lord offer selues sacrifize cheerful corage let v suffer blud fall ground say wee heare thing let v beware wee suffer thing perish god hath ordeyned edifying better confirming v fayth although wee ought bee sufficiently instructed preaching alone yit must needes great strengthening v god word onely preached also sealed fashion bee called question disputed vncertayne matter god hath graunted grace led farre holy spirit suffer truth faythfull wittnesses blud serueth giue full sealing vp word intent wee bee better resolued thus yee see wee haue gather vppo streyne although enemy gospell make triumphing spit fire keepe great coyle deface belongs god yit let v ceasse gloryfie god alwayes seeing battels prepared satan pollicie ageinst faythful turned god crownes garland maketh ouercome thing seeme make vndoing destruction thing whiche wee haue yet mark effect must bee thrust way see wycked sorte despyzers god al worldlynges scorne simplicitie suche tyme brother suffer persecution must consyder pryzons kept reprochefull fire much worthinesse excellencie seates iudges sit satan vnderlings vpholders ranke murtherers yea excellent al seat king prince though make neuer much adoo greatnesse hereuppon paule addeth also haue heard dealing foorth haue proceeded god wee come thither mynd prepared surely god neuer suffer v bee receyued guyde v holy ghost wee shalbee certifyed fayth con neth grounded vppon power tha commeth men let serue one age alredie passing halfdead yea euen good buried meane whyle letteth whole world go destruction foure hundred yeeres spent law published howbeit abraham linage gentyles farre greater number keruers bee short god neuer hath full right except wee rid quyte cleane thefore man cannot discerne saint paule hild al thing god mere grace free gift considering former slendernesse say considering manner one bin estate bin poynt greate importance wee see men couet alwayes reserue somwhat themselues although graunt god deserueth exalted without end yit finde hart forgo whole prayse thinges hath beleeued truth verye hard bycause wee bee much giuen distrust vnbeleefe agein beleeue one day wee haue doo required wee hold still verye rare thing bee found world bycause wee bee alwayes isking satisfyed wee haue rest selues wholy thereuppon although wittes affection bee fickle yit ought bee hild awe prisoner may say let v cleaue let v cleaue godpsal according saying dauid behold felicitie ioy ioyned god likewise sayeth another placepsal c welspring lyfe lyght agein wee haue ng morningpsal portion cannot haue better lotte must needes take delight thus yee see w haue remember first place secondly let v mark well degree saint paule setteth downe wherof first must haue fayth although iesus christ haue opened way passage bludhebr c make v enterance vntoo god father yit gap opened menapo b vnbeleuers cannot inioy benefite whereof kye trew doore neere hand opening therof easye haue kye say wee receyue gospell trew obedience fayth soo yee se saint paule telleth v ynough v iesus christ hath layd foorth tresures infinite goodnesse mercie god father standeth v hand syde receyue fayth wee dan doo owne power yit wee come vntoo iesus christ bee partaker benefit offereth v gospel except wee haue fayth beleef must procede trust say wee must bee fully perswaded god alwayes receyue v wee shall fynd fauour hand although wee bee wretched sinner vnwoorthie liue vppon earth yit neuerthelesse wee shall fynd still fauorable v wee come heauen lo fayth linked trust therof springeth stoutnesse mynd boldnesse hyghest step soo although wee must need bee dis ayed wee consider bee selues yit ceasse offer selues vnto god head vpryght bycause looketh vppon v person sonnemath pet therfore sayd welbeloued howbeeit himselfe onely ut also sake member bodie ye see haue gather vppon text receyuing doctrine gospell trew obedience faith wee possesse lord iesus christ meanes shalbee led vntoo god father come perfection lyfe lyght goodnesse way wee bee warned go foreward fayth till wee throughly perswaded fyghting ageinst temptation assayle v shall get vpper hand meanes faythrom g finally wee may brag specially paule dooth eyght romanes ageinst lyfe ageinst death ageinst power aboue beneath despyze distress knowing full well nothing able disappoynt v loue iesus christ hath shewed v god father also hath vttered towardes v person theruppon also dooth come prayer must bee grounded vppon full certeintie sayeth iamesiames th nketh obteyne thing doubting deceyueth himselfe therefore wee must assure selues promise gospell god readye receiue v mercy whensoeuer wee come vntoo thereby wee perceyue paule sayd naught wee haue fayth wee must seeke thing iesus christ must bee treasure bycause wee haue thing requisite ioy contentation let v fall downe maiestie good god acknowledgment sinnes praying make v feele wee may myslyke yit notwithstanding ceasse bee glad hath shewed self pitifull towardes v person sonne hath voutsafed drawe v gulfe hell giue v enterance intoo kingdome also graunt v grace come theruntoo trew fayth withdrawe selues worldly intycementes serue turne v away wee may forsake vaynglory much voyde goodnesse selues seeke wantes trew fountayne goodnesse neuer drawen dry may please graunt grace v also people c xix sermon fourth vppon third chapter vvherfore beseech yee faynt trubbles vvhich endure sake glory vvhich thing bovv knee father lord iesus christ vvhom kinred named heauen earth according rich glory graunt bee strengthened vvith povver spirit invvarde man woonderfull thing men hauing many meanes come vntoo god labour go much possible euery strawe make turne head yit notwithstanding think themselues haue reasonable excuce say letted shalbee nothing least occasion bee wyll serue bycause seeking alreadye shrinke away god common adayes desyrous iustifye themselues bycause reiect doctrine gospell alwayes fynde fault cause offence say thy trubbleth mee maketh mee mislyke doctrine gospell maketh mee forsake vtterly euer alledge shalbee tryfles yit wee neede labour much ouercome lettes stoppes diuell indeuoreth cast way wee may still keepe trade course thing whereat paule ameth heere exhorting ephesian bee thrust way holde still truely constantly fayth gospell notwithstanding might offended see prisoner good condemned already certein saint paules suffering mayntenance thinges preached make swarue god pure truth contrariwyse protesteth glory myght tryumph aforehand considering inuincible constancie giuen haue sayd already besydes thing haue touched alredy naughtinesse rooted nature wee bee well appayd wee haue outward colour shrinke away god beare selues hand bee quite cleane discharged howbeit paule spake one people giueth heere instruction ought serue v day although part world bee mad gospel fight much quench rememberaunce lord iesus christ although faythfull bee persecuted diffamed tormeted yit must swarue aside hart considering ought confirme fayth lord iesus christ wee haue wherof glory seeing god holdeth vp church strong hand vtterly oppressed ouercome gospell receyued without geinsaying one common accord surely haue cause blisse god bee melodie betweene heauen earth men angel might full mouth magnifie god goodnesse shi ning foorth vppon men yit fighting men ageinst gospell sure recorde vntoo v god author inasmuch imprisoned drawen euen vntoo death ceasse stand stedfastly it2 king c god vttereth wounderfull power appereth euer satan doo wee neuerthelesse haue proofe god side fighteth v vpholdeth v power exempteth v affliction alwayes giue v victory ought suffize v thus thing wee haue remember vppon text paules wee must bee readie receyue alarum satan shall make vppon v although wee see doctrine gospell ill receyued world despyzed disdeyned also hated vnbeleeuers inflamed diuelish rage destroy yit notwithstanding must beare lesse reuerence wee must measure god maiestie opinion put cace god euery despyzed according men deede churlish vnthankfull bee monster shaped ageinst kind yit must god loze right wee owe notwithstanding rebelliousnesse would wrap god iniquity wee ought honour humilitie euen also pure doctrine gospell although world set themselues ageinst many men trample vnderfoote mocke gnashe teeth fire kindled yit let v still quietly obediently receyue thing wee knowe come god thus yee see fayth ought always keepe way although many practizes enterprizes bee attempted ageinst faythfull man shal euery heare nothing confederacy threatenings outrage thing yit wee must ceasse fight stoutly vnder christ bannerluke possesse soules pacience heereunto ought saying paules serue glory fayth bee good dead god tryed neuerthelesse wee see faythfull examined wee haue alwayes much better warrant doctrine giuen v god trew ought bee grounded heauen say vppon aucthoritie god alone without hauing respect creature angel heauen able authorize gospell god maiestie must bee fayne come foorth v leane vntoo shall wee neuer bee shaken downe notwithstanding martirs sticke giue liues witnessing god truth sayd afore wee bee ought bee stirred vp receyue doctrine sealed vp hart forasmuch persecution serue confirme doctrine better therfore paule sayeth glory wee ought triumph seeing god dooth mainteyne strengthen sendeth intoo battell certeine respect frayltie fleshe shoulde quayle get vpper hand let v mark god dooing woorketh manifest fashion wee haue cause glorifie wee bee trubbled wee bee tempted shrink giue ouer euery brunt put v token wee haue skill profit selues meanes god giueth v drawe v make v sticke trew stedfastnesse therfore let v fyght ageinst weaknesse ageinst naughtinesse nature wee see diuell practyzeth ouerthrowe gospell maner euery wee may consider god forgetteth strengtheneth wyze power fayth getteth vpper hand end shold hope lyke wee bee ease rest wee ceasse prepare selues example shall please god reach hand vppon v make v take turne course wee may bee fenced long whyle aforehand bee possessed imagination bee beare themselues hand shal neuer feele greefe trubble wee may alwayes redy armed fyght herewithal paule sheweth ynough v taught ceasse alwayes fretting men half wittes vntill god made doctrine take place wee touched quicke hauing exhorted ephesian sayeth bowe knee father lord iesus christ exhorting end euery man myght courage bin ynough paul would haue added speaketh heere prayer intent shewe ephesian doo falleth intoo way giue example therfore let v marke wee shall haue eares beaten god woord shewe v dewtie thertoo bin instructed also exhorted spurred forward yit alwayes bee sloth coldnesse rechlesnesse v doctrine shal stand v smal stead vntill god touch v holy spirit serueth beate downe al pryde v number thinke themselues able woork woonders feele themselues beguyled come pinch wee see happened peter promised yea euen vnfeynedlymath g would shrinke mayster though dye yee see peter made stout brag surely made zeale man would say good holy ment haue intent settled haue shewed neede yit notwithstanding stout wordes sillye wenche made deny christ redy haue denyed hundred tymes insomuch fell cursing banning seeing wee haue looking glasse let v acknowledge owne weaknesse peter person paule sheweth v heere let v resort hath power ynough v knowe disease vnlesse wee seeke remedie first let v rid selues al foolish opinion wherwith world imbrewed man may bee able ouercome temptation owne free rather let v learne abace selues vtterly knowing god gracious v teache v woord inable v doo onely hold v giltie conuicted therof end wee make sheeld ignorance let bee one poynt yit notwithstanding let v stay asmuch weake selues godhath strength let v repayre vntoo certein calleth allureth v vntoo therfore let v thinke wee shalbe disapoynted cast selues downe half dead rather starke dead feete doubting lift v vp agein saint paule speaking praying god heere alonly protest discharged dewtie intent serue example faythfull vppon knowing wantes myght resort vntoo god knowing holdeth v vp continually strong hand hath giuen v fayth addeth also inuincible constancie wee stand end effect wee haue beare mynd therfore let v take warning trust owne wit presume anie whit vppon power strength wee come heare god woord desyre god lyke hath voutsafed haue woord preached vntoo v mouth man also speake vntoo v inwardly secret holy ghost meanes doctrine wee haue heard may take roote bring forth profit fruite moreouer sith wee see experience god requyreth v power abilitie auoord let v desyre supply wantes according example haue set downe alredye cleane contrarie fleshly reason wee go death neede bee forsake world owne lyfe bee found man followe still owne reason god therfore must bee fayne woorke cace remedie infirmitie although suffer gospell go death blyndfolded eye bee turned away striken downe anye thing bee verye hard thing passe abilitie man yit god stand v sort wee shall ouercome distress wee arme selues weapon giueth v say vpon knowing wee vnable walke commaundeth v doo pray giue v legges strengthen v wyse wee may ouercome doone man cannot say doctrine vnprofitable lord giueth v thing holy spirit haue nature euen make doctrine hand yit scarce one bee fonnd among hundred dooth truely without hipocrisie man could serch fynd redye burst lyke toad pryde filthinesse presume woonderously vppon themselues go seeke succour god hand yit thinke haue seeking themselues surely excessiue leaudnesse yit vyce reygneth much howsoeuer wee fare wee desir god reache hand succour v let v lerne first abace selues let v know wee haue sufficient strength owne nature must bee fayne come aboue holie spirit paule hath expressed heere yee may bee strengthened sayth power holy spirit doubt maketh comparison thing cleane contrarie long man doo ought god spirit needeth supply roome forasmuch power proceedeth god free goodnesse therin shewed v wee doo nothing selues strength wee surmyze selues haue smoke vanisheth away starke illuzion imagin god succoreth v hath eye thing else wretchednesse dooth good disposition sawe bee v cause succoreth v needes therfore saint paule sayeth heere standeth v hande bee strengthened power holy spirit free gifte sayeth acording richenesse glory wherfore magnifieth rich god goodnesse much beate downe fond opinion wherwith men besotte selues weening bring wote owne meane make themselues short wee must resort lord iesus christ haue spirituall kinred wherby god avoweth v adopted child wee haue wee must doubt whether god heare prayer seeing wee come vppon foolish rashnesse presuming vppon owne naturall reason selflyking obedience commaundement agein wee haue promis neuer deceyue v contrarywyse thinke obteyne fauour god hand meane doo run astray haue shet selues doore already therfore none excuce wee must simply hold way gospell sheweth v come vnto god wit name lord iesus christ without adding creature see doone whole world deede pester vp throng patron aduocates terme hope bee well welcome vntoo god warrant hath promised god accept deuotion offer vntoo v appoynt officer heauen court iustice world myght well bee matter course terme myght lie power iudge giue leaue listeth pleade men caces intent myght confuzion wee make aduocates owne pleasure vppon owne head heauen one wee would rob god authoritie souereintie yea wee must bethink v paule sayeth prayer supplication shall neuer aught worth vtterly vnprofitable vayne conformable god word take rule fro thence shall wee call vpon god saieth wee knowe aduenture shall knowe maner pray style speeche wee vserom c wee must come hearing thing men shall bring v owne brayne thing god commaundeth v wee must vse modestie sobrietie speake randon wee pray vntoo god simply obey word yea know prayer cheefe sacrifice god requireth whereas sayd wee must worship one goddeut c math b alonly ceremony kneeling downe deede requisite meete wee honour god body mynd bycause bee howbeit worshipping wee must acknowledge truely wee hold good thing doo wee praying wee come thither poore soules vtterly destitute thinges meete v knowing without wee bee woorse miserable sayde lawe offering sacrifyze god men must doo thing owne head follow ordinaunce insomuch forbidden take straunge fyre vse vppon aulter whereby ment figureleuit men vtterly forbeare owne deuotions intend offer thing vntoo god likewyse forbydden offer sacrifyze without saltleuit mark g thereby shewe wee ought haue sure instruction offering wee offer vp god bee sauced poudered woord without bee nother taste sauour seeyng wee adayes haue substance truth figure lawe whensoeuer wee offer prayer supplication vntoo god yeeld prayse thankes let v doo lord iesus christheb c apostle hebrewes exhorteth v serueth finish vp matter begunne morning wee must call mynd paule told v morning namely praying vntoo god wee must bee giuen wordly affection seeke god may bee glorified residue may bee appurtenaunce cause spake purposely inward man god giue v brydle aske whatsoeuer came head wee side take libertie thing giue v al owne asking would turne ruine confuzion haue lust square litle child sick folk v generally doo experyence find selues wee bee fast settled heere bylowe would fayne bee hild continually world wee hang head groueling downeward cannot lift vp much therefore doth stand v hand mark wel thing paule sheweth v sentence namely wee ought pray god renew v strengthen v holy spirit increace giftes v passing world may alwayes ame mark bee heere wayfarer end lord may auowe v child heritage kept v hath promised v bought deerely v death passion lord iesus christ heereuppon paule inferreth iesus christ may dwel hart fayth wherby sheweth without christ wee shall neuer bee made partaker one drop god grace trew god hath whole fulnesse life light rightuousnesse goodnesse head welspring vtterly hidden shall neuer able come selues wee think doo good owne inuentions deceyuing selues wee shall dig pit continually yea euen pit full hole haue spring water beholdierem c thing men gayne following inuentions make much trotting vp downe neuer neerer lord iesus christ fountayne wherout may well drawe ou fill yea wee neede make long windlass come vnto bycause offereth saying thirst come vnto drink whosoeuer drinketh liuing water giue himiohn c shall haue ynough himselfe also make flowe neighbour much lorde iesus christ th bountifully offer v benefit wee receyue god father therfore paule sayth must bee fayne dwell hart wee may bee reformed god spirit let v mark iesus christ hath full perfection goodnesse onely respect euerlasting sonne god also euen humane nature tooke v wherein became brother hath also receyued fulnesse according saying prophet esay vppon shall rest spirit wisedomeesay spirit vnderstanding spirit feare god spirit rightuousnesse spirit strength end vse neede sayd another text end distribute vntoo member wee v least drawe fulnesse fearing fountayne dry vp seeing lord iesus christ dooth gospell dayly communicate offer vntoo v thing wee want needefull saluation nought paule hauing shewed wee nothing furtherfoorth wee bee vphild god grace addeth god must bee fayne dwell hart vppon word wee haue gather first god thinking ynough remedie defaultes misdooyngs wantes hath voutsafed giue himselfe v person onely sonne told v wee bee restored former state whence father adam fell much therein wee haue excellent record goodnesse god hath onely giuen v heauen earth say thing fit v respect flyghtfull lyfe euerlasting saluation foules also hath giuen himselfe vntoo v euen giuing v lord iesus christ sayd nyenth prophet esay scripture also leadeth v thither sheweth v god giueth himselfe vntoo v wee possesse haue full fruition theruppon wee must conclude paule sayeth eyght romanes namely inasmuch god sonne hath excellence dignitie giuen vnto v shal thing else withhild fro v seeing god hath graunted himselfe f rfoorth vntoo v haue sonne dwell v shloud doubt obteyning thing ee knoweth profite behoof thinke shalbe denyed v yee see thing haue remember first place god hath shewed bountifull toowards vspsal psal b hath thought ynough put v possession good hath voutsafed become portion cup scripture sayeth vseth similitude shew man seeketh ordinary repast well appayd hath meate drinke bycause refreshed must resort vnto god haue trew foode wee must hold selues contented giueth vntoo v heerewithall let v euer beare mynd haue sayd namely wee neede sore ayre make farre fetch possessing god bycause hath knit v person lord iesus christ made partaker benefit paul setteth crawling heere world subiect misery without number seeyng long distance betweene v howe may dwell v paule addeth purposely gospel power vnite v god sonne leastwyse wee receyue fayth behoueth v consider contentes substance thing preached vntoo v concerning grace lord iesus christ onely sayd god haue offered sacrifyzce intent wee myght bee reconcyled sunnes bee wyped myght neuer come account bee short full amendes myght bee made sinnes death passion rayzed agein iustification paule sayeth fifth romanes onely thing sayd iesus christ also said head haue seene already liue owne substance tree draweth sap roote head sheadeth foorth power body haue wee secret vnion one woonderfull farre aboue order nature bycause although iesus christ bee heauen yit fayleth dwell v soothly sunne cheere v vp beames without fleeting place insomuch wee see euery morning wee bee refreshed comforted ryzing yea eue sicke folkes feele cheerlinesse though lye long beddes seeing creature onely transitorie corruptible also senslesse vnmoueable self hath notwithstanding force propertie giuen god reioyce refreshe v fashion shall lord iesus christ doo ordeyned haue fulnesse godhead dwelling himcoloss b euen meanes fayth hereof wee shall treate fully fifth chapter notwithstanding text could haue bin vnderstoode vnlesse noted thing haue briefly touched euen wit iesus christ dwelleth v fayth receyuing vnbeeleeuers doo need dwell euer still beneathe transfigure god theyr owne lyking wee see doone popedome god among sort puppet call image remeberances moreouer bycause see well dead stock stone haue made another god haue shet vp box resort liuing god deede supper lord iesus christ according institution stead abhominable masse haue brought owne head iesus christ woulde bee present among howbeeit worldiohn b whosoeuer walketh cannot stray way wee must serche examin selues narrowly wee take vayne cloke vnder name iesus christ see manie doo adayes protest themselues bee gospeller euen among spirit hereuppon saint paule addeth vvee must bee rooted grounded charitie woord charitie loue may bee taken well loue god beareth v mutuall loue wee ought beare one towardes another verie trew natiue sense saint paule heere ment haue v knit toogither spake heeretoofore god free loue towardes v sheweth fayth importeth wee haue brotherly loue one towards another holy scripture bringeth v alwayes poynt insomuch speaking full perfection good lyfe fayth goeth come charitie next vntoo end wee must begin vtter abacing selues end wee may seeke welfare god hand seeking may bee first acknowledge giueth v thing person onely sonne secondly call vppon settle fayth flee wholly refuge mercy euery man feeleth himfelf bound vntoo v exceedingly acknowledge thanksgiuing rightuousnes holynes victorye ioy glorie happinesse wee may performe thi g sayd ieremie whosoeuer glorieth let glorie lordiere f bycause woorketh ryghtuousnesse iustice mercy yee see wee must rest wholly vppon god else vertuousnesse wee seeme haue men shalbee filth dung haue wee fayth charitie must matched wee must liue euenly vpryghtly one another euery v acknowledge thus created self seeke myne priuate benefyte commoditie benefite neighbour also therfore let v absteyne fro al guile wrong outrage malice indeuer serue eche others turne according abilitie perfection good lyfe saint paule hauing spoken alredie fayth addeth wee must also bee grounded charitie say wee must haue alonly fit pang loue manie men haue must bee stedfastnesse euen holding lyfe long thing may giue greate blaze yit quayle anon behold huge building may ouerthrowen one blast wynd set vppon sure foundaton also man may set vp greate tree roote bee cut asunder come must needes fall downe hand else haue hold one ende tyme must needes wither heate sunne euen v haue greate zeale well rooted harte wilbee maske gay showe men cause saint paule exhorteth v purposely bee grounded charitie intent correct vyce louing startes fit say common thing neuerthelesse fondnesse conclu therefore saluation grounded vppon good woorkes heere treateth cause saluation nly wee ought rule lyfe agein wee knowe one onely foundation church paule sayeth hym full trustcoloss b wee must answeare bycause lord iesus christe giuen v fulnesse godhead dwelleth wee bee yit farre perfection howbeit forasmuch wee bee grounded vpon lord iesus christ wee haue steadynesse continueth life let v marke saint paule exhorteth v true stedfastnesse intent neuer bee weery wel though wee haue neuer many occasion thrust v aside euen best mynded see doo neuerthelesse take pritch men shewe themselues vnkind towardes consider well dooing men wyll requite euyll bee sore greeued become quite hart cause fewe continue feare god walke ought doo seemeth haue lost labour well agein foloweth inconuenience also wicked take occasion rush much intoo maner harmfulnesse man liue simplicitie beare wrong paciently doone vntoo hym men wyll bee dooing euery man would eate hym vp sheepe among hundred woolues easily intreated giue goodes neighbour seeme bee set spoyle euery man wyll bee catching al euer men see lea de dealing th world maketh euery man take owne share men say contrariwise told v heere wee bee rooted grounded charitie although men thrust v aside discorage v vnthankfulnesse yit wyll wee ceasse hold well dooing bicause wee haue good deepe roote paule hauing spoken good wee ought beare towardes neyghbours returneth matter fayth surely cheef poynt v knowe god auoweth v child sinnes forgiuen v taketh v ryghtuous wee haue fynd sweetnesse seruing honoring bee lifted vp fayth offer presence contrary part see men haue gone worke deede haue bin ashamed popedome say wee ought bee alwayes doubtfull saluation wee cannot haue sure beleefe ignorant sort say doctor sinagoges hold article fayth wee ought bee alwayes mamering doubtfull euen much cast men vp aduenture vntoo satan much therfore behoueth v beare well mynd doctrine conteyned heere wit wee knowe loue god beareth v lord iesus christ wyse hath witnessed v death passion dooth still dayly warrant gospell wee haue perfect knowledge shall giue v full happinesse cause sayeth end yee may learne meaning saying loue hath bin shevved v iesus christ therfore wee knowe well god loueth v inestimable mercie wherof hath giuen v good pledge person sonne wee haue bee sayeth let v inforce wittes vpward downeward let v stye aboue cloudes let v pierce centre earth let v go downe bottom deepes let v rake ouer sea land yit shall bee nothing vanitie leazing wee haue ended wyndlasses surely weee may peraduenture discourse lyke folk verie suttle haue learned vnderstanding manie thing yit shall bee substance v wee knowe god father iesus christ commeth passe meanes wee obteyne greate benefyte thing sayeth whertoo wee must hold v trew measure fayth bee bondes whosoeuer couers knowe dooth go astray though would wilfully enter intoo maze wheroutof could neuer wynd agein wherfore let v hold selues contented iesus christ vttereth gospell shall wee bee filled full sayeth paule filling euen fulnesse god sayeth say wretched folke wee bee none v coueteth knowledge naturall desyre burneth men insomuch wee shall see many consume good spare nother bodyes lyues doo get knowledge wee shall see othersome trot place place doo get knowledge men haue desyre lesse ignorant person would faine come knowledge seeyng wee bee inclyned thertoo nature let v learne trew knowledge deede science behoofefull passe world withall requisite men haue artes trade also liberall science termed good bee referred dew endes yit notwithstanding wee must come science science neuer fayle man shall haue trotted earth ouer science profyt wyll come bee vanitie sayde afore wherefore let v seeke thing iesus christ let v rest wholly swarue whit heere wee see first thing haue touched already heeretoofore namely wee knewe wel lord iesus christ wee would easly giue ouer thing according sayd third philippiansphil b paule counted former high esteemed thing losse dung end might hold iesus christ went forewarde therein tyme life yea hold armes stretched catch protesteth yee see thing wee haue marke heere wee knowe wealth world meane whyle iesus christ thrust great way agein sayd one sacrifize offered hath gotten v grace saluation yea euen euer death passion appeaseth god wrath bycause therby haue full thrust vnder foote agein sayd iesus christ onely aduocate maketh intercession v vntoo god father yit notwithstanding popedome whole warreins swarmes patron euery man hath forged owne brayne bee contented alonly apostle martirs must also haue christopher catherin night ghost neuer borne world looke whatsoeuer diuell put head cor receyued agein sayd iesus christ rightuousnesse yit neuerthelesse euery man take vpon make attonement god owne woorks therevppon sprang ground worke merit rest ageiniohn sayd iesus christ loadestarre way wherby wee must come god father finally euerlasting saluation yit needes haue whatsoeuer commeth owne imagination say mee think good seeing doo good intent god take good worth thus make god pretie fellow stoope appoyntment iacke creepe vnder sleeue pleasure see proud men whe turne away god pure truth vnto foolish inuentions pure sound thing corrupt cause thing haue bin turned vpside poperie knew iesus christ one set forth gospell shall haue profited well god may well cast away thing filth poyson deede doctrine haue sauor first syght wee see doo alwayes follow saint paul speakes second colossian wit bycause theyr dreames dotage haue showe wisdomecoloss therfore giue themselues vntoo must vnderstand trew foode god giueth v prouide v thing knoweth bee needfull v wee bee filled without thinke wee seeke uirgin marie call hir moother grace maner papist doo commonly giue hir title wee shall fynd thing want surely one would go seeke foode snatch bit bit morsel gobbet iesus christ sayth come vnto ye shal fynd haue neede according wherunto sayd al treasure wisdome knowledge inclozed himcoloss know loue god father hath shewed v person shal haue fulnesse wisdome shal neede trot heere wee shall neede go vp downe farre wyde wee shall haue wholly whatsoeuer good requisite welfare wee heare must needes wee good bewitched wee beleeue god rest wholly vppon saying without flinging abrode fashyon without making manie dig pit pleasureierem c forsake spring liuing water god hath set eye good reason wee bee ahungered athirst ly broyling owne foolish lust trot fro like woman chyld long eate char coales leuer drink water puddle tha water fayre clere spring wee fall gadding maner satan bee gre illuzions trumperie cannot content selues good lord setteth afore v must needes worse bewitched diuel hath made v stark beast let v vndestand first thing men bring v owne behalf tryfles rather illuzions satan secondly ori ture etteth iesus christ afore v nought told v wee must rest wholly vppon hold v wee come thither bycause hath fulnesse goodnesse therfore wee neede bee haled fro take greate peyne seeking thing needfull v finally wander abrode stick wholly vntoo perfect souere blisfulnesse thirdly must consider iesus christ infinit grace brought v imparted v meanes saint paule saying heere loue sendeth v wellspring though wee knew god secretes priuie rest till perswaded loue beareth v wee see man speakes god vnbeleeuers dooth greeue wote become matter heauinesse bycause conceyue nothing rigour grace fatherly goodnesse vttered vntoo v hath shewed lord iesus christ come boldly vntoo wee bee afrayd seate haue familiar accesse therin dooth v inestimable good turne one surmounteth euer wee wish world according paule setteth v downe heere yee see saying loue god importeth sayeth purposely iesus christ bycause without wee could bee beloued god let iesus christ bee yee would say let alone let v put cace wee thought vppon god wee apply wit theraboutes therwithall wee bethought v selues also wee shall fynd incomprehensible maiestie god shall swallowe v vp lyke deepe gulf agein iustice perfect wilbee much lesse possible v stand snowe abyde ageinst sunne wee come selues wee must needes see sea miserie v wit sens blynd wee bee vtterly vnfurnished vertew wee bee giuen euill wee bee hild downe vnder thraldome sin nothing v euen excellentest thinges wee thinke selues haue lothsome god therfore know twoo thing wit haue conceyued terrour god maiestie bee drowned despayre syght selues let v afterward go seeke al meanes bee let v call angel help come neuer neerer v let v take hee sayntes shee sayntes aud tytle belong v nay rather wee bee separated agein god fountayne purenesse receyue v v say wretched creature thinke intermeddle filth vnclennesse contrariwyse must needes abhorre v without cause saint paule hauing spoken heere expresly god loue intent wee myght know dooth iustly hate v long beholdeth v owne naturall state addeth immediatly loue grounded vpon bludshed lord iesus christ end spottes bee scoured away thereby wee bee clenzed wee myght bring anye thing hensfoorth god myght displease meanes wee discharged quit dettes bycause hath yeelded perfect obedience lo stubbornnesse doone away shall neuer come account bycause offered sacrifice v lo wee set free thraldome bycause hath ouercome diuell death sinne benefite lo wee day inioy victory make tryumphe wee see briefly god hath loued v iesus christ agein know must vnderstand also must make long fetch ne trubble selues vayne stying vpward fond speculation going downeward fantasticall imagination meane whyle let iesus christ alone though farre v commeth neere v yea dwelleth v haue v knit ntoo wee bee body lyuely member owne substance sith let v learne hold selues wise vntoo nothing may turne v although may tempted owne fancy shrinke away yit let v cut occasion get vpper hand fayth wee haue doone let v vnderstand god still shewe himselfe louing kindharted father towardes v iesus christ also doo dewtie shepherd towardes v wee herken voyce rest wholly vppon doubting preserue v wee shallbee safe vnder protection protesteth saying receyue giuen god fatheriohn keepe hath receyued none shall perish rayze vp agein last day let v cast selues downe maiestie good god acknowledgment faultes praying make v perceiue misery may driue v seeke good thing offereth v euen trew singlenesse fayth may wander owne fond speculation gaze abyde settled vppon word may bee leaning stocke take roote harte may make v walke purenesse eeke mercie person sonne also make v liue vprightly indifferently one another may profit therin wee may abhorre al abuse world assuring selues seeing wee haue iesus christ guyde wee cannot fayle come thither ascended alredy behalf wit euerlasting heritage hath purchased v according wee beeing made fellowheires end come perfection wherintoo gone afore v may please graunt grace onely v also people c xxi sermon sixth vppon third chapter first vppon fourth novv vntoo able doo abundantly aboue thing wee aske thinke according power vvorketh v bee prayse church iesus christ throughout generation euer amen fourth chapter therefore vvhich prisoner lord vvarne vvalkeas becommeth calling vvhervvith yee called vvith lovvelinesse meekenesse vvith pacience c god hath doone v neuer much good although wee feele selues beholden vntoo bound yeelde dew praise yit wee discharge selues dewtie free hart except wee hope holde still hereafter shewe himselfe ende wee haue knowen bee heretoofore without fayth cannot hope vnpossible god haue dew praise men handes put cace wee found god helpe neede whatsoeuer wee could wishe meane whyle wee thinke sodein brayd vanished away hand hensfoorth wee may looke hand shalbee vayne v requyre certeyne wee would come bycause wee bee pinched pressed heauinesse griefe therefore wee may holde praysing god name wee must cupple twoo thing toogither wit one syde wee bethinke v good wee haue receyued syde wee hope still alwayes bee stedfast constant purpose vntoo end neuer ceasse doo v good order paule keepeth heere saying prayse glory yeelded vntoo god vntoo sayeth vvhich able doo thing beyond asking yea beyond thinking certein heere saint paule eye backe wee haue seene god vtter infinite rich goodnesse voutsafed haue gospell message saluation published throughout world neuerthelesse quickeneth vp faythful discharge themselues cheerefully telling must mistrust god withdrawe hand though shewing himselfe liberall towardes bin away meaning god go woorke therefore wee may giue selues praysing name without stop well respect good wee haue receyued already vppon beleefe holde without euer fayling v effect matter wee haue gather vppon streyne saying let glory bee yeelded god church wherby sheweth ynough euery v doo priuately acknowledge benefites god hath bestowed vppon wee must also ioyne toogither mynd body bee well ease surely member bee addicted selfe haue regard rest god hath made church prosper number thereof multiplyed also increaced spirituall giftes onely haue receyued benefites must inforce themselues praise god also rest body much becommeth v bee knit togither holy bond whereof paule speake heereafter cause speaketh purposely church say seeyng god dooth vtter goodnesse euery man ought bee inflamed glorify bycause looke whatsoeuer dooeth neyghbours wee ought take doone selues verily eye heere myght hinder praysing god one trew consent iewes alwayes certeine disdeyne ageinst gentile bycause thought meete themselues keepe stil birthryght wrong made equall bin vtterly shaken afore likewyse gentyles perceyuing iewes bee giuen foolish bragging lawe taken end myght haue despyzed syde saint paule therefore telleth inasmuch god called brother heritaunce saluation became agree wise praysing prayse myght sound euerywhere sayeth let prayze bee yelded god yea euen euermore world world iesus christ forsomuch saint paule hath treated hertoofore grace serued guyde faythfull kingdome heauen therfore dooth good ryght say men must prayse god away also cause continewe lyfe one man throughout age yea moreouer paule ment doo v vnderstand churche bee preserued euer alwayes remayne seede world record sauation neuer bee frutelesse bee people still bee gathered toogither bee looking glasse wherin behold inestimable mercie god sheweth v lord iesus christ wee see saynt paul meaning wherby wee ought bee assured christ shall bee auaylable notwithstanding crueltie tyrantes practyzes houshold enemyes would ouerthrowe whole buylding also cause saynt paule setteth v downe name iesus christ trew wee cannot yeeld good thing howbeit saint paules meanyng doo v vnderstand text god shewing hym selfe bee father men person onely sonne ordeinyng hym make attonement last euer continue world without end insomuch wee gentlenesse among v therefore paule hath matched meekenesse lowelinesse lowelinesse moother meekenesse last setteth downe pacience sufferance bearing long men infirmity vyces wee needes serche parcell meale whatsoeuer wee shall see amisse euery man surely shall haue occasion reiect great small man blemished euill haue wee abated pryde spake thereuppon conformed selues meekenesse gentlenesse wee fynd harte bee warned beare others none v hindred infirmity abyde make account men brother shall church meane abyde alwayes good plyght hereuppon paule addeth wee intend keepe vnitie spirit wee must liue toogither peace wee know fyre strife kindled euery man would haue enemyes drowned bottom hell soone wee giue brydle affection wee fall spyting man man groweth hartburning grudge ageinst v followeth parttaking church breache concord therfore wee desyre bee one wee eedes must wee god child let v take good heede satan set oddes variance among v let v bee quiet indeuer preuent trubbles wee see likelyhood yee see ought obserue wee mynde helpe neyghbours bryng passe god may bee honored among v one accord heere wee haue mark first saint paule speaking lowelinesse meekenesse pacience warneth v ware euery man brydle diuell shall alwayes haue easie accesse entrance intoo v trubble v sayd euery v shall fynd disease ambition rooted none v would fayne beare coutenace superioritie leastwyse till god haue layed hand vppon holie spirit beaten downe al pryde made leane take mee followe owne naturall sway surely euer hygh mynded thy wil conteted except bee exalted much made saint paule therfore thought good warne v hereof end learne mi ke vyce indeuer rid selues thing wil bee doone easly hard battell howsoeuer world go wee must giue ouer till wee haue gotten much aduauntage selues knowe nothing v esteemed rather thinketh bee excellentest ought tyme hath sifted examined himselfe throughly bee ashamed abashed owne wretchednesse proof therof haue throughly vewed al wee weene selues haue wherwith win v fauour dignitie reputation among men certaynly wee shall fynd euery whit free gift god much neede haue wee humble selues seing god byndeth v vntoo hast thou sayth paul boast aboue men1 cor b chalendge thine certain god hath giue thee therfore honour thing thou canst doo long thou art puffed vp pryde considering al vertues wee myght bee praysed record god goodnesse hath shewed louing father towards v hath pleased haue v come neere fashion ought make v cast downe eye walk meeldnesse wee compare vertues vyces surely wee shall fynd much wherwith beate downe horne wherfore set vp man hath cast card throughly shall perceyue although haue good zele serue god yit dooth llmp halt still behalf hath vertue blemished spot alwaies one thing put mynd ought bee proud agein vyces euer mo nuber great way tha vertues shall wee doo ashamed selues doo sort defyle holie thing wee mingle owne deformity wyse gift god spirit therfore dooth moste excell hath cause bee lowely much bound vnto god yee see esteemed peerlesse perles exalted little woorse angel ought alwayes brydle themselues short knowing little blemish ought bee taken greeuouser haue receyued great gift ne excellent besy also vyces v euen selues sayd afore bee good v god hath giuen v owne mere freebestowed mercie therfore v presume wee must impute euill selues hee maketh comparison sone beate downe ouerweening wherwith puffed vp deceyued excelletest sort al haue wherof vaunt theselues shall meaner sort doo dispyzed worldward haue nothing set themselues withall fyght ageinst nature needes vaunt themselues bee short man shall alwayes fynd auncient prouerb trew knoweth best esteeme least wee must passe yit must vnderstand thing selues doo aught thing woorth good god hath put intoo v ought serue teach v meeknesse wee know well shall wee bee throughly humbled say trew lowlynesse humilitie make fayre face pretend myld countenance many doo speake gently louingly looke rufully yit ceasse bee full pryd toades within short humility importeth meekenesse pulleth v downe selues suffereth v aduaunce selues degree honour seeke estimation aboue neyghbours haue told wee shall neuer bee meeke neuer haue gentlenesse myldnesse v vntill wee bee brought lowe pryde doth euer hold scorne world wee see also ouerweening stand owne conceyt beleeuing themselues bee well woorthy deserue bee exalted aboue common aray doo therewithall become straunge insomuch men dare scarce looke vppon thrust away one driue away another great way therefore wee must haue learned humble selues end wee imbrace trew brother specially sith wee knowe wee haue neede bee borne handes behold sayd lord iesus christ dooth easely let v come vntoo himmath bycause tempted made lyke vntoo v beareth weakenesse infirmity bycause hath experience certeyn lord vyce welspring goodnesse yit notwithstanding intent wee syde sticke resort familiarly end wee bee heard god father sake sayd compassion vshebr bycause felt man man infirmity howbeit without spot sinne sayde afore shall wee doo wee haue foolishe beliefe wee bee throughly perfit seeing pryde rooted nature shall wee pitie wee see myserie wee consider first wee bee better woorth let v marke well bee kyndharted gentle freendly pryde must first bee beaten downe v furthermore let v marke also kinde heartednesse mother pacience continuall bringer foorth frute wee bee sterne signe crueltie v wee wild beast therby also conuicted pryde ouerweening haue well learned lesson paule copyeth v heere deede wee ought bee greeued fault neighbour wee must feede flattery common fashion world yit must zeale bee measured must beare great sort selues also haue neede bee borne withall bee hastier folkes would bee v alwayes kepe naturall vprightnesse dooing thing neighbour wee would haue doone selues summe lawe prophet lord iesus christ sayeth yee see zeale ought bee mingled kynd hartednessemath bee sauced altoogither vineger come wilbee taste sauour therfore must haue oyle put vntoo must bee temperature correction sweeten withal bee ouer rigorous bee short paule ment shewe v heere although ought bolster euill rather moued godly zeale condemne deserue yit notwithstanding must reiect weakelings though vtter reprobate castawayes labour winne god according wee haue seene already way ought bee obserned two euill extremity looke whatsoeuer god hath ordeyned holy spirite alwayes bee found bee euery man welfare one euill customes man cannot wel taken world except flatter intendeth mainteyne must play blinkard shut eye see number thing freends woorthy blame yit meane silence secret betraying see wee pretend loue high way destruction wholly hardened naughtinesse yit notwithstanding wheras ought waken else set looking glasse might behold leaudenesse ashamed wee winke steade dooing euery v dooth coke cloketh thing ought bee sharpely rebuked insomuch flattery better playsters ease sore meane whyle feede roote within euill extremitie wee bee rigorous euery little fault ynough make v storme sith wee shall neuer haue spirit meekenesse aforesayd wee bee guided gouerned god spirit sayd afore heerby man may see iudge certeyne pryde lurking within v wherethrough take much vpon selues short neuer ouer great rigour without crueltie crueltie without pryde whosoeuer dispyzeth neighbor setteth much ca beare nothing terribly sterne al sinnes opinion vnpardonable sheweth also manhood humanitie much therfore doth stand v hand beare mynd paule sheweth v heere forgiue forbeare allowe men vice sayd afore haue leaue doo euill without rebuking wee paciently rebuke men fault bee sory dooing dewtie forget also beare frayltie weakenesse neighbour shame ne stryke intoo eauinesse fall dispayre see forbearing forgiuing hand thing wee ought beare mind cause paule addeth men beare one another charitie loue sh uld say forasmuch bee brother toogither neede none rule make v well kind hearted also pacient lowely proof therof sayeth thirteenth first epistle corinthians1 cor b charitie hath three thing first gentle kind hearted secondly moueth v lowely meeke thirdly pacient suffreth al thing three quality paule attributeth vntoo louingnesse wee demaund rule holy lifecoloss c scripture telleth v loue full performaunce therof1 tim bycause bond perfection end fulfilling lawe lo text doo teach v charitie agein lord also intending conclude doctrine lawmath setteth downe twoo poynts namely wee loue hart mynd power strength neyghbours selues wee thinke bee allowed god charitie reigne v wee deceyue selues world may like well v whole lyfe shall bee vtterly lothsome god vntill charitie bee setled harte shee gouerne v wee tend alwayes vntoo hir yea woorke woorkes hir seeing loue trew perfection faithfull god child let v see importeth man brag hath meane whyle haue nother lowlinesse gentlenesse pacience maketh holy ghost lyer without cause sheweth betokened charitie loue hath set downe bare woord sayd yee charitable hath also shewed v ment namely first wee must beate downe pride beguyleth v maketh v dosse horne ageinst god insomuch right hard v bee lowely mynded towardes men wee cannot hold selues meekely obedience vnder god let v fyght wyse pryde may bee corrected v therwithall inforce selues alwayes humilitie wee may bee kynd harted fellowlyke faythfull cannot bee doone bearing one another heathen men skill say wee wit discretion see vyces selues bee pacient toward others haue neede bee borne withall selfe doo lyke folkes partially doo deale consideration alone ought tame v sufficiently though nother lawe gospell wherefore asmuch wee knowe charitie importeth three thing let v learne bee pacient onely wrong doone v also wee see neyghbours bee weake feeble yit come perfection requisite though bee well foreward settled god woord wee would wishe yit let v pitie meekenesse indeuer vse correction towards nother vyces may bee nurrished party themselues bee cast despayre thus yee see wee haue mark vppon streyne heervppon saint paule inferreth haue touched heertoofore wee must keepe vnitie spirit bond peace setteth heere vnitie spirit marke requisyte church flocke god insomuch wee bee oddes among selues wee bee oddes god therewithall sheweth v thing wee haue seene breefly wee bee one among selues god disclaymeth v telleth v wee belong vntoo vnitie therfore thing ought bee much set adayes seeing meane respect whereof wee bee acknowledged god child trew wicked vnbeleeuers haue confederacy linked one another streyter allyance bee found world euen euill dooings doo bynd one another though fast sowed toogither bycause perceyue themselues bee hampered insomuch hath conspyred mischeef another naughtipacke bee afrayd feare bond cannot bee broken howbeeit saint paule presupposeth heere faythfull one god declare anon cause sheweth vnitie may bee kept sayeth bond peace fyre kindled soone quencht ageine wee imagin wee cast selues intoo chafe wee come selues agein shall bee whist still hand agein diuell dooth set foote stryfe contention turneth deadly sting men inuenimed although shewe outwardly ne cast vp rage froth yit notwithstanding hartbyting hartburning lurke still within hath bin anie debate therfore sayd let v thinke anie trubble stirred vp wilbee pacifyed soone wee would haue consideration wherof saint paule telleth v church shall perishe euery turning hand fyre wee continue quiet shun stryfe debate sheweth maner attonement vnion hath spoken saying one god one fayth one baptime one hope vvheruntoo vvee bee called one god father lord iesus christ vvho aboue v v requisite bee added shewe peace shall neuer bee good allowed god rather accursed vnlesse haue good groundwoorke peace wee would adayes linke papistes wee bee fayne forsake pure doctrine gospell bend selues ageinst god defyle selues manner filthinesse abhomination better whole world sunke seeke peace much wee bee fayne doo respect turkes none seeketh wrappe v destruction plucke v away god bee attonement among v wee needes inioy fleshly lust craueth confuzion bee uerely oftentymes god seruantes accuzed conspiracie spytefull malice stubbornnesse bycause cannot fynd harte consent anie wickednesse insomuch authoritie credit would vsurp manner tyrannie hinder preaching god woord ought bee deuyze list owne brayne albeeit bee preaching still yit shall bee free according god woord god seruantes bee driuen needes must trubbled satan champion shalbe blamed diffamed euerywhere folke alwayes doo office turning good intoo euill false reportes flaunders howsoeuer world go peace commendable doo h ioyne v toogither god reigneth ouer v wee become one without shalbee cursednesse yee see saint paule calleth v backe heere god lord iesus christ vntoo fayth gospell baptim shewe ought agree among selues wee haue heere twoo poyntes beare mynd one seeking attonement men wee must alwayes haue eye vppon god wee bee come wee must bee setled thing wee must euer haue care generall trew peace bee desyred verye name estimation among men yit wee must shroud selues vnder shadow peace separate selues god end wee make warre ageinst proclayme v bee enemyes cause sayd wee must bee continuall battell wicked asmuch serue satan wil ceasse fyght ageinst god saluation therfore wee must bee cold negligent behalf zelous setting selues ageinst insomuch although bee honour credit yit let v abhorre sayd psalme let vntoo v stinking lothsome thinges full filth vncleannesse though boast neuer somuch greatnesse yit let v assure selues much better drowned brauerie bottom hell exalt themselues ageinst god yee see must esteeme greatest men world better woormes dare bend horne ageinst god consequently wee haue peace seeing wee bee fayne forsake god pleasure sayd afore better world turned vpsyde downe bee wee knit toogither god let v followe rule giuen v heere wit bee abaced selues world may perceyue myldnesse loftinesse v set v oddes lyke kyndhartednesse bringeth pacience also let v condemne men vyces yit labour alwayes drawe party vntoo god win vntoo rather set sharpnesse let v come woords couched heere paule hee sayeth one bodie one spirit bee called one hope calling first formest sheweth v vppon condition bee called god wit bee knot among v myght shewe wee bee deede bodie lord iesus christ ynough v cast vp togither lyke heape stone wee must bee knit toogither hartie good lyke sayd one hart one mynd among faythfull primitiue churchactes must appere among v day saint paule telling v wee one spirit one bodie meaneth wee bee made one man iesus christ iesus christ well fynd hart communicate name companie faythfull ende drawe v sayd affection liuing toogither concord brotherly loue euen attonement wee may bee brother say knit toogither finger hand without wee neuer shewe wee bee desyrous atteyne kingdome heauen therfore thing ment twoo woords bodie spirit trew god spirit gouerneth v reformeth affection wyse mynds knit toogither howsoeuer cace stand saint paul ment declare whole bodie faythfull one man man put foorth wee must bee linked toogither euery man office calling short must one shalbe declared anone length forasmuch none gouerne v iesus christ wee must need bee made one man soothly wee knowe thing sayd adam eue maryed folk wyues must also bee accomplished church churche bone lord iesus christ bone flesh flesh soo mariage betwixt bee knit togither sonne god reason also agree amog selues one vnion extend al whole bodie vnpossible lord iesus christ reigne ouer v yit notwithstanding wee bee diuyded among selues seing one let therfore serue first poynt saint paule stirre v vp better heruntoo telleth v wee bee called vntoo inheritance saying sheweth much holyer attonement betweene v betweene naturall brother world although bee borne one father one moother bee one blud yit notwithstanding eueryman shift anon inheritance parted among brother seeme separated asunder naturall bond among half broken wee haue inheritance cannot broken man cannot say haue belongeth mee get mee away dwell alone self inheritance god himselfe moreouer heauenly lyfe purchaced v lord iesus christ wherintoo himselfe gone afore v gather v thither seeing wee bee called one selfsame inheritance v shrink asyde brother one gaue ouer part kingdome heauen wee woulde abhorre blasphemie man demaund anie v whether woulde renounce part paradyce would make heares stand vp vppon head meane euen haue feare god al dout wicked monstrous beast flush blasphemie mouth renounce theyr saluation yee ask man well aduyzed hee alwayes abhorre detest yit notwithstanding verye deede wee go shet selues gate barre selues comming kingdome god wee wype awaye hope giuen v gospell wee bee knit toogither among selues througly printed hart surely would bee another maner freendship brotherlinesse among v men see maner meekenesse meeldnesse pacientnesse though wee haue hithertoo bin misaduyzed yit much better take warning late neuer wherfore let v lerne doctrine saint paules whensoeuer bee prouoked displeasure wee seeme haue cause reiect one leaue another separate selues hir must vnderstand haue one hope kingdome heauen iesus christ head calleth v vntoo condition set afore v without wee cannot come wee must shew truely deed wee make account partaker gospell v brother though owne flesh blud also bee ioyned toogither finger one hand sayd afore heeruppon paule going foreward doctrine sayth one lord certeyne heerby meaneth one god hath soueraigne dominion ouer v maister keepe v vnitie1 cor bycause cannot abyde shoul bee od twelfth chapter first epistle corinthian paule sayth one god shewe seruice wee owe vnto god specially graunting v gift wherwith edifie churche attributing souereyntie vntoo god text v wit cannot serue god vnlesse wee bee vnitie among selues although mortall man variable chaunge mynd morning night yit haue discord house broyle ryse strife cannot away shall god doorom g god peace nameth scripture seeing wil haue v gather toogither vnder telleth vs1 cor f sitteth among v wee bee house thinke wee wee wynd intoo trouble contention skirmishingsphil b hurliburlies heat v bee fayne transfigure chaunge nature let v imagine deny paule sayeth shal bee fayne cut v rotten member shewe wee belong vntoo seeth wee come nothing neere therfore let v resort sayd souereintie dominion god hath ouer v intent alay strife variance satan shal indeuer rayze vp among v seruants although disconteted another haue hartburning grudge thing among selues doo neuerthelesse brydle selues loue mayster agree agein among selues shal cace concerneth pleasing god paule declareth effect wee bee wayward beare nothing fall euery small light occasion token onely wee dispyze men also rebell ageinst god lothe yeeld hym subiection thus yee see effect haue consider vpon saying addeth one faith one baptim one god father lord iesus christ saying one fayth shew wee haue one common treasure euen world hath spoken already heritage wee hope warranted v heauen though bee manifested v yit pledge endlesse lyfe gospell haue wee common toogither seeyng faythfull forsake one anothers company surely gospell bee good torne peeces wee must alwayes wey well woord one paule hath couched heere often repeted saying one hope calling hereby sheweth wee go breake disperse kingdome heauen much v wee liue concord sayd one god heawing hope saluation peeces wee cannot suffer god gouerne v holde v vnder protection sayeth one fayth surely long v gospell torne peeces gobbet rent fitter say cannot agree brother beare gently paciently commannded heeretoofore thing whereuntto god calleth v wee ought profit selues dubble one way abhorring diuersities opinion looking well selues wee haue one fayth hart one confession mouth faythfull doo contrarie one another certeine shewe sufficiently haue gospell side least one part must needes erre truth god trew erewhyles may well happen v shall conceyue one selfsame thing cace paule shewes v remedie sure god hath reuealed truth vntoo hold himselfe quiet pray god leade yit meane whyle behoueth v bee fully resolued article fayth agree toogither euery v bee demaunded seuerally may shew holdeth none thing generall beliefe church first poynt wee haue marke paules telling v one fayth howbeit fayth one bycause men haue found meanes brayne vnite themselues toogither god must bee fayne bryng bycause cannot come thither abyde one minute except god strengthen truth must need bee interchaungeable bond betweene fayth gospell lyke gospell wherof god author one fayth also must bee one also touching doctrine ynough v confesse god altoogither one mouth must also teache v holde selues linked toogither one vnitie euery v doo trauell neyghbours benefite consider wherin wee may serue turne apply selues faythfully thervnto bearing weake honoring haue receyued largely god giftes wee making none account selues wee may atteyne hyghnesse wheruntoo god calleth v wee may bee parttakers glory wee haue humbled selues body vnlesse needes turne away yee see reason god father onely hath created v hath begotten v agein gospell bycause hath shed grace vppon v sayd agein aboue yee see meane wherby god linketh v one another casting beames sunne beames heauen wee must needes come toogither intoo one sith wee know whence thing come belong spirituall lyfe namely god gift towardes v scatter v sunder rather gather v toogither intoo one body last wordes doo yit better lay open mynd paule namely god v euery v know god dooth much grace honourhebr b take house dwell excuce v wee bee variance hatred euery man would first saint iohn lord iesus hath bin lyfe men creation world howbeeit forasmuch men haue excellent priuilege bruce beast sayd lyfe lyght heere cace concerneth spirituall state church wheras adam race corrupted accursed nature god hath sholed v vou safing chooze v end shewe ioyned vnto much streyter holyer bond tha rest mortall men haue first birth ioyning spoken theiohn xvii saint iohn sayd holie father sanctify thou haue sanctifyed self may become one v thou one lord iesus protesteth speak th world retinew heritage letteth go destruction haue bodie churhe bee truly knit toogither may bee doone deede appeereth wee set asunder nerest v think euery man wee considered god hath reformed v holie spirit giuen v special lyfe grace shew self v holie spirit vtter power v co idered thinke although wander world euery v put asunder neyghbours according necessitie present lyfe yit must let v ioyned vnder lord iesus christ none v bee wedded owne profit none v loue self hee despyze brother suffer selues bee gathered toogither vnder maystership god forasmuch dwelleth v also must shew dooings wee bee desyrous bee one power grace hath spred euerywhere therfore wee see saint paule exhorteth fayne breath strength intoo thing bothe aboue beneathe according sayd psalmepsal withdraweth spirit thing trubbled finally turne intoo nothing anie brute beaste anie tree earth anie bird aire anie common accord shewe dooyngs wee bee trew body lord iesus christ hauing head e god aspyre vnto desyring nothing bee one himiohn alledged euen text iohn confirme matter yit better sayeth euery v hath auaylable profit furtherance brother therwithall bee contented borrowe men suffer himselfe bee helped succored handes according hee see himselfe haue neede thereof serueth bring v backe agein thing wee haue seene afore namely wee shall neuer haue agreement among v without humilitie meekenesse wee see wherat paule amed handleth matter xii chapter first epistle corinthian taketh similitude man body2 co b shewe wee bee farre wittes euery v despyzeth neyghbours wedded himselfe sayeth member limmes haue particular vnderstanding themselues hande hath wit conceyue reason office haue finger fastened yit legges feete part bodye hath priuate vnderstanding selfe yit notwithstanding hand dooth willingly acknowledge selfe bound serue rest body neuer refuzeth doo bee ache disease bee neede alwayes hand walking syde thother vp downe continually occupyed feete also without hauing vnderstanding onely secret selfmouing nature skill beare vp rest body neuer looth doo greeued lykewise hand disdeyneth borrowe helpe member knowing full well able mainteine selfe alone lo interchaungable companionship among member body hath god called v haue v bec one iesus christ hath bin sayd afore dooth followe euery v bee whole body himselfe wee see contrarie part god hath dealt vntoo euery man portion vntoo generall bond hold v toogither concord intent wee bee puffed vp fond ouerweening say haue yee claime say haue mine owne yee hold thinges mere free gift god therfore cast downe heades euery one consider none god ought haue preheminence yee must learne stoope hold selues contented euery man degree yee labour indeuer serue neyghbours al whole commonaltie body church howbeeit saint paule addeth moreouer according meazure christ according vntoo haue declared wit shal fynd perfection man aliue euery man hath neede bee succored respect common lyfe trew lord sheweth v aforehand hold v linked toogither bycause wee would bee fleeting separate selues asunder euery v cannot bee baker euery toogither meane accordingly also wee haue seene first chapter office gather thing toogither heauen earth scattered asunder let v marke asmuch god hath giuen men perfection euery one v lyue alone wee must cling toogither peace concord certeine god could well haue made v perfect hand nothing haue wanted v nigard inriching v good farre foorth knoweth bee behoof seeing infirmitie v dooth god knit v shall bee indeuer discharge duetie seruing neyghbours sayd afore end god giftes alwayes edifye one another god temple may gr among v bee still rered full perfection yee see wee ought bestowe spirituall giftes wee haue receyued god hand cause also sayd know gospellluke b ought shewe conuersation whole lyfe bee child lyght blynd wretch wander darknesse wherfore let v learne make god giftes auaylable wyse may bee glorifyed respect mention made expresly meazure intent wee alledge excuce man man gaue v good example standeth vppon commendation euery v beares hymfelf hand would perswade world beleeue excellent yit meane whyle wee consider god hath bound v dubble voutsafing shewe large bountifulnesse toowardes v set v hygher degree neyghbours therfore let v bethinke v better generally particularly wee haue doone generally wee haue gospell freely preached heere among v wee ought vniuersally bee burning cresset shew way saluationiohn particularly discharging euery man owne duetie wee giue cause stumbling neyghbours rather indeuer drawe v aloofe god truth also take peyne confirme put foreward god hath set alredie good trade ryght way ala men discharge themselues ill according man hath excellenter giftes needes ouermayster others bee woorshipped idoll meane whyle vnion broken manner handes yit sayd afore impossible linke toogither brotherly concord conforming selues church owne member without impossible v bee truely linked one yit yee shall see euery man couets bee estimation agein commeth edifying others doo cleane contrarie saint paule telleth v heere fourteenth fifteenth romansrom sheweth wee must deale strong man see another man weake little ought vtter strength broozing neyghbour ought rather beare vp say little child lead breake armes legges running hastily another man much stronger would needes tyre mee vnder colour hee lustyer trying abilitie force ageinst mee meete bee cast downe therfore wee must sayd haue care fashyon selues wyse brother stronger sort doo shoulder neyghbours feeble weake vexe laboring ouercrop forceezech c ne doo prophet ezechiell vpbraydeth namely abuse corage strength sort goat dosse horne ageinst sillie lambes haue none intent bee meeke thing wee ought doo wherfrom wee bee farre also certein citie geneua ought generally bee burning cresset giue lyght yit farre gospell appereth world goeth v report mee yisterdayes dealing must need speake concealed pulpet meane whyle countrifolke make report stretes yea giue iudgment much blame seing little child sing say rank traytour god peopleesay c say fellowes play dumb doggs goldsmith make crosse chalice bee punished deserueth man doo make thing serueth popish superstition shal bee abidden marchantman sell bead shall haue punishment worthie man sell chesibles awbes trinket masse shalbe suffered borne neuerthelesse hath bin doone whose name euen ought brydle others punish offended place place dedicated consecrated god executing iustis yit notwithstanding perchaunce bee sayd done ouersyght beeleeue partie bin well aduyzed surely would haue kept dooing vnlawfull vtterly vnexcusable deede therfore let v beware let v say beware suffer selues bee blynded fashyon satan rocked aslepe wee consider told v namely wee haue receyued anie grace gift god hand wee must set store put vse god may bee glorifyed church furthered else wee shall haue dreafull account make giuing cause offence weake bin better filthie trash bin consumed hundred tymes fyre haue bin brought foorth open place syght lye wayt v farre truthe wee knowe well ynough manie watch v seeke nothing spye cause speake euill v mocke v labour wee bee woorthie blaspheme god name therfore man haue ouershot good bee warned may take better heede hereafter wee knowing god hath bound v deeply vntoo exalting v dooing ageinst labour fashyon selues purenesse lord iesus christ lyke sanctified behalf also let v bee holy namely grace power holy spirit let holynesse consecrated doctrine gospeliohn c sayd another place intendeth shew coniunction hath taken vppon mankynd proper v respect humane nature also respect spirit bycause maketh take place v man styll yit wit wee bone bone flesh flesh bee created substance power holy spirit maketh substance body blud flowe downe vntoo v wherwith fylled insomuch wee haue onely meate eate also drinke drinke sufficient content v withall condicionally wee consider benefites lustes affection hinder vniting vntoo god wee continue hope giuen v vntill beyng taken world wee inioy euerlasting rest hath purchaced v may please graunt grace onely v also people nation earth c xxv sermon fifth vppon fourth chapter hath giuen apostle prophet euangelistes shepherdes teacher reparation sainctes vvoorke administration edifying body christ wee haue seene heertoofore lord iesus christ hath withdrawen power farre v though bee exalted aboue heauens greate distance betwixt v respect absence body world yit doo wee finde alwayes present power holy spirit meanes dooth fill thing paule sheweth maner filling intent euery faythful man al lowlinesse serue owne turne giftes grace hath pleased lord bestowe vppon hath set church gouerne syde haue receyued larger measure aduaunce themselues drawe alone themselues indeuer doo seruice common benefyte saluation welfare god child summe therfore paule mynded say iesus christ hauing rich hath delt therof vntoo euery v part partlyke leastwyse wee bee throughly perfect ment hath distributed measure1 cor b deede order hath set church sheweth prophetes1 cor teacher euangelistes dooth follow christ intendeth distribute giftes certeine measure theruppon wee haue conclude presumeth surmizeth hath requisite dooth foully deceyue twoo wayes man hath receyued perfection hath neede profit still brother one poynt agein excellentest others bound doo good thing god hath comitted charge trust pa n contrary part meaner ignorant sort must enuye go lerning wisdome bycause iesus christes haue must bee seeing haue church gouerned meanes men wee see wherat prophet amed namely wee suffer selues bee filled spirituall giftes belong saluation none v refuze bee taught meanes men let v belyke fantasticall person would haue god send reuelation heauen myght haue neede preaching reading let v bee caryed away foolish ouerweening let v great small submit selues soberly order lord iesus christ hath set haue greate skill well seene thee holy scripture haue gift teaching streyne themselues serue whole church bee bound dooiohn b end hath god aduaunced aboue others meaner sort ignorant bee enuious see selues haue lyke portion lawe wee must keepe without breaking good sooth set downe souereine authoritie sonne god men hygh mynded many would shake yoke haue doo would euery man say bee taught fellowe seeyng wee haue holy scripture among v ought wee fetch thence whatsoeuer meete v know one man bee preferred rest company thus would bee horrible disorder churche man would submit himselfe bee taught man would bee learner knoweth bee necessarie v moreouer saint paule addeth must serue v little tyme wee must continew tyme lyfe added yit thing see man myght say ought deede coforme selues rule god giueth v howbeit must
