set foreward put cace wee good abilitie capacitie learne behoofe within twoo three yeeres space yit wee fickle headed euery v would bee starting way wee hild backe therfore god voutsafyng haue woord preached vntoo v euen dying day serueth make fayth stedfast yit greater necessitie thinke themselues forewardest sift themselues throughly shall fynd themselues yit farre marke runne atphil c therfore standeth v vppon bee strengthened dayly haue lyght fayth increaced maner day see grow still bryghter bryghter vntoo hygh noone must profit still till daysonne ryghtuousenesse appeere vntoo v trew men stout harted number beleeue bycause bee contented assishnesse yee shall see great sort proud presumptuous bycause haue studyed three fower latin word owne seeming passe greatest doctor world surely also doo begin study science beare themselues hand bee alredy come perfection yit haue scarsely entered lyke cace handy craftes much none bold blynd bayard sticketh lesse al thing man hath greatly profited also lyghtheaded christias get saying scripture theyr tunges end behold bee ow seeming half angel neuer passe profiting apply whole indeuer learne stil god schoole doo fynd themselues behynd hand ten twenty yeeres end howsoeuer world go let v marke well apostle sayeth heere god haue v trayned gospell twoo three yeeres haue v go wee liued hundred yeeres vpward world yit must wee bee schollers still wisdome knowe yit come neere perfection wee neede go foreward still heeruppon wee must euery v part stirre vp spurre foorth selues therwithall god must bee gracious v alwayes redy throughly perfected wee shall see cause dooth iohn call old men young men flower age intent submit themselues obedience gospell yee old men1 iohn b come heare tyme sayth speaking lord iesus christ appeered young man little child learne knowe yee haue father heauen stronger sort know yee wherin strength lyeth bee short paule sheweth v heere god child must humble submit themselues instruction teaching day day yeere yeere consider bee yit come whyther woulde purpose dooth adde vntill wee bee knit toogither vnitie fayth forasmuch wee myght quyte start away brydle could holde v backe necessitie constreyned v haue shewed already morning therfore paule telleth v wee bee yit come poynt fantasticall person puffed vp vayne ouerweening doo thinke themselues bee come vntoo though wanted nothing paule sayth wee yit trew wee ought indeuer bee one haue shewed already without concord bee nother church religion among v nother god honored serued neuerthelesse wee doo go ward still vntoo concord asmath wee doo vertues long wee liue world wee alwayes go still according whervntoo lyfe vayne named race way1 tim b appoynted v god maner dooth speake vntoo v vnitie fayth christian ought varye one another maynteyne contrary opinion whyle trade profiting paule sheweth fayth cannot bee one vntill bee well settled alwayes bee imperfection infirmity alwayes bee cloudes ignorance therefore wee must keepe marke set v downe heere furthermore wee must marke well paule addeth concerning knowing sonne god therein sheweth v summe fayth wander fro knowe iesus christ power benefites bringeth v trew perfectnesse fayth therfore said notable poynt wee see wretched world hath bin misseledde beguyled heretoofore still popedome haue deuoutnesse torment themselues greatly take paynes inquyre alwayes full hartbytings alwayes full questioning yit still sort paule reporteth bee euer learning tim b neuer whit wyzer paule speaketh hypocrite despyze simplicitie gospell turne away iesus christ follow theyr owne foolishe inuentions haue speculation eyther syde take payne ynough yit shall neuer bee wyzercoloss inasmuch treasure wisedome vnderstanding layd vp iesus christ wee must ame onely shall wee fynde whole substaunce saluation wee knowe iesus christ giuen v god father1 cor b reconcyle v death passion wee know onely wee must seeke ryghtuousnesse wee knowe wee bee washed spot vnclenenesse blud hath made satisfaction dettes wherin wee indetted holy spirit hath sanctifyed v dedicated v eruice god1 iohn aduocate make v fynde fauour prayer supplication say w e knowe wee may despyze thing sort thinke themselues know haue imagined without certeintie cause therfore dooth paule adde heere expresly knowing sonne god end defyne better woord fayth importeth runneth roundly ynough men mouthes euery man say beleeueth meane men vaunt themselues full mouth bee pillers church good catholikes may bee world see well ynough bee demaunded faith stop short say perchaunce beleeue god yea turkes papistes say yit condemne turkes bycause know beleefe much bee sayd papist wherin differ wee wee say call selues christian knowing god hath sent v iesus christ leade v vp hygher wee bee sure bycause father lay sinnes charge receyueth v intoo fauour owne free goodnesse accepting v ryghtuous wee condemne selues trew repentance seeke welfare iesus christ acknowledging nothing v vtter cursednesse yee see lord iesus christ marke whyte wherat wee ame man shoote long bowe crosse bowe gunne haue mark white discharge aduenture way way shooting euen standes cace al ame lord iesus christ doo roue intangle selues many pecke trubbles wee bee euer daunger bee misledde de eiued men wee knowe iesus christ settle whole contentation hym assuring selues whole summe fayth saint paule addeth yit age perfection true accomplishment wherby doth v wit haue touched alredy long wee liue world wee must still growe go foreward knowing still manie infirmity v wee bee yit come full greatnesse yit therfore bee sayd wee bee litle child still adde anon setteth downe three degree age first infanc e chyldhod secondly yeeres aboue twelue bee yit discretion skill gouerne selues tyme wee must still profit man come age fortie yeeres cheefe state tyme ought haue trade bodie mynd wheron stay rest wee must profit still euen threescore yeeres speake similitude saint paule setteth downe heere first therfore sayth wee must herken gospell till wee bee come full age death sayeth heere wee must count yeeres manner men man past fiftie seeming decayeth sens wit saint paule sayth wee shall neuer bee full growth till wee bee rid bodie spirituall age christian bee gone world let v see manner one wee bee since wee beganne profit gospell wee bee lyke chylde halfe man past fifteene yeere old perhappes past twentie yit ceasseth learne styl dayly hath needde sure although haue studied good whyle yit come last step hath gotten settled stayed iudgment requisite howbeeit may well come passe child twentie yeeres shall haue science finger endes wherein hath bin trayned instructed yit shall bee neuerthelesse lyght headed nother shall haue skyll apply vse bycause yit rype lyke greene corne lyke vyneyard make fayre show good vintage grape yit rype euen age cause saint paule sayth similitude long christian alyue although threescore yea foure score fyue score yeeres old yit must bee still lyke child chyldren wit young stripling age profite1 cor doo willingly submit suffer themselues bee gouerned bycause knowe well bee yit rype discretion neuerthelesse saynt paule telleth v wee must bee lyke lyttle babe haue yit nother wit discretion1 cor b scarsely yit discerne betweene good bad first formest therfore wee must beare lesson well mynd wee haue seene tryed neuer much world traueled place place bin exercyzed manye affayres though thinke selues politikest world yit wee wyse wee neede learne heere cace concerneth god wisdome passeth wit man wee may bee commended ynough much world yit wee shall know thing part1 cor c therfore let v deceyue selues therfore away fond ouerweening thinke selues wyse ynough spake euen able teathe others let v continew scollers still although iesus christ haue appoynted certein bee leader guydes shewe men way yit dooth follow bee wyse must bee learner well rest speaketh must take instruction man shall neuer meete declare god vntoo men except learne dayly thing whiche wee haue beare mynde wee must bee throughly perswaded wee profit selues wee go lyke seacrabbes go foreward doctrine saluation vaunt neuer much taught god schoole doo vndoubtedly go backe therfore let v beware wyse wee fall asleepe stand still stay though bee learned let v consider lyfe lykened way thervppon learne go foreward still gayne alwayes ground spurre etch foorth insomuch forecast driueth burning couet usnesse ought wee syde bee greatly ashamed wee make prouision god woord old age seeing wee perceyue much feeblenesse sin still v wee labour bee continually still inlyghtened euen tyll daysonne ryghtuousnesse lord iesus christ shyne vppon vsmala h hygh noone seeing wee fynde owne ignorance experience yee see meane put doctrine saint paules vre first babe little child agein another place saint paule sayth cor wee bee babe naughtinesse yit sayth wee must bee babe vnderstanding thing rehearseth agein present text condemneth babe vnderstanding say doutfull wauering bee sure nothing knowe fayth bee god woorship told world full babe harden themselues brutishnesse ignorance good sooth manie shall man fynde throughly settled god truth cannot bee themselues ignorance yea couet bee lyttle babe styll othersome well ynough skill yeeld account wyse man woulde deeme good roote fayth yit come one blast wynd yee shall see perplexitie wote god beleeue ryse vp heresyes stumbling blockes part spake woonders afore wyndshaken saye neuer opinion heard meaneth may man holde best dooing shewe well ynough sayd afore neuer streyned themselues ne tooke great payne go forwarde myght bee wauering furthermore besydes lykening men vntoo babe saint paule setteth downe yit similitude saying folkes reedes shaken vvith euery vvynd boate floteth vppon waues sea lake deede belongeth little babe saint paules intent also shewe howe wretched state throughly grounded gospell greater wretchednesse bee floting wauering euery wynde haue steadinesse matter concerne saluation wee threatened euerye minute houre wee scared wee continuall fearfulnesse trembling wee leauer bee dead hand linger sorte dye hundred tymes aday wee stand vppon euerlasting saluation soules wote become cace shall bee stedinesse v paule therefore ment shew v thing purpose redresse slothfulnesse rechlesnesse whervntoo wee much giuen pricke v foreward yit dubble sayeth vvee must bee subiect men cousinage vseth heere woord taken dyce playing wee knowe make trade occupacion craft must haue store siyghtes faythfulnesse trust deede sayd man shall see tryall one wit disposition playe knowen also dycers deceyuers insomuch simplest would haue cunning beguyle playe deede cunnyng shred men good eyghtie conueyance yit wee see generall vniuersall propertie play bee guylefull game onely welneere saint paule hath set downe heere one kynde experience sheweth cace standeth yea euen lyttle child ought beare well mynde whereas call little child meane hang vppon dug lyttle cockchickens tyed swordes pert fellowes weene themselues men ought haue rodde yit half doozen yeeres longer yit al doo take snuffe man kepe beyng deceyued game set lybertie surely woulde store cousiners euerywhere young heyre shoulde sooner come dozen yeeres olde haue newe lyuerie backe say fynde cousiners ynow would take hande picke purse keepe good companie till quyte shred hath although saint paule speake heere stedfastnesse fayth gospell yit borroweth comparison common lyfe thinges seene day day saying vnlesse wee haue well settled fayth wee bee fully purposed determyned walke god truth euen end stand inuincibly little child subiect euery man cousinage shall alwayes fynd cousiners deceiuers robbe v spoyle v neuer perceiue wee shall woonder wee become poore taking wee commeth poynt shewe v wee haue great neede bee well fenced wee bee feare euery v falles reueling take care wee keepe watch bee warre wee bee threatened wee think behoues v keepe good watch wee stand vppon gard wee dout afterclappes bethink selues least taken napping saint paule therfore telleth v heere bee nothing cousining shal fall satan snare euery minute houre wee watch warely among wee conuersant sort cousiners worlde euer bee leaud companie shall seeke ouerthrowe fayth euer bee scoffer heathenish folk makebates would fayne haue thing go ha cke yea indeuer shead poysons herestes abrode corrupt infect men withall bee short diuell hath thousand wayes deceyue v men also redy ynough vntoo maynteyners ynow offer themselues desyre better liuing say cause saint paule sheweth v wee labour stoutly profyte god woord wee shall surely bee caught caryed away euery hand fleete fro bee led bill runne lyke little chilldren wee shall haue discretion wee bee well aduyzed euen forewardest v shall stumble within step twoo flote fro euery wynde haue stedinesse fayth diligent profite god woord surely wee shalbee armed fenced withstand wyles satan wicked men would beguyle v although god bring v perfection hand hold v paule say knowledge god loue neyghbours twoo thing ought bee sep rated asunder putteth truth foremest purposely bycause linking toogither would boote v vnlesse iesus christ bond concord god alloweth bycause grounded vpon woord saynt paule ment heere put difference betwixt v heathen vnbeleeuers men graunt well ynough nothing hauocke among men bee lyke dogges cattes hath bin knowen grounded principle age country among people insomuch euen heathen folke knew trewe religion meaneth haue simply commended esteemed benefyte concord agreement toogither yit buylded without foundation therefore saynt paule beginneth god truth saye wee must linke one among selues god must also go v wee must obey wee must bee gathered toogither vnder sit ouer v wee must leuer chooze bee defyance whole world slip away thus yee see thing wee haue marke vppon text god haue v bee knit toogither without knowing haue v agree woorship serue put whole trust infinite goodnes iesus christ head member bodie power fayth agein wee knowe wee haue father heauen hath adopted v bee child iesus christ hath voutsafed take flesh substance vppon intent wee bee flesh flesh bone bone moue v loue one another bee carefull ech others saluation helpe one another according abilitie god gyueth v according wheruntoo sayd psalmepsal freendship brother leeuesome thing afterward prophet bringeth v oyntment powred vpon priest say men hauing euen moother wit may perceyue leeuesome thing world liue peace amitie howbeit therewithall declareth order maner shewed v heere paule ayth sayd brotherhood must bee con crated dedicated name god annoynting aaron successor sort oyntment sheade downe vppon whole body vppon garment therefore let v marke wee intend linke toogither well wee must drawe vntoo god linking must bee allowed otherwyse wee may well haue fellowship toogither shalbee cursed felowship end neuer bee vtter confuzion wherefore wee may rule lyfe well let end wee begin bee cleaue vntoo truth ryght necessarie warning v adayes papistes accuse v wee haue trubbled world debate adayes doo spring fault inasmuch heretoofore deade euery man sayd amen disputing deede great trauell spent seeking god saluation men cast diuell possession gotten behoued v vse great vehemencie according sayd neuer giue ouer place except bee inforced therefore stoode v hand yee would say thunder lighten waken world falne asleepe sort bewitched inasmuch vnbeleeuers extremely stubborne stryuing ageinst god cannot abyde truth take place vpholde theyr lye diuelishe wilfulnesse cause much trubble warre world adayes meane religion papistes would laye blame neckes let v see fault wee desyre euery man doo homage vntoo god great small submit themselues woorde bee one trew vnitie fayth simplicitie gospell go guyde thing wee seeke papist fynd fault yit notwithstanding none thing bee found doctrine wee would fayne bee melodie betweene men angel woorship trew god follow w ord trew rule end corruption seruis contrarie part papistes would maynteyne abhominations errours cannot indure iesus christ haue preheminence haue bereft office made bootie haue infinite warrein hee sayncts shee sayncts giue tytle aduocats saying merit obtein fauour god hand pray vntoo moreouer rest doctrine nothing peruerted yea falsifyed besydes errours superstition papist also spytefull bend themselues euen ageinst god spit madnesse yea indeue wype away rememberance iesus christ fyre swoord wee doo cace compounding renouncing god truth wee know order taught v heere holie ghoste saint paule could well haue sayd io one woord agree freends sawe well hee haue spoken one half doctrine also haue bin misconstrewed therfore sayth let v bee knit toogither truthe let v rather gyue ouer frendship worlde procure anger vnbeleeuers rebell ageinst god swar e one whit wee seeke bee good agreement truthe none b bee wedded rather euery v procure welfare saluation neyghbours concord ought among v thing wee haue effect remember vppon streyne one syde must beware confederating god enemyes om wee stryke sayle say please although behoue v seeke haue peace vnitie men neere wee yit god truthe alwayes excepted wee must make account world deede need gartify creature meane season turne away god truth much shall bee alwayes vnhappie wherfore let v euermore abyde stedfastly god hold v vnder yoke shrink away wyse rather defye whole world yea though man hold v one poynt agein world may bee wonne obedience wee bee able doo much drawe one twoo consent one fayth v must wee put indeuer labour theruntoo wee must shun twoo extremity namely offending god turning away pure woord purchace men fauor also hygh mynded full statelinesse trust euery man himselfe let others alone passe man himselfe two euill extremity wee must beware let v learne ioyne twoo thing inseperable namely wee yeeld god trew obedience fayth holding selues pure simplicitie word agein therwithall despyze neyghbours indeuer win may submit themselues quietly vntoo god meanes al v greate small may speake one mouth holy ghoste reigning hart v haue knowledge hath bin spoken namely god authour saluation hath also shewed father towards v adopting v voutsafing haue v al household cannot bee except wee liue good concord bycause god peace although wee bee driuen fyght ageinst whole world yit let v bee good comfort bycause angel heauen companion cleauing vnto god wee dayes separate selues infinite multitude men presume vppon rich greatnesse pomp credit yea wisdome yea let v esteeme euery whit trashe owne parte although call v schismatikes count v ofscowrings world let v hold v contented wee know angel heauen holie patriarks hrophets apostle martirs agree v short god chozen people abell present day doo beare v sufficient companie may wee despyze shalbee layd reproche wee haue god truthe mark wherby wee knowe selues bee child inasmuch god cannot deny continew alwayes church wherof bee parcell shee sticke vntoo woord let therfor bee one poynt meane also let v forget seeke peace v termost power according text alledged romanes therfore let v wilfully seperate selues worldrom let v haue armes strected take home yeeld themselues willingly obedience god wee may haue one fayth toogither let v indeuer bring passe also cause saint paule telleth v heere fayth obedience w yeeld vntoo god serues puffe vp hart pryde wee reiect men euery v loue shift ut make v followe example heauenly father allureth farre readye reconcyled enemyes thing seing hath shewed v lord iesus christ giuen v excellent pledge wee also must haue doctrine peace thought hart indeuer much possible bring vnion gospell separated yit haue bin stark mad ageinst god doo yeeld themselues lambes sheepe flocke wee must bee redye receyue let v bend selues bee giuen euery man owne profite assure selues sith god hath knit v toogither bound v one another euery v ought imploy vttermoste abilitie according owne measure drawe neyghbours may ryghtly one bodie iesus christ reigne ouer v cause also dooth adde wee grovve thing head vvit iesus christ woord growe saynt paule continueth matter wee haue seene heeretoofore wee must stand much owne conceytes thinke selues bee come alredye marke wee go told lyfe iorney therfore wee must go styll lingereth way dooth well shew neuer wist wherat amed therefore although wee must bee little child yit wee yit come full age nother haue wee gotten yit strength requisyte wherfore let v growe say let euery v looke well owne infirmitie see owne weakenesse let theruppon take harte thrust foorth let preace vntoo god let myndes bee continually bent waye ynough v haue begunne yit haue gone good way vnlesse bee printed harte wee must profi e still euen dying day otherwyse certeyne wee shall dazeled owne pryde make god gif e vanish away wee receyued afore wherfore let v imagin wee haue power vnderstanding thing requisyte saluation wee consider nought holy ghost exhorteth v heere growe heere yee see also lowelinesse ought alwayes ch fayth according sayingpsal b god woord serueth instruct small lowelye one greater man would make bee surely dooth shet doore ageinst haue enterance intoo schoole god lord iesus christ therfore let v looke well owne slendernesse wee may bee meeke nothing may hinder v hoping continually god ought also quicken v prouoke v serue confirme selues continually woord cause greate sloth coldnesse seene manye men thinke themselues bee clerkes greate ynough alredy therin deceyue themselues reason diuell hath dimmed eye owne fond ouerweening seeing let v continew little one still vnderstanding naughtinesse hath bin sayd afore sith wee knowe wee neede profit let v indeuer doo howbeeit let v also haue eye meane shewed v heere resort head tr ly saint paule addeth theruntoo thing shewe v en christen man hath examined throughly shal fynd haue anie vertew shalbee vyces mingled vertewes euer blemish mayme wherfore let v cast downe head let excellentest men world vnderstand god hath still reserued peece grace hath giuen intent wee bee puffed vp fond ouerweening think selues bee wee bee let v come heade spoken heere saint paule telleth v shooteanker must bee knowe iesus christ hath bin declared afore treasure wisdome knowledge layd vp himcoloss else many would raundge farre god woord bee bee alwayes learning neuer knowe thing sayd another text paule telleth vs2 tim b iesus christ wee shall fynd requisyte saluation also must haue preheminence head appeereth aboue rest b dy grew wise shoulder get vp half h ad growing growing bee well lyked better member starke dead tha shoulde disfigure body muche head ought bee vppermost saint paule telleth v expresly ynough v growe wee must alwayes growe vnder lord iesus christ may stand ouer v v great small submyt selues vnto hym wee see experience spoken nothyng number carrye great countenance shewe knowledge yit doo nothing set thyngs broyle vprore theyr vayne glory great sort could fynd theyr hart haue lord iesus christ buryed selues myght perke vp haue world gaze vppon bee estimation reioyst many wretch come farre passe come may keepe selues reputation ageyn othersome myngle lord iesus christ many superstition vtterly ouershadowe wee see happened poperie verifie owne prouerb throughly sonne god cannot knowen apostle bycause haue fleeced robbed honour belongeth made bootie dealing euery man share portion thus papist well growen howbeeit ignorance superstition bycause iesus christ hath preheminence among nother hee shooteanker yea euen among v also yee shall see desyrous get renoune among men iesus christ shalbee nothing much therfore dooth stand v hand mynd well lesson saint paules growing must bee lord iesus christiohn according saying saint iohn baptist must diminish increace let v followe example namly excellencie church abyde v appayred yit mean whyle iesus christ bee shooteanker men although starres haue bryghtnesse yit must sunne shyne aboue men must knowe whome wee haue trew lyght deede therfore let lord iesus dayso e rygh ousenesse regarded nothing may impeach bleare eye wee look fayth leuelled alonely cause saint paule addeth expressely iesus christ must bee head wee growe resort vntoo set ou whole studye mynd vppon expresse better addeth vvhom hole body knit ioyned toogither ioyntes furnisheth substance lyfe according measure portion euery member done body well proportioned howbeit loue must reigne among v else shall nothing confuzion insomuch bee greatnesse bee ouer huge shall bee naturall body rather monster nowe saying wee receyue growing iesus christ knitting body proceedeth also wee bee maynteyned life sheweth v vnthankfulnesse wee yeeld honor deserueth must needes tootoo leaud sonne god giueth v thing yit wee bereeue honor requireth shewing bountifull towards v desyreth yeeld recompence nother nother needfull yit glorifyed seeyng wee bee inriched wee notwithstanding doo fall robbing honor defrauded bereft must needes bee wee bee woorse diuelish wherfore let v mark well wherat paule amed intended heere reproue worlde leaud vnthankfulnesse yeelding lord iesus christ dew honour somuch exalted among v nother doo wee thinke vppon nother doo wee place chiefe souereintie men myght doo homage therwithall sheweth also wee bee almost wittes wee honor iesus christ ne exalt wee ought doo man dooth naturally ouet owne profit forsaking iesus christ seeme haue conspyred sworne owne confuzion might bereft grace rotten member without strength head man body roote ree life sustenance proceedeth hand feete belly stomacke leg rest member conspire togither say let v forsake hea hey win conspyre toogither put head downe thrust belly men myght see profit whole body haue euen standeth cace would diminish glory maiestie god sonne lessen power acknowledge end sent god father namely seeke welfare partes saluation much would put downe head paule telleth v must bee knitting body commeth head whence cometh beholde veynes conuey nourrishment euery whole body senewes hold bone togither giue mouing yit must thinges haue roote head need despyze god diminishing glory sonne surely turne confuzion iesus christ wel ynough forbeare v must need perish wretchedly like rotte carions giue v whatsoeuer belongeth life thus yee see paule ment shewe v hereunto addeth certein measure euery member furnishment therof cometh head sheadeth whole body howbeit sayth measure sayth measure doth v wit al excellencie see heere derogation perfectnesse iesus christ twoo reason bee marked one man vnperfect therfore must resort lord iesus christ alonly may abyde vnimpeached bee mingled creature measure portio euery member hauing peculiar seat could hand doo continually nurrished maynteyned head bond holdeth altogither must needes bee maynteyned thence also naturall heate mouing must come thence insomuch hand shoulde wither euery minute houre rotte away head wrought continually like respect betweene christ church wee consider well men though admitted one bee like angell yit hath measure still intent iesus christ bereft honor belongeth vnto seeing euery v hath portio hath bin shewed afore good reason also euery v stoope lift vp horne take thing vpo v god reserueth sonne one point agein let v vnderstand measure cometh free gift hath bin shewed alredy yit without cause paule repeteth heere agein wee see foolish presumptuousnes men euery man would lord would faine rod god right end aduaunced esteemed selues therefore abate loftinesse clenze v vyce paule putteth v mynd agein1 cor b haue nothing giuen v therfore must resort sayeth first corinthian art thou haste thou made thy selfe excellent thyne owne cunnyng hast thou thing thou canst chalendge thine owne god hath aduaunced thee therfore humble thy self meaning whole knitting whole furnishing cometh head ynough v wee created shaped standeth v hand haue member still mainteyned plyght therefore cause paul addeth word furniture sheading god shead downe inworking vppon head head shead fo rth inwoorking throughout member paul ment saying iesus christ spirituall head hath receyued fulnesse grace according first chapter iohn sayd giue alone v also brother seeyng let v vnderstand al grace haue receyued god creeped v meanes lord iesus christ wee haue full furnishing throughout also trew sayd strength inwoorking passeth euery member comming head shal shoulder bee arme afterward arme hand yit shall arme therfore glory selfe giue hand part receyuing impart vntoo residew limbes cometh head agein shal hand one syde giue power backe agein arme syde yi euery member knowes owne office say euery member hath naturally inclination serue rest bodye though god giuen discretion wisedome say thus must bee bound vntoo knowe neede eche hath others helpe trew hand cannot iudge thing yit hath god put indowment disposition desireth nothing rather imploy self seruice rest body also foote doth dewtie without intreating bydding though god imprinted discretion consider receiue power heauen thing haue receyued must fitted thervntoo man shoulde demaunde euery man alyke equall church saint paule speaking portion measure meaneth god hath distributed lyke portion euerye member legge eye yit euerthelesse leg according qualitie hath needeth cause also saint paule sayeth member bee knit togither myght make vp one whole body loue meane haue euerye one wherewith bee contented twoo thing wee must marke namely god gift diuers much excellent eye excellenter member foote wee see also honour mouth leg marke one poynt diuersitie lord exalteth honoreth listeth others great small church must bee teacher prophet yit diuersitie letteth euery member hath desyre meete foote enuyeth hand hand foote enuyeth eye purpose serue hand haue syght thing could doo good also doo harme euery member al office self surely bodie confounded come nought hand hath perfection belongeth vntoo meane degree lykewyse foote howbeit paules meaning ought suffyze v church bee edifyed common neyghboures bee inriched god giftes redoundeth partly vntoo v syde wee haue receyued larger measure grace wee bee bound imparte haue neede therefore thing saynt paule meaneth set downe text saying knittyng bee manner bodye shall bee well buylded made vp heere wee see contineweth matter wee must linked toogither according doctri e gospell iesus christ may reigne ouer v wee knowe heauenly father hath giuen v condition wee linke toogither vnder maynteyne brotherly vnitie among v yit afore thing wee must bee subiect hath souereine dominion consider asmuch heauenly father hath set degree wee must ame continew obedience vntoo end therwithall let v vnderstand cannot bee doone without loue say vnlesse euery v rid cursed affection seeking much owne profit deede easye perceyue affection dooth blynd v make v despyze neyghboures much therfore dooth behoue euery v indeuer giue ouer owne ryght knowe god hath distributed giftes euery man may bee world church asmuch euery man hath neede neyghboures meane wherby hold v toogither ought also prouoke v much doo wee one another although bee one fountayne whence wee drawe spirituall giftes namely euen lord iesus christ yit notwithstanding god maketh fulnesse grace hath put iesus christ flowe foorth chanelles wee may receyue euerye man portion expedient v yee see effect wee haue remember heere doctrine well put vre surely trubbles adayes world would soone bee appeased would bee many bickering disputings wee easly agree toogither ambition uaynglorye moother heresyes whe men needes exalt theselues must needes therby thrust downe christ could agein whence spring superstition men knowe inestimable benefytes brought v lord iesus christ dayly offered vntoo v gospell hath made world alwayes wanton wandering owne lust hath made men forge many patron aduocates hath made men aduaunce owne deseruings hath made folke deuyze manye satisfaction many meanes wherwith please god many new seruices namely contented iesus christ want knowing manner one wee haue ought suffyze v wee hold selues bycause father hath gloryfyed wee ought duetie doo homage honour souereyne king asmuch wee see wretched vnbeleeuers scattered reason turne away iesus christ haue much neede warned hold v simply obedience know welfare commeth therfore ought returne yeeld dew honour therwithall put whole trust intent may doo must consider nothing lth v hold spi itual lyfe away wyse woorketh continewally v sttengthning furthering v euen vntill haue brought b perfection say perfection hope cause holy supper left v remeberance lord iesus christ must wholly seeke thing belonging lyfe soules professe nurrishment euen satisfye v full therfore cause wee come thither eate drinke put v mynd haue iesus christ halfe lyfe whole wee bee fed must content selues seeke one droppe myte say elsewhere maner must wee come holy table wit examining owne sinnes know wee bee nothing wee must seeke meanes god calleth v may keepe way thither euen tyll perfectly knit vnto namely knowing iesus christ giuen v haue behooffull wanting selues therfore let v esteeme lord iesus christ wee may take sustenance fayth haue touched afore haled away roue heere finally vanish quyte away may rest vpon may know nother rightuousnesse holinesse merit power aught else selues wee shall fynde cannot parttakers wee must also parttakers good hath receiued god father seeing good thinges god hath put intoo head communicated vnto v meanes let v learne humble selues clymb wise defrauded honor confesse simply without feyning looke whatsoeuer giuen v free goodnesse mainteyneth preserueth moreouer increaceth stablisheth v furthermore let v marke wee cannot possesse good lord iesus christ take profit except first inioy cause giueth vnto v thinkes ynough giue v part portion rightuousnesse desertes sacrifyce death passion obedience yeelded vnto god father giftes receiued fully god father say thinkes ynough giue v part portion sacrament sayth possesse yee mee ynough v go seeke want hand may impart v wee must also consider first offereth vntoo v sayeth lo heere body deliuered lo heere blud shal shed remission sinnes doone ende wee know dwelleth v truly holy spirit wee liue owne substance sayd heere without cause knitting bodye commeth hym furniture thereof forasmuch wee want grace giftes belong spirituall lyfe wee must drawe fountayne resort perseuerance fayth gospell wee shall feele selues strengthened stablished grace euen till haue rid v imperfection infirmity make v inioy heauenly glory let v fall downe maiestie good god acknowledgment faultes praying make v feele wee may sory therwithall worke v hereafter wee may day day bee clenzed imperfection vyces lord iesus christ welspring purenesse may shed foorth grace holy spirit wee may bee made newe creature therby doo souerein king honour belongeth let v say almighty god heauenly father c xxviii sermon eyght vppon fourth chapter say therefore adiure lord hensfoorth yee vvalke rest gentyles walke vanitie mynd hauing vnderstanding ouercast vvith darknesse straungers lyfe god reason ignorance blyndnesse hart vvho vvithout remorse conscience haue giuen themselues ouer leaudnesse commit vnclenenesse euen inordinate greedinesse considering howe corrupt wee bee nature ynough v haue good shewed vntoo v vnlesse vy rooted v bee also corrected lyke woulde smally boote sowe corne ground ouergrowen nettle shrewd weedes rush thornes therefore notwithstanding saint paule haue heretofore shewed trew rule godly lyfe yit addeth neede standeth euery man hand bethinke himselfe chaunge quyte cleane become newe man bycause vntill god haue clenzed v mynde ha partes soule neuer bee thing tilthinesse doctrine wee haue herd heretoofore boote v wee heare presently bin added knowe ephesian saint paule speaketh conuerted fayth lord iesus christ liued certeine tyme ignorance bin giuen naughtinesse leaud lyfe euen vttermost yit notwithstanding saint paul setteth downe heere generall haue bin aught god schoole blynd wretch vnable discrene betweene good euill yea sta ke beastes insomuch euen roote commeth moothers womb euery man hardeneth tyll fall intoo excesse become monster appeare bee creature fashyoned image god yee see effect saint paules intent hath declared god stablishing gouernment ouer v end walking world bee go vnto god heauenly lyfe wheruntoo calleth v sheweth wee shall neuer obey bow necke receyue yoke vntyll wee haue chaunged disposition mynd forsaken selues cause wee vtterly corrupted twoo part instruction giuen v one sheweth v wheruntoo god calleth v wee must fyght ageinst owne sinfulnesse vtterly imprison selues wee may become teachable receyue doctrine god setteth v howbeeit asmuch hard doo saint paule think ynough giue v single warning also cyteth v sort setteth seat iustice wee must yeeld account intent moue quicken speaketh small thing make men renounce theselues considering euery man sootheth beleeueth able woork wonder although bee saped naughtinesse yit think hath vertues yea although wee haue fault proued face yit wee labour cloke hipocrisie set fayre colour glosse vpon else maynteyne wilfully neuer yeeld selues giltie though shame lye open whole world short hard incounter must well lay wisdome weened oo haue gouerning owne fancie also tame affection may bee subiect vntoo god haue nothing self shall stryue ageinst himrom b flesh stout behalf wee heare sayd another text man thought euer conceyue emnitie ageinst god lykewyse also sayd genesis gene c yea euen tyme world greatest soundnesse euer whatsoeuer come warehouse owne brayne stark naughtinesse rebellion ageinst god requisite greate vehemencie bee vsed behalf therfore also dooth saint paule vse saying teacheth also cyteth speaketh end may knowe bee god presence fall asleepe vayne selfflatteries diuell hath manie allurement beguyle v contrarie part god woord must inlyghten v although wee forslowe consider vyces leuer conceale yit wee must vnderstand profit come reason examin throughly v cause saint paule mynding exhort ephesian chaunge lyfe setteth downe adiuratio kind witnesse bearing though present god iudgment seate bee couenanting betweene man man solemnitie ceremonie swearing moue cause bethink themselues well promis leastwyse bee quyte wit howbeeit heere notarie take notyce othes customes among men ratify thing agree vppon among themselues heere saint paule standeth behalf person iesus christ hee hath authoritie requyre v also summon v make account wee indeuer discharge dewtie yea telleth v tha v let slip thing sayeth heare deaf eares bycause god present punish rechlenesse despyzing woord sith let v learne leaue flattering selues manie doo wee see pretend deafnesse whatsoeuer coutenances make continew alwayes afore wherfore let v mark well god thinking ynough teache intendeth take away excuce elleth v wil suffer contempt woord wee voutsafe giue eare seeing gracious speake vntoo v giue v warrantyze saluation let v come effect conteyned heere saint paule sayeth bee rest gentyles haue told alredye wryteth tyme quyte giuen naughtinesse without feare god euen cradle bin brought vp maner idolatrie yit thought themselues well discharged doone sacrifyze puppet like day popedome play moste murlimewes counted holie think themselues god dette haue doone sort pelting tryfles cause dooth saint paule send ephesian similitude saying looke vppon rest gentyles may see plyght taking weere god gathered intoo church prye vppon selues sayeth shall see owne image tyme god reached hand drew dungeon vnbeleef wherin plunged differed nothing leastwyse yee ought consider grace hath bin graunted may bring foorth fruite way let v marke vsing speech rest gentyles saint paule comprehendeth heere al mankynd speaketh twoo three men one nation countrie sayeth generally bin trayned gospell blynd wretch wee see bee short sheweth maner one wee vntill god haue preuented v grace intent wee cast exhortation away beare selues hand exempted thing shall see hereafter therfore end wee surmyze priuiledge withdrawe selues common aray men saint paule hath heere knit adam child toogither weere one bundle mankynd nothing bee found leawdnesse corruption heere therfore two poynts wee haue mark one heere looking glasse wee behold owne state long god giueth v brydle letteth v follow owne swindge mark one poynt lay large anon wee see enormity committed whole world men bee shamelesse euil dooing rather altoogither bewitched besotted man meanes moue learne feare god wee see say one syde stubbornnesse men syde soo grosse beastly senslesnesse let v learne spy selues consider god v singular good turne pleased touche v quicke woord myght preuayle v wee differ nothing al woorst disordere orld moste horrible confuzion yee see wee haue bin god pityed v ought touche v wel quicke grace god hath graunted v bee darkened quyte quenched end wee bee quyte cleane bereft manner therefor ought wee apply text instruction saint paul setteth men v haue yit bin inlyghtened fayth gospell let alone comparing state wee may consider mercifull god shewed self vn oo v drawing v dungeon intent wee bee diligenter giuing selues vntoo hereupon sayth vvalk hensforth vanitie mynd woord hensfoorth hereafter intendeth shame trayned gospell lyfe proue haue mispent labour purpose wee called fayth lord iesus christ separate selues stumbling blockes world therefore wee must excuze selues bringing vp euyll custome example myght allure v leaudnesse yit nothing frowardnesse round v seeyng god hath adopted v bee child wyll haue v lyue therafter therefore let v marke fayth importeth reforming selues lyfe bee cleane chaunged cause sayd cor c whosoeuer wyll bee counted bee iesus christ must become new creature wee may prate gospell ynough much wee may maruelously fyne headed shal bee nought woorth vntill sayd chaunge appeere v say vntill wee leade newe lyfe besydes wee haue marke heere saynt paule hath spoken vanitie mynd addeth blyndnesse mynde darkenesse vnderstanding lastly sayeth blyndnesse stubbornesse hart blazing men sort serues well put quyte conceyt philosopher spake excellencie woorthinesse man nature alwayes set downe reason ouerruler next hir downe discretion betweene good euill men debate themselues make serching turmoyling thing manner make courte barre end make man iudge good euill seeme saynt paule heere abaceth men much sayth reason hath nothing vanitie vntruth deceytfulnesse agein euer men conceyue maze vayne fancy doo ouerthrowe selues blynd wretch wander abroade darke yit notwithstanding holy ghost competent iudge giue sentence thing v least wee myght thinke selues haue wonne goale flattering selues according told v afore men haue theyr eye blyndfolded fond opinion haue conceyued owne woorthinesse cannot bee ashamed confesse owne leaudnesse cause philosopher alwayes magnify nature man yit notwithstanding experience sheweth cleane contrarye vanitie apparrant wyted vppon men negligence rechlesnesse men would aply sens nature throughly knowe good bee little angel imagined want boul yng bottom neuer wist god made discharge themselues lyghtly toowardes insomuch euen disputed cunningly god maiestie hygher vnderstanding common sort bee short esteemed wyzest men world could notwithstanding neuer come neere truth god whensoeuer seruis came question graueled turned thing vpsyde downe wisedome world uffer v come heauenly lyght speciall gifte god bee found selues yee see euen greatest men skyll deceyued themselues cause men fall asleepe fond opinion wherto much inclyned afore yea see foolish rather diuelish ouerweening hath gotte place euen among iewes insomuch haue alwayes bin opinion men adayes popedome haue freewill trew papistes graunt heathen folke namely wee corrupted original sin howbeeit meaning notwithstanding infirmitye man yit abydeth remnant goodnesse insomuch wee halfe vnderstanding styll also able trayne v vntoo good though bee weake self bee short needes iudge according naturall vnderstanding say men sound vncorrupted angel papistes conuicted manye recordes scripture graunt well ynough wee bee fal e originall manye vyces v yit let say still half cleane able good owne power wee bee humbled god short make partnership betwene god men say deede wee haue neede bee inlyghtned aboue atteyne fayth yit wee haue lyght selues god maketh vp wanteth agein say lust dooth reigne v ryght hard v submit selues god yit wee must labour doo able doo god ayd v reache v hand concurrence terme say matching marrowing toogither god grace goodnesse remayneth man though wee bee corrupted sayd let v rather herken god euen competent iudge hath spoken vnrepealable sentence follow common reason thing man hath self blynd wret he shall become reason although men think serueth giue lyght shew way yit certeyne dooth alwayes tumble intoo pit wheras weene themselues bee well aduyzed shalbe stark beast cause told v continewally doo v vnderstand god must bee fayne reforme v half whole throughout heere man myght ask question men meene god hath let alone without vnderstanding discretion behalf whether myght one see example verie certeyne bee lyke horse yit lyke dogges yit let v mark vnderstanding discretion v iudgment possible v haue serueth none end make v vnexcusable therfore wee must vnderstand although wee haue discretion betweene good euill god haue taught v woord inlyghtened v holie spirit yit erueth beree e v excuce wee myght make buckler ignorance wee bee w nt doo although euery man haue written lawe yit must beare sentence damnation hart sayeth paule second romanes god must driue perceyue aforehand making feele har ytings whether shall say giltie thing thus remayneth vnderstanding men howbeit leade way saluation make much giltie god touching affection myght sayd many liue honestly without blame though neuer tasted gospel yeamary meane whyle harte fraughted malice st bbornnesse dout haue bin reformed god spirit shall still feede sea wicked froward malicious lust within therfore let v stay vppon outward showe1 sam b psal c iere b iohn let v mark nought god chalengeth searching men harte peculiar office therfore must bee reserued vntoo also let v call mynd saint iohn epistle sayth see sinnes v god seeth farre cleerly iudge therof howsoeuer cace stand men haue doone best yit rid hand condemnation come heauenly iudge specially seing starres cleere syght euen angel somuch listed examin rigour bee able come perfection let v note vntill god haue visited v come vntoo v hath subdewed v vntoo wee shall alwayes continue ignorant blynde wretch shalbe nothing va tie vnderstandyng harte shal nothyng pride presumption lustes shall bee farre square shall stryue ageinst god wee shall fyght ageynst iustice ageynst right surely wee see hath folowed men would needes gouerne selues eir owne wyt fashion seruyng god haue byn brought ntoo world howe wicked wanted great cunnyng great skyll wee see god hath gracious gyftes suche wise man wyt hath showed selfe right excellent maner science knowledge sauyng chiefe wyt commyng vnto god haue fayled haue wandered away nothyng fasehoode deceyt cace indeuered thrust themselues foreward muche deeper dyd plundge selues intoo myre wherefore let v note although light shyne sayd first chapter saint iohn yit notwithstanding wee beyng darknesse conceyue saint iohn sheweth euen beginnyng god separated men beastes imprintyng image gyuyng discretion discerne betweene good euyll lyfe man serues onely eate drinke also consider wee haue better lyfe haue order common pollicie beneath vnderstand god ruleth loe lyght adam fall lyght abydeth yit styll yit shyneth darknesse darknesse comprehendeth rather quencheth quite cleane wee haue small insight ame let v consider little spark passeth vanisheth away hand meane whyle concerning owne nature wee bee able haue regard goodnesse seeke followe continew vtterly vnpossible vnderstanding stark blyndpsal b short nothing vanitie v according saying god perused thought men sawe nothing vanitie leazing expresse yit better saint paule sayeth vnderstanding darkened vvere straungers lyfe god wherin cutteth occasion excuse men make replye continually ageinst god though bee condemned yit alwayes haue last woord saying doo bee nothing vanitie mee seeing god created mee made mee otherwise saint paule telleth v heere wee haue vnderstanding ouercast owne darknesse bycause lyght quenched corruptio come vpon v adam short paul sheweth v must keepe mouthes shet scripture bewrayeth bee ignorant blynd brutish must think cace alledging god ought haue made v otherwyse euill proceedeth adam fall bycause bereft good receyu wee also impouerished lyke feyteth good must beg child must wee also also penurie pouertie consyder still day misfortune come vppon v fault offence first father thus yee see saint paule hath heere disappoynted starting hole men woont set afore shewe themselues bee ryghtuous innocent god whence commeth vanitie mynd wee bee blynd ignorant euen beyng darknesse darkening lyght god put intoo v first creation forasmuch harde matter brucke paule bringeth v lyfe god laugh scorne tryflyng imagination men haue contryued maynteyne owne freewill reason discretion haue sayd already bookes philosopher full stuffe popedome bickering still day freewill though mard man good selfmouing abilitie prepare himselfe receyre grace made fellowe god could make grace effectuall offered reckening men shall onely bee hayle fellowe god may bee beleeued better abilitie shall adde little portion paule sayeth wee may well bee alyue opinion respect god wee shall fayle bee dead carkesses rather euen rotten stinking carions let men take vpon foolish ouerweening haue reason wisedome freewyll would fayne knowe owne state let lyft vp eye consider theyr liuing must bee lyfe god lyfe euery man fancyeth heere himselfe paule seuenth romanes confesseth thought himselfe alyue tyme namely bin conuerted pure doctrine bycause full hipocrisie possessed pryde thought bee little angell bycause god lawe yit sifted throughlyrom b entered intoo selfe sayeth knew lust god lawe wound mee death perceyued lyfe lyued afore death made selfe beleeue woonders taking selfe bee fooles doo beleeue bee king prince meane whyle lyce eate vp else starue hunger cold saint paule confesseth conuerted alyue owne seemyng tryumphed christ humbled made feele god iudgment gaue ouer lyfe sawe well death lykewyse sayeth although wee bee alyue opinion world men clap hand v magnyfye vertewes wee selues also besotted opinion nothing wee must go vntoo god wee shall fynd god hath speciall lyfe reserueth keepeth layd vp secret child albeeit make daysonne shyne vppon good bad shewe himselfe lyberall towardes without exception yit dooth scatter abrod thing serue chozen according saying psalmepsal f lord great thy goodnesse thou hast layd vp store feare thee treasure thou hast hoorded vp whereas saint paule speaketh heere god lyfe sheweth lyuing according nature wee haue lyfe whence god hath created v wee haue beeing mouing sayd seuenteenth actes common lyfe god asmuch maker asmuch sauiour chozen asmuch father child hath adopted lyfe common good bad named god lyfe man lyfe god letteth alone plyght god lyfe vppon choozing v sheweth v way lyfe saluation reneweth v holye spirit iesus christ dwelleth v fayth wee haue seene afore vttereth power v causing old man crucifyed yea euen buried wee may bee rayzed agein euen bee separated vncleannesse world wee may resemble vnbeleeuers wholly prisoner vnder tyrannye satan driuen haled giue ouer themselues euill effect cause paule hath spoken v god lyfe wee may beteer bee wakened receyue exhortation vnfeynedly let v deceyue selues opinion euery v may conceyue owne head yit iudgment men oftymes doo prayse commend thing nothing woorth uerilye wee knowe lord iesus christ sayeth saint lukeluke thing hygh excellent afore men vtterly lothsome god intent therefore wee may bee deceyued let v vnderstand vntyll god haue made v new creature begotten v agein holye spirit wee bee blynd vnderstanding wee haue nothing v vanitie wee bee vtterly ignorant yea starke beastes effect thing wee haue beare mynd wherfore oft wee fall accustomed byase followe owne fancie let v learne cyte selues beefore god wey wel ment lyfe reserueth peculiar serueth none bycause bestoweth vppon none owne child therby sheweth haue chozen v wee haue seene first chapter heerupon setteth downe immediatly hardnesse hart single hardnesse maner wee take hardnesse greeke word betokeneth thickenednesse muddinesse peece wyne well fyned trubbled becommeth lee groweth thicke muddie lyke puddle cleere licour euen saynt paule sayeth hart thickened blynded hardened meane cannot yeeld obeying god cleerenesse trubbled lyke puddle word hart doth holy scripture betoken lustes lykings man sometymes also vnderstanding asmuch heere saint paule hath put difference betweene man vnderstanding mynd hart may wel think ment adde togither scanning debatings wee make selues iudging good euill finally whole vnderstanding wee haue reason reigneth v saynt paule therfore ment effect shewe man corrupted partes sinne adam nother wit wil tendeth wholy vntoo euill vtterly saped therfore lyke erst condemned beastlinesse v also sheweth bee blockes cannot bee quiet follow god whither soeuer calleth v wee stubborne haue stiffe neckes cannot bowe moyses also vpbraydeth rebelled ageinst god telling necke yron brasse euen wee nature cause sayd ezechiellezech f god chaunge harte haue saued wheras stonye make fleshye similitude sheweth well v tyll god haue wrought alteration v wee haue nothing hardnesse much holy ghost say wee bee god enemyes refuzers al truth vntill god haue softened v corrected crabbednesse stubbornnesse wherethrough w e cast vp rage wyze ageinst god bee short lustes men warre marching battell let god reigne execute power superioritie ought haue ouer v lo nature let v go brag owne freewill reason wee see wretched papistes doo euer harping styll vppon stryng let v learne humble selues good sayd afore let v consider saynt paule blameth men nature shewing v greatest least plundged euen bottom hel vntyll god plucke v backe agein therwithall let v consider enormity doone whole world conclude selues doo much god shewed v mercie let stirre v vp brydle selues least wee ouershoote selues tyme seeing hath pleased god drawe v vntoo let v turne backe agein meddle leawdnesse vnbeleeuers wonder though stumble tumble reele fro haue lyght direct lord shyneth vppon v woord giueth v eye holy spirt therfore let v eschew bee lyke paule exhorteth v heere heereuntoo addeth toppe al mischeef men go astray owne kynd continew going outward woorse woorse foade themselues flatterie wherby cast conscience sleepe feele anye remorse griefe hygh way make vtterly past recouerie first let v learne heere preuent vengeance god ought make v quake wee heare abyde styll owne nature ouershoote themselues farre bee without scruple conscience become brute beastes voyde discretion moued eyther lyfe death maner feeling owne soule health let v god name walke feare awe bewayle sinnes euerye houre early late wee bee hardened fashion wee see growe beastly sort doo gather hard hartednes man cannot bow haue gotten boldnesse giuing themselues vntoo euyll thus touching first poynt let v bee ryght well assured god reuengeth himselfe terrible manner ageinst foade themselues vyces take inordinate leaue doo list end become brutish euen ass dogges second poynt god vse rigor towards neuer yit trayned gospell doo v shall haue shewed v way saluation long tyme yit wee continew still lyke neuer tasted good instruction wee thinke punishment shal bee horrible dreadfull vppon v lyke paule declareth first romanes god gaue men ouer intoo disordinate shamefull lustes vtterly past shame speaketh expresly heathen vnbeleeuers none knowledge god skyes earth creature none helpe great booke wherby glorify god yit forasmuch therefore condemned maner wee haue excuce sillie soules wee cannot say wee able discerne good bycause blynded adam sinne nothing vanitie v god hath giuen v woordepsal v iustly called lampe guyde v wee haue gospell lord iesus christ declareth guyde yit needes prouoke god wilfully disaulling doctrine saluation whereas wee followe sort many euen day seeke wallowe leaudnesse disorder despyze god openly shall become v wherefore let v learne walke feare god let v marke well saint paule hath without cause set downe toppe mischief purpose shewe v therby wage god pay yeeld dewe tyme place rather take libertie naughtinesse though scaped handes let v afrayde ouershoote selues farre although haue wandered farre afore god skill well ynough drawe v let v bee afrayde least god execute sayd vengeance vppon vsprou b wel vppon according saying salomon wicked man come extremitie despyzeth say regardeth nother lyfe death flingeth foorth lyke brute beast therefore let v quake threatenings feare least god execute vppon v wee cannot abyde bee rebuked vyces contrariwyze let v practyze doctrine salomon sayethprou b happie man whose hart pricketh quickeneth vp nyght day let v learne bee owne sollicitors touche selues vyces wee enter intoo let v bee abashed cast downe condemne selues vntill god haue releeued v mercy maner must wee put doctrine paules vre end god hath knit v meanes lord iesus christ giuen v lyfe wee may take good heede lyfe bee defaced quenched v owne leaudnesse vnthankfulnesse agein beyng mynded continew doctrine may learne first humble selues certeyne humilitie cause v resort vntoo god secondly humilitie bee matched warenesse wee bee rechlesse flatter selues warenesse wee streyne selues vttermost fyght ageynst vyces lustes tarying lordes leyzure vntyll rid v quyte cleane meane whyle let v alwayes win somwhat selues bee neuer lyttle may continually appeare lord iesus christ woorketh v maketh grace preuayle causing v goe foreward goodnesse wee may say bee dispozed wee may growe vntyll god haue taken v ou world let v fall downe maiestie good god acknowledgment sinnes praying touche v quicke may drawe v vntoo trewe repentance continew tyme lyfe beyng vtterly beaten downe made nothing selues wee maye learne seeke welfare theruppon leade v familiarly hand lord iesus christ wee may go seeke go foreward professing gospell intent also bee filled gracious giftes trew fruites roote may please graunt grace onely v also people nation c xxix sermon nynth vppon fourth chapter haue learned christ leastwise yee haue heard bin taught euen truth iesus wit yee put old man former conuersation corrupt lustes errour bee yee renewed spirit mynd put newe man vvhich created god rightuousnesse holynesse truth saint paule sheweth v example heathen men vnbeleeuers wretched man lyfe suffereth bee led owne affection lust wee bee blynded sinne adam discerne beetween good euill howbeeeit perceyued first blush yee looke whole course man lyfe yee shal find hold certein way wander fro end become stark beast haue hart greef scruple conscience sheweth diuersitie ought bee betwixt lyf christian haue bin ray ed gospell lyfe ignorant blyud wretch neuer wist god cause addeth wee ought keepe farre trade wee say trayned vp iesus christ sayd haue lyght god straye heere maruell though doo blynd wander darknesse seing god hath inlyghtened v wee haue iesus christ daysonne ryghtuousenesse shyning vppon v shame wee bee mingled haue direction excuce v wee alledge heathen little exawple serue lessen sin shall dubble condemnation god setteth eye looking glass wherin behold wee selues nature whyle wee bee vngouerned holy ghoste contrarie part haue lord iesus christ shewe v way lyfe nought hath sayd lyght worldeiohn b whosoeuer walketh cannot strayiohn agein also way wherin man cannot go amisse cause effect saint paule addeth v wee haue lerned iesus christ yee haue herd layeth setting downe woords purpose cut occasion making shrouding sheete ignorance men loth bee counted fooles except bee come accounting god would fayne scape saying silie idiot able buzie self manie matter vnpossible set mynd vntoo yee see wee well ynough acknowledge ignorance wee bee called cyted make reckening god agein another sort say gospell hygh deepe thing saint paule answereth vntoo one woord saying haue heard iesus christ say long none selues wee haue bin well dewly instucted seing gospell hath bin preached vntoo v god sheweth self farre foorth expedient v sufficient learning gospell v alledge owne rawenesse darknesse god dooth dewtie good faythfull shcoolemayster bee short wee continew still beastlinesse haue heard doctrine gospell must blame selues surely long god knoweth meete v cause also saint paule protesteth2 cor veyle preaching men myght see iesus christ blynded satan vnbeleefe goo away intoo destruction howsoeuer cace stande wee coulde fayle god behalfe bee guyded gouerned meete v wee gaue diligent eare thing sheweth v gospell dooth yit much aggrauate leaudnesse profite god schoole addeth haue bin taught though bin sheweth iesns christ away small tast myght seeme ignorance excusable seeing eares continewally beaten day day wee haue bin confirmed furthered fayth yit wee abyde styll beastlinesse vtterlye vnexcuzable hath shewed heertoofore boote v notwithstanding men stirring v vp early late come vnto god theyr offering foode lyfe vntoo v feede v withall wee haue bin confirmed day day intente wee want thing wee bee styll apcie lyke yong beginner knowe rule good lyfe wee blame none selues nother wee say wee bee silie ignorant soules god speaketh vntoo v darke language wee haue bin trayned vp knowledge truthe dispatched saint paule telleth v heere god hath ceassed preaching truth vntoo v twyce hath ordeyned gospell bee preached continually wee myght confirmed time lyfe thing wee conceyue vnderstand first bee repeted vntoo v layd foorth familiarly knowen tung ende wee myght haue larger confirmation wee profit calling v without ceassing wee see vnthankfulnesse apparant wee knowe iesus christ wee haue eares beaten long tyme gospell spoken vntoo v wherfore let v learne recken tyme well haue knowen god truth chyldhood come man state let thinke thus themselues ought bee great teacher aposte also sheweth epistle hebreweshebre fifteene twentie yeeres ago since came age discretion number men still behynd mee god calleth mee preaching gospell vntoo mee chaunce therby god sheweth care hath saluation loue beareth towardes mee seeing haue heard gospell long tyme without ceassing myght haue done fault self must needes looke terrible condemnation continew still beastlinesse agein let haue bin sometyme darknesse afterward inlyghtened thinke thus yeere fyue ten ago since god opened myne eye woord drew mee dungeon wherin left mee styll bin wretched forlorne creature hath voutsafed inlyghten mee knowledge truth precious thing bee rechlesse hearing receyuing therof agein syde god pitying rudenesse applyeth much bee capacitie insomuch dooth euen lisp yee would say shewe mee secretes sweete louing fashyon one feede little babe chawe meate end haue doo swallow downe shall notwithstanding continew dullard still let v marke well thing beare well mynd word paule sayeth onely wee haue heard iesus christ also wee haue bin taught bycause god goodnesse gospell preached vntoo v one day hath ringed long tyme already eares wee haue marke paule speaking doctrine gospell matcheth iesus christ according hath bin tolde v heretofore thing god sheweth v word knowledge iesus christ also end substance thereof therefore let v marke itrom intent wander wee would faynest profyte god woorde may haue alwayes certeine marke ame wee see number haue turned ouer scripture leafe leafe able make great report meane whyle wote effect pith amyng lord iesus christ much behoueth v marke well textes wherein shewed v wee knowe benefytes brought vntoo v sonne god power hath treasure vttereth towardes v wee haue trew vnderstanding gospell without iesus christ wee haue nothing verily wee ought prouoked theruntoo example name themselues christian yit notwithstanding wote sainct vow themselues say example see papistes gad vp downe without certeintie reedes bend euery wynd bycause stedfastnesse lord iesus christ bee iustly punished seeking although bee neuer stout owne imagination yit must bee fayne knowe end thing haue buylded forged owne heades nothing therefore haue touched already let v vnderstand iesus christ shooteanker wherunto god father calleth v wee must bee drawen thing apply wee haue vntoo cause paule dooth god name authoritie exhort warne agein haue heard iesus christ bin taught doctrine gospell furthermore saith yee haue learned well according truth lord iesus christ set downe purpose bycause number fickle headed folke fantasticall fellowes make great protestation full mouth bee christian though deuoured whole gospell yit haue nother wisedome discretion would god example therof ryfe adayes world man demaund euery whether would haue gospell yi else say runnes roundly without stop saying good cheape let man examine part haue profited shall scarce fynd one among hundred knowes good earnest belongeth iesus christ say men may lawfully eate flesh vppon frydayes mocke superstition poperie say gewgawes tryfling thing ease meane whyle man aske regenerated pacience newnes lyfe fashioned agein image god part wil shew neuer tasted truth gospell guibble barke neuer came substance adayes paule sheweth wel eue time many folk abused name christ wold needes take great christian yit neuer wist sonne god wherfore let v mark wel said paul find fault thing spoke needed amendment giue sharper check rebuke falsifie christ name wickedly abuse gospel making cloke wickednes paul making countenance bethinke better sayth yea sooth pray god ye haue learned shold say speak indifferetly al haue heard pure doctrine god howbeit forasmuch great sort wil wrest wring thing told take patch matter wote therfore haue good foundation buyld vpo short haue roote fayth yit al haue fidled ouer wote great clearkes seeming therfore looke wel sayth ye make vayne protestatio least ye co uicted falshood god angel name iesus christ ought holy taken vaine wheras enery boasteth christian yit notwithsta ding ye know end iesus christ giuen god father made parttakers redemption wee may inioy benefytes yee knowe certein bragging shall cost ryght deere haue full mouth protested selues bee christian yit notwithstanding knowe bee quality christendome ende apply effect thing wee haue remember vpon streyne behold saint paule telleth v heere wee haue bin trayned gospell beh ueth v differ ignorant vnbeleeuers god sholing v setting v aray alone selues fashion inlyghtening v e wanderer randon silly blynd wretch groping dark wee knowe ryght way saluation especially seeing wee dayly exhorted come vntoo giueth v meanes v fayth let v bee verye ware vnhallow holie thing truth gospel pure doctrine god wee vnhalowe know end god hath giuen v wee must beare mynd haue told alredy manie fantasticall person pretend christianitie wel ynough yit substance roote therfore let v looke well wee knowe whertoo wee bee called god bee disappoynted intent hee dooeth office schoolemayster towards v wee consider sheweth v way lyfe saluation lyke good faythfull teacher let v bee lyke schollers vntoo let v come truthe whereof saint paule speaketh sayth yee put old man corrupted earthly lust euen according conuersation yee haue led heretoofore expresseth yit better vaunt themselues bee disciple iesus christ yit notwithstanding leade lawelesse lyfe doo giue occasion offence churche falsaries man bring forth counterfet deede wherfore let v mark cursed trecherie wee say wee intend bee christianstitu professe also mouth yit notwithstanding go thing woorks wee protest woords sayeth saint paule another place taketh leaue doo euill yit wil bee taken bee number god child certeyn denyeth iesus christ whole lyfe much soeuer confesse woords therfore let v bethink selues consider wee meane bee allowed god wee must learne rid away old man woord scripture meaneth al haue nature wee knowe yee would say twoo welsprings mankind wit adam lord iesus christ respect first birth wee come welspring adam corrupted sinfulnesse nothing frowardnesse cursednesse soules standeth v hand bee renewed iesus christ bee made new creature cause dooth old man betoken wee haue birthryght father man bee let alone first state surely shalbee blynd wretch full rebelliousnesse spyte ageinst god bee short shall tend wholly vntoo euill wee bee altoogither saped thing ment old man least wee think saint paules intent rebuke vyces apparant men lyke men rebuke one hath played vnthrift tyme say must cast old skin heere saint paule passeth yit liking vtterly vntoward one drop goodnesse vprightnesse v thought wicked desyres affection rebellious ageinst god ageinst iustice furthermore wheras speaketh vnclothing putting similitude ryfe ynough wherby ment wee must giue ouer owne cast quyte away wee may bee clothed agein ornament wil adde anon see twoo partes ruling lyfe comming vntoo god one forsaking selues wee bee gouerned god spirit need must owne bee layd downe god take hand guyding v thought god doctrine affection commaundements wherby god haue v bee ruled fyre water therfore owne nature must bee cut god doo gouerne v cause wee must begin forsaking selues also verye order saint paule hath followed text wee must sayeth put old man secondly wee haue mark iesus christ sent v end repayred image god trew hath reconcyled v god father death passion sheading blud washeth v filthynesse setteth v free damnatio endlesse death offring hath made full satisfaction v insomuch resort iesus christ remission sinnes god free goodnesse accepteth v ryghtuous bycause passeth bee buryeth fault ceasseth fauour v childre notwithstanding wee bee wretched sinner benefyte receyue wee iesus christ yit must wee separate second poynt isiohn b coloss c b wee must bee sanctifyed holie spirit according saying hath receyued fulnesse grace end v drawe esayesay declareth spirit wisedome spirit iudgment spirit vpryghtnesse spirit feare god rested vppon neede himselfe intent wee receyue wee want according measure pleaseth deale vntoo v wee haue seene heretoofore cause paule second corinthian sayeth2 cor b became poore intent fyll v rich wee desyre receyued mercy god hand death passion onely sonne haue sinnes vnimputed v bycause hath made discharge payment let v learne also giuen v make v holy end bee gouerned holy spirit wee intend begin rule lyfe well wee must forsake selues fyght ageinst owne nature agein wee must note also christianitie v nother wee skill sonne god power office vntyll wee knowe wee ought bee repayred accordyng image god two thing wee ought marke well trew deserueth well bee layd foorth large howbeeit intent whole may knit toogither one linke let v note briefely wee neuer bee allowed god neuer doo seruice may lyke vnlesse wee enter intoo sayd battell offering force violence vntoo thoughtes affection subdew prisoner obeying god kill quyte cleane much concerning first poynt ende doctrine myght seeme needeth saint paul putteth ephesian mynd bin wee knowe men willing bee rebuked say bee loth abyde would rather bee spared insomuch warning giuen coulde fynde hart put farre syde wee bee newfangled man tickle v eare new thing wee doo despyze disdeyne example man speake v walking feare god knowes say wee let go preache little child many man say bycause seemes bee lost tyme speake thing well knowen dooth therfore follow bee familiar vse say doo wee knowe well ynough god must bee loued honored serued must absteyne theft extortion lying deceyt blasphemie whoredome thing greatest despyzers god ryght dealing yi let v herken saint paule telleth v heere go sayeth exhort put olde man yee saye haue aduyze selues well consider tyme god drew knowledge gospell wit yee folke lost vtterly forlorne assure selues naught exhort ridde away olde man yee bee quyte stripped yit dubble garment therefore yee must bee fayne labour earnestlyer nowe laye away residew remayneth styll agein syde telleth also must greeue bee exhorted though thinges spoken sufficiently knowen specially seeyng experience sheweth neuer knew order lyfe knowe behoueth v doo wee haue doo wee must also shewe lyfe well acquaynted god doctrine bee perceyued fruites wee haue roote v wee skill frame selues wholy god may bee sayd bee well learned former lyfe bewray v haue bin stray sheepe rather vtterly peaked away owne lustes remayneth yit styll smatch wee bee well clenzed requisite let v bow downe eares herken willingly thing wee see bee profitable yea needfull v saint paule spake alonly ephesian also v common wherefore oft seemeth vntoo v wee coulde well forbeare often putting v mynd one thing let v examine lyfe wee fynde selues yit throughly rid disease wee bee told let v abyde bee taught assuring selues ynough v haue doctrine god swimming brayne must bee well settled harte lyfe sayd afore may answer v wee bee learned good earnest saint paule hauing spoken old man sayth corrupted according lustes errour deceyt saying corrupted compareth agednesse soules agednesse wee see body man commeth old age becommeth weake respect strength bodie mynd forgoeth lustinesse hangeth wing bee short good half dead age dooth abate corage must looke styll towardes graue wayteth saynt paule taketh resemblance hereof old agednesse soule haue told alredie put away old agednesse soule old man forsake owne nature bycause altoogither cursed wee bring nothing v moothers womb good cleane therefore wee bee geuen owne imagination followe owne fleshly reason giue brydle affection soule old agednesse saynt paule sayeth meanes corruppted say lyfe god wee haue seene heretoofore let v vnderstand corrupt long wee continew old man say long wee continew styll owne state nature doubt wee thinke selues haue lyuelinesse ynough madnesse maystries wee trye shalbee breake neckes vntyll wee haue forsaken giuen ouer thoughtes lustes cause saynt paule speaketh purposely desyres lustes deceyt sheweth men blynded discerne diuell deceyueth intycementes setteth afore whosoeuer touched trew feare god let looce man say vnhappye creature wilt thou vndoo thy self answer seemeth serueth diuell bewhitched satan illuzions sort doo cleaue vntoo beecome starke doltes dullardes end wee learne flatter selues owne conceytes fall asleepe theruppon saynt paule telleth v lustes full deceytes say take se ues bee good cace yee haue owne wishing fortune yee terme hir smyleth vppon yee prosper thing euery yee want nothing behold al felicitie falshood bee short saynt paule ment warne v heere wee ought suspect selues desyres therefore man intend rule lyfe well must first formest mislyke consider euer imagineth owne conceyt illu ion satan wherwith deceyueth beguyleth many snare intangle sydes wee knowe shall haue profited greatly one day lyfe longe asmuch wee see number wretched soules cast awaye themselues vppon hope profit haue imagined owne head let v beware wee hold trade say wee follow owne good intentes men terme wee shall throwe selues headlong intoo destruction wee followe way owne nature dryues v owne lustes lykings deceytfull none shift laye asyde reason wee weene selues haue toogither intycementes satan world euery whit bee cast away wee well appoynted knowing sweetenesse serueth beguyle v sooner wee myght perceyue deadly poyson hid vnderneath thus effect wee haue beare mind paule telleth v vntyll yme haue learned denye selues holde selues prisoner vnder god woorde yea rid selues quyte cleane thinges wee haue selues owne nature wote christi nitie meaneth wee knowe whertoo gospell tendeth ende preached ynough haue put away old man wee must profit according warning giuen v heere good scoth paule taught ephesian receyued doctrine yit neuerthelesse exhorteth along tyme wee see hereby sheweth v v invre selues pacience lyfe long although wee haue alredy struggled greatly thrust affection lustes lykings vnder foote yit shall neuer haue ouermaystred selues wee shall bee throughly reformed therefore standeth v hand giue indeuer theruntoo labour tyme lyfe fewe woordes yee see stoutnesse wee must haue forsake owne lustes wicked thoughtes heereuppon wee must proceede second poynt wee must bee renewed ynough men mislyke themselues hate vyces shunning wee must also frame selues god according saying hate euyllpsal c doo good thing paule hath spoken hithertoo preparatyue set lyfe good order lyke man intendeth haue good crop feelde must first stubbe rid away bramble bush euyll weedes afterward plow harrowe sowe fruite spring labour therefore wee purpose beare fruite vnto god bee desyrous order lyfe wise name may bee glorifyed wee must first cause selues bee stubbed wee bee full naughtie affection thornes thistle therefore must bee cut away plucked vp roote afterward wee must bee tylled plow passe vppon v say lord maketh v feele iustice wee must bee sorie wee bee giuen naughtinesse may bee good tylth v god hand thing saint paule dooth hithertoo soweth good seede ende god may gather good fruite requireth v say may honored handes wee may shew wee doo verye deede thinke selues beholden thinges cause speaketh next beyng renewed mynd vnderstanding say must bee reformed thing throughout bee chaunged men may perceyue wee haue onely forsaken selues also god reygneth v without geynstryuing possesseth v affection thought according deserueth ryght well wee bee giuen wholly vntoo let v fall downe maiestie good god acknowledgment faultes praying make v feele may make v bee sory walke roundly away path wherein hath set v bring passe wee may consider end lord iesus sent v thing hath doone v may bee lost perishe leaudnesse carelesnesse wee beyng renewed may learne serue god holynesse ryghtuousnesse wee may well shewe great account wee make noble excellent redemption performed spared onely sonne sake let v saye almighty god heauenly father c xxx sermon tenth vppon fourth chapter bee yee renewed spirit mynd put yee newe man vvhich created god rightuousnesse holynesse truth vvherefore put avvay lying speake truth euery neyghbour wee bee member one another bee yee angry sinne wee haue lay foorth second part well ordering lyfe set downe heere saint paule wee must walk newnesse lyfe bycause behoueth v bee reformed god spirit intent wee may knowe chaunging must bee part whole saint paule taketh heere thing seemeth excellent estemed mannes nature namely knowledge vnderstanding wit reason maner abilitie mynd bee wisdome v saint paule sayeth must bee corrected trew reason self alwayes commendable wee bee corrupted adam sin cor b haue skil think much one good thought crooked full malice rebellion ageinst god although perceyued openly yit euer secret hipocrisie lurking ynough much condemne v god yee see thing wheruntoo wee must inforce selues wee purpose please god rid owne conceit affection wee get v new guyde wit god spirit according wh untoo vseth lyke maner sentence twelfth romanesrom speaking christian lyfe behoueth v bee transformed affection sinfull euery man may iudge euen thing seemeth faultlesse wit reason wee haue spoken bee short wee must bee sacrifyzed else lyfe bee alwayes vnholy vncleane sacrifyzing expounded saint paule text alledged laying away mortifying al haue selues trew perfection fyghting ageinst al owne nature wee suffer selues bee gouerned god spirit may bee perceyued wee bee vtterly chaunged ynough lyfe haue honestie worldward may bee commended good reputation among men also ambition vyces ly lurking within v must bee clenzed away lord must haue guyding v cause also doothe adde must reformed according god namely trew rightuousnesse holinesse lyke heertoofore condemned old man haue told alredie euer wee bring moothers womb sayeth wee must bee new creature cause dooth send v example lord iesus christ sixth roman saying wee must bee crucifyed dye namely respect old man also bee fashyoned lyke rysing agein walk newnesse lyfe trew vseth woords howeeit commeth one lyke lord iesus second adam must bee patterne v wee bee fashyoned image wee may lyke surely wil come passe owne nature yit exhortation needeth bycause holie scripture bringeth v lord iesus christ meaneth wee bee block woode wee come offer selues god may woork v deede twoo thing agree v ry well power v come god moueth v vnto good bringeth v
