selfe wee haue peece v tendeth euill yit sufficient excuce v wee therefore bee vtterly ageinst token wee belong nothing truely respect wee bee onely men adam sinne hath alienated v god theroutof spring malice spytefulnesse pryde excessiue passion wicked desyre reuenging separateth v god fulnesse goodnesse wee moothers womb adam sinne sayd afore yit must wee needes chaunge kynd pleaseth god reache v hand gather v knit thing agein one scattered asunder yi cause paule sayeth god deere beloued child heerein sheweth wee shall haue mouthes shet vnlesse answer god goodnesse bearing one another according also lord iesus telleth v mathewmath g follow heauenly father sayeth maketh sonne shyne vppon good bad say wee bee god child call vppon pretend name christian yit meane whyle bee despyzers god make though wee would defye shewing wee drawe aloofe vtterly ageinst kynd yi therefore let man deceyue himselfe let v consider wee bee onely full hypocrisie also vtterly past shame wee fashion selues lyke vntoo god yit needes bee hild taken child trew bee fashyoned lyke vntoo god resemble fully one man commeth neere vntoo another vnpossible yit must wee bee hart soothly wee must call mynd scripture sayeth wee go godward although wee bee farre marke wee ame yit dooth accept willingnesse wee keepe way indeuer continually go forwarde styll although wee bee slowe weake although wee trip stumble yit god imputeth none faultes vntoo v wee bee desyrous fashyon selues lyke wee shoote marke although wee bee farre short wyde yit dooth god take good woorth sayd ought giue v corage wee bee dryuen fashyon selues lyke vntoo god poynt poynt respectes ala could bee doone euen angel notwithstanding bee nothing holinesse god glorie shyne foorth yit farre short perfection god wee bee corrupted marred haue abundance naughtinesse plucked back turned away many vyces temptation satan trumpeth way yit haue wee reioyce lord beareth v accepteth dooings good part wee keepe toowardes manner following commaunded v heere trew wee must meane whyle fall asleepe say many doo would fayne lyke vntoo god doo wring mouth wee must consider euery day euery houre wee haue ill profited trew rule fashyoning selues lyke vntoo god theruppon condemne selues thinke thus good yisterday increaced since nothing rather seeming become colder maner must quicke vp selues fyght ageinst thing hinder v wee may indeuer go styll foreward come neerer neerer marke whence wee bee yit farre howsoeuer wee fare yit wil lord fayle esteeme v alwayes bee lyke bee trew follower wee willingly without hipocrisy forgiue haue offended ageinst v leastwyse example hath giuen v pardon farre greater pardon bee gotten handes wee beare vyces infirmity neyghbours wee see hath borne v myght iustly sinke v downe bottom hell yit forbeareth adopt v child seeing loueth v sort notwithstanding vnworthinesse v good reason wee resemble dooing although wee better prerogatiue naturall birth yit ought wee knowe god hath separated v asunder euen wretched paynim vnderstanding heereof sayd man lyfe tend vnto god bee fashyoned lyke vntoo image also full perfection happinesse agein added wee cannot resemble god better thing vsing gentlenesse one towardes another dooing good pitifull let v consider asmuch god hath made v welbeloued child v say enemyes nothing filthinesse v clogged many vyces woorthie bee lothed yit hath letted loue v good reason wee winke manie thing myght offende v hinder louing neyghbours holding saint paule hauing spoken god addeth also example lord iesus christiohn b heauenly father loued world well spared sonne deliuered death v iesus christ forgate regarded owne person1 cor b lord glorie submitted self reproche lyfe beginnig made self mortalliohn power god father made self weake loue v thing hand became poore2 cor b inriche v thing blissed became subiect cursing seing r lord iesus christ abaced self fashyon saint paule also sayeth another place setteth foorth example v sted gloriephil tooke vppon al shame2 cor sted ryghtuousnesse became sinesay offended blemishe spot bearing punishment sumes respect also scripture termeth name sin1 cor agein sted lyfe tooke death voutsafed bee cursed god world wee myght haue blissednesse meanes wee think vppon al ought pryde presumption al feercenesse scornfulnesse bitternesse layd away considering meane wherby lord iesus christ hath reconcyled v god father let v thinke wel vppon thing furthermore pull v downe breake hard hartednesse whertoo wee bee much inclyned saint paule sayth offered sacrifyze good sauour vntoo god father say freends well weyed grace fauour purchaced lord iesus christ would soone beate backe wicked affection make stomack thing yee would fyght ageinst vntill yee ouercome therfore bee kynd harted bearing one another seeing hath pleased god gather v intoo one flocke lord iesus christ dooeth dewtie shepherd leade v toogither shewe selues bee flocke sheepe rauening wooles somuch lord iesus disdeyneth v thing insomuch hath made offering sacrifyze owne person vntoo god father wherby hath wyped sinnes let moue v rauish wyts glorifie god doo homage lord iesus christ oft wee thinke vpon whereas sayth sacrifize offered iesus christ sweet sent sauor therby sheweth nothyng stynche v ende hath sanctifyed v ryd away infection filthynesse made v stynkyng lothly god sacrifizes offered materiall temple god sayd good sauour vntoo howbeeit respect men could come vntoo god reason sinnes bee infected therfore god must need haue shunned fulfilled lord iesus christ truthe shadowes law seeing let v vnderstand wheras sayd sacrifyze iesus christ offered sweete sauour god put away rememberaunce infection intent wee appeere face god wee must dayly prayer supplication sinnes may bee layd charge although wee bee disfigured like wretched leper nothing infection v yit may bee impediment god may imbrace v ryghtuous innocent bee companion angel fashyoned fully according image may bee doone euen bycause lord iesus christ haue spot wyped away wee may come head vpryght well assured alwayes make v fynd frute mercie hath told v let v kneele maiestie good god acknowledgment fault praying make v feele may draw v vnto trew repentance yit notwithstanding wee dout beareth v end wee ask mercie forgiuenesse assuring selues heare v wee keepe way sheweth v word reforme v according image wee may giue trew proof wee call vppon father wee couet nothing else also bee trew child let v say anmyghtie god heauenly father c xxxiiii sermon second vppon fifth chapter fornication manner vncleannesse couetousnesse let bee named among becommeth sainctes nother ribaudrie foolish talke iesting conuenient thing rather thanksgiuing yee know vvhoremonger vncleane person couetous body vvhich idolater hath inheritaunce kingdome christ god forasmuch wee see lyfe subiect many myseries assone haue scaped one daunger another come necke wee ought take better heede selues man haue care lyfe hee wyll bethinke fence himselfe ageinst colde ageinst heate ageinst inconueniences agein wil take heede mischaunce happen house making fyre goeth abrode alwayes thinking vppon aduersities woont befall men wee begin ende namely hundred tymes mo daungers within v wee see without v diuell hath many wyles wynd v number vyces doo make warre ageinst v therfore standeth v hand watch else haue ouercome one vyce bee easye another steale vppon v take v vnwares shall haue absteyned open force shall bee tempted defraud neyghbour couert policie despyzeth good world shall haue infirmitie bee giuen whoredome gluttony superfluitie othersome gamyng play bee short besydes euery v dispozed naturally wickednesse sinne man hath infynite sort enemyes fyght ageinst sayd wee bee onely inclyned one euill nature great number euen vertuous shall fynd themselues surpryzed handes therefore standeth v much hand marke exhortation conteyned heere saint paule hath told v many vyces already shewed v meane incounter put flyght addeth whoredome one syde couetousnesse foolishe talke full vayne bibblebable wee would thinke ynough v haue bin warned one woord walke godlily haue touched already let v consider little syde diuell woont assault men hath layd battrie cannot compasse purpose beginneth new agein hath gyuen skirmish ryght syde commes agein lefte one whyle another whyle behind alwayes fyndeth gap open intoo v one thing wee haue marke vppon exhortation made heere let v come paules speaking fornication vncleannesse forasmuch vyce men doo ouer easly beare withall themselues therefore warneth v ynough euery one v absteyne actuall whoredome wee st also consider god commaunding v bee chaste vndefyled meaneth wee bee well fenced ageynst intycementes whereby satan myght beguyle v kyndes whoredome whorishnesse made account among men yit shall fayle bee condemned afore god cause paul thought ynough tell v wee must bee chaste respeet bodyes addeth vncleannesse filthinesse ought bee farre v lykewyse matcheth couetousnesse trew bee two farre diuerse vice whooremonger wyll commonly bee prodigall wheras bin well thriftie forget himselfe wast away paules intent make article difference betweene vyce vyce nother needefull therefore ynough shewe many sort diuel might beguile v kepe good watch shet gate ageinst also preuent descry daungerswherin wee end practyze may alwayes fynd v garded vnder feare god may haue entrance vntoo v moreouer addeth afterward filthinesse vncomlinesse men take leaue bee wanton surely rebaudrie haue full scope example wantonnesse foolish thing bee permitted dauncing thing men say first may well borne withal worse let men beare suffer dauncing masking mumries lyke dung dout diuell haue fling cannot mean bee letted wil marde cause saint paule forbidding whoredome addeth also manner ribaudrie vnhonestie therewithall fond talk bodie would take bee greate harme man iest dally mayd wyfe prattle number thing sayd bee allurement satan bee suffered cannot bee mayd must bee made harlot though shee honestest woman world efffect thing wee haue beare mynd think ynough say god child must absteyne fron couetousnesse whoredome thing come neere vntoo intent wee may abhorre sayeth let bee named among without cause sayeth haue sayd alredy shalbe declared fully hereafter touching couetousnesse wil bee thought bee vertew man woorketh scrapeth toogither al sydes good thriftie fellow men clap handes men soothe although count theefe robber cutthrote yit notwithstanding haue good euery body think dooeth well maynteine self bee credit lo men flattered couetousnesse agein concerning whoredome wee see god woord cryed vppon vyce continually without ceassing would bee set libertie euery man would dispence self would bee honestie among men saint paule therfore perceyuing bee hard thing keepe men sayth much name ought suffred haue course ought driuen among v deede plague towne euery man keepe self cloce house bee afrayd go abrode perrill bee short men wil bee ware ynough keepe selues cloce disease catch yea generall commaundement also shalbee giuen keepe street cleane aire bee infected take away thing may feede increace mischeef meane must need vse still saint paule standeth vppon ceremonieexod b deede god sayeth expresly lawedeut b thou shalt commit aduoutrie thinketh ynough forbid whoredome intent wee abhorre hee sheweth v wee see talking vngodlinesse leaue giuen vse looce speeche euery man giue self custome go lawe men take whoredome bee lawf finally wee haue mark saint paules intent speake bare name whoredome much man set vppon scaffold bee shame world saint paule therfore spake bare name whoredome much bee sayd name couetousnesse talke yee couetousnesse sound ilfauoredly man acknowen atteynted put vppon taken welneere vertew saint paule ment men onely forbeare bare name myght make vyces themselues abhorred hated hee woulde rather whoredome shoulde bee named villanous thing men vnderstande whorehunter cutteth bodye lord iesus christ banisheth kingdome heauen cursed god angel thing must knowen agein couetous person idolater forsaketh god damned soule confounder ryght equitie possessed diuell tormentour thing standeth v hand knowe wherof wee cannot speake much wee knowe manner desyrous take libertie delyght sharpen wittes tell merrie tale saying remember mee thing thing doone tyme yea sticke report haue heard graundfathers themselues borne intoo world ribaudrie vnthriftinesse dooings lay open top end end euery body bee desyrous inquire filthinesse thus snare layd chatch v withall whensoeuer diuell shal haue wonne much handes yee see thing saint paule ment pleasant tale told make men merry intent euery man delyght whoredome bee ashamed giue themselues ouer leaudnesse also take lawfull thing may common speech may bee made table talke feastes ordinarie communication streetes euery else yea see haue iorney trauell meane euen poore people cannot solace themselues labour without offending god intermingling alwayes fond tale end serue euen harden men harte may thinke themselues euery man poynt maruell though lecherye bee made heynous matter behold man behaueth one also vyces bee made common seeming goale wonne syde cause saint paule sayth must bee named among v lykewyse dooth say couetousnesse euery man take vertewe pill aud poll lyfe long neuer leaue raking men good fraude extorsion yea men haue delyght followe say man myne acquayntance could well skyll vse practyze tricke trew couetous folkes speake malice say villein dooth nothing else catch scrape sydes trust cruel churlish bee short euery spyteth fellow ye see couetous sort rayle one vppon another couetous person intendeth confirme naughtinesse harden couer faultes say meete man bee forecasting knewe one one came foreward meane poore fellowe nothing hath behaued wyse hath hoorded vp well marrie good policie man fell intoo hand left heare behind left skin thus doo couetous folkes shroud themselues spoyling men vnder pretence good thriftinesse terme say vnder pilling polling lyke thing therfore wee see needfull exhortation paules sayth vyces must bee shet doores man speake must abhore make iesting matter among v feare least wee bee atteynted wee must marke also addeth al vvantonnesse folish fond talke sayd afore certein whoredome must needes growe lawfull among men suffer prouocations occasion naughtinesse one man would wilfully giue ouer himselfe satan therefore let v take heede selues driue enemie farre v let v bee sure lyghtnesse leaudnesse haue full scope must needes bee brothelrie stewes set vp one corner citie towne ouer place shall bee cleane experience sheweth much yit would men bee willing see euery man complaynes adayes chastitie world wonder tyme hath bin honestie sobernesse bee seene maryed woman count vertew bee mannish brazenfaste vtterly shamelesse men say woman chaste shee bee well tryed ho come sayes shee roysters fall dallying mee tush tell well ynough send away shall well fynd speake wote answer thus harlot play chaste wyfe though shee mirror honestie yit meane whyle shee wyll stand barryers lyke man armes ageinst commers holde talke hir leaudnesse ribauldrie therfore let v marke well paule telleth v heere woman haue bin suffered long tyme bee vnmeasurable bold besydes wanton talke also garish attyres hard discerne whether bee men woman must haue euery day new deckings trimming euery day new disguyzed fashyon make great cart wheeles lyke peacockes tayles man cannot passe within three foote hee shall feele wynd myll sayle flasking agein haue ribauldry songes myngled chastitie bee driuen away banished force contrary part trumpet sound sydes euery body giue ouer themselues superfluitie garishnesse seeke nothing else plundge themselues ouer head eares let v marke well disorder iestures countenance talke dauncing lyke fondnesse vanity loocenesse one man cut trench riuer conuey water wheras riuer runneth ordinarie course man cut streame drawe syde must needes haue course way men fall corrupting world fashyon deede one cunning trickes diuell hath vsed long tyme must needes go hauock bee vtterly past recouery yi therfore let v marke well sayd vntoo v heere wee heare iesters say god name men shall shortly bee poynt may laugh beemerrie dauncyng forbydden shall bee lawfull folke talke toogither good fellowe may bee bold come company man daughter talke vntoo hir loue matter man doo speake wyfe though bee sport shall bee turned cryme ende come shall bee stowrenesse sternnesse world men speake maner one proclaymed themselues bee diuels proctor aduocates infect poyson whole worlde might nothing loocenesse whoredome ribaudrie myght reigne libertie men myght thinke sin effect thing haue beare mynd heerwithall saint paule sayeth becommeth well saincts shewe ought disputing replying vyces bee condemned sharply wheruntoo dooth god call v poynt must wee come truely man say men frayle ala myght bee bold cast eye asyde giue pleasant looke bee condemned say man frayltie myght bee construed truely vyce would eyther bee vtterly lessened else made half excuzable let v come owne state god knoweth infirmity wil haue v welter hath voutsafed dedicate v seruis let v see wee make looce behauyours folie satan allurement sayd afore agree woord holinesse ment holinesse much say wee must bee sholed consist insomuch vnbeleeuers thinke themselues bee alyue vnlesse may delyght themselues foolish wanton dalliance doo linger pyne away wee bee prouoked lyke thing wee must consider honour god hath done v voutsafing dedicate v obedience wee nature v euen moothers womb wee bring nothing disorder wee bee cursed bee saped sin bee short top toe peece v giuen euill member instrument sin nother eye eares nother mouth feete hand exempted forasmuch wee bee full vncleannesse sin yit god hath plucked v backe reason wee dedicated vnto seing calleth v holinesse ought honorable tytle restreyne v taking vnbrydled libertie euery v could fynd hart take folowing owne lust bee short saint paule ment shewe v heere wee may fyght ageinst wicked lust follow nature surely though man inclyned lecherie yit shall haue vyces yea haue vyces v restreyned god brydle yit doth euery man beguyle self owne behalf bee doone wee must spare selues rather fight ageinst selues let v bee dismayd though diuell bee suttle wee tender easie bee soone shaken downe let v consider god calleth v contrarie holy thing therfore saint paule ment say first place armeth v setting v state wheruntoo god hath voutsafed call v goodnesse intent euery man gather strength giue way satan although wee bee sore layd yit wee yeeld victorie bycause god hath chozen v vntoo clennesse hath drawen v gentlenesse dooth also set downe horrible manace ought make heares stand vp vppon head therby wee see god indeuereth win v meanes sayeth bee saynts holy one therin god vseth sweetnes gentlenesse say child bethink selues haue created liue alauenture worlde haue therwithall adopted intent call heauenly heritage seeing haue redeemed blud sonne giuen spirit dwell end bee temple bee woorshipped go giue selues leaudnesse agein sted temple become stye swyne suffer affection bee dirt dung defyle withall fall wallowing agein myre yee haue bin wasshed made cleane yee child hold yee plyght haue set maner dooth god proceede v drawe v though yee would say half flatter v syde bycause see v cold wee abuze pacience touched quicke grace vttereth followe still owne lust threateneth v lyke father perceyuing chyld bee vnruly free disposition bee wonne first sayeth thus vntoo wotest thou though haue cockered thee suffered much thy hand yit must thou behaue thy self otherwyse play good chyld towards mee else go diuell thou wilt need continew still thy naughtinesse get thee gallows father suffer self bee mocked without redressing maner father indeuer keepe chyld good fauour bee possible see boote falleth threatening chyding breake stubborne hart euen dealeth god v therin wee see care hath welfare sayd afore saint paule therefore hath told v wee bee saintes addeth couetous person lechour vncleane man shall enter kingdome god haue part heritage purchaced v threatning sayd ought scare v else wee bee blockishe thing wee bee berefte god kingdome way wee must marke well woordes vseth sayth vvee shal possesse kingdome god christ twoo dyuers kingdomes expresse better inheritance belongeth vntoo v namely birthryght yit owne purchace free gift kingdome god heauenly lyfe al whole happinesse god wee haue vnhappynesse therefore wee bee banished god kingdome must need plundged miserie expresly sayd bee kingdome christ bycause purchaced v blud also bycause wee bee restored agein state whence wee falne father adam agein wee knowe inheritance giuen v lord iesus christ intent member adopted god meanes also bee parttakers peculiar first hebrewes called heire thing shell v vtterly bycause wee cannot otherwyse bee taken god child incorporated intoo bodie lord iesus christ belongeth wee bee reiected god wee bee cut benefytes haue bin purchaced v lord iesus christ come passe owne vnthankfulnesse ala wee bee blockish yea better expressing thereof saint paule vseth woord heritage inheritance say yee heires god kingdome moothers wombe consider great greef ought vntoo bee set besyde vnderstand kingdome god communicated vntoo lord iesus christ bycause hath purchaced made brother fellowes vnderstand yee besides bycause god hath adopted freely yit haue birthryght nother yee say owne otherwyze free gift seeing state inheritance yee bee leaud looze benefite offered shall god inuyte graciously glory shall offer ioy happynes kingdome heauen shall match owne sonne meane make possesse good thing wishe shall nothing woorth needes hold scorne refuze satan farre ouermayster wee see saint paule ment waken v heere earnestly meanes intent wee cannot bee drawen wholly vntoo god loue leastwyze yit threatening may doo v good moue v yeeld desyres may meane brydled lust ouerflow outrageously sith god sheweth iudge wee may leastwyze refrayne resist one wee would openly runne rushing ageinst seeing owne holy mouth hath auowed v bee banished kingdome heauen wee notwithstanding doo make none account thinges telleth v dealing furthermore whereas saint paule sayeth nother whoremoongers cuetous men vncleane person shall enter intoo kingdome god meaneth haue offended doone amisse reiected god say cleere vyces reherced heere meaneth whoremoongers couetous person looce liuers take pleasure lustes hardened settled filthinesse feare god hold backe wee heare sayeth corinthians1 cor b hauing made greater beadroll vyces hauing first vttered lyke sentence telling giuen vyces shall neuer come kingdome god sayeth haue bin sheweth faythfull also bin steyned lyke corruption yee bee washed made cleane sayeth yee bee sanctifyed god holy spirit blud lord iesus christ say nature yee miserable folke giuen leaudnesse willingnesse desyre haue serue god came selues god drawing vntoo wheras erst wyld beastes hath brought vntoo obedience wheras yee foule vncleane hath washed blud lord iesus christ wheras vnholy hath made holy holy ghost therfore fall wallowing plundging selues agein intoo vncleannesse thus trew meaning woordes effect wicked lead awlesse lawlesse lyfe say fyght ageinst lustes delyght naughtinesse shall neuer come kingdome god first faythfull bee renewed birth spirit god bee steyned sinnes wheruntoo mankynd subiect yea wee see wholy giuen vntoo albeit lord haue wrought v holy spirit dooth therfore followe wee bee well reformed first day euill v wee must bee fayne keepe continuall battell repentance lyfe long repentance take place wee felt sinne dwelling styll within v therfore suffyzeth reigne v paule exhorteth v sixth romanes paule telleth speaketh looke vppon former life must needes ashamed bycause strayed away forgotten god vertew honestie yee cannot sayth remember yee yee conuerted beleefe gospell yee must needes cast downe eye great shame yit notwithstanding telleth sinne must reigne mortall bodyes although dwell still deede bee wished sinne dwelling v wee lyke angel heauen saint paule knowing well wee cannot atteyne long wee dwell world vntyll wee haue put corruption bee dispatched transitorie lyfe wylleth v yit leastwize sinne reigne v although wee bee steyned many vyces yit let v fyght ageinst may become heynous crymes though wee rebelled ageinst god continew onely infirmity wee beseeche god forgiue v quite cleane acknowledging wee haue neede obteyne mercy dayly accordingly without cause teacheth v aske forgiuenesse sinnes yee see saying bee vnderstoode furthermore paul addeth wee haue seen alredy galathians couetous folkes idolater gala truely matter well woorthy bee discoursed lengthcolos nothing spoken may bee spoken agein howbeeit forasmuch handling epistle galathians declared paule calleth couetous folkes idolater shall suffyze touche pith matter fewe woordes touching vyces doo deede make v forget god inordinate lustes fleshe euerychone idol euery man haryed away thing desyreth setteth hart mynd vppon forgetteth god therefore may well bee sayd wicked lustes idol impeache maiestie god prouoke v stryue ageinst yea shake yoke betake selues vntoo satan neuerthelesse couetousnesse iustly called idolatry bycause certeyne man dooth giue himselfe theruntoo etteth whole felicitie therin lyke glu ton hath remorse shame naughtinesse lyke drunkard whoremoonger blasphemer yit shamefastenesse bycause cannot blynd men wyll speake shame although whole world clapped handes knew whit leaudnesse yit shall themselues bee inforced haue hartbyting yee see offend god way whatsoeuer bee shall yit bee hild awe feare haue remnant discretion left say doo amisse much euer soothe themselues fall sleepe yea euen vtterly harden themselues yit shall bee compelled feele pricking within couetous man dooth reioyce doyngs thinkes faultie nother god man gloryeth wickednesse hath fleeced one robbed another good deceyued one snared intrapped another theruppon casteth vp account say blissed bee god hath prospered mee well insomuch yee shal heare greatest cousiners world say thanked god haue made good hand day haue sped well moneth haue gone well foreward yeere yit enter intoo owne harte sift throughly shall fynd al theeuerie extortion craft deceyt howbeeit diuell hath stopped eye haue discretion conscience say euill done forsomuch couetous folke poynt haue feare god stay holde backe therefore termed idolater mischiefe yit woorse poynt set felicitie rich doo forget themselues thinke harme happen wherthrough bee puffed vp pryde thrust god hundred league prouerb sayeth therfore nought saint paule exhorteth riche men world1 tim trust good exalt themselues sayeth purposely bycause haue greate opinion rich feare god rather vtterly forget yee see couetous folk abuze rich setting whole hart vppon notwithstanding forbidden thempsal c prophet psalme weltring wyse owne seeming haue paradyse heere alreadye therefore cursed disposition insaciable luste couetousnesse1 tim b maketh men drunken blynd iustly named idalatrie lykewyse roote euill bycause couetous man seekes alwayes owne auayles whether bee hooke crooke murther treason periurie poysoning whatsoeuer meane else one may compasse desyre thence spring many trubbles contention much bludshed world poysoned othersome haue throts cut none cause insatiable gripplenesse couetousnesse trew ambition whoredome lyke vyces drawe sort foule inconueniences yit dooth discharge couetous sort atteynted let v mark well paule speaking couetousnesse doth iustly say doth subdew v satan maketh v forget god make v brutish wee stand feare god ne haue remorse conscience puffe v vp pryde god seemeth nothing v wee yeeld honor liuing god vnto gold siluer rich rank treason good cause bee made abhorre wee see holy ghost speaketh mouth apostle let v fall downe maiestie good god acknowledgment fault praying make v feele trew repentance greeued hartily sorie wee may sorrow offending straying way saluation wee may seeke nothing dedicate selues wholly vntoo may dayly cut whatsoeuer corruption v make v forsake world end whertoo wee redeemed clenzed blud lord iesus christ meane whyle voutsafe beare infirmity rid v continually vntill hee haue taken v world ioyne v ryghtuousnesse holinesse may please graunt grace v also people nation earth c xxxv sermon third vppon fifth chapter yee vvere sometyme darknesse novv yee lyght lord walke yee child lyght fruite spirit consisteth goodnesse rightuousnesse truth trying acceptable lord haue doo fruitlesse woorks darknesse rather euen rebuke wee knowe hard matter reclayme men euill custome bee inhardened vntoo mischeefe dooth easly take roote v bycause wee bee inclyned almost wholly giuen nature yit wee bee soone chaunged wee haue continewed along tyme dooing euill happeneth vntoo v vnto sicke folkes whose disease hauing gathered strength doo sticke bone meanes bee purged away great number folke giuen naughtinesse beare themselues many vyces bee called god touched quicke repentance therefore wee haue neede practyze doctrine saint paule teacheth v heere wit knowe wee haue hild aloofe god strayed way saluation wee must flatter selues make buckler excuce bycause become ordinarie thing v wee must pardon selues whit rather consider god hath pityed v drawing v euill wherein end chaunge v make power grace better knowen lyfe beareth witnesse wee bee men wee cause saint paul sayth text yee vvere darkenesse novv hath god inlyghtened say wee must respect eyther others doo hath befalne selues hope bee iustifyed acquit faultes meanes hath pleazed god reache v hand shewe v mercie adopt v child make v heires heauenly lyfe sted wee forlorne cursed damned afore grace ought preuayle greatly v make v become new creature among wee liue god giue brydle let alone men forsaken let v vnderstand shole v miserable taking therefore let bee looking glass vntoo v behold wretchednesse men followe owne lustes little ought offending sinning multitude couer faultes wee ought rather take warning withdrawe selues hold selues fettered vp vnder feare obedience god seeing sheweth speciall fauour vntoo v wherof residew abyde still ignorant vnbeleeuing depryued howbeeit better vnderstanding whole let v marke first saint paule hath shewed v heere state men generall vntill god haue drawen telleth v cause wee ooth selues vertewes insomuch speeche sayeth wee darknesse say nother lyght reason gouernement v rather wee bee become stark beast ught well make v cast downe eye submit selues humilitie deede many shall haue showe wisdome bee commended world well aduyzed men able guyde themselues whole lyfe also counsell direct others yit notwithstanding god auoweth stead hauing ryght wisdome reason wee bee brute beastes respect lyke saying warneth v sygh grone god also doth prouoke v seeke remedie necessarie well ruling lyfe suffer god bee maister teacher woord shalbee declared length anon also pray holy spirit may woork v wee may bee led ouerweening count selues wyse owne conceyt fancie yee see effect wee haue remember vppon streyne saint paul intytuleth men reprochefull name saying bee darknesse nothing vtter brutishnesse hereof haue treated alredy last chapter saint paule shewed men discerne nothing ne go destruction vntill tyme bee reformed contrarie part sayeth lyght lord shewe wisedome wee haue commeth supernaturall grace terme say wee haue inheritance nother wee father vppon selues altogither god woorking wee must bee linked lord iesus christ bee parttakers benefyte naught scripture saythesay god spirit giuen vntoo rest vppon full perfection therefore let v learne distrust selues know euer wee bring owne stand v stead turne v way saluation haue wisedome except bee giuen v god free goodnesse intent gather v vntoo make v member lord iesus christ sonne trew lyght wee shall see anone bee short one paule saye nature wee bee onely darknesse adam wee bee inlyghtened agein lord iesus christ sayd afore intent wee seeke none excuce alledging wee cannot put olde skin vtterly forsake thinges printed v shiftes tryfling passe account god contrariwyse intent wee learne examine well wee bee state tyll god haue redressed consider wee haue owne namely wee bring nothing cursednesse v moothers womb therwithall make grace effectuall god hath giuen v bee yee would say choked vnthankfulnesse malice wee consider well end lord hath reached v hand shewed himselfe pitifull towardes v namely wheras wee plundged darknesse bring v agein lyght wee bee called lyght lord onely bycause wee haue woord gospell burning cresset guyde v also bycause himselfe spirituall daysonne dooth therewithall inlyghten v inwardly god spirit wee see experience men fare neuer whit better hauing eares beaten doctrine truth one may take payne teache yit shalbee labour lost therfore lord must bee fayne make sonne shyne saye lyke hath commaunded ordeyned woord bee preached vntoo v also must giue v eye inioy lyght though sunne shyne neuer bright skye yit wee fynd nother frute profit vnlesse wee haue eye instrument receyue lyght commes aboue must god bee fayne giue v spirituall eyesyght conceyue thing taught v woord yee see meane wee become lyght lord one syde god sheweth v way saluation preaching woord vntoo v therwithall giueth v new spirit mind intent wee abyde ignorance wherin v nature saint paule vttereth meaning yit better addeth vvee vvalke child lyght nowe wee see heere onely prayzeth commendeth god grace stirre v vp gloryfye wee bee bound doo also therewithall sheweth vse say beware wyse yee thrust god grace vnder foote ne make vnauaylable vntoo calling knowledge lord iesus christ intent yee bee wholly chaunged tod bee brought vntoo lyght wee would haue sunne onely stande ydly gazing vppon lyke folke wittes thing wee better haue continuall nyght sunne must serue v apply selues buzinesse haue doo labour getting liuing euery man according charge office calling yee see wee abuze sunne bringeth v great benefyte euery v occupie selues thing wee knowe bee dewtie saint paule applyeth similitude spirituall daysonne wit doctrine gospell saying shyneth howbeeit v giue selues ydle speculation end wee set hand plough euery v looke wherwith ought doo seruice theruppon make lyght auaylable offered furthermore saint paule one place calleth v lyght addeth chyldren light come one end yit nought termeth v lyght serueth expresse better god grace offered v also imprinted v wee bee sort new shaped heere dooth itphil b also epistle philippian wee haue marke first tytle belongeth properly none lord iesus christ according sayeth lyght world walketh mee ohn b shall neuer stray yee see lorde iesus christ sufficient alone giue v lyght wee keepe selues aloofe shall fynd nothing darknesse nother heauen earth creature else wee speake god maiestie aboue heauens yea angel haue lyght borrowe lord iesus christ cause saint iohn baptist excluded honouriohn sayth lyght dignitie belongeth peculiarly sonne god inlyghteneth men come intoo world agein apostle preache god truthe also termed lyght degreemath b sayd yee bee lyght world belongeth properly vntoo bycause god serueth turne deliuereth word guyde others shew way saluation beareth candle lyght men doo reele stumble stray heere thing therefore asmuch god hath giuen v charge preache woord wee bee warned walke wyse euery man may bee edifyed lyfe yit meane whyle derogation honour lord iesus christ inlyghtened must thrust forth themselues fellow fellow lyke alone must continewe ly ht still wee inlyghten one another according saint paules saying text alledged aforephil b sayeth thus faythfull bee lampes burning world euen hauing woord god lyght scripture allotteth well teacher taught v must haue god woord must bee candle set vp aloft lyues must ruled thereby vnbeeleeuers may bee drawen fayth reformed else confounded put shame see lordes calling v profit scoole vayne yee see sense paule sayeth wee bee lyght lord namely bycause god woord ought bee burning lampe vntoo v guyde selues also shewe way otherwyse go astray hereunto addeth vvee bee child lyght doo v vnderstand lyght commeth elsewhere selues wee borrowe lyght worldiohn b haue alledged according whereuntoo sayd god father lyght also dooth scripture name agein lord iesus christ trew lyghtiames wherby god appeered vntoo v whereby wyll inlyghten v therefore wee child lyght say wee bee yghtened god lyght v namely bycause wee bee member lord iesus christ sayde afore communicate guydeth v lyght gospell inlyghteneth v also holy spirit forasmuch lord woorketh v fayth dreepeth intoo v measure himselfe thinketh good haue seene fourth chapter howsoeuer cace stand let v esteeme god grace woorthy deserueth theruppon turne owne benefyte disappoynted rechlesnesse wee may walke saye consider whertoo god hath called v euery v imploy inforce himselfe theruntoo hereuppon saint paule giues warning frute lyght goodnesse ryghtuousnessr truthe say speakes common fashyon men intendeth bring v vntoo god shewe v purpose serueth v christian trew vse learning wee haue gospell also power holy ghoste ought shewe self v wit well ordering lyfe three woords goodnesse ryghtuousnesse holinesse meaneth wee doo body wrong indeuer liue vpryghtly faythfully neyghbours also bee kynd harted hauing compassion one another beare paciently one another succour one another neede shall requyre trew thing requisyte christen man lyfe heere saint paule comprehendeth vnder one kynd say freends god singularly gracious vntoo v gathering v vntoo wheras wee strayed away intoo destruction wheras wee hild thraldome vnder tyrannie prince worldiohn e b diuell hath set v free made v member sonne lord iesus christ lo heere inestimable benefyte must wee shewe end lord hath vsed greate mercie towards v sayeth must bee knowen lyfe euen walking one another goodnesse say wee cruell dogges cattes giuen guyle craft malice deceyue wynd one another go soundly roundly thing deale vpryghtly euery v indeuer yeeld neyghbour dew man wedded owne profit greeue others whe life ordered maner shall men percey e beare frute lyght light also beareth fruit v say light god hath giuen v ydle lyke god hath inlyghtened v wee apply selues doo thing commaundeth appoynteth cause saint paule speaketh frute ryghtuousnesse according former saying told sunne giueth lyght world intent euery man sit still armes folded one within another intent wee bee foules flye ayre serue turne guyding v dooings frute vse sunne therfore gospell frutelesse thing woorking must shewe self lyfe wit ryghtuous kynd harted faythfull vnder woords saint paule hath compryzed thing belonging twoo table law told afore charitie serues make v forget belongs god seruis though thing small weyght maner scripture send v backe neyghbours speaketh seruing god certein wee loue neyghbours wee ought doo liue according god law god shall alwayes haue cheef ryght vntill wee bee ruled vnder awe euery v loue himselfe much desire drawe himselfe glorie himselfe bee short bee nothing v pryde uaynglory couetousnesse crueltie al maner deceyt vntyll lord hath brought v vnder yoke wee bowed selues vntoo obeysance honour serue blisse holy name shal bee doone yeeld men dewtie trew tryall record wee feare god shewe v wee liue world paule setteth downe three thing namely goodnesse say kynd hartednesse hauing pitie compassion vppon distresse releeue neede beare paciently infirmity thus much concerning woord goodnesse next ryghtuousnesse signifyeth vpright dealing wee take away man good go aduauntage selues hinderance neyghbours bee giuen pilling polling bee short contented whatsoeuer god giueth v without raking men good possession vntoo v last added truth contrary craftie packing leaud practyzes whereby wee labour draw men good v haue wee three thing certein charitie reigneth fully perfectly v thing haue remember vppon streyne wyll wee shewe trayning vp gospell hath bin vayne wee haue forsaken grace lord iesus christ let v liue vprightly euenly among men agein let v kynd harted bearing one anothers infirmity also succoring neede finally let v bee faythfull say let v vse craft suttletie let v bee soothfast wherin euer haue deale others let fynd v dubble thing therfore effect wee haue beare mynd god inlightening v end plundge selues darknesse wee haue taken lyght wee also indeuer giue light wretched vnbeleeuers wander reele stumble lyke breake neckes bycause bee silly beast maruell haue lyght guyde themselues trew shall excuze shall alwayes bee giltie god ignorance matched malice shall wee syde haue lay selues wee stray away seeyng god hath inlyghtened v woord holy spirit knit v lord iesus christ daysunne ryghtuousnesse haue declared alredie hereupon paule telleth v must trye examin thing please god reacheth hath sayd sheweth v trew rule wee followe wee cannot doo amisse namely frame selues according god willpsal b truely know feare without cause called trew wisedome wherof commeth men ouershoote themselues intoo euillprou c bycause forget god bury rememberance name maiestie haue god myndes shall euer bee restreyned brydle although fleshe tempt euill yit resist consider long lyue worlde must spend lyfe seruice gaue myndes bee vppon god surely arme v giue v strength ageinst temptation paule sayeth heere must examin well thing please wherin wakeneth vp rechlesnesse foresayde despyzing god spake twoo thing one men fall eepe soothing themselues thinke euer shall come account theruppon doo rest soundly v make good euill afterward fall outrageously flinging themselues aladuenture ageinst god therefore ynough v fyght wilfully ageinst god play wyld beastes mad bulles push euery way horne ynough wee must bee watchfull inquyring throughly lawfull v wee may discerne betweene thing god permitteth thinges disalloweth bee short first thing saint paule sheweth v heere hat lyfe shall neuer well ordered vntill bee wholly conformable god marke one poynt secondly haue told wee must thinke god forgiueth carelesnesse wee doo wilfully shet eye contented go astray without taking great heede behoueth v stand vppon gard seeke diligently god alloweth twoo poyntes wee haue marke touching first poynt wee see men haue alwayes taken leaue age followe owne inuentions terme soothly hath euer bin common prouerb intent iudgeth men trew part men haue misexpounded misconstrewed vnder presence euery man hath imagined bee cleered god bee taken ryghtuous intent offend maner hipocrites weene themselues well haue inuented sort folly superstition beare themselues hand god ought take good woorth bycause weened good god deales according imagination wee see men foully beguyle themselues imagining ynough haue good intent meaning terme euen therefore nothing hellish confuzion poperie bycause haue forsaken god woord regarded bade forbade tooke leaue doo thing came euery man fancie al vnder colour men bee iudged intent trew sayd afore intent iudgeth men respect although wee doo commendable woorke deuyzed yit shall wee fayle bee condemned god hand bee doone ryght end honest dealing bee outward apparance get report wee bee henestest men world meane whyle vertuousnesse dung filth within showe honestie bycause intent leaude crooked yit sayde afore wee must take head doo whatsoeuer owne brayne teacheth vsrom cheefe wisedome seeke god according wheruntoo saint paule sayeth reasonable seruice god commaundeth v wherin obedience shalbee well allowed wee needes doo vppon owne head god reiect reasonable trash trumperie satan wherefore let v marke well told v heere wit wee must seeke difference betweene good euill weying god balance owne say seemeth mee thinke bee good take taste let v beware saye bringing rashnesse v let v bee little child newlye weaned teate let v learne god suffer selues bee guyded gouerned wholly yee see humilitie beginning serue god well wee bee puffed vp caryed away ouerweening rash say weene thinke contrariwyse thinke thus god hath spoken woord although seemed bee best excellentest thing world yit notwithstanding would fayle refuze bee forbidden god cause expresly sayddeut thou shalt doo thing seemeth good thyne owne eye cause wee forbidden bee wyse owne conceytes let v assure selues taught god infallible wisedome soone wee step asyde sheweth v wee bee wanderer though wee wyzest outward showe best esteemed world bee short wee see euer men bring owne stand sted onely condemne nothing guyde v god rule whereby wee may say noughtwoorth good seeing diuell hath gone bereeue v benefyte behoueth v much stand vppon gard say heedfull apply wit throughly seeking god wee carefull ynough temporall profit men neuer lyghtly take thing hand without forecasting wel may insew say behold shall cast selfe intoo daunger agein serue turne way else may hinder mee hurt mee heedfull ynough seeking thing belong flyghtfull lyfe meane whyle wee step forth aladuenture seruing god although pretend great zele seeking heauenly lyfe yit shew therby wee make none account euer wee doo fashyons sake taskwoorke therefore let v marke well men shall bee sore condemned rebelling ageinst god wilfully set purpose harden themselues frowardnesse trew men shall doo thing without looking neerly yit must looke whether god lyke thing wherin wee must bee wyzest best aduyzed make owne profit manner world counteth wylyest folke wyzest get v spirituall discretion know thing god alloweth followe heeruppon addeth also wee must haue doo fruitelesse woorks darknesse rather rebuke added without greate reason although bee well dispozed frame lyfe according god woord yit shall wee bee shouldered wee learne resist temptation truely although wee sawe vyces v withdrawe obedience god yit haue store vyces alredie v must need haue profited well god schoole beefore wee bee disposed submit selues true obedience say lord reigne thou ouer v let thyne bee rule yit let v put cace wee come farre foorth feele resistence geynsaying selues wee could subdew affection myght sort bee ruly yit notwithstanding diuell neuer ceasseth assayle v syds one whyle lyght biekerings another vndermyning another whyle giuing alarum open assault wil soone ouerwhelm v except well fortifyed god haue giuen v inuincible power withstand pollicies cause saint paule addeth wee haue doo vnfruteful woorks darknesse say freends knowe well vneazinesse going vntoo god world wil blocke keepe backe dooing dewtie although yee knowe god ought haue maystrie wee ought bee vnder subiection yit notwithstanding yee bee conuersant despyzers god vnholie person hard walk vncorruptly looke many vyces reigne many infection atteynt hard scape vnperuerted lyke cannot bee wee must feele pricking whe walk among thornes forasmuch abundance corruption whole world man scarsly remoue one foote shall stumble vppon euill standeth v hand haue greate strength maynteyne v vnimpeached seruing god else must vtterly urned away fron obedience excuce v sayeth saint paule wil boote v alledge ala shall doo poore frayle creature god set mee alone self could serue better heere among many vyces must need doo men doo pill poll whoremonger drunkard swearer finally see much wickednesse maketh hart quake seeing hemmed thing doo extremitie wee alledge geere say vayne wherfore let v learne prepare selues wyse seruing god wee may stand obediently battell ray resist temptation trew wee shall haue much adoo bring passe yit god bee strongest wee pray gouerne v holy spirit gouernment serueth subdew v dominion also giue v victorie ageinst thing satan practizeth ouerthrowe v yee see wee call vppon god put selues guyding certein wee shall haue ynough make v keepe way notwithstanding world ful wicked stoppes thrust v way thing haue remeber vpon streyne besyds good mynd wee must haue submit selues vntoo god besyds lowlinesse accept receyue whatsoeuer god commaundeth v frame whole lyfe therafter wee must also armed fyght ageinst assault satan maketh ageinst v though see whole world set vppon naughtinesse wee must think may serue diminish fault god consider exercyze v fashyon yit notwithstanding wee call vppon put whole trust working holy spirit surely wee shall obteyne victorie ageinst euer satan trump wayes yee see wee may ouercome thing hinder seruing god finally paule following still imilitude brought afore telleth v wee must haue doo woorks darknesse say wee must bee separted vnbeleeuers wee liue aladuenture though god wrought v though word done v good al much trapled iesus christ vnder feete abolished frute death passio defyled blud fountaine holinesse si h let v looke retyre darkenesse haue doo wyse calling name frutelesse woorks shewe v wee bee mingled vnbeleeuers worldlinges despyzers god wee shall receyue poore reward shall yeeld v fruite gayne wee taking leaue doo euill vnder colour part world giuen wickednesse nothing must reape reward euerlasting death follow one another fashyon let v looke neerlyer selues men pardon selues lyghtly seeke nothing else keepe themselues fast fettered vnder subiection father satan cast themselues intoo bottom hell ala wretched libertie saint paule therfore telleth v expresly wee ought little intermeddle selues corruption world wee rather indeuer amend take libertie doo euill vtterly ouerthrowe themselues wee ought bee hild obedience god woord holy spirit may serue v inuincible power fyght ageinst assault wee may bee armed furnished therwith may bee vntoo v bothe helmetephe c brestplate harnesse swoord wee shall see heerafter let v beware walk world wee may serue god trew constancie bee turned trubbles impediment lettes stoppes bee layd way let v fall downe maiestie good god acknowledgment faultes praying touche v repentance wee may bee sorie rid away strengthening v feare keeping holy commaundementes meane season beare wyth infyrmities vntill wee bee quyte cleane rid make v profit day day doctrine wit remission sinnes vntyll wee come perfection rightuousnesse glory let v say almightie god heauenly father xxxvi sermon fourth vppon fifth chapter haue doo vvith fruitlesse vvoorkes darkenesse rather rebuke thing vvhich doo secret shame euen name thinges layd open vvhen bee rebuked lyght lyght layes thing open vvherfore sayth awake thou sleepest arise dead christ vvillinlyghten thee wee haue seene morning although bee many thing world turne v away seruing god yit must therfore swarue though myght serue v excuce haue bin stumbling blockes world tymes remedie doctrine wit god child must stande vppon gard corrupt themselues companying v beleeuers bycause god hath sholed asunder ynough v bee drunkardes whoremonger theeues murtherers wee must also shun manner euill wheresoeuer bee deede wee ought begin alwayes seluesluke f hipocrites alwayes spye mote neyghbours eye yit beare great stone owne without feeling wee bee ryght sound iudges let euery man examine begin condemning vyces let v consider well whether wee selues bee faultie wee may first formest make owne indytement god hating euyll selues howbeeit wee must also shewe therwithall wee loue god better world maynteyne selues fauour freendship wicked foading faultes flattering cause paule addeth wee must rather euen rebuke woorkes bring nothing vtter cursednesse serueth onely shewe zeale wee haue god bee honored also withdrawe sillie soules way destruction bring backe agein intoo way saluation lo heere twoo cause ought moue v reproue euill one must irke v see god offended men prouoke wrath ouerthrowing order hath set seeyng god meane despyzed woord troden vnder foote ought greeue v according psalmepsal b sayd wee ought receyue selues reproches offered god also ought dewtie haue care redeemed blud lord iesus christ wee see soules go damnation cost god deere make reckening scorning blud lord iesus christ euen cause also dooth paule tell v inasmuch wee bee separated euill intent wee companion despyze god wise bee lyke wee must vttermost power shew hate end beyng meanes ashamed leaudnesse may bee touched repentance wee haue profited farre shall bee great gayne haue drawen backe wretched soule way destruction maner speaketh saint iames exhorting v doo saying thing shall gayne itiam shall saue soule loozing although men bee hardened sinnes yit great purpose v shew zeale haue honoring god woord bee impeached order broken hath set without declaring displeazeth v man bee knowen bee good faythfull subiect suffer man speake euill prince without setting himselfe ageinst lykewise chylde shall bee taken vnkynd vnhonest heareth father wrougfully lamed defaced maynteyneth honour honestie god souerein prince yi although wee bee wretched woormes earth vyle caryons yit dooeth honour vntoo v adopt v child wicked heathenish folk deface maiestie darken ryghtuousnesse yea indeuer plucke dominion wee dissemble excessiue intollerable leaudnesse therfore let v mark well told v heere standeth v much hand mark text bycause vyce hath reigned world age namely according euery man lesse desyrous flatttered dothe ea yer beare men maner wee haue seene heertofore wee ought haue compassion weake vse pacience towards cleane contrariwyse wit wee bee contented feede euill enter continually willing confederacie toogither intent men sift v narrowly vyces let v alone doo wee list wee giue euery man leaue take lyke libertie self cause thing order adayes world agein wee bee loth prouoke man displeazure ageinst v insomuch leuer betray god betray neyghbours bothe bodie soule vse libertie god spirit commaundeth v wee see wretched man play naughtipacke let follow owne swindge say wee mak matter v wee wil discontent agein see othersome peruert order iustice infect whole people countrie wee passe ouer easly without speaking ageinst bring self displeasure man authoritie let bodie leade daunce willingly say amen hanged iebet whyle desert godhamercie mee meane whyle go put hazard matter thus vyces passed ouer nowadayes yit god giue ouer ryght sayd sentence shall stand inuiolable behalf according shall wee condemned full treason wit wee shalbee hild companion wicked wee play blynd deaf beast wee restreyne naughtinesse setting selues ageinst much v lyeth doo suffer god honour bee abaced honestie ouerthrowen wee say nothing therfore ought wee bee attentyue warning rebuke euill sayd afore shewing vttermost power wee mislyke also diligent let lye power doo euery man imployed self sort surely wee see another maner soundnesse world cause god name much blasphemed blasphemy cloked euery man leuer defyle self men leaudnesse purchace disfauour mislyking say lyke cace drunkennesse lecherie robberie extorsions wanton dooings committed wee zele commaunded v heere saint paule surely wee much corageous stout rebuking doo amisse syde also wee shewe selues haue loue kyndnesse among v wee suffer good men bee trampled vnder foote misuzed wee ought reache hand agein men ules go destruction wee remedie though god haue doone v grace place v sted office sauing thing way bee lost damned paule hauing spoken addeth confirme doctrine quicken vp slothfulnesse v cause vvhy vn eleeuers take libertie doo euill euen bee ashamed speake hyde themselues men haue feare god therefore take themselues bee well hydden theese perceyues body neere rifleth cubboordes breakes open doores filcheth catcheth caryeth away uery well bycause cannot yit bee conuicted afore iudge beares himselfe hand scaped quyte cleane robber murtherer get intoo blynd nooke thinkes himselfe well hidden finde man astray hee pulles hym strippes woundeth yea cutis throte cannot otherwise mayster hym hee thinkes himselfe well escaped bycause man see lyke cace deed wee bee ashamed men afrayd god scripture cryes thought must come account wicked deed shalbe punishedpsal also euen thing wee thought haue bin buryed last day book shalbee layd open say nothing shall bee forgotten except wee haue obteyned grace promised psalme namely god forgyueth me doone without repentance inhardened euill doo make mo ke put shame men let god doo bee growne brutishe cannot wake consider harden harte ageinst souereine maiestie god therefore vnbeleeuers despyzers god get couert lurking hole sort vyle lycentiousnesse among man would bee ashamed thinke doo say saint paul addeth vvhen bee rebuked mischeef discouered libertie cut bycause brydle bycause bee blamed afore men also bycause feele themselues haue doo heauenly iudge dreadfull thing fall intoo handes bee short saint paule ment shewe purpoze rebuking may serue wee vse ryghtly good zele charitie haue told alredie wee must vse hipocrisie iustifye selues condemning men euery v hath well examined owne lyfe hateth vyces wheretoo wee bee subiect wherein wee bee wrapped let v indeuer bring selues home vntoo god praying strengthen v power holy spirit wee may stryue frame selues according ryghtuousnesse doone let v flatter doo amisse let v tell freely thing may doo good profyt come thereof sayeth saint paule god shall bee greeuously offended wee see moreouer whereas men past shame afore may meane bee brought honestie whereas seemed leaue doo manner euill shal repent themselues drawe others repentance much ought followeth moue v say wee line world inioy infinite benefytes god bestowed vppon v meane whyle suffer authoritie bee defaced euen may seeme men would plucke seate blaspheming holy name men shall prouoke anger wee let slip must wee needes bee arrant villein traytors wee found man cost one rayle vppon owne house practize murther robbe good defyle wyfe intyce chyld naughtinesse wee meane whyle sit cramming selues eate bread drinke wyne bee short bee fed maynteyned charge yit let alone say nothing wee deserue bee stoned haue men spit face yi certeynly vyce vnthankfulnesse shall alwayes bee condemned euen among men wee bee much bound vntoo mortall man maynteyne honour honestie wee bee found free cost ought wee doo god wee house long wee liue world haue wee much one droppe water goodnesse liberalitie behold god hath fatherly care v yit notwithstanding wee suffer name bee blasphemed maiestie bereft spoyled al reuerence woord bee torne peeces order hath commaunded bee broken church wyfe bee corrupted misuzed child bee intyced naughtinesse meane whyle wee play mum bowget would fayne knowe whether silence doo sufficiently shew wee bee woorthie eate one bit bread bee counted number earth woormes lyce cimies vylest filthyest thing world therefore let v thinke well vppon wee shalbee found giltie despyzing god maiestie wee see bycause wee rebuke men vyces cause wicked heathenish sort waxe bolder thinke world runne wheeles syde tryumph despyzing god fashyon commeth partly silence thing paule ment shewe v heere followeth moreouer wretched soules lord iesus christ hath bought deerly spared haue saued doo perish giuen intoo satan possession sufferance meane whyle wee make none account doo wee therein bewray wee haue much one drop charitie v yi cause sayde dooing wee bee traytours god neyghbours wee haue better zeale towards god name better care neyghbours welfare doth world see euery way wee bee full crueltie vnkyndnesse crueltie meane towardes men wee suffer perish euen knowing looking vppon vnkyndnesse towardes god bycause wee yeeld honour deserueth wee haue corage shewe leastwyse wee mislyke men derogate god authortie reuerence owe therefore whensoeuer wee bee afrayd prouoke men displeazure purchace ill let v thinke vppon thing told v heere namely wee ought leastwyse feare lord whose wee bee seeyng wee bee fed cost wee must abyde see leaudnesse committed ageinst without shewing much possible vttermost power abilitie wee doo vtterly abhorre thing say farre wee tymes mouthes shall bee shet wee shall bee able doo sigh lament vtter disorder men become lyke diuels let looce flinging intoo furiousnesse ageinst god beare swoord seeke nothing make confuzed medly intent goodnesse may forgotte sayd haue none remedie bee sorie according sayd loth greeued hart bee sodome2 pot b therefore let v forbeare let euery v prouoke himselfe greefe sorowe wee see thing order let v gyue recorde farre may doo good agein hope v win vnruly let v continually assay draw repentance yea let v streyne selues many men alledge prouerbe lyghtly man must cast perles among swyne beare selues hand men swyne haue tryed bee though haue bin lyght behauiour yea euen looce lawlesse diuell hath sort caryed away yit must wee labour win agein1 cor c haue good hope according saint paules saying charitie hopeth well thing vntill tyme men shewe themselues vtterly wilfull euil disease appeere bee vtterly vncurable let v indeuer bee good phisitions aduyzements god shall put intoo mouth yee see paule intended saying vnbeleeuers thinke themselues bee hidden bee perceyued rebuked bee let go rouers bee darke theruppon conceyue boldnesse doo wickedly wee bee partly cause cannot wash handes god setteth v roome behalfe giueth v woord hath authoritie condemne euyll yit notwithstanding suppressed thrust vnder foote marke one poynt contrarie part wickeddest men world bee rebuked perceyue shame whereas discerned whyte blacke man bee darke seeth nothing staggereth stumbleth though bee neuer much berayed yit perceyueth therfore god woord set afore men shewe offender faultes libertie requisite much wee shewed glasse sayd see thou art thou art fowle filthie may bee art thou ashamed see thy selfe go washe thy muzzle warning alwayes win thus much howbeeit alyke men sayde afore many hardened satan possesseth god hath giuen vp wilfull stubborne mynd bee past shame neuerthelesse whensoeuer faythfull man dooth dewtie wyll alwayes doo good profit come insomuch erst wood beastes wyld bullockes returne man shall see honestie therefore let v win poynt bee possible v leastwyse let v streyne selues win yee see haue gather vpon wordes saint paule touching woord rebuke signifyeth properly discouer thing hyd allotteth office vntoo preaching according wheruntoo taunteth vaynglorie reigned churche corinth cor speaking straunge tung intent bee commended men myght say man greate clerk man speake language yit meane whyle edifying lykewyse dayes popedome organes pyping one syde chaunting fower part syde store gewgawes simyle people rauished neuer whit edifyed saint paule sayeth wee bee come togither name god wee must indeuer fare better may bee yeth good men alredy inured feare serue god edifyed woord also vnbeleeuer come erst mocker neuer remorse conscience heare vttered name god wit wee cannot scape god hand must need come iudgment seate lord iesus christ deerly iesus christ hath payed v trayterousnesse v make sacrifyze death passion vnauaylable say vnbeleeur heares wee bee exhorted feare god stirred vp loue infinite grace vttereth towards v although erst brute beast sayth paul yit shal enter bee rebuked vseth woord vseth heere meaning wherof is1 cor wheras coscience good dead afore maner brutish inforced enter examination self bee ashamed could giue glorie vntoo god befalleth indifferently wee see number folk gone astray forgotten god regard owne soule helth shalbee touched one sermon appeere bee chaunged lyfe looke doone common assembly ought euery man practyze self bee heere intent euery man profit self intent wee also teache one another mutuall instruction maner must wee rebuke offender end may take libertie mocke god fashyon shake yoke wander naughtinesse effect thing saint paule intended shewe v heere confirme doctrine better addeth yit one reason lyght sayeth layeth thing open heretoofore tolde vsephe c wee bee inlyghtened god spirit gospell wee must bee lampes giue lyght intoo world wee haue woord lyfe serueth guyde v also drawe intoo ryght way haue gone astray going forward herewithall sayth nature propertie lyght discouer therfore wee suffer naughtinesse nestle grow still deeper deeper huththermuthther shew well nother lyght child lyght say wee belong awhit nother god iesus christ short saint paule meaneth wee cannot giue proof christianitie fayth hating abhorring euill much possible may haue full course sway let v think vppon selues agein sayd none v faultie fearing men god winking others end shoulde wink v bee inquisityue dooings lo wee betray one another silence yit another vyce woorse cut dsquare namely besyos dissembling wee doo also help feede euill meanes whoredome hath ful scope bycause euery man woman playes baude wheras say euery one meane men woman adayes doo wink al maner leaudnesse misorder stoppe eares thing myght well heare euery man seek conceale fellowes leaudnesse men men woman woman myght remedie greate sort enormity committed rather go eray gownes cote folkes dung filthinesse discouer vyces bee short euery body playes bawd effect concealing neyghbours vyce end shoulde doo much lyke cace sinnes yit notwithstanding sayd afore god hath spoken vaine wee shall one day feele execution sentence speaketh heere apostle bee late forethinke v wee knowe let feare god learne remember sayd heere god inlyghtening v end euery v examine himselfe bee blynd wretch groping dark stuble one syde runne ageinst thing know way saluation moreouer teache men also discouering euyll lay hidden end haue turned backes vppon god well appayd haue bin darkenesse styll may vnderstand must bee fayne come lyght whatsoeuer come way therefore v shewe deede good earnest wee belong god inlyghtened holy spirit woord discouer thinges else lye lurking long tyme wee drew forth intoo lyght trew charitie couereth multitude sinnes sayeth salomon behoueth v bee pacientprou b beare many infirmity meete wee diffame one another1 pet b diuerse stead warning see offend fall sowing abrode newes streetes market place full yea inhaunce matter small scape make deadly crymes therefore saint paule biddeth v discouer men ment wee defame one another manner wretched man eye blyndfolded satan bee made perceyue owne miserie naughtinesse myght bee ashamed woman giuen ouer hir self vnchastitie myght bee made recouer honestie returne agein intoo ryght way put shame hauing hir faultes vyces layd afore hir manner discouering backebyte one another taunt vpbrayd one another play hipocrytes streyne gnatmath c swallowe vp oxe sheepe morsell say make conscience small lyght matter see number great enormity suffer passe hard nozes without beeing whit offended wee must doo wee see mischeef fed increaced vnfaythfulnesse let v prouyde let euery man bee compelled thinke better vppon vppon vyces may amend effect carefullnesse saint paule inioyneth v heere meane rid away plague satan would haue maynteyned still silence dissimulation therefore whensoeuer wee perceiue impostume lying hid let v beware matter settle long within till disease become vncurable let v purge hand let admonition serue launcers letting blud meanes helpes take away rotten matter myght marre infect whole bodye yee see effect wee ought put doctrine vre heeruppon saint paule inferreth therfore lord iesus christ doctrine gospell speaketh falne aslepe sinnes good dead intent vvake ryze vp shall wee beee inlyghtened wee haue heere remember first iesus christ dooth rayse v deade calleth v fayth bringeth v intoo hope saluation intent wee perceyue state better wee see men sooth glorifye themselues although bee nothing vtter confuzion yit notwithstanding needes put hor e lyke suayles vaunt themselues despyte god nature scripture sayeth wee bee dead wee may well haue resemblance lyfe wee bee conuerted fayth iesus christ howbeit lyfe death god cause sayd saint iohniohn c houre come heare voyce sonne man shall liue though bee dead shall passe death lyfe iesus christ speakes visible death resurrection hope latter day sheweth v wee haue alredy preparatyue second rising agein god reneweth v giueth v spirituall lyfe wee doo nothing euill hath bin declared heertoofore saint paule also vseth phraze speeche namely wee bee dead godward following matter heere sheweth v whole drift gospell ryze dead long wee bee straungers god welspring lyfe wee dungeon bin better v neuer haue bin borne wee must wake one part death blockishnesse wherin wee bee according declared heeretoofore wee bee corrupted afore hand euen moothers womb wee fynd sauour well dooing wee bee starke blynded wicked lustes diuell dryueth v thrusteth v foreward wyze long god giueth v brydle wee doo nothing grub downe bottom hell sinke selues deeper bee wee come poynt sorinesse paule sayd aforeephe nothing stubbornnesse god nothing v nother haue wee feeling perceyuerance sinnes cause sayeth heere wee must wake bycause wee deadly sleepe vntyll god stirre v vp make v perceyue wee bee wee may abhorre sinnes returne vntoo enterance lyfe saluation god visiteth v grace wheras wee dead wretch nothing v vtter corruption mark one poynt secondly let v marke besydes naughtinesse v also great hardnesse wilfulnesse god must bee fayne wake v force wee may haue feeling vyces mislyke trew doone cheefely god calleth v pulleth v confuzion wherin wee yit must euery christian continew therin tyme lyfe wee shall neuer bee throughly awake wee shall haue neede god stirring vp v still according yee shall see folke heauie asleepe euen clothes bee vp vppon feete go reeling styll bee halfe slumber v tyll stretch foorth themselues set handes buzinesse bee heauie dumpishe still slumber euen waking euen v although lord iesus christ haue doone v grace draw v backe death quicken v holy spirit woord yit shall wee still feele selues slothfull sluggish must bee fayne waken v styll therefore wee haue neede bee exhorted euery day yea haue eares beaten early late though iesus christ cryed shrill loud vntoo v doo yee yee wretched soules wherat looke yee though wee heard warning without ceassing yit wee bee throughly awake needefull wee see paule ment declare streyne namely looke wee feele god goodnesse selues wee put vre towards neyghbours lord iesus christ hath rayzed v dead wakeneth v dayly dead sleepe wherthrough wee bee drowzie end wee afterward wake vp others one asleepe indeuer drawe lyfe poore dead men furthermore wheras sayeth iesus christ inlyghten thee ment wee ryze vp awake owne power lord iesus christ dooth afterward adde grace hee meaneth nothing effect intent wee shalbee inlyghtened iesus christ maner though dark place sayth paul neede candle nyght time though see cleere yit haue glimring lyght whether bee moone starres thing else haue ame say heere doore gate heere path way man eye vtterly vnprofitable go nyght dark euer bee lorde iesus christe inlyghteneth v muche woonderous maner wee bee dark also stark blynd remedie therfore sonne god bringeth v teaching v doctrine gospell hee giueth v syght agein eye pikt sin first father would eeds see cleere uaynglor iousnesse cary away would need discerne betweene good euill lawfull sted hauing greater lyght became brutish wee insomuch v continew blynd therfore wee neede haue eye restored v agein haue god spirit serue v sted eye mark one poynt agein world nothing dull darknesse yea thicke wee wote step one pace without stumbling without straying way therfore standeth v hande bee guyded lord iesus christ shewe v way saint paule declareth v heere lord iesus inlyghteneth v namely wee bee dimsyghted helpeth v supplyeth want v also wee bee stark blynd yea dead finally euen pit hell lyke coarse layd graue men may well bring candels torch seeth neuer lord iesus imparteth lyght vntoo v make v see cleerly wee afore giue v whole ysyght new agein bycause bee stark blynd seeing iesus christ speaketh maner contineweth day day wakening v making v see cleerer cleeres ought wee followe example hold backe neyghbours much wee wee see straying destruction pith thing shewed v heere seeing lord iesus setteth forth example patterne need must barbarous sauage touched sonne god hath voutsafed doo office inlyghtening v shewe v way saluation waken v deadly sleepe wherwith wee ouerwhelmed also hath inlyghtened v haue v serue lampes others followe wee may shewe way haue v sort execute one half office seeing sonne god hath doone v honour wee doo thrust lyght vuder foote nother doo good selues men heynous treacherie agein wee imagin selues bee discharged dewtie euery v dooth owne part refreynes dooyng euill meane tyme let others go destruction wee haue nother care willingnesse remedie matter wee see diuell hale euerlasting death must needes perceyue therin wee doo god great wrong iniurie holding lyght choked fashion betraying neyghbours suppressing benefyte serue euerlasting saluation soules yee see wee shall bee alwayes blame woorthie god man vnlesse wee followe thing shewed v heere lord iesus christ beare doctrine alwayes harte put vre namely call themselues christian bee taken must therwithall bee trumpetters waken asleepe guydes direct go astray bring intoo ryght way wandered afore manner say must wee deale continew dooyng vntyll wee bee come happie meeting lord iesus christ shall call v put v possession heritance hath purchaced v let v fall downe maiestie good god acknowledgment faultes praying make v perceyue wise suffer v fall asleepe lyke wretched infidel forasmuch lyfe bee one continuall day wherein gyueth v sunne inlyghten v onely tyme nyght shoulde afterward come vppon v guydeth gouerneth v himselfe nyght day wee may take profit thereby suffer v returne darknesse agein hath inlyghtened v keepe v styll waking go holy calling wherto hath called v follow way sheweth v wee may call others v runne toogither vntoo calleth v vntill wee bee fully come thither may please graunt grace onely v also people nation earth c xxxvii sermon fifth vppon fifth chapter take heede therefore yee vvalke circumspectly fooles vvyle recouering tyme dayes euill vvherfore bee vnvvyse vnderstanding vvill lord bee drunken vvith vvyne vvherin loocenesse care wee haue tempor profit suffyze condemne v god negligence seene v wee come well ordering lyfe wee thinke escape excuce wee thought tollerable fault god calleth v setteth heauenly lyfe v specially telling v deerly purchaced requireth nothing wee yeeld ryght say glorify trew obedience bee nothing v must needes bee wee bee grosse headed stande buzzing strawe yee would say sort thinges vanish away meane whyle despyze kingdome heauen sort make account god seruice esteeme saluation ur soules thing nothing yi therfore paule exhorteth v bee waker haue bin woont first sayeth ace must stand vppon ga imagin god must acquit v blo kishnesse sake wee bee intangled worlde meanes thinke vppon kingdome heauen take heede sayth yee vvalke circumspectly trew although looke neuer neerly selues yit shall wee misse bee caryed away infirmity wee commit many faultes ignorance also euen wittingly oftentymes bee strong ynough withstand temptation manfully requisite neuerthelesse yee search narrowly men pardon themselues many offence easly beare themselues hand god thinkes yee shall fynde proceedeth negligence wee considered wee walke presence god angel surely would hold v another manner awe wee bee therefore cause dooth expressely requyre heere great care circumspectnesse v intent man gyue ouer vntoo euyll want taking heede prouoke v theruntoo addeth vvee haue neede redeeme tyme bycause dayes euill wherin sheweth wee cannot deuyze abuze god grace little willfull lozing tyme wee cannot recouer afterward let v gather breef summe thing conteyned heere let v begin poynt dayes euill wherby saint paule dooth v wit wee shall fynd many lettes keepe v comming vntoo god wee knowe wee bee hemmed many corruption euen best mynded shall stumble one syde bee pulled backe dyuers tymes stray quyte away wee neede singular inwoorking fyght wyse wee may get vpper hand impedimentes satan caste afore v plucke v god thrust v quyte cleane way saluation therefore hath bin true age forasmuch men alwayes froward nature borne sin satan holdeth v prisoner agein man among v draweth men naughtinesse moreouer wee wote scarsly open eye shall see one thing may vtterly ouerthrowe v diuell wylynesse applyeth owne woorking vnlesse wee take good heede dooings marreth v hand world rageth iniquitie ouerfloweth ought wee marke well text counsell giuen v heere holy ghost surely adayes men come full measure enormite part world man may fynd single sound dealing old tyme yit man myght haue found nation folke craftie malicious excessiue pomp kyndes pleazures farre ouer shooes robberie crueltie extorsion adayes let man go euerywhere shall fynd nothing horrible water flud confuzed turmoyle wickednesse therefore saint paul haue sayd dayes eui l hundred tymes soundnesse adayes ought bee vigilant keeping good watch according increacing euilnesse tyme fear warre euery v abate countenance consider hazard one chop must reserue little sprincling pinch well vittelles thing also wee haue trubbles euery v bee forecasting ynough behalf let v bethinke selues wee say necessitie driue v wee see well euilnesse dayes say ageinst v although wee diligentest circumspectest world yit shall wee fayle bee taken ardie many thing fynd selues hindered wee serue god yit notwithstanding passeth slippeth away wee mynd therefore let v bethinke selues learne redeeme tyme say mo occasion bee prouoke v naughtinesse pull v away god let euery v inforce streyne himselfe doo good wee woont take corruptnesse time cloke couer sloth vnlustinesse withal wee beare selues alwayes hand lawfull v play vnthriftes among vuthriftes prouerb sayeth man tell v wee must liue indifferently vpryghtly shall doo euery man say man cannot buy pennywoorth apple without deceyt may deale ware marchaundyze agein man tell v wee must liue soberly tayedly yea say wee dooth man speake v pacience myldnesse thing apparant say wee euery man behaueth himselfe cleane contrariwyze shall bee al alone world lo wee make vyce buckler ageinst god ageinst warning giuen v say bycause common therfore ought serue v acquittance discharge contrariwyse sayd heere wee must take much peyne redeeme tyme diuel laboreth hinder v meanes wyles hath doo withall must euery v imploy manfully waken vp wit vnderstanding praying god strengthen v giue power risist thus yee see redeeming tyme must bee making temporall worldly gayne behalf wee neede nother counsell incoragement euery man much inclyned way owne nature lustes fyrye suffer v bee flothfull cace sith wee see deuill go trubble v spend lyues seruing god let v redeeme tyme respect manner speaketh redeeming raunsoming buying agein presuppozeth must forgo looze thing desyrous haue kept wee bee redeeme thing gone handes buy thing wee neede compound thing another man withholdeth v caces wee forgo peece profit another man haue layd hold thing commoditie must giue peece mony get hand agein euen sayd wee must redeeme tyme manner alwayes gold siluer forsaking owne lustes true tyme gold siluer must bee spent worldly rich turne v away plucke v backe following whithersoeuer god calleth v wee must redeeme tyme say euer wee perceyue bee noysome offensyue sort must thrust vnder foote howbeeit many meanes besydes snarled ambiciousnesse world hath altogither rauished take tast euerlasting lyfe thing preached vntoo othersome bee giuen deceyuing others extorsion according euery man see diuell able win make looze tyme consuming wicked thing let redeeme say let reforme himselfe forsake himselfe temptation wherwith myght bee intangled yee see thing wee haue marke vppon streyue considering corruptnesse adayes throughout world great number outrageous vyces thing quite order bee short euen perfectest men somwhat infected vyces disorder euerywhere stead seeking vayne excuce alledging wee bee weake vnable ouercome great number impediment offered v wee must redeeme tyme meane doo vnderstand satan thrusting v downe sort sufficient discharge v god wee resort vntoo giue v armour weapon hold battell withall vntill wee haue gotten victorie howsoeuer cace stand let greeue v lay away thing wee lyked hold wicked affection imprizoned bee easy v followe thing saint paule sayeth heere wit bee watchfull heedfull wee walk aduyzedly euen vvyzefolk fooles wee haue seene alredy heretoofore wee profit god schoole wee ought doo wee shall haue sure rule cannot bee deceyued seduced god knew wee haue neede hath forgotten shewe v thing therfore saint paul presuppozeth although blynd wretch although ouerwhelmed darknesse world although diuell haue manie suttleties wyles wynd v yit wee bee good schollers godward suffer selues bee ruled woord wee shall haue sufficient wisdome
