vvhole armour god ye may vvithstand assaultes diuell vvrestling ageinst fleshe blud ageinst principality ageinst povvers ageinst lordes vvorld gouernours darkenesse world ageinst spirituall vvickednesses heauenly place vvherefore take vvhole armour god yee may bee able vvithstand euill day stand fast vvhen ye haue performed thing stand fast therfore hauing loynes girt truth beyng clothed vvith brestplate ryghtuousnesse hauing feete shod vvith preparation gospell peace taking aboue thing sheeld fayth wherby may quench fyrie dartes wickednesse also take helmet saluation swoord spirit vvhich vvoord god shewed morning saint paule speaketh heere force craftes satan wit wake v wee bee taken vnwares happeneth oftentymes therefore standeth v hand knowe manner enemye wee haue doo may stirre v vp resist trew first wee myght bee abashed comparing owne weaknesse practyzes preparation satan wherof mention made heere remedy thereof set downe therewithall haue touched alredy saint paule proceedeth shewe yit length therefore sayeth first incounter wee haue deale much harde daungerfull men world set themselues ageinst v force satan aboue cause sayeth fyghting ageinst flesh blud woordes dooth v vnderstand wee haue stand ageinst mortall men onely trewe men shall oftentymes bid v battell yea shalbee satan vnderlings torment v thing must sticke diuel serues turne driue v despayre prouoke v reuengment make v grudge ageinst god howsoeuer cace stand wicked doo neuer trubble v bee egged another say satan ruleth head setteth woorke endes aforesayd therefore wee sticke vppon men wee forget principall manner dogges man doo cast stone fall byting stone wreake themselues regard hand threw euen wee vnpurueyed wit wee thinke stryuing men meane whyle thinke vppon inuisible enemye wherfore let v bethinke v well thing saint paule telles v heere namely satan cheef enemye wee haue yea must withstand although use diuerse meanes vexe v turne v away fro feare god yit must wee alwayes haue eye vppon may beware agein man myght thinke straunge saint paule say diuelles principality aire lordshippes power heauen prince world man would deeme matcheth ageinst god although heretikes olde tyme haue abuzed place intending haue made twoo beginning god bee letted maynteyne himselfe ageinst satan defend hath taken intoo protection yit notwithstanding wee haue eye saint paules intent question wil bee easly resolued heere talke power diuell haue despyte god aduaunce himselfe ageinst wee must rather stand fully resolued poynt diuell executer god iudgmentes cannot attempt thing graunted permitted himiob b text first chapter iob diuell appeered angelles named child god get leaue doo mischeef ought satisfie v throughly trew seeketh nothing else peruert confound thing yit god holdeth brydled executeth think good meanes insomuch diuelles haue deuyzed ca yit attempt thing without god leaue yea except haue ordeyned giuen expresse charge doo yit notwithstanding nought paule nameth power principality aire dependeth vppon thing speake anon concerning darkenesse world diuelles haue superioritie ouer mankynd shaped image god ageinst reason yea wee continued soundnesse wee hild state wherein god created father adam certeyne diuell haue aduauntage ouer v forasmuch wee bee ouerwhelmed darkenesse become thralles owne nature therefore diuell named prince world wherfore let v marke well saint paule hauing aduaunced power diuell sheweth v whence proceedeth welspring intent wee thinke diuell hath reynes brydle looce necke hee bee able doo listeth god vnable let intent wee imagin god souerein dominion abated power diuelles saint paule sayth power proceedeth world darkenesse trew sunne shyneth vppon v moone also yit wee ceasse bee plunged dungeon death bee blynd wretch bycause wee bee banished lyght lyfe god inasmuch wee bee destitute knowledge made fashyoned thing haue wittes intangled naugh inesse reason vtterly peruerted therefore dooth satan reigne ouer v question dissolued myght haue bin demaunded namely diuelles named prince aire haue scope world god hath created commeth originall order nature haue declared alredye corruption happened fall man howsoeuer cace stand diuels haue power ouer v wee could tel withstand vnlesse god sheeld wal serued turne al assayes yea fought v tyme wee doo nothing say wee must mark well also beate downe foolishe presumption rooted hart ryght hard v weede wee see men doo alwayes vaunt themselues woulde make themselues idol speaks scripture calleth diuells slaues long wee haue iesus christ king seate vnset vp among v reason adam fall diuell must needes bee prince haue authoritie ouer v wee bee subiect vntoo let men make greate brauerie list chalendge themselues yit notwithstanding thing holie ghost hath spoken must continew soothfast vnrepealable definitiue sentence giuen heere wit diuel prince wee subiects hild downe vnder thraldome vntill wee bee set free lord iesus christiohn c according saying eyght saint iohn maketh v free ende wee shoulde depart cursed tyrannie bondage satan seeing wee bee wretched folk ouerthrowen diuell ouer head hath gotten vpper hand v alredye wee bee reskewed woonderfull maner good cause wee stoope declared alredye morning distrust strength wee surmyze selues haue owne nothing else deceytfulnesse also wherwith quicken vp carefulnesse make v resort vntoo god pray forsake v ne suffer v bee giuen vp pray enemy finally make euery man streyne knowing although wee selues doo nothing yit dooth god woork wyse v wil haue v bee block haue v exercyze fayth bee men warre serue battell stoppes wee incounter restreyne v keeping course still wee outstand ambush assault put v thus yee see effect wee must put text vre concludeth agein wee must hold owne resist wicked dayes vntill wee bee fast settled performance heere putteth v mynd agein ynough v haue fought toutly mooneth yeere wee must hold end yea euen lyfe long god hath set v world maynteyne battell vntill wee bee come rest heauen earth pilgrimage faythfull also camp wee must alwayes haue enemy trubble v nyght day without ceassing cause saint paule sayeth expresly wee must resist till wee haue finished performed thing euill dayes meaneth lyfe specially tymes lord suffereth v pinched ordinarie although god trye v end yit doth forbeare v pitie weaknesse would become v trew wee must take truce satan yit dooth god sometymes giue v respits bee greeued extremitie euill dayes therfore bee greate maner extreme temptation tryalls howbeeit whole lyfe comprehended vnder word true impeacheth continuall happinesse god taketh v still people heritage yit shall alwayes bee euilnesse wherof saint paule speaketh heere let v make account earthly paradyse heere beneath reape heere frute victorie liue rest rather let v assure selues misery prepared v without ceassing number wherfore let v bee armed abyde ouercome pleading ageinst god behalf verye trewe could handle v much gentlyer hee could set v alone selues enemy come v wee suffer vexation lyketh doo therfore wee must bow downe neck euery v buckle battell god calleth v vntoo sayeth saint peter good reason fayth much preciouser gold siluer1 pet b bee tryed seeing corruptible mettall fyned fyre fayth much excellent bee kept comming purenesse perfection therfore let v think wel vpon sayd namely wee must finish thing go end man cocker hath hild owne whyle taken greate peyne imploying self god seruis walk still end put thing vre paul sheweth v another placephil c euen example although doone notable thing man myght say god haue hild quite giuen rest ofte fyghting sea land dyuers wayes yit notwithstanding sayeth forgetteth past streyneth inforceth self still foreward till may atteyne fellowship resurrection lord iesus christ causeth number take greate libertie think themselues haue doone ynough may giue others leaue take turne say twentie thirtie yeeres haue taken extreme peynes without ceassing world hath seene faythfulnesse zeale care haue serue god diligence dooyng thing charge requyred theruppon conclude therefore may well take rest wee must indent god whatsoeuer wee haue done wee must forget behynd sayeth saint paule looke foreward thing yit come wit wee bee yit come glory lord iesus christ many infirmity v styll fayth yit throughly well fyned neede brought ageien furnace fyre therfore let v hold tyll wee haue finished thing ment hauing lyued obedience god wee dye lykewyse pleaseth according wyll ynough v lyue awe wee must also euen death yeeld record wee bee wholly wee must couet lyue heere vntyll wee bee wery lyfe wee must alwayes haue one foote lifted vp depart pleaseth god finished wee haue lingered world long pleaseth god euery man indeuered lyue according calling bin pacient end finally bee wee lyu bee wee dye let v alwayes bee trewe sacrifyzes offer selues vntoo god let v seeke nothing yeeld vp soules bodyes intoo god hand therefore let v stand fast sayeth paul say may able shew selues god hereuppon sheweth maner armour wee must bee fenced furnished wit vvith fayth vvith ryghtuousnesse vvith truth vvith god vvoord vvith gospell wee must bee curious seeking heere saint paule giueth tytle helmet one tytle brestplate another tytle sheeld another first epistle thessalonian toucheth doctrine briefely1 thess b howbeeit without following similitude throughout saying wee must bee armed helmet fayth charitie speaketh otherwise place man would say contradiction doubt would soone bee dissolued namely saint paules intent heere decyfer particularly peeces christen man armour shewe briefely wee receyue meanes god offereth v bee diligent serue wee shall bee furnished peeces wee neede feare wee shall haue wherwith withstand enemy yea vanquish saint paules meaning setteth downe heere first wee must bee girt vvith svvoord girdle truth put headpeece ryghtuousnesse twoo woordes meaneth soundnesse holynesse lyfe therefore whensoeuer wee heare woorde truth let v vnderstand saint paule condemneth hypocrisie haue v learne giue selues seruing god free hart eye seruice syght world pure right meaning mind know soothfastnes vprightnes soundnesse put brestplate needefull trubble selues much sayde afore poynt wee must beare mynd saint paul shemeth v wee take armour god giueth v wee shall bee sure without fayle haue victorie ageinst enemyes ryghtuousnesse matched trew rule whereby walke feare god lyue neyghbours without dooyng harme without fraud without malice without extortion rather indeuer doo one another good according end lord hath knit v toogither wee communicate neyghbours man bee wedded hys owne profit v seeke common welfare maruell though diuell ouercome v easly steale vppon v al kynd wayes v ware euening morning euery minute soundnesse saint paule requyreth heere first nay rather euery v flattereth himselfe wee thinke wee haue doone much wee haue vsed fewe fayre countenance bin vtter rebel ageinst god world cannot vpbrayd v wee haue bin despyzers maiestie wee play starke bedlems pretend fayre showe make gay countenance religion owne seeming wee haue discharged dewtie well notwithstanding diuell meane hath turned v quyte away soundnesse substancialnesse whereof saint paule speaketh heere lyke cace ryghtuousnesse wee would fayne content god little deede wee confesse well ynough mouth reason god bee serued honoured wee lyue quietly toogither indeuer doo one another good wee condemne robberie extortion whoredome deceyt wrong dealing yit doone wee would haue god accept good woorth little fyndeth v hold contented meane behold diuell fyndeth v still vnprouyded forasmuch wee open gap wee must maruell getteth better hand v therefore much better v go race sticke tackeling wee stand fast man shall see dyuerse haue good zeale farre bee iudged yit shall bee blast continue bycause wee bee fenced ageinst satan proofe hereof wee followe thing shewed v heere certeyne promis wyll neuer deceyue v although saint paule exhort faythfull stand fast hold ende yit certein warrantyze included therin god wyll alwayes succour neede shall fynd themselues disappoynted fyght styll vnder banner calling continually vppon power vsing meanes offered word therfore bee cowardlynesse v afrayd diuell make v tumble downe start asyde stray quyte good way wee must impute owne rechlesnesse bycause wee haue put armour god giueth v haue hanged vp vppon pin afterward heere followeth vvee bee shod vvith preparation gospel peace dout saint paule eye auncient fashion men warre wore shooes home went warfare bothe defend cold saue feete entred intoo battell enemie sayd gospell serueth v howbeit twoo woords bee marked also addeth preparation peace notwithstanding wee may lay foorth thing order let v note saint paule allotteth gospell power propertie shooing v bycause wee bee trayned doctrine gospell wee ought bee wee may walk safely world wee see vnbeleeuers plundged euer head eares god hath prepared walk atteyne kingdome heauen snarled world bee altoogither vnprofitable though legges broken sink themselues dayly deeper deeper therfore one way make v wade world atteyne kingdome heauen haue instruction gospell namely god hauing adopted v bee child haue v dwell heere beneathe euer wee come vntoo yea euen haste speede agein intermeddle selues vncleannesse vnbeleeuers separate selues thus much concerning first poynt also woord preparation wherby saint paule dooeth v vnderstand wee haue skill aduauntage selues gospell wee shal bee rid thinges let v hinder v comming vntoo god wee fynd wheras erst wee wee falen asleepe rather doted pleasure vanity lord dispozeth v come vntoo wee haue seene already world darknesse long wee abyde wee bee asleepe wee see way v doo reele stumble rather lye along dead menesay b sayd esay wee bee reskewed lord iesus christ must lye snorting still wel er euer darknesse wherfore let v learne put selues redinesse loynes may bee girded vp sayeth lord iesus christluke lampes bee burning hand wee may see way lyght giuen v lord iesus christ without cause named lyght world ageiniohn b let v withdrawe selues spirituall drunkennes turneth vnbeleeuers away kingdome heauen holdeth downe heere beneath vntill bee come vntoo finall destruction therfore let v mark wel wee cannot profit well gospell vntill wee bee put redinesse say vntill neede weeded thing belowe lord haue dispozed v self trauell may bee come alwayes forewarder neerer vntoo vntill wee bee gone world bee also quyte rid set looce bond satan meanes hath hinder v wee knowe wee shall haue profited well one day saint paule addeth one tytle gospell serueth make v loue saying gospell peace therby giueth v corage fyght say freends trew enemy myghtie giue hard skirmish insomuch yee bee able withstand yee bee ouerthrowen hundred thousand tymes houre god ayded neuerthelesse yee refuze succour god giueth rather make effectuall inforcing selues withstand euill yee shall haue peace middes warre gospell bringeth alwayes benefyte much wee fyght without afrayd wee see taking bee tyme time quiet nother counsell aduyce bee quyte hart bee short trubble dooth alwayes dismay yit trew must haue care v hath bin sayd afore wee bee rechelesse shalbee ouerraught howbeeit care let impediment may enter intoo battell freely stedie well settled mynd forasmuch god syde vtter myghtie power defence thing ought make v quiet feare attache v may make v turne head disfurnish v aduyce wee bee pinched may flee vntoo god praying succour v prouyde need knoweth much better wee selues doo wee see saint paules meaning wil haue v bee shod gospell holde v world rather wee bee redinesse trauell freely towards kingdome heauen moreouer haue quiet mynd serue god trusting assuredly notwithstading trubbles haue indure yit wee shal perish assureth v succour v one assault continew v vntoo end euen till haue deliuered v al greefs trubbles wee susteyne day vvee must aboue thing take sheeld buckler fayth spirituall svvoord vvhich god vvoord touching sheeld setteth downe meanes thereof wee may beate backe burning fyrie dartes enemye whoorleth v seeme saint paule vseth needlesse speech putting god woord fayth asunder set downe twoo thing one fayth nothing selfe furtherfoorth grounded vpon god woord god woord also aduauntageth v except wee receyue fayth distinguishing twoo thing notwithstanding go ioyntly toogither easyer declaring setteth fayth buckler end sayeth wee therewith ward dartes enemye yit agein sheweth v owne power wee bee able warde blowes satan giue v would deadly thinkes ynough say simply ward blowes assaultes sayth dartes men see one shall sooner ee hit vnwares dartes speares swoordes lyke adayes man shall sooner bee hit hargabusse dubble canon swoord swindged one face may easly shun saint paule therefore setteth downe diuelles dartes lyke erst set downe wyles let v marke satan onely vseth force also myght wound v death suttle meanes wee fenced fayth sayd elsewhere behoueth v knowe whyles2 cor c without wee doo wee neuer withstand father lying besydes hath store wyles none haue beguyle v intrappe v therefore let v receyue warning wee may bee waking apply promise behoof giuen v god woord setteth downe fyrie dartes shewe woundes deadly sayd afore god set power afore v defend v preserue v therby wee see force fayth looke much attributed fayth much taken away men fayth borroweth thing god mere grace liberalitie therfore let v marke text saint paule ment humble v shewe v god must bee fayne prouyde v thing belonging requysyte victorye therefore whosoeuer make themselues sheeldes bulwarkes deuyzed repulse satan withall shall haue spyders web say satan sport presumption insomuch weene haue mountaynes world fortifye shall profit nothing neede wherfore let v learne make fayth bucklar say wee mynd enter intoo battell hold let v consider god father bycause hath elected chozen v child owne infinite goodnesse seeing hath assured v alwayes syde greater world hath put v good safe keeping ordeyning lord iesus christ bee shepherd let v gather promise toogither make sheeld set v whensoeuer wee bee assayled let v defye diuell bycause wee bee protection god inuincible power bycause lord iesus christ hath taken vppon charge saluationiohn c promised bee faythfull keeper soules end wee bee poynt shall wee beat backe dartes diuell one syde wyll labour make v distrust god grace syde make v beleeue lord iesus christ farre v yea tempt v murmur grudge ageinst make v cast foorth tryflyng vnprofitable question else blasphemyes thing dartes agein wee bee tickled wicked lust longing harte next way v bee taken tardye trew first blush allurementes seeme nother bitter irkesome hard thing else yit al bee deadly dartes yit notwithstanding fayth beateth backe wee bee tempted coue u usnesse bycause wee bee afrayd least earth fayle v god hath taken vppon charge nurrish susteyne v let v rest vppon aske dayly bread hand diuell labour win v whoredome wee knowe iesus christ hath incorporated v intoo himselfe made v owne member bee one shall wee go spoyle selues dung filthinesse dealing hath set v free clenzed v blud shall wee go wallowe agein vncleannesse wee prouoked gluttony hath god created vittelles vse yi shall wee defyle ouerthrowe order god hath set wee bee susteyned thereby bee directed heauenly lyfe shall wee turne thing hinderance ught bee help agein wee tempted ambition gloryfye selues yea example hath lord iesus christ set vsiames b pet b moreouer wee couet great world wee shal bee enemyes god resisteth proud pryde presumption must needes bee pulled downe thus yee see wee may euery way beate backe dartes satan agein man appoze thee saying canst thou tell whether thou shalt bee euer better thy trauell thing gospell promiseth fayth must woorke cace wee see reward promysed rather wee see store trubbles incounters sorrowes bee short wee seeme bee miserablest creature world shall wee doo wee needes quayle euery minute houre god reached v hand take wee holde hand sayh br doo wee aduauntage selues power fayth must bee fayne woorke behalfe say wee must looke vp thing seene apostle sayeth epistle hebrewes maner shall wee beate backe satan dartes finally addeth woord sayd afore ought bee separated fayth haue told already paule ment adde saying declaration matter sayde freendes wheras tolde myght withstand enemyes beate backe dartes meanes fayth bycause god woord cannot fayle forasmuch yee haue promyses saluation god speaketh knowe hath keeping cannot bee confounded trust therfore set fayth bucklar howbeeit haue fayth yee haue mo bucklars one god woord trew spirituall swoord wherby wee may onely beate backe enemye also discomfit beate downe vnder feete remayneth learne profit selues better god woord haue doone hithertoo seeyng lord iesus christ graunteth v inestimable grace benefyte teaching v schoole let v consider therwithall end dooeth wit arme v ageinst satan bycause wee cannot lyue obedience keepe way sheweth v fyghting also dooth giue v armour let v assure selues wee haue good swoord wee skill apply god woord vse moreouer fayth proceedeth thereof bee good sheeld v also wee shall haue helmet hope saluation bee short wee shall bee throughly fenced furnished sydes thereof commeth soundnesse conscience holynesse life hath spoken finally wee shall want nothing wee skill vse well meanes god setteth foorth welfare albeeit state faythfull seeme bee irksome may bee bycause god exercyzeth ageinst diuels hell one day onely tyme lyfe yit must wee thinke ryght sweete amiable seeyng god prouydeth needes leastwise wee awake consider daungers wherein wee bee sauyng wee resist let v consider say one syde satan violence force syde craftes suttleties therwithall let v call vppon god saint paule shewe v agein hereafter also consider commoditie god woord bringeth v hereby wee see wretched papistes haue stripped themselues starke naked armour serue saluation woord god among noze waxe haue bin ashamed belke blasphemie theyr bookes also sermon namely certeintie god woorde yea wee wrong call spirituall swoord armed v ageinst assaultes satan therefore wee could repulse temptation wherwith wee bee prouoked euyll vnlesse god woord serued v thertoo wee found experience surely saint paule would neuer haue giuen name let v indeuer profit let v bee good schollers giue good eare whyle god hath mouth open teache v wee shall fynde saint paule hath vayne promysed v heere wee shall euer get vpper hand euen tyll wee bee come heauenly kingdome wee shall fully inioy fruite victorie let v fall downe maiestie good god acknowledgment faultes praying make v feele better meane whyle wee may alwayes resort vnto bee hart although wee bee tootoo vnwoorthie offer selues maiestie quayle bycause vyces imperfection seeyng hath pleased bee side make remedy serue neede hath giuen v wee desyre hand wee may indeuer profit woord may guyde v foorth end wee may quayle incounter diuell may bee confounded lord iesus christ exalted bycause vnder power wee fyght also victory proceedeth may please graunt grace onely v also people c xlvii sermon fifth vppon sixth chapter praying vvith prayer supplication tymes spirit vvatching theruntoo vvith instance supplication saintes mee opening mouth vtterance may bee gyuen mee vvith boldnesse vtter secret gospell many supposing themselues haue profited well fayth yit notwithstanding ignorant belongs prayer thinke ynough say god help mee see daunger hand yit meane whyle flee refuge folke wote purpose promise serue made vntoo v god sayeth singly haue care v help v needes also allureth v therewithall incorageth v praying cannot one bee separated wit wee rest vppon hope god promise haue throughly rooted harte also bee stirred vp resort vnto god fayth exercyze v prayer supplication thus see wee bee vnseparable thing looke much wee bee forewarder fayth much earnester zele call vpon god acknowledge confesse saluation lyeth hand wee looke good thing forasmuch wee bee lothfull behalfe setteth downe twoo woordes prayer supplication expresse better wee must go coldly slyghtly courtesie sake wee must bee touched quicke continue adde anon hold ryghtly without ceassing anye tyme trew god telleth v prophet esay heare v wee cry say hand shalbee redye succour v wee haue opened mouth howbeeit make v slothfull wee lye gaping open throte say shewe suffer v linger wee shall haue called vppon though carelesse help v proof thereof preuenteth v wee fynd experience yit notwithstanding haue v yeeld trew proof f yth praying vntoo way v shewe truly promise haue taken effect v wee trust thempsal c soone wee bee touched greef affliction wee go streyt vntoo himpsal b vnburthen harte sayd another place wee see wee must make aduauntage god woord whereby wee bee certyfied wil neuer fayle v wit seeking thing protesteth wee shall fynd prayer keyes whereby come treasure god reserueth v keepe v therefore wee must open way praying yit saint paule thinketh ynough say fayth must bee matched prayer supplication god sayeth also yea prayer say matter al thing great smal al dooings whatsoeuer bee must bee shooteanker myght happen wee would call vppon god onely wee thought else matter importance hand saint paule sayd haue v doo god homage euery tymes protesting wee cannot haue good hand mere free gift much importeth woorde good sooth wee see lord taketh charge whole lyfe condicion wee seeke euen bacest thing wee durst requyre freend equall companion euen thing haue v ask vnder saying giueth v dayly bread certeyne comprehendeth belongeth lyfe ala number small thing haue wee neede wee would bee ashamed bee acknowen euen inferiours god abaceth himselfe farre voutsafeth haue care person wretched rotten carions yit neuerthelesse haue v stick aske thinges expedient needefull v sith let v remember well saying saint paules willeth v pray god al thing wee deede assuring selues wil yeeld farre vntoo v nothing shal yee would say scape handes sayeth expresly vvee must pray tymes spirit whereas sayth spirit surely exclude hipocrisye knowe part world babble ynough come vntoo god howbeeit lippes tippes tung doo dewtie manner god bee prayd vntoo called vppon lyketh supplication rather abhorreth bycause wee pray fondly vntoo wee make false shrowding sheete kynd trecherie wee thinke heard god babling meane whyle hart dead prayer proceede ryght dispozed earnest mynd wee make god idoll little babe wherein wee doo great wrong maiestie short transfigure owne fancie therfore behoueth prayer made mouth also come bottom hart forasmuch haue owne power holy ghost must fayne worke therin therfore word spirit may vnderstood beseech god gouern v wyse touch v throughly end may pray ought doo also accept prayer acknowleding mark holie spirit wee must alwayes remember sayd epistle romansrom c wee know pray respect selues thing surmounteth vnderstanding ablest v fayleth behalfe notwithstanding number beare themselues hand knowe perfectly howe pray vntoo god howbeeit opinion dooth shet v gate vnlesse vppon knowing default infirmity wee resort ryghtfoorth remedierom according saying saint paules spirit god driueth v vnutterable gronings cannot bee expressed without wee could vtter much woord father gala according also sayeth galathians spirit cryeth v wee open mouthes call freely vppon godrom c reherced another place certein wee shall neuer bee throughly dispozed pray vntoo god except gouerne v holie spirit moreouer saint paules intent haue declared alredie exclude counterfetting wee hope iustify cace god ceremony popeholines terme making long prayer many circumstance suffer spirit beare sway wherfore first let v bee touched spirit may bee mayster teacher indyte thing v wee haue vtter calling vppon god secondly let prayer proceede bottom hart let v put saying psalme vrepsal wee must sue vnto god truth sayd neere haue qualitie without cause exposition set downe haue declared alredie wee bee much inclyned shifting seeming god ought yeeld v nature cleane contrarie forasmuch god perceyueth men abuse name fashyon make prayer owne maner say prayer wrapped hipocrisie vntruthe haue substancialnesse soundnesse sayeth expresly must hope bee heard hand obteyne thing except prayer bee ruled ryght meaning say vnlesse wee pray hartie affection thus yee see wee haue remember vpon saying saint paule wheras sayth stedfastly holding throughout ende expresse better neuer season call vppon god euen therefore added bycause wee would fayne exempt selues god wherein man may well perceyue howe vnperfect myndes howe destitute wit reason wee welfare consisteth hauing accesse god wee seeke help hand bee short neere vntoo wee bee sure regardeth v hath care welfare besyds would fayne bee heard yit notwithstanding wee pray vntoo god seemeth wee bee haled force wee bee rauished loue haue shewed alredy vyce rechlesnesse coldnesse wee neuer pray vnto god compelled constreyned neede corrected saint paule therefore telleth v wee must tarie till vtter necessitie inforce v must vnderstand al time seasonable conuenient resort vntoo god iu deede wee bee picked foreward must wee runne swiftlyer according certeyne wee bee spurted affliction manifold trubbles god sendeth v lyke asse wil go must haue good cudgell layd vppon backe euen god perceyuig wee come good fayne drawe v violence yit must euery man cheere vp self though vrgent necessitie compell bee short must pray vntoo god bothe tyme prosperitie tyme aduersitie thing ment woords tymes theruppon paule sayeth wee must bee watchfull euen instance pray saint saying wee must bee watchfull hee toucheth vyce whertoo wee bee much inclyned yea wholly giuen ouer say wee bee sleepie wee pray vntoo god neede bee waked bycause heauinesse sluggishnesse wee bee commaunded wake keepe continuall wacth end wee let occasion slip alwayes resort vntoo god prayer perfect man fyndeth maladie experience self namely wee pray vnto god number thing crosse v set v wandering abrode insomuch wee shall woonder sted holding earnestly mynd shalbee rouing seeing wee bee fickle wit skittish hard hold v ast whyle standeth v hand watchfull intent bring selues back agein intoo good way started let v tarie till diuell haue woone much handes plucke v quyte prayer supplication breake continuall course stedfastnes ought bee wee pray let v locked vp fast tyed say let wittes bee full bent settled vppon thing wee haue doo euen heathen men make sacrifyze idolls vsed proueth among whyle thou woorshippest god doo nothing else bee thou wholly occupyed fastened theruntoo thou think vpon thing god wrested confession ought wee doo wee offer cheef sacrifyze alloweth aboue wee confesse selues beholden good thing wee mingle owne vanity make prayer bee custome fashyons sake watchfulnesse wherof saint paul speaketh verie requisyte reason fraylnesse wit specially bycause wee bee wandering horrible seeing v wee goo pray vntoo god let v bend whole mynds vnto let wittes bee intangled care affection let comming vntoo bee though wee broken bondes cause mention made lifting vp selues prayer supplication trew offering selues vnto god wee must come lowlinesse yit must wee lift vp harte wyse wee may bee sort prese ce god say thing imported sayd diligentnesse sayeth instance serueth still shewe v wee intend bee wel disposed praying wee must go lazily yea wee followe owne nature sheweth v wee shal bee farre comming god therefore must euery man inforce seeyng saint paule speaketh much sayd freendes yee shall fynde coldnesse selues yee shall neuer pray vntoo god nother shall yee euer bee willing pray except ye prouoke inforce selues diuell alwayes bleare eye end yee see neede yee haue pray vntoo god yee lye sleeping still cause god forsake seeyng bee thanklesse despyze benefites yeeld honour acknowledge welfare proceedeth lyke leaud lozels wee defyle benefytes god bestoweth vppon v vnlesse wee acknowledge wee haue thing hand yea euen crauing thinges wee want also yeelding thankes thing wee receyued already let v learne match watchfulnesse instantnesse herein wee comprehend holding continuance ynough v pray vntoo god startes braydes say wee must continue twoo wayes first wee haue prayed day euening morning euery houre wee must holde still neuer swarue trade long wee lyue fayth sayd must exercyze self meane exercyze withall yit one maner perseuerance holding wee haue desyred god helpe v wee must repete request twyce thryce onelyesay oft wee haue neede hundred yea thousand tymes example although god haue told v succour v wee open mouth yit doth shewe alwayes openly eye therefore wee must neuer bee weery wayting god helpe also good wee bee heard owne lyking bycause god knoweth meete expedient v must gouerne v according owne sayd wee pray fashion maner protesteth wee shall obteyne requestes hand euen wee haue vttered mouth yit notwithstanding sometymes hold v staues end much shall seeme asleepe wee call vppon hath turned backe vppon v cause perseuerance requisite wee bee pinched distresse would fayne seeke ease god hand must doo away wee must returne oftentymes bee yee would say importunateluke according similitude lord iesus telleth v widdowe doo iudge without feare god shame world yit neuerthelesse shee obteyned hir sute euen importunatenesse must wee doo say wee must bee importunate vppon god slowe succouring v sayd afore bycause trye constancie fayth pray vnto god fall stomacking chafing impaciencie releeue hand doo pray vntoo yee would say summon bee commaundement lustes behoueth v restreyne passion desyres god good wee pray make speede wee may neuerthelesse bee pacient bee contented tary leazure delaying day morrowe long pleaseth yee see wee must continue prayer supplication wee must pray presently necessity pinch v day lykewyse morrow may come wee must pray ordinarily euery day besydes god list deliuer v soone wee fayne would let v ceasse renew petition still euen vntill wee perceiue wee haue profited praying haue shewed v effect promis forasmuch hard v bee brought pray well vntoo god saint paule heere setteth v foorth thing owne person ought perswade v say wee bee bound pray vntoo god onely selues say euery man himselfe also haue care neyghbours respect also trew wee considered owne misery well great number sinnes v great neede haue succored god haue cause ynough without going selues imploy selues prayer supplication yea though wee nothing else al lyfe long sygh lament god offence pray reach v hand end satan might ouercome v sayd wee haue matter ynough selues wee must extend prayer wit whole church god vnderstand haue mee thinke alonly vppon selfe also bee myndfull chozen inasmuch hath knit mee must indeuer comprehend prayer much possible mee seeing say wee bee resolued herof must need bee blockish touched yit quicke set fyre carefulnesse spoken therwithal continue howbeeit saint paule speaketh heere expresly saintes faythfull yit impediment wee pray generally men wretched vnbeleeuers ignorant sort haue greate neede bee sewed vntoo god behold bee hygh way destruction wee sawe beast poynt perish would haue pitie shal see soule perill precious god hath shewed hath raunsomed blud owne sonne wee see poore soule go destruction ought wee bee moued compassion kyndnesse desyre god remedye saint paules meaning text wee let wretched vnbeleeuers alone without care wee pray generally men howbeeit sheweth v therewithall wee must haue speciall care god hath knit vntoo v streyter bond lykewyse speaketh almesedeedesgal c intent bee doone men without exception haue neede yit addeth wee must specially succour houshold fayth euen prayer supplication spirituall brotherhood god hath set among v ought touch v make church god come eye intoo remembrance oft wee pray word father ought teache v make prayer common none v say father alone himselfe wee call shewe wee ought haue care selues forget belong vnto v linked v neere knot haue declared already cause paule sayeth expresly wee must pray saintes well printed harte sayd afore wee bee well waked pray god without end ceassing let v consider state plyght church dayes although lord giue v rest yit poore brother tormented tyrantes enemyes fayth fayne flee haue good taken many bee thrust intoo prizon burnt stake poore soules vnquietnesse put new terrour euery minute houre wee see tirrible manacing threatening may bee wee see diuell dryueth foreward outrageous fury would abolish doctrine gospell wee see scattering made stumbling blockes satan thrusteth champion wee see great sort seeke nothing else put gospell shame meane whyle poore seruantes god imploy themselues seruice trubbled vexed meanes gather toogither misery aduersities wheretoo church subiect consider well distresse euery brother must needes bee wee duller brut beast wee bee moued pray vntoo god yea euen ryght perseuerance though bee myne ease day many thousand great perplexitie shewe wel cut selfe much bodye lorde iesus christ pitye member linked without cause therefore dooth saint paule set saintes heere afore v intendeth inflame v better ryght dispozed mynde praying continewe throughout therupon requyreth also men pray yee shall pray mee also sayeth god giue mee boldnesse opening mouth may vtter secret gospell accordingly saint paule commendeth self prayer neyghbours therby sheweth well humilitie wee ought walk counterfet exhorting ephesian praying protesteth god angel neede let v compare selues saint paule man abilttie forbeare bee succored prayer neyghbours saint paule exempteth self let euery man praying vntoo god desyre bee made parttaker prayer made throughout churchepsal generally particularly deede promis shall alwayes stand trew god wil bee neere hand call vppon ionas fayled bee succored godionas though whale belly therfore bee forsaken men good dead remembrance v good buryed yit wil god ceasse regard v cast eye vppon v succour v according saying eye god alwayes vppon feare himpsal eares open repayre vnto notwithstanding intent humble v betterpsal c lord telleth v wee haue neede one anothers help bee intercommoning among v besyds also another reason keepe charitie occupyed wherfore let v learne shewe almesdeeds counsell helpes none v giuen self owne priuate profit god hath linked v toogither euery v coueteth succour member communicate toogither prayer supplication commending one v another maner vntoo god cheef dewtie charitie therfore caused saint paule desyre ephesian expresly pray man alledge signe vnbeleef promis suffyze v euery man shall obteyne owne request poynt distrust answer thertoo easy wheras god sayeth haue pitie vppon seeke hand meaneth disanull thing commaundeth v many text wee bee myndfull one another furthermore let v mark following god woord wee neuer bee blamed misbeleef come passe men fall misbeleefe passing bound wil need adde god hath vttered example wee see popedome men haue forged many patrones aduocats wote beetake themselues vntoo whence procedeth euen head bee ticklish agein distrusted thing conteyned god word wee haue generall lessonpsal c call vppon day thy neede heare thee god haue v resort vntoo looke assuring selues neuer refuze v pray vnto sonnes name lord iesus christ commeth afore v offereth v saying hee beare woord fro v long hold v path wee neede feare wee shall fynd accesse vntoo father wil receyue v familiarly dooth holie scripture report haue papist doone say wee haue neede aduocats make intercession v trew lord iesus christ god father hath assigned vnto v ought suffyze v forasmuch appoynted office contrariwyse papist make aduocats paradyse owne pleasurepsal meane whyle spoyle iesu christ priestly dignitie giuen god father yea euen solene othe papist contented haue made patching cace become horrible confuzion v wee followe taught v god woord shall wee walk fayth wee neede feare straying wee shall bee blamed vnbeleef god wil alwayes guyde v aryght answere question doubt myght bee cast whether bee poynt distrust desyre men pray v seeing euery man may heard self bycause thing god hath ioyned toogither men must presume put asunder wee must alwayes beare mynd howe sayd euery man must occupie himselfe praying moreouer drawe neyghbours bee matched shall wee neuer bee turned fayth man obiect lord iesus christ cannot bee onely aduocate patrone wee make supplication one another answer theruntoo easie sayd iesus christ onely mediator men great small must resort obteyne sutes1 iohn vnlesse prayer bee dedicated holinesse surely shall euer bee foule infected esay commaunded beare message god appoyntedesay b sayd ala god man vncleane lippes dwell among people vncleane also shall doo must call vppon god speake familiarly mouth mouth seeing wee bee full vncleannesse infection prayer must sanctifyed lord iesus christ else wee shall neuer fynd fauour god hand also certeyne christ aduocate intercessour auncient patriarks fayne hold rule lykewyse prophet apostle tymes must wee also continew yit wee bee letted therby pray one another inasmuch wee haue albut one comon head lord iesus christ prayer must bee ioyned toogither intent wee may one accord one wel tuned melody protest wee haue none welfare pleaseth god haue care v insomuch full felicitie vppon trust wee come ryght foorth vntoo meane v continew euermore ryght way see lord iesus christ bee defaced take aduocate turne asyde one way owne fond fancy come passe popedome wee see papist haue bin ashamed alledge text perswade v pray saint peter saint paule yea saint pope owne forging rather idol diuell hath blowen intoo eare heere wee haue consider wee bee commaunded praye mutually one another bycause god hath also commaunded v seeke helpe comforte neyghbours handes lord willeth promiseth wee shall fynd maner also dooth saint iames speake itiames acknowledge sinnes sayeth one another pray one another say yee bee pressed temptation yee feele many infirmity vyces let euery man vnburthen self towards neyghbours say ala haue thing greeueth mee haue offended god manner yee doo bewray infirmity yee wel stiree yee vp pray one another lyke thing betweene sayncts deceassed v saint peter saint paule come tell v sunnes end wee myght pray haue eares long ynough heere prayer wee see god intended restreyne mennes mutuall praying one another conuersant world yit battell therfore haue neede prayer shall also pray syde v wee must doo lyke syde departed world v make aduocats god wee cannot make aduocate matter law shal past fyue shilling iudges power appoynt one aduocate listeth put office presumptuousenesse wee take vppon v make aduocats heauen pryde presumptuousnesse plucking god maiestie authoritie let v learne pray one another wee passe bound wander one way euery owne conceyt bee contented haue care member church wee bee bound doo take comfort ioy selues god hath voutsafed bynd churche vntoo v mutuall communicating shewe selues bee member bodie lord iesus christ therwithall let v tend head knowing prayer bee woorthie bee receyued rather bee foule filthie stinking lord iesus christ hallowed holinesse perfection knowing let v neuer presume open mouth call vppon god name mediatour assuring selues office bearewoord v make v bee heard wee may fynd god fauorable foreward help v meane v pray vntoo god boldly open mouth sayd text alledged euen eyghth ramans saint iames also wee haue seene third chapter epistle wee must call vppon god beleef wee haue iesus christ assuring selues came downe intoo world shead blud remission sinnes also incessantly god pray v wee bee fully resolued although wee bee wretched earthwoormes yit god accepteth v auoweth v child meanes alwayes mercifull receyuing prayer supplication bycause wee offer owne name selues good sooth foolish presumptio owne imagination bycause hath commaunded shewed v way hold v let v fall downe maiestie good god acknowledgment faultes praying pardon notwithstanding wee deserue bee quyte cut hope saluation forasmuch hath pleased call v promis v wee shalbee receyued mercie wee come fayth humilitie let v pray prepare harte wyse wee may make requestes alloweth therewithall beare infirmity wee may fayle obteine fauour though many imperfection prayer let v al say almyghtye god heauenly father c xlviii sermon sixth last vppon sixth chapter praying also mee opening mouth vtterance may bee giuen mee boldnesse vtter secret gospel ambassadour cheynes end say may speake freely becommeth mee speake yee may also knowe state tychicus deere brother faythful minister lord shall shewe thing haue sent vntoo purpose myght knowe state comfort harte peace brother charitie fayth god lord iesus christ grace bee loue lord iesus christ purenesse amen wee sawe morning wee ought bee carefull praying one anther frute commeth thereof namely euery man member sonne god must assure selfe whole church laboreth generally iesus christ must bee refuzed god pitie v heerewithal wee haue marke also saint paule commending himselfe prayer church myndfull bodye thing much excellenter wit due executing charge office committed vntoo man bee sicke necessitye world trubbled enemyes wee bee woont crye helpe succour wee would haue euery man occupye himselfe v inasmuch wee bee fleshly soone wee feele disease bodye wee bee sorye harte meane whyle wee forget cheef poynt wit thing concerne euerlasting saluation soules agein come seruing god euery man thinkes sufficient ynough himselfe doo without helpe neyghbours saint paule sheweth heere thinkes himselfe sufficient execute charge committed preaching gospell without help aboue therefore requyreth prayer church afterward sheweth therwithall maketh account therof lyfe notwithstanding hild prizon yea euen cheyned ye see saint paule hild streyt ward sory offender looketh dayly nothing death yit careth much lyfe aduauncement preferment god woorde insomuch leuer dye bee slothfull dooing thing inioyned effect thing wee haue remember vppon text trew epistle thessalonians2 thess noteth also reason desyred bee deliuered wicked faythlesse ceassed lay snare lawfull set store lyfe yit set cart horse say wee see textcoloss also written colossian alwayes regard discharge dewtie toowardes god specially respect church preaching gospell faythfully ease himselfe eschew daunger wherein sawe first lord call v charge whatsoeuer bee let v learne vnderstand owne infirmitie wee may bee succored wee neede presume whit vppon owne strength cunning consider god must bee fayne hold v vp strong hand wee haue neede resort vntoo yea desyre example saint paule bee comended prayer al member lord iesus christ deede good reason wee pray mutually also first poynt secondly although lawfull v desire men pray v wee bee sicke bee pinched affliction yit notwithstanding lyke wee must afore thinges pray comming god kingdome seeke aduauncing gloriemath make income thing else cace wee must learne bee wedded world transitorie lyfe cry helpe wee bee pinched aduersitie neede meane whyle forget thing ought bee preferred wherefore let v learne bee chare wyse lyfe wee may couet aboue thinges god glorified person whether bee life death paule sheweth v owne example epistle phillippiansphil c ye see haue remember first place sayeth expresly vtterance myght bee giuen opening mouth say god myght giue corage constancie myght speake fayntly freely preach gospell conceale thing myght serue let foorth grace iord iesus christ infinite benefytes hee hath brought v thing saint paule ment opening mouth experience sheweth without cause desyre god mouth myght bee opened gate doore vseth terme forealledged place fourth colossian shun death wit parte professe preaching gospell sticke say somewhat matter yit doo oftentymes disgyze ryght else speake fearfully hearer wot meane woords shalbee intangled bee short whereas shewe loud shirle voyce lord iesus christ god seruice trew religion fayth repentance touch glaunce rip vp matter serch bottom cannot away see perill hanging ouer heades vse freenesse howbeeit god trew seruantes must practize saint paule sayeth timothie2 tim b namely haue slauish cowardly hart march foorth freely vocation ouerpasse furiousnesse world haue brazen forehead erem sayd ieremie although see many hard battelles cannot please world dooing dewtie shall haue enmitie many men exalting grace lord iesus christ ought doo yit let ceasse go foreward ouercome lettes howbeeit forasmuch wee bee fearfull feeble god must bee fayne woorke v giue v boldnesse speake wee ought doo ynough v bee warned dewtie wee must also adde poynt resorting vntoo god acknowledgment wantes defaultes furthermore let v take notice generall preaching gospell hygh weyghtie charge vnlesse wee bee gouerned god spirit according also saint paule cryeth second corinthian sufficent co b speaketh preaching whereby men bee reconcyled vntoo god certifyed saluation whereby kingdome heauen opened whereby wee haue witnesse forgiuenesse sinnes whereby blud lord iesus christ giuen foorth wash v steynes abilitie meete sayeth saint paule except god make v able woorking v wee cannot much thinke doo good yea wee bee farre hauing power doo thing deede wee cannot much thinke one good thought vnlesse god giue v let called office teaching god church vnderstand owne weakenesse put themselues wholly intoo god hand bee made able discharge themselues knowing shall neuer bring passe hundreth part vnlesse bee giuen aboue therefore let men pray ordeyned bee teacher minister woord singular gift god wee haue shepherdes soules able guyde v well wherfore bee knowen great small maynteyne church hir perfect state soundnesse god must bee fayne giue power strength teache men must pray euery man procureth owne welfare saluation negligent therin token wee make reckening nother spiritual life common welfare church heerin wee see wee ought deeme pretend preache god woord dayes meane whyle fearefull dare open mouth vntill haue well bethought whether thing intend speake may offend delyght eares hir sort see wee popedome rowe betweene two streames would fayne haue knowen bee would fayne haue leaue preache purely yit doo beepeynt doctrine vtter play craftie merchantes nothing falshood according also saint paule vseth similitude2 cor speaking abused god woord purchace fauour world maynteyne saying men must stryke sayle hold hare hunt hound eschew occasio stumbling block man stryue ageinst streame say bee much wyzer god ho speaking saint paule telleth v iesus cerist must bee preached throughly men must go bury seeing rizen vntoo glorie haue voyce gospell ring loud shirle without dissimulation sayd afore moreouer euen persecutio sword fyre world see name themselues minister gospell would fayne currye fauell wyse bee shift lord iesus christ must stoope wrythe truthe fro mennes pleasure adayes preacher perceyue pleasant thing put men vnder yoke lord iesus christ say shall wee offend greate men authoritie ouer v wee rather win gentlenesse yi bee wyld beast dossing horne ageinst lord iesus christ cannot abyde bee disciplyne church yit men must preache still lyking trayterousnesse villanie yit notwithstanding man neede go farre fynd preacher gospell say leaud chopper chaungers turne topsiteruie knowing dewtie world see example manifestly eye therfore standeth v much hand mark well text saint paule sheweth gospell preached god hath commaunded except men go fully openly full mouth say speaketh secret gospell magnify doctrine else despized many wil need play suttle sharp witted fellowes according yee shall see sort presumptuous fellowes think theselues wyse gospell simplicitie cannot brucke would stye vp sore aboue cloud haue speculation myght amaze nother themselues man else vnderstand trew first syght men reade gospell shall see god dooth sort play nurce self sayeth bycause knoweth rudenesse bee little child lispeth v yit doctrine therof passeth wit man verie angel doo woonder itephe b inforced honour sayd another place pet let v vnderstand simplicitie seen gospell wisdome god incomprehensible vnlesse please reuele v holie spirit best learned doctor world yit wee fasten vpo nothing vnlesse god inlyghtned vnderstanding sayd two first chapter first epistle corinthian therfore cause paule telleth v great secret gospel vnderstad foorth god woorketh v tung man able vtter except god guyde heare bee taught also speake bee gouerned holy spirit addeth becommeth mee speake wherin hee sheweth yit agein ynough preache rote whatsoeuer come tung end must bee ruled god woord may perce men hart win obenience sayd another place bee language speache1 cor kingdome heauen consisteth gay rhetorik power god end may lyuelinesse may know teache v stirred vp god instrument doo seruis saint paule desyreth men pay wherfore let v learne step vp pulpit expound text scripture bee doone must special handsomnesse groweth garden men proceedeth extraordinarie goodnesse godrom c herein sheweth speaketh another place namely noman performe dewtie good faythfull teacher vnlesse bee sent sending importeth god giueth men requisyte executing charge bycause want themselues yit saint paule gloryeth bearing ambassage gospell notwithstanding bee poore prisoner yea cheynes man set man stock etter therfore vseth woord ambashadour intent imprizoning preiudice doctrine god sayeth god auoweth mee ambassadour albeeit men hold scorne mee though bee thus afflicted although men myght lothe mee looke vppon mee yit derogation office wherin god hath put mee say ambassadourship preaching gospell name text saint paule dooth magn fye honorable dignitie giuen vntoo declaring men cannot diminish glorieth greatly hild yron cheynes streyt prizon surely serued good record preached earnestly men ought receyue doctrine quietly without gey saying trew go charge follow god calling free hart shalbe seruants yit good proof v god sendeth tryall wee bee one whyle prizon another whyle driuen place place trubbled vexed dyuers wayes wee see agein wee bee wrongfully blamed torne peeces yit neuerthelesse doo hold still without swaruing one way thing may befall dooth god ratifye authentikly seale calling shewe hath made v seruants seeing saint paule prizon moued deny self could haue gone would forsaking truthe gospel yit hild stedfastly lyfe nothing continewall seeking magnify name lord iesus christ constancie seene saint paule myght well bee concluded bin counterfetting whe man shall preache afterward commeth aking tippe finger starteth backe would plucke pennie stake say dooth world see niggler player enterludes man great wryter excellent teacher deuyzed yit notwithstanding wil shed one drop blud god calleth shewe doctrine hee caryed abrode owne appeereth mocker woorthie haue men spit face haue shame reproche bin ignorant beast saint paule gloryeth band saying although world made reckening disdeyned yit neuerthelesse god auoweth ambassadour heerupon let v learne bee scornful despize god seruantes see hild prizon let v vnderstand god dooth exalt much greater dignity honour mounted aloft pulpites prison persisteth pure confession gospel much honorable degree al preach free liberty marke one poynt agein tyme god spareth v giueth v leyzure let v learne fence selues afore hand corage constancie wee may bee ambassadours whensoeuer shall please prizon middes threatenings enemy rage death bee put ageinst v thing wee haue marke vppon streyne let v bee dismayed number vnconstant person heare great sort imprizoned place one burnt another place hart gospell accounted forge themselues stumbling blockes shewe well neuer liuely roote fayth contrariwyse wee see lord iesus christ dooth serue himselfe calleth tryall putting intoo handes tyrantes enemy truth yit giueth inuincible constancie goodly strengthning fayth wee haue cause bee inflamed vnlesse god wrought certeyne strenght bee seene man liuing therefore wee must pray god arme v neede therwithal shewe v doctrine gospell sufficient authoritie selfe must bee authorized manner prouision yit must blud martirs god hath sanctified glory serue purpose bycause bee proctor men heereuppon paule addeth hath sent tychicus ephesus intent ephesian myght knowe state also sayd common edifying church whereas saint paule speaketh state dooings meaneth thing concerne bodie health thing else belongeth present lyfe referreth specially confession fayth free maynteyning gospell wee know man bee prison specially man renowme folke bee care saying ala god giue constancie agein diuell sleepeth tyme shall neuer man credit hath edifyed god church bee cast prison impeached shall thing bee sowed abrode disgrace bring intoo slaunder deface thing god hath doone meane ouerthrowe hath builded one satan policy therefore saint paule knowing men myght sowe abrode many lye say ho see yee warrant yee bee long borne rome specially hauing emperour court ageinst except yeeld may well bee sayd cace cleere others tush men make account see doting foole others one thing another euery man owne fancie saint paule say perceyuing many poore akelings myght hindered cast intoo perpleritie othersome myght bee kept backe comming gospell haue state knowen diuell slaunders put foyle mouthes backebyters stopped lykewyse colcaryers seeke nothing set trubble church also feare least begun profit gospell myght bee hindered occasion shet gate ageinst yit come saint paule intending preuent respectes sayeth hath sent tychicus wee see yit better text care alwayes make church continewe goodnesse could haue alledged letted ynough himselfe ouermatched enemyes could haue made beleeue leyzure thinke folkes owne part ynough doo dewtie rome without sending ouer sea confirme church great sort others besydes agein forasmuch god shet vp bin ynough man would haue iudged common opinion swarued syde euen death contenteth self faythfull witnesse martir lord iesus christ thinketh therwithall became preuent stumbling block diuell stirred vp one way defame gospell withall imployeth therto wee see heere example let v learne serue god wyze euen laste gaspe lyfe wee may haue care neyghbours also procure welare much wee accordingly god hath bound v thertoo intent tychicus receyued calleth brother faythfull minister christ giue credit men myght receyue record deede wee must iudeuer vttermost power serue church may bee aduaunced men knowe bee may haue mark may haue authoritie requisite example saint paule sheweth v vaynglorie fauor men commended tychicus maner desyre men know christ faythfull minister owne benefyte myght haue accesse reiected one woorth nothing woord myght receyned deserued theruppon end knit vp epistle withall saint paule prayeth brother myght haue peace loue fayth god lord iesus christ woord peace commonly taken saint paule welfare prosperitie deede signifyeth properly concord apostle accustomed hebrew tung haue vsed word importeth saint paule sayeth grace peace bee giuen vntoo first wisheth god fauour mercie prosper v goodnesse good thing therfore text sheweth prosperitie godly commeth god mere goodnesse elswhere therunto addeth also fayth charitie wherin wee see god reserueth self office sending v outward good wee want also specially giuing v spiritual gift wherof wee bee vtterly voyd destitute howbeit hard make men beleeue bicause alwayes drunke pryde imagining themselues haue abilitie mynd beleeue gospell discerne betweene good euill insomuch seeming needlesse thing pray god inlyghten yit must wee need bee punished ouerweening wee think wee haue eyther fayth charitie selues let v conclude bothe bee singular gift god let v confesse come side must bee fayme wee bee blynd wee haue woord pre ched v chawed v remayneth v doo swallowe downe yit shall wee continew dull lyke block timber god doo inlyghten v hys holie spirit bow hart obedience god woork certein eares shal haue bin beaten good doctrine tyme lyfe shalbee lost labour text sayd man shall scarsly fynd leaf holie scripture wherin god reserueth selfe giuing fayth good fayth wee selues see well holie scripture inlyghteneth v vtterly wee bee destitute god spirit wee compare selues fayth thing bringeth v wee shall well see iust cause god v doo homage great excellent fiftpsal sayd god looked downe vppon men found euery chone giuen ouer euill saped filthinesse one seeketh goodnesse agein speaking reason wisdome1 cor sayd stark ignorance bee vtterly brutish wee must become fooles selues wee profit god schoole hart bee full naughtinesse bornnesse eue chyldhood holie scripture reporteth euery forasmuch wee blynd vnderstanding froward wil let v come see fayth coprehending god secret know fatherly loue beareth v assure selues take hold heauenly lyfe neuerthelesse incomprehensible man vnderstanding shortephe acquaynted grace lord iesus christ extendeth hygh lowe deepe wyde wee haue seene herteoofore one syde consider fayth syde enter intoo selues examin selues sort fynd selues vtterly destitute goodnesse good reason wee confesse vntill god giue v fayth wee haue fayth thing wee haue mark vppon text much bee sayd charitie apparant euery man wedded loue self affection arye v away wee seeke owne profit continually hinderance men yit lust wee cannot loue neyghbours would rather oppresse must need haue charitie elswhere god must breake cursed inclinatio v namely ouer excessiue louing selues moreo er wee haue renounced selues wee must vnderstand wee bee indetted neyghbours wee must indeuer doo dewtie towards yee see fayth charitie iustly called speciall gift god saint paule dooth iustly text say charitie fayth bee vntoo frow god father certeyne wish made feynedly saying doth v vnderstand wee must haue god hand wherfore let v lay downe foolish ouerweening let v vnderstand spirituall benefyts wee haue free gift god wherby hee sheweth declareth liberalitie effectually towards v certeyne perfection christian consisteth faythe charitie wherfore let v conclude whatsoeuer belongeth saluation soules woorthie bee esteemed commended wee haue none owne growing commeth v abouemath c accordingly sayd confessing fayth nother flesh blud doo shewe v iesus christ sonne godmath father reuealeth v lykewyse also lord iesus christ sayethluke father thank thee thou haste hidden thing wyse reueled little one therfore let v learne bee little one may bee god schollers bee fooles selues wee may bee filled wisdome yeeld honor according measure gift wee shall haue receyued bee soo wicked chalendge prayse vntoo v dooth iustly ryghtly reserue self howbeeit saint paule matcheth lord iesus christ god father doo v vnderstand wee obteyne nothing meanes hath reconcyled v vntoo god cause wee bee corrupted nature wee bee voyd goodnesse full fraught vyces short altogither abhominable vtterly estraunged lord iesus christiohn b coloss c b fountayne al goodnesse cause indewed fulnesse grace according sayd father hath giuen hym spirit certein portion wyse v may drawe wee want thing fountayne neuer bee drawen drye wee haue one drop spirituall gift flowing downe vppon v lord iesus christ cundi pype lord iesus christ hath office giuing v owne pleasure whatsoeuer requisyte necessarie welfare respect mediator wee haue seene iiii chapter also saint paule yeeldeth moreouer giueth v faith charitie owne authoritie power setteth equall degree father let v vnderstand lord iesus christes office inlyghtening v fayth reforming hart belongeth respect mediator god minister also owne maner speeche paules would otherwyse agree heere way man myght aske question saint paule prayeth god giue fayth faythlesse charitie fleshly vntoo brother say bodie church church bee god child alredye bee begotten agein holie ghoste meane haue fayth charitie herin saint paule sheweth v ynough god begin fayth v vnlesse continew end lyke wee call fayth gift god must also make growe increace day dayphil ment saying giuen vntoo v beleeue iesus christ also suffer therfore god giuing fayth vntoo v wyse dooth prepare v wee myght beleeue gospell listed afterward bring consent owne go foreward selues power god hath dispozed v beleeue must also giue v affection may touche v quicke afterward driue v forewarde giue v abilitie perseuer may profit go foreward confirmed euen end cause paule speaking heere faythfull brought alredie intoo good way grace god manifested sayeth neuerthelesse god must bee fayne giue gift hold euen growing wel fayth loue therby haue warning pray god increase strengthen fayth inflame v charitie therwithall make v knowe imperfection although wee see number come neere v yit wee conceyue pryde stand owne conceit though wee come fayth already wherefore let v assure selues way long bee worlde therefore let v inforce selues foreward perfection fayth euer wee fynd among men certeyne god fynd much amisse farre foreward soeuer wee bee well euer wee haue profited charitie man shall come farre short fynding v hath forgotten self thrust couetousnesse ambition vnder foote thing may v fro seeking benefyte neyghbour imploying selues doo seruis sith let v learne sayd knowe owne imperfection wyse wee may mislyke selues bee induced therby doo better wee haue done hithertoo although men prayse commend v yit let v learne confesse humblenesse meeknesse wee bee yit farre short atteyning mark hereuppon saint paule addeth agein grace bee loue lord iesus christ vncorruptly wherin sheweth bee brother e euen professe themselues liue gospel loue lord iesus christ yea sayth soundnesse bee affection corrupteth banisheth away hand without cause sayd wee see fewe loue iesus christ ryghtly soundly multitude pretend holdwith godspell greate ynough number renounce god work haue confessed word agein man examin narrowly haue yit good token liue orderly ynough without blame myght bee sayd hipocrisie shall see ouershoote themselues turning hand example wee see persecution adayes discouer haue lyuely roote doo temptation lykewyse insomuch haue liued good reputation doo afterward tur e asyde go astray cause therof new blocke satan casteth way stumbling stocke make turne good way therfore throughly reckened man shall fynd verye fewe loue iesus christ vncorruptly say haue rew stedfastnesse stoutnesse bee tempted eyther feare death pouertie yit notwithstanding ter continew stil theyr calling shew holie ghost reigneth possesseth bottomes hart euen vntill bee quyte rid imperfection flesh dout perfectest haue store lyke may well bee tree shall seeme vtterly withered farre discerned outwardly braunches yit roote continue still force tree shal safe although superfluous boughes cut yit spring againe appeere playnly still alyue within euen wee day day cut corrputions flesh yit v vntil wee bee come fulnesse incomprehensible perfection wheruntooo wee labour atteyne let v fall downe maiestie good god acknowledgment fault praying voutsafe open eye wee may consider infirmity vyces v yea also vntoo wee bee giuen god deliuered v drawe v away day day theruppon let v moorne acknowledging selues bee wretched offender well woorthie bee condemned pitied v let v profit woord may bee amendment thing yit amisse v bringing therof passe let v call vppon grace holie spirit bycause wee knowe needfull v respect rechlesnesse yea rather rebelliousnesse v yit let v ceasse go still heauenly perfection wheruntoo calleth v may please graun grace v also people nation earth c finis glorie honor prayse bee alonly vntoo god lord iesus christ amen
